111111.content:
Midstride, in the very heart of a park Hinata felt a sharp jolt of pain shoot up from her big toe. "Ow!" She yelped as she instinctively put the injured foot into the air, holding the soles of her sandal as the pain began to fade. It was unlike anything Hinata had ever before experienced, it wasn't just a prick or something but it felt like her toe was actually get spun and twisted around by some amazing force; whatever caused it was definitely unique to say the least. Hopping on her good leg Hinata approached a nearby wooden bench.

When Hinata let out her yelp of pain Naruto momentarily felt bad but it was quickly replaced by his premature joy, "Yes I am so going to be found! I knew that was a good idea!" But the jumpsuit ninja spoke too soon, the next instant Hinata's foot was high in the air bobbing in every direction as she hopped. It took most if not all of Naruto's ninja training to not get blown away into the ground where he would likely be crushed by the hopping Hinata. The only way he managed to avoid this fate was by desperately holding onto Hinata's big toe, using chakra in his hands as an added measure.

Just as Naruto found this safe method the hopping mayhem ended, around his friends foot was now solid wood instead of the listless air. The size dimensions through the knucklehead ninja off for a moment but he soon realized Hinata had planted her foot on the seat of a common park bench. Turning around Naruto about leapt out of his jumpsuit, Hinata's massive blueish eyes were deeply scanning her foot for what caused her pain; just what Naruto wanted but it was surprising to see Hinata's face so massive! It looked damn near godly and even....beautiful. The shrunken ninja blushed at the idea and instead turned his attention to leaping to and fro in an attempt to grab the giantess' attention.

It didn't take particularly long for Hinata to find the cause of her sudden foot pain, bright orange against a tan foot and navy blue sandal really stood out, plus the small being was jumping around making even easier. " It kinda reminds me of Naruto, orange and jumping around like that....what a cute bug..." Hinata quickly blushed at the thought of Naruto even if in comparison to a bug by her feet.

"A....BUG?!" Naruto yelled, jaw wide open in disdain. "I am NOT a bug Hinata! It's me Naruto!"

His pleas fell on deaf ears though, even with Shinobi hearing the Hyuga didn't grasp so much as a wisp of noise. "Careful little one." She cooed, "If it were anyone else you might just have gotten stepped on. Go back to your little bug family, it's ok go on."

Gently Hinata nudged the "bug" via her index finger, but it held on tight to her toe. Naruto fought to remain where he was, knowing full well that the chances of him finding another person to help him were slim to none without at least breaking a few bones in the process. Plus Hinata was debatably the nicest girl in the entire village of Konoha, if someone like Tsunade found him like this.....Naruto didn't even want to think of it.

"Come on little one. I'm sure my feet are soft and all but go back to your family..." Again Hinata gently nudged Naruto thinking he was a bug, slowly starting to get a minor frustration towards the little thing. Not to mention her leg was starting to feel a tad stiff atop the bench like this.

Stubborn as always Naruto held his ground, shout Hinata's name to the heavens in continued attempt to get her to realize who he was. "Come on!" Hinata said with her voice going up a little bit; she shook her foot in a weak attempt to remove Naruto from her toe but he stayed strong.

"I gotta try something new." Naruto muttered, slightly shaky from Hinata's attempts to remove him. "Maybe if I tickle her or something..." Careful not to jostle his flow of chakra too badly Naruto began rubbing his hands in small circles against Hinata's silky soft toe, and even nuzzling his own face against it for good measure, regardless of how demeaning it was.

A surprised gasp escaped Hinata's mouth, her face turning to the side as an eye closed and lips twitched at the sides; desperate not to burst out laughing. "That feels....really good." She realized, all the stress she seemed to ever have in her feet seemed to melt away; as if the bug had the touch of an angel. Extending her finger again Hinata gently brushed it along the "bugs" back. "Fine, you can stay there if you really want to." she smiled almost motherly at the bug.

Finally releasing himself from Hinata's toe Naruto leapt up and down for joy, "Not quite what he was shooting for but at the very least it meant he wouldn't be discarded now!

"From now on I guess you can be my little foot bug if you want."

"HUH?" Naruto muttered almost humorously, jaw open.

It took a moment for Naruto to reply. Both he and Sakura knew that Tsunade was without a doubt the best medical ninja of the age, but they also knew that she was probably the moodiest ninja too. On more than one occasion Tsunade had let her temper control her and well...whatever town she was in happened to suffer. Now Naruto, Konoha's greatest mischief maker, at a mere couple inches tall at best was going to go see her. Naruto wasn't sure if Tsunade would make him normal again, or make him a slave; it was about a fifty-fifty chance.

Wearing a deviant smirk Sakura leaned forward so her lips were directly before the ninja in her palm. "Says the girl who's over a hundred times your size. The girl who's toes,fingers, and pretty much everything can whip you like a doll."

Upon entering Sakura walked to a desk with a young man tending to some paperwork, as soon as he saw Sakura he stood up. "Hey Sakura, here to see the Hokage for some advice again?"

111322.title: Tayuya caught him

choices: I suppose we could get some lunch
1113221.content:
Tayuya appeared to be deep in thought for a moment, Naruto hated to admit it but the sound ninja was beautiful.

"I think I should take you home with me." She stated.

Naruto tilted his head in a confused manner "Home? The Sound Village is kinda far isnt it?"

Surprisingly Tayuya simply laughed "Oh no, I'm a part of the rogue ninja reformation project. I'm one of the 'good guys' now. I live in the Leaf Village."

"Rogue Ninja Reformation Project?" Naruto repeated, trying to remember if he had heard about it. He vaguely recalled overhearing Kakashi speak of it once.

"Guess I should've payed attention" he whispered with a laugh.

"I'm going to place you in my cleavage to keep you safe, don't get any ideas though this is just a safety measure." Tayuya muttered, averting her gaze and blushing.

Naruto smiled cockily "Your face says differently." He mumbled low enough for him not to be heard.

"So anyway.....just don't be perverted." Tayuya told him rapidly as she pulled back her shirt and placed him between her surprisingly fair cleavage. Blushing slightly Tayuya leapt up and began running along the rooftops of the leaf village to get home.

"Wow I thought you were flatchested." Naruto blurted rudely, snuggling slightly to Tayuya's left breast.

Tayuya appeared as if she would get made for a moment but just laughed, nope this shirt of mine is just really loose. I actually am the proud owner of C-Cups."

"Cool" Naruto said.

About ten minutes passed before Tayuya pulled Naruto out. "Here we are." She said as she beckoned to her room. It appeared normal, kinda messy but otherwise perfectly normal.

"So uh what now?" Naruto asked. Tayuya smiled as if she was waiting for that question to be asked
1113221.title: Taken to Tayuya's new home

choices: She stopped to do something else
11132211.content:
Naruto looked around the room as the giantess swayed through the tide of clothes. A sigh fell between her smoth lips as she swung herself upon the sofa.

Her brown eyes stared into the air as she blew away the thich strand of red hair that stayed between her two eyes. Always threatening to blind her.

"Hey!" Naruto cried out as her hand absentmindedly stroked the feeble ninja as he stumbled from the blows. Yet she ignored his words as she searched the ceiling.
"I got it!" She spoke, sitting upp sharply and smiling down at Narutos dazed body as her fell between her legs. "Do you like me?" She asked cutely, her eye's shimmering with lust.

Naruto caught on,
"Uh..." He looked around for a second, smiling at what it might lead to. "Yes!" He screamed up as the goddess's movement shook himm off his feet. He felt his own heart pound as she lent forward. The bandages on her head were almost close enough to touch as Tayuya gazed down shyly.
"I've never done this before..." She muttered, as the ninja jumpped up and down,
"It's fine!" Naruto pleaded, making a smile light her face.
"Well... ok then" She spoke softly, her blush faded as she reached down for the smiling ninja.

Later

Tayuya giggled softly as her feet sandwiched the ninja, crushing his body gently like a toy.
"This isn't what I had.. in... mind" Naruto spoke slowly as the girl slipped away one of her socks, sliding it over the poor boys face as she finaly tugged it away from her toes. She pinned the boy to her other socked foot as she glaired down at him with a smile.
"What did you have in mind? Hm?" Tayuya spoke, the mocking voice pierced through the boys courage.

He stayed silent for a second before Tayuya mashed his face into the soft fabric and her bare toe. A yell fell through Naruto's mouth as the fun continued.

He felt the red haired godded smerk as she picked him from her sticky sock with her scrunched toes. he foot swung down like an axe to the ground as she let Naruto touch the ground.

"I love you to" She spoke, an evil smerk crossed her deadly face as she slowly rubbed her foot over his frail body, grinding him down on the soft floor. "Hmph, no matter how dull you are" She crossed her arms with a sock at the ready.
11132211.title: Not what I ment!

choices: Tayuya heads to the small shop she spoke about
On the way there Tayuya surprisingly runs into Sakura!
11132212.content:
"Lunch?" repeated Naruto, well he was a tad bit hungry. Amazingly the whole shrinking ordeal had silenced his usual eating habits.

"Yeah...unless you have other ideas?" Naruto gulped slightly as he eyed in the teasing look in her eyes and the smirk on Tayuya's lips.

"AH NO!" he coughed for a moment, "I mean no uh no lunch is cool with me." Naruto stated with a quick smile as he felt the river of sweat slide down his jacket wearing back.

"Good. Now let me just change then we'll be off."

After being placed at top of the sturdy desk in her room Naruto eyed Tayuya as she apparently went through the attire in her closet. It didn't take long for her find something, the redhead was never a picky dresser, kicked open a drawer on a cabinet opposite of her bed and pulled what appeared to be a pair of blue-jean shorts.

Looking over at the tiny blonde Tayuya faked something of a glare.

"I'm going to go change now. If you even try to sneak a peek due to your small size my demon summons are having YOU for lunch."

Tayuya chuckled as she watched Naruto nearly go pale. A moment later she was out of the room.

"Sakura....Tayuya....man why are the awesome girls always the most violent." Naruto mumbled to himself, figuring that Jiraiya must think the same with Tsunade...

After changing into a slightly tighter but still loose for the most part black tee and shorts, Tayuya grumbled slightly as she retraced her steps back to her room. Despite what she had said Tsunade would have her head on a platter if she purposely killed Naruto. Part of her reformation was vowing to never slay any of the leaf unless a mission called for it, which incidentally would be something that the ANBU not her would take care of.

Tayuya didn't liked being on something of a leach but the girl was smart enough to understand what Tsunade was getting at, spending the last six months in The Leaf Village had shown her what life was like outside of being Orochimaru's puppet, and hell still being alive was nothing short of a blessing so the redhead figured why toss that all way. She could have a burning temper at times but she wasn't stupid.

"Alright Uzumaki let's go." she stated as she walked in through the door. Naruto was relaxing for a moment before he felt himself leave the ground and before long meeting Tayuya in the eyes.

"This time I got a new spot for you." She said popping off a cap, similar to the one she wore during her Sound Four days, she had placed on her head shortly after walking in.

"HEY!" called out Naruto before he placed at top of her head and soon enough surrounded in darkness.

"Not cool..." the blonde grumbled causing Tayuya to smirk.

"Too bad, so sad, now stay there till we hit a place nearby. Don't want me kicking your tiny ass now do you?"

Naruto huffed in frustration as he sat down doing his best to get comfortable despite it all.
11132212.title: I suppose we could get some lunch

choices: Having heard Sakura, Naruto pops up from underneath Tayuya's cap
Naruto's fallen asleep while Sakura joins Tayuya for lunch
111322122.content:
Sakura sighed as she used a handkerchief to wipe the sweat off her brow. The humidity was slightly higher then expected and with the temperature already a tad bit high made for a weather forecast that was as Shikimaru would say rather troublesome for someone like Sakura who was running around town taking care of errands for Tsunade (Shizune was also sharing the same fate...).

While she was almost done Sakura exhaled softly as she took a short break resting in the shade projected from a nearby building.

For whatever reason she was surprised to not see Naruto around town. Usually the goofball of a blonde was dashing here and there, eating Ramen at Ichiraku's, or pestering someone to train with him if he couldn't find Kakahi or Jiraiya.

'Always on the move...' thought Sakura with a whimsical smile. It had taken a while but she had soften up just a bit on Naruto. After Sasuke's departure Sakura felt as if a hole had been craved into her very being but Naruto had shown her that for better or worse she still had him in her life. She wasn't alone and for that she was thankful. Sure he still pestered her from time to time but she had grown somewhat accustom to his antics.

Which is why she was surprised that she had yet to run into him considering she had been out in the streets all morning long...

Suddenly Sakura caught sight of the redheaded ninja, Tayuya. The pink-haired girl in truth had no real beef with the former Sound member, despite the fact that their villages had clashed with each other in the past.

Sakura even recalled a moment where she had decked a couple of boy ninjas that were giving Tayuya a hard time. The "punks" (a very mild way of describing what Tayuya had actually called them) were practically begging for a fight so the redhead could be incarcerated. Tayuya was just about to loose it when Sakura floored the apparent leader. After a quick tussle the boys fled screaming curses at Sakura. Tayuya had a rather difficult time showing her thanks but Sakura knew with the handshake the two had shared that the redhead was grateful.

Long story short, after that incident the two had become something of acquaintances. Sakura respected Tayuya's strength and like with Naruto could understand the outcast feel she must feel. Although she wasn't sure what Tayuya saw in her causing Sakura to chuckle.

Curious as to what the other girl was up to Sakura sprung to her feet and sprinted over in Tayuya's direction.

"Tayuya!"

The redheaded girl blinked in surprise as she shifted her vision slightly and spotted Sakura heading toward her. The pink-haired girl waved with her free hand while carrying what appeared to be a list in the other.

"Yo" stated Tayuya rather casually just as Sakura reached her.

"The old bat have you working again, huh?" Tayuya stated as she eyed the object in Sakura's hand.

"Ahahaha...yeah something like that. Not sure if she'd appreciate the name though she already gets on Naruto's case when he calls her grandma." said Sakura with a mild chuckle.

Speaking of Naruto though...
111322122.title: Sakura and Tayuya

choices: Sakura thinks its a bug, but Tayuya covered for him
1113221221.content:
Naruto spent a good ten minutes beneath Tayuya's gray cap, trapped between it and her crimson red hair. Not that it really bothered him, but he just felt kinda...left out in his current situation.

That quickly changed when Naruto heard Sakura's voice. Upon hearing his childhood crushes voice Naruto ran to the edge of Tayuya's cap and poked the upper half of his body through, looking from the top of Tayuya's head to the top of Sakura's pink hair.

The two seemed to be sharing a good conversation, "When did they get so buddy buddy?" He mumbled.

"So what're you doing?" Sakura asked with a curious look, Tayuya remained a mystery to her.

"Going to get some food, probably at Ichiraku." The sound ninja shuffled her feet slightly, probably wanting to leave before her appetite got the better of her, or if she slipped up about Naruto.

Leaning forward Sakura smiled at the ninja, "Mind if I come along? I might find Naruto there."

"S-She's looking for me?" Naruto asked aloud in amazement, his jaw open.

Normally Tayuya would have probably refused but through some sort of impulse she agreed, "Sure, let's go together."

"It's a date!" The pink haired kunoichi winked with short laugh.

Hearing it all Naruto repeated, "D-Date?" Instantly a mental image of the two female ninjas kissing entered his mind, quickly followed by a sudden nose bleed.

"Good god I'm as bad as the pervy Sage," Naruto realized, still having uncontrollable fantasies about the two beauties before him. Distracted by his perverted thoughts Naruto failed to realize he was slipping, until finally he did, he fell off of Tayuya's head and descended to the ground.

Seeing some sort of bug fall from Tayuya's scalp Sakura bent over at where Naruto landed, through some miracle he lived.
1113221221.title: Clumsy Naruto

choices: The girls continue their lunch date but first who grabbed Naruto?
Shockingly a bird swooped down and snatched up Naruto confusing him for a bug!
11132212211.content:
Naruto grunted sharply as he thanked his luck for not ending up in a broken bleeding pile on the ground. Somehow he had lived through the massive free fall, maybe the demon fox had reinforced his skin...or so Naruto thought briefly still reeling from the impact. He was definitely going to feel it later tomorrow...

Blinking as his head seem to finally get around to finish spinning he suddenly felt a presence tower over him. Sure enough he was now completely covered in Sakura's immense shadow. If he could Naruto would have leaped back onto his feet unfortunately one he was barely getting feeling back in his legs and two attempting to do so now would most likely leave him laying in a crumbled heap.

Sakura meanwhile stared at the miniature object on the floor. It had seemingly fallen from at top of Tayuya's head and curiosity getting the better of her Sakura just had to know what "that thing" was.

Leaning she gasped and nearly screamed in surprise. Luckily the pink-haired girl was able to suppress her yell.

"...Naruto?" she asked extending a hand out toward the blonde.

Before Naruto could response a second massive hand crashing down in front of him. He already knew who it belong to.

"What do you think you're doing?" asked a curious Tayuya, an almost unreadable look on her face.

"Huh? Oh well...um..." Sakura really wasn't sure how to continue so...

"Naruto fell out of your cap."

Being blunt probably was the best way after all.

"Tch, dumbass." mumbled Tayuya under her breath.

"So...why was Naruto inside your cap anyway?" asked Sakura, eyebrow raised at Tayuya.

The redhead sighed guess there was no way around it now though she did make a mental note of pounding the crap out of Naruto when he returned to normal-size. So deciding to bring Sakura into the know Tayuya shrugged.

"Found him that way.He shrunk himself the dumb piece of..."

"Okay I get it." stated Sakura with a quick interruption. Suddenly she remembered that neither one of them had checked up on the fallen Naruto.

"Naruto you okay?" "Hey get your clumsy ass up, Uzumaki."

Naruto chuckled for a moment. They were both obviously concerned and perhaps it was the slight head trauma influencing him but it was humorous to hear the two vastly differing speech patterns.

"Just fine...Sakura, Tayuya." answered Naruto with a brief thumbs up. Relived the two girls reached toward the blonde ninja.
11132212211.title: Sakura recognizes tiny Naruto

choices: Switch over to Naruto and see how he's doing
111322122112.content:
Suddenly before either girl could react a black crow descended and nabbed Naruto in it's clawed feet.

"What the hell?"

"Naruto!"

"Sakura, Tatuya...GET ME DOWN FROM HERE!" yelled the blonde as the bird ascended higher and higher into the heavens.

The girls exchanged a look with one another before wasting no more time in chasing after the feathered thief.

"Son of a..." growled Tayuya, Naruto's kidnapper should could fly and it was quickly extending it's lead on the two shinobi. The redhead was just about to pull out her flute when Sakura caught on and ordered her to decease.

"What? Why!" the near-fuming ninja argued a glare shot straight at Sakura. The younger pink-haired girl ignored it and explained that if her summons ravaged the town Tayuya would be in serious hot water. Remembering the restriction placed upon her Tayuya cursed rather loudly and rather recklessly. Sakura sighed with a smile even though Tayuya had "educated" her on a few new cusses (were those even real words, she wondered) at least the redhead had gotten the message and used a little self-control.

Sakura herself had been ready to toss a kunai at the bird in hopes of scaring it but the problem with that mostly came with the obvious of either striking Naruto or fatally hitting the crow causing them both to fall to the ground before either girl could get to them in time.

In any case the bird was still ahead of them and they were running out of options to stopping it from having Naruto as a snack.
111322122112.title: Taken by surprise!

choices: Oh crap! The bird's coming under attack!
1113221221122.content:
Naruto wasn't exactly having fun either the bird's talons had wrapped themselves rather tightly around his small form making it hard for him to perform any jutsu much less move around freely.

"You stupid bird! I'm no bug, I'm a freaking ninja!" yelled Naruto in pure frustration. How had it had made the mistake was beyond the tiny blonde but he figured that if he kept insulting it's intelligence perhaps it would wise up and realize just what it was carrying home.

Unfortunately the crow wasn't getting the idea no matter how much Naruto yelled out.

'Dammit this thing still wants to have me for dinner...gotta think gotta get out of this mess before that can happen.'

Naruto wished he could spot Sakura or Tayuya but being so high above the ground made things rather difficult. He didn't doubt that the two girls were still after the bird but for the moment it looked as if he was on his own.

'Hmm...maybe if I continue to shake around I'll break the hold this darn thing has on me...' thought the blonde as he began to rattle and roll as best he could in hopes of at least getting a tad bit free.
1113221221122.title: Naruto's on his own for now...

choices: Rules be damned the girls are taking down that bird!
Seems someone else already has their eyes on bird...
11132212211221.content:
The blonde ninja struggled for what seemed to be the time-span of several minutes before he at last got at the very least his upper body free.

"Sweet!" he cheered with a grin.

With his arms now free Naruto moved to his next problem getting free from the bird without him falling to his doom. The Kyuubi had seemingly protected him last time but from this height...well he wasn't so sure..

Still he had to come up with something before the crow became wise to his semi-escape...

Down below Tayuya was still keeping her temper in check, a very difficult thing for the redhead to do I assure you, as she followed Sakura. Being a medic the pink-haired girl could still faintly feel Naruto's chakra even when he was so far away in the clouds.

"Dammit is he close or what?!" yelled out the older girl.

Sakura focused for a moment before pointing out into the distance.

"There! That's the bird!"

Tayuya smirked before speeding up to catch up with Sakura. Tayuya chuckled slightly before giving Sakura a surprising thumbs up.

"Great now we can take that feathered bastard down!"

Once again the redhead reached for her flute.

"No don't! Didn't I already point out what will happen if you use your summons in the village!"

Tayuya spat in anger as she cursed.

"Well what the fu..are we suppose to do! The old bag should understand that if we don't do something that damn feather duster's gonna eat that dumbass Uzumaki!"

Harsh words for sure but Tayuya did have a point and reluctantly Sakura agreed, deciding if Tayuya would get punished then she too would serve as part of the blame. It was the least she could do for the redhead.
11132212211221.title: Naruto's half way free and a look at SakuTayu

choices: Let's get you back to Konohagakure
111322122112212.content:
The bird flew all the way to Kirigakure and Naruto, who had realised that falling would kill him, had stopped struggling. Suddenly, a lava ball the size of a pea struck the bird and it dropped Naruto and falling from the air. Naruto closed his eyes, expecting to hit the ground or water, but to his surprise, what he landed on felt like skin. He opened his eyes to find himself being studied by a beautiful woman who appeared to be quite young. Her very long hair was russet-red, and her eyes were jade green. Her hair covered her right eye and she was wearing webbing as an inner layer, with a blue garment covering it; her clothes didn't seem to be unpretentious.

"Why would a bird have a toy?" the woman wondered.

"I'm NOT a toy!" Naruto shouted, making the woman almost drop him.

"Ho, sorry ma'am. This REALLY hasn't been my day." Naruto said. "I'm Naruto Uzumaki."

"I, little one, am the Fifth Mizukage." The woman said smiling. "How HAS your day been?"

Naruto told her everything. The Mizukage smiled and said...
111322122112212.title: Meeting the Fifth Mizukage

choices: But thats just a joke I like telling. You won't be tortured
1113221221122121.content:
The Mizukage's lips formed into a smile, shivering slightly Naruto felt remiscent of Tsunade, this girl was just as scary. "I don't think you outta head back to Konoha. In fact, I'll just keep you for myself."

In the woman's clenched fist Naruto started feeling his emotions swell up. "What?! Why the hell?!"

"Because, if a mere bird could get you away from your village than Akatsuki will have no problem. I will be damned if Akatsuki will get their hands on the Nine-Tails because Konoha's ninja can't even keep an eye on a bug of a ninja." Taking a deep breath the Mizukage smiled gently," Plus you might be good for some other 'activities' as well." Giggling slightly her eyes quickly looked at specific points of her body, feet, breasts, and butt along with other areas.

Not registering the threat Naruto kept going in his rage, "You can't hold me here just cause you're some lonely old bat! I am a ninja and I will be treated like one!" Roaring fiercely the ninja struggled against the girl's massive hand, attempting to get free; futilely of course.

The Mizukage was silent, processing what Naruto said. Yet all she registered was old and lonely and immediately her face contorted into an angry expression. "I'll have you know I can get a man anytime I want you rude little brat! And as for my age I'm a hell of a lot younger than your grandma of a Hokage."

Naruto rolled his eyes, "That's not saying much." luckily he wasn't heard.

The Mizukage took a deep breath, the rest of Naruto's rant coming into memory. Smirking she tightened her fists grip around the ninja, "You know you're right. You're a ninja, an enemy ninja. Ever wonder what enemies do to one another?"

The hyperactive ninja gulped loud enough for even the Mizukage to hear, "Um.......sorry?"

Chuckling slightly the Mizukage teasingly traced a finger along Naruto's face, it being too small for her to really trace the details. " Too late for that, and the answer was relatively simple too. Enemies are to be captured and tortured. For information along with other things....."

"T-tortured?" Naruto repeated, several beads of sweat sliding down his cheek.

The Mizukage nodded, "Yes.........
1113221221122121.title: Behind enemy lines

choices: Naruto decidesNOT to risk causing a war and reluctantly stays the Mizukage's pet
He asks to be let out of his cage
11132212211221211.content:
"Yes, but that's just a joke I like telling. You won't be tortured."

Naruto fainted.

The Mizukage sighed and grabbed one of his legs then dunked his head in the water and shook him underwater. She pulled him up to see he was coughing and sputtering.

" Sorry for the bad joke and how I woke you up." The Mizukage said sincerely.

"Sorry for the "lonely old lady" commitment, its just this day's really getting to me and I know about how Kirigakure used brutal methods to train its ninja, added on to how Zabuza Momochi, Kisame Hoshigaki, Raiga Kurosuki, and Suigetsu Hozuki have all tried killing me before and I don't have a good record with people from Kirigakure." Naruto said.

"Apology accepted. But I'm still going to keep you." the female kage said before her lips enveloped Naruto's face in a gentle kiss. She took Naruto home with her and put him in a hamster cage.

"Welcome to your new home pet." The Mizukage smiled
11132212211221211.title: Apologies and Ownership

choices: I've had a long day and I think my feet deserve proper care.
I'll just play a game with you, if you win you get to eat.
111322122112212111.content:
Naruto felt his fist clench and tighten to the point his nails dug deep enough to draw blood. He wanted to badly to punch this woman, to knock some sense into her and escape. As much as he wanted to do this he didn't, his first instinct was to go for it but as if he were actually there a mental image from Jiraiya came to mind, the image saying "Don't be an idiot!"

Although either a memory or a figment of his imagination Naruto took Jiraiya's words seriously and pondered what would happen if he did escape. Although he thought for only a couple moments Naruto came up with every repercussion of a reckless action like that.

First off there would be the issue of how he would get away from one of the world's greatest ninjas, and how to get back to his village. Kirigakure wasn't exactly a neighboring country and chances were very very high that Konoha wouldn't have patrols that far out looking for him, the bird traveled well over two countries, what are the odds that his village would pick the farthest one that by impossible odds a bird carried him to?

Yet this was only issues involving him personally, on a global scale it could be a disaster. Konoha would no doubt be outraged by The Mizukage's actions, but on the other hand the Mizukage and in turn her country would probably show outrage about them losing the Nine-Tails and taking it away from their protection. Then of course word would spread and the other countries would jump in about how Konoha wouldn't be fit to defend the Nine-Tails if they couldn't even stop a bird from getting him.

There would no doubt be months of arguments and political debates, heck if he did make it back Tsunade would probably make Naruto's life a living hell. He shuddered at the idea of what the Hokage would do to him in that scenario.

Everyone would argue until eventually someone snapped and sent a group to retrieve the Nine-Tails, and this of course no matter whether it would work or not would be found out and chances are it would start a world war between the countries. As for Akatsuki, no telling what they would do.

Somehow Naruto processed all of this in seconds and realized that not just for himself but for the world he would have to be a good pet to the Mizukage.

Slowly Naruto's fist unclenched as he took a look around the empty hampsters cage meant to be his home, " Look's cosy." He lied, the cage had none of those wooden chips one would expect, no food or water either for that matter. "What am I supposed to live off of?" Naruto found himself asking his owner.

The Mizukage smirked as if expecting the question, " That would have to be up to how you do that day. You'll have to earn your meals like a ninja should. Do poorly at your jobs and you'll be lucky to get dirt from beneath my sandals. Do a good job and I'll give you a reasonable meal. Go above and beyond and I might get a gourmet chef to give you a meal to die for."

The shrunken ninja shrugged, despite being twisted circumstances for a human the idea itself did seem fair. "So what do I gotta do to get my food for today?"

"What indeed?" The giantess giggled seductively, holding a finger before her lips.

Quickly getting impatient Naruto asked again, "What do I have to do?"

Not avoiding the question this time the Mizukage answered, "Simple....
111322122112212111.title: Naruto actually made a smart move

choices: follow Naruto and the Mizukage as the game begins
See how things are in Konoha then come back to Naruto and the Mizukage
1113221221122121112.content:
"Ok...um...What kind of game?" Naruto asked.

The Mizukage giggled. "I'm thinking of a game of tag...that includes the use of jutsu." the attractive woman said "

"Swell. I always wanted to run from a kage-ranked giantess that's able to spew acid and lava...that is if what I've heard about you is true." Naruto muttered.

Laughing the leader of Kirigakure nodded. "Its all true, pet. I assure you of that. I won't hurt you with my jutsu though, just capture you."

Naruto sighed in relief at that information, then a thought struck him.

"Uh...Ms...um...Madam Mizukage...what exactly happens if YOU win?"

Hearing how he addressed her, the Mizukage laughed harder than before. Her new pet was absolutely adorable!

"Well pet," Naruto's new mistress cooed at him "you have to pleasure me while I'm doing my...ugh...paperwork."

Naruto suddenly got the impression she used the paperwork to practice her lava jutsu. He swore Tsunade would love this woman. His owner reached into his cage and set him on the floor.

"Playtime!"
1113221221122121112.title: playtime and the stakes

choices: And Now The Mizukage begins her paperwork
Naruto accuses the Mizukage of cheating
11132212211221211121.content:
Quickly, via her sandal covered foot the Mizukage rushed it forward in an attempt for a quick win against Naruto. Naruto was an idiot, a knucklehead and a straight out fool but if there was one thing he could do it was react quickly and that's just what he did. In roughly one second Naruto created a clone and used it as a jumping post to leap away in time, effectively dodging the Mizukage's quick attempt to win the game.

Extra motivated by the idea of having to pleasure the giantess in some way if he lost Naruto turned to face the girl's foot. Like Tsunade's the nails were dark red and the foot itself well kept, boy Naruto was going to enjoy wrecking it via a Rasengan and winning.

Charging the chakra sphere in his hand a thought crossed the ninja's mind, if the Mizukage was 'it' then how was he to win? She had never specified a time he had to survive or how he could win otherwise. Putting two and two together the answer was obvious, the game was rigged so that the Mizukage would win.

Still, despite realizing this Naruto didn't want to give up like some kind of a quitter, he was going to dodge the Mizukage as long as possible.

Quickly turning her foot back in Naruto's direction the Mizukage repeated her effort, this time following it with a stomp where Naruto landed after dodging. Barely dodging the stomp the shockwave sent Naruto back, he was wide open and about to lose but then he remembered how jutsu's were allowed.

Forming a handsign Naruto focused all his energy in this "Kage Bunshin No Justu! (Shadow Clone Jutsu) " In a puff of smoke hundreds of Naruto's appeared, each scattering to a different area leaving the Mizukage unable to tell which was which.

Letting out a grunt of frustration the giantess stomped her foot, destroying a number of clones in the process. Still, she soon smiled eerily as she too made a handsign. In a puff of smoke similar to Naruto's there were now not one but in fact five Mizukage's!

"You're not the only one who can create clones' She sneered. In a well executed team effort The Mizukages began capuring the various clones, crushing them slightly to see if they were real or not.

"Guess who your future wife is, goshujin," she smiled.

"Um, are you okay Mei, because I'm not your husband?" Naruto asked once he comprehended what the Mizukage had told him.

"I'm fine Naruto, I mean, aren't you," she glanced around then pulled Naruto in alley to avoid any overhearing. "Aren't you the son of Namikaze Minato?"

"Namikaze Minato? I know that name," Naruto thought for a second with his eyes closed. Three seconds later his eyes shot open as he looked at Mei, "Y-yondaime-sama? Konoha's Yellow Flash!"

"Uh-huh, aren't you his son?" Mei asked again, confused at the blond's reaction. She recognized him immediately as soon as she'd found out he was actually a shrunken person rather than a toy.

Naruto was confused, angry, happy, sad, and shocked all at the same time. Within the alley, the blonde teenager slumped to the ground. The man that he had adored his entire life, the man that he had always wanted to surpass, the Yondaime Hokage, was his father; it was too much for the boy to take in at once.

Terumii Mei knelt before her betrothed and placed a comforting hand on his shoulder. When he looked up at her she spoke with a saddened tone, "I know, you didn't know. Sarutobi-sama kept the truth hidden from you to keep you safe from people like Iwagakure. I…I was told you had died during the Kyuubi's attack, but…you're alive, and I know this is a lot to take in, but, believe it or not Naruto, we're engaged."

One blink, two blinks, three blinks and then laughter erupted from the blondeson of the Yondaime Hokage, "Okay now I know you're joking!"

A small, stunned expression crossed Mei's eyes before she narrowed the one eye that was visible, uncovered by her long, brunette hair. "Why would I joke about something like this? For fifteen years I thought you were dead! Then I find you alive…"

"No, no that's not it," Naruto stammered. "I'm only fifteen, how can I be engaged? I mean, I've never even met you before."

Mei smiled as the simple explanation before speaking again, "Well, my father, the Sandaime Mizukage, sixteen years ago set up an arranged marriage between myself and you while your parents were expecting you as a means to create an alliance between our two villages. But because when the Yondaime Mizukage started the war on those who had Kekkai Genkai, Sarutobi-sama thought I was killed as well."

Naruto's mind felt like it was going to explode from information overload. He was suppose to get married? And to a Kage no less! The fox was sealed into him by his own father? He knew the fox's power better than anyone and knew that if even the Shinigami couldn't get rid of the fox, then that had to mean the fox was immortal. Therefore what couldn't be killed could however be imprisoned. Naruto would need to think about this, right now he was torn between hating his father and understanding why he did what he did. And he understood why he was never told about his betrothed at least.

"So ready for the wedding, darling?" Mei asked seductively

"Um...no offence, but I don't feel exactly comfortable with getting married to you right this second." Naruto said.

Mei frowned. "Why not?"

"I mean...shouldn't we get to know one another first?" Naruto said quickly, not wanting to upset his bride-to-be.

Mei blinked a few times before she laughed and reached towards Naruto and pinched his cheek with the tips of her thumb and index fingers "Ho you wanted to go out on a date and get to know one another first rather than rush things and marry someone that's still more or less a stranger! That's alright my goshujin. Sorry, I thought you weren't going to marry me!"

She let go of his cheek and scooped him up in her hand

"Now my goshujin, what say we enjoy a night on the town?"

"Pleasant things, praise my beauty and kindness, comment on how I am your goddess and owner, how you love me and all I am, praise everything from the soles of my feet to my the tip of my scalp, and continue to do so until I say otherwise. If I go to sleep without saying stop you better compliment me throughout the night!"

These new orders brought a frown to Naruto's face, a frown he quickly hid. He had been through so much and now he had to whisper sweet nothings to a girl who thought of him as little more than a bug. To a girl who believed that Naruto's sole purpose was to be her pet and slave. It was a nausiating idea but Naruto was forced to comply.

"When do I start?" He asked with a sigh.

The Mizukage seemed pleased with the lack of rebellion, "Right now, I'm leaving immediately." The Mizukage removed her hand from her hair and immediately it fell back into place, trapping Naruto in the strawberry smelling darkness where he nervously began his new task.

"Meimei....you're so amazing, every girl is jealous of your beauty and brains."

"I know" The Mizukage replied smugly as she left her office.

" You're hair is so soft and amazing, better than any girl's. Your big toe has more beauty than every other woman's combined. Meimei....you're just perfect."

"I know."

Naruto felt himself get nausiated further, this was the last person he wanted to compliment and the name Meimei..... whether it was a nickname or not it just bothered Naruto to call her that, on some level he did respect the fact she was Mizukage.

The Mizukage stepped out of her office and into a hallway, swerving to the left and walking with a little skip in her step. Her pet was whispering the best things in her ear and it just felt great, the best sounds the Mizukage had ever heard in her opinion, the sounds of Naruto calling her his goddess.

Arriving out in the open The Mizukage snuck her way to town, soon arriving in the town square. As with all towns and villages the town square had about every sort of store you could think of. Clothing stores, food stores, shoe stores, jewelry stores, book stores, it was all here for the Mizukage to enjoy with her pet.

Naruto understandably wasn't enjoying himself, he soon ran out of good things to say so he had to resort to praising The Mizukage's body in specific places. Starting at her feet her complimented them and spoke of his endeering love for them, and he continued speaking like that about every body part as he worked his way up, currently he was at the thighs, next came The Mizukage's butt. This was only what he himself did, in the mere motion of walking the Mizukage further tortured Naruto in ways she herself probably didn't realize. With each step The Mizukage's ear lobe bobbed a little, and being attached to the earring on this ear lobe Naruto also bobbed a little, it only went about as high as several feet and went down roughly the same amount but repeated this had a very rough effect on the shrunken hero. Plus due to walking a couple strands of hair occasionally fell, and at his size they were quite bothersome when they struck Naruto.

Either unaware or uncaring of Naruto's suffering The Mizukage walked around the town square, enjoying the various things at her disposal.

doing it slowly...It was tight, really tight.

" You wanted to be treated as a ninja, right ? Being tortured is a risk when you get captured, no matter how
small you are." She simply said to him.

Now the pressure was too much for Naruto, he started to scream, releasing the air from his lungs. So the Mizukage
decided that it was the moment to let him breath a little.

" Does it hurt ? " she asked, in a mocking tone.

" If i wasn't so small, you wouldn't be so confident !! "

" I'm a Kage. You couldn't stand a fight with me even at your size. "

Naruto was about to answer her, but it was too late. The Mizukage was brutally squeezing him again, making him scream
in pain, and breaking some littlle bones. She enjoyed this, honestly. As a leader of her village, she was not supposed to get
pleasure from the suffering of her ennemies, she had to be neutral and do what she had to do to get what she wants.
But this situation was different. After all, it was not everyday that she could meet a tiny ennemy.

Oh well, Naruto was more a cute boy than an ennemy for her. She already could have any man at her feet if she wanted
to, but she was looking for a special man to marry her. Naruto was not a man yet, but this could be a better quality.
After all, he was young and tiny, in the hand of a powerfull giant woman. Considering this perspective, she was dominating
him in every way, and she liked that.

The Mizukage released her grip. The torture time time was over. Now it was time for some humiliation.

Just as Naruto was Naruto was getting free, a kuni flew through the air and struck the bird in the chest and it (and Naruto) fell to the ground. As Naruto fell, a portal opened up on the ground under him, so he fell into the portal rather than crashing into the ground.

Naruto felt as though his bones were jelly and his stomach was trying to squeeze the life out of his brain. He closed his eyes to block out the nasuating rainbow of colors that filled the inside of the portal.

111322122112221.content:
(Before I begin please note that this story seems to be heading into a crossover. If you dislike that I suggest you go back to the last few chapters and take a different route.)

Rising from his back Naruto took a brief examination of his surroundings, around him was what appeared to be a boys room, either that of a tomboyish girl anyway. Even with his dim wit Naruto pieced together this was a teenagers room, posters of bands, a punching bad hidden in a corner, cabinets filled with clothes, clutter that seemed to bring a new definition to 'organized chaos', if this wasn't a teenagers room Naruto would have to really rethink his views.

But he noticed something off, it took no time to figure it out. The room appeared normal, yet before Naruto blacked out he was puny, inches to centimeters tall. For the briefest of moments Naruto thought he was saved, all would be well, then he realized he was standing on something, a sort of purpleish colored tree that was soft to touch.

Being a ninja Naruto unconciously stood atop it with perfect balance, that and he was too focused on the room itself to notice where he was. He recognized the silky soft texture, although the height was shorter than what he had experienced thus far, he was in a forest of human hair, a girls judging from how well kept it was.

As if it were gods way to confirm it the person Naruto stood atop spoke, apparently complaining to herself. "Urgh dammit Ichigo and Orihime left again! Plus they took Chad,Uryu and that new girl Rukia....I wonder what they're always doing together........."

The girl fell back, another detail Naruto missed was that she was sitting on the edge of her bed, lying back merely brought her head to the pillow. The sudden wind forming from the girl's descent created a miniature tempest, it took all Naruto had to hold on to one of the girl's hairs, and even then he slid away, just lucking out by grabbing onto another hair, this one almost directly before the girl's eye. He got a good view of her body, her feet wore black socks that seemed to go along with a dark grey skirt and top which held back some fair sized breasts, a school uniform by the looks of it.

She seemed zoned out, her mind was probably wandering in its own little world. Naruto knew he had to get this girl's attention, to find out where he was if anything.

Suddenly he face palmed himself, "Duh! Jutsu!" Placing his hands by each other while still holding on Naruto made some very crude handsigns, performing his signature clone technique. Due to the somewhat sad way he performed it Naruto only formed three clones, more than enough.

Together the trio descended directly on the girls lower eye lashes, jumping up and down. The ninjas couldn't have been more than a centimeter tall. Coincidently at this moment the girl came back to Earth, her eyes instantly focusing on the tiny Naruto's.

Then she did what any sensible person would do, she screamed and backed away. As a result of the movement the three Naruto clones fell and died somewhere along the girl, the original Naruto though was close enough to be seen by the girl who plucked him from her hair and held him between her fingers.

"A bug?"

The ninja shook his head, "Nope, I'm the grand ninja of Konoha Naruto!" he had to scream at the top of his lungs to even be concieved as being heard.

The girl raised an eyebrow, somehow hearing him. "Last time I checked bugs don't talk, and they sure as hell don't have names."

Naruto shrugged, "Isn't ant a name?"

"Name of a species, not an individual ant." The school girl corrected, her lips formed an amused smile. She was somehow having a conversation with an ant man.

Naruto's eyes closed as his lips formed a neutral expression, along with his whisker like markings he looked like a fox like this. "Speaking of individuals what's your name?"

The girl seemed to blush for a split second, "Ah sorry, never had to talk to a bug man before. My name's Tatsuki Arisawa."

"And I never had to talk to a giantess." Naruto retorted to Tatsuki, flashing a toothy grin.

Quickly Naruto's face turned serious, "Where am I?"

Tatsuki seemed slightly taken aback, "Karakura Town, Japan, how do you not know that?"

Naruto seemed to slump down, "Because I somehow got teleported here from my ninja village."

The giantess blinked in surprise, "Ninja village? There hasn't been a ninja in centuries. And they didn't have any magic that made people teleport or become small."

Again Naruto slumped, this time further. "Well where I come from it's very possible. Heck I created clones a few minutes ago to grab your attention. I guess I somehow got teleported to another world or something."

Yet again Tatsuki blinked in surprise, her curious eyes taking in the revelations rather well. " That sucks."

Now it was Naruto's turn to blink in surprise, "You believe me?"

The purple haired girl shrugged, "Why would you lie? Plus at my size compared to you, I don't think I have much to fear if you're plotting something."

The ninja looked up with a false sad expression, "You don't gotta say it like that....." Seconds later the two laughed.

A few moments later when the laughter died down Tatsuki suddenly looked serious, "Hey I have an idea."

Naruto looked up, his eyes suddenly radiating with hope and curiousity, "What?"

Pausing briefly Tatsuki replied,

11132212211222111.content:
Tasuki smiled gently at Naruto, " Is there a game called tag in your world?"

The maverick ninja nodded, more than once the game had been used against him, often getting a message through his thick skull. "Yeah, just gotta run and touch the other person."

Nodding once Tatsuki continued, "Exactly, do you wanna play a game with me? I won't hurt you or anything just pin you down with my feet. Heck at your size we wouldn't even have to leave the room."

Narrowing his eyes into slits Naruto formed a quizzical look, thinking his answer through for once. Least he thought for about two seconds, "Sure! Just promise me I won't get covered in any sweat from your feet!"

The school girl laughed at the request, "No promises there little guy, heck the smell might just take you out."

Hearing the comment Naruto seemed to turn green, "I'm starting to have second thoughts..."

Laughing Tatsuki leaned forward, gripping the edge of her black sock she yanked it off revealing her bare foot. Quickly doing so with the other one she wiggled her toes with a content sigh, "There, now that my feet can air out they won't stink so bad."

Grimacing the shrunken boy looked at the massive feet before him, at the size of a centimeter they rivaled the biggest buildings he had ever seen. "What should the prize be for winning?"

"Prize?" The girl repeated, "I dunno, I guess we each pick something when the winners up. But I'll have you know I never lose."

Banging a fist against his chest like an ape Naruto let out a toothy grin, "Neither do I!"

Leaning over by her feet again Tatsuki placed Naruto on the ground, "You get a ten second headstart."

The ninja turned around shocked, "No 'go' or anything?"

"10"

"Crap!" Quickly Naruto put his ninja training to use, running immense speeds away from Tatsuki's feet. Slowly rising from her bed the tomboy reached seven on her countdown, eyeing Naruto with a mixture of amuse and amazement.

Not once did Naruto looked back, all he did was run. As for what he was running too, no idea, he was just getting distance between him and the giantess of a girl.

Tatsuki felt her lips curl into a smile, "Zero and here I come!" Raising a bare foot dramatically slow Tatsuki took a long exaggerated step to Naruto, even without any speed or power behind it it still sounded like a terrifying boom.

Now that Tatsuki began Naruto took a look back at her, now she quit the slow motion walking and was proceeding normally, in a handful of steps she reached right behind Naruto.

Raising her left foot above the ninja and the next ten meters or so before him she let out a victorious giggle, "Look out below!"

Lowering her foot Tatsuki was sure she nailed Naruto, but upon removing her foot found nothing. Instead next to it was Naruto flashing a V for victory. "I thought I said no foot sweat could touch me."

Raising her foot again Tatsuki replied, "And I said no promises. No stay still!"

Again Tatsuki lowered her foot, again it made a shockwave to the tiny Naruto on impact, and again he dodged. The game continued like this for a while, not even moving around the room anymore, just the same little section. Despite Tatsuki's best efforts her foot would not make contact with Naruto, but it was around now her size advantage helped out. At her size Tatsuki exhausted no energy, but Naruto with all his unreal stamina was running on empty.

Tatsuki began lowering her foot again, and again Naruto ran to get out of the way, except this time he stumbled and fell. Turning around he saw Tatsuki's foot before him and then upon him.

Giggling with victory Tatsuki flashed the V Naruto did, in clear sight beneath her big toe was Naruto's head. "Look's like I win. And I get to claim my prize."

"What is it?"

111322122112221112222.content:
Humming a cheery song Orihime walked home, bobbing her head back and forth to the tune she hummed. Due to this Naruto had a bit of an adventure keeping a grip but thanks to the seemingly never ending amount of Orihime's hairs he had plenty to grab on.

He listened intently, searching for something remotely related to the people Tatsuki mentioned. She gave brief descriptions of each person and as far as Naruto could tell he couldn't see," A strawberry haired thug, a giant tan mexican, a mega nerd, or a devious short haired girl."

"God she sucks with explanations." Naruto complained, considering leaving. The exact second after the tiny ninja spoke Orihime stopped dead in her tracks, "Did someone say something?" Turning both ways the redhead searched for the source of a voice, of course not finding the source of the voice almost directly on her neck.

Wiping some sweat from his brow Naruto sighed in relief, "Thank god, if this girl found me I could be in trouble. Hell if Tatsuki found out I might be dead!" The ninja stopped his whining, he had the sudden eerie feeling he was being watched.

Out of his eyesight, a portion of one of Orihime's hairpins began to glow and broke apart from the accessory, turning into the shape of what appeared to be a thug wearing a scarf and a black and red body suit. He was Orihime's means of attacking, Tsubaki.

Of course the girl noticed her rude spirit right away, "Hello Tsubaki." Hearing Orihime address someone Naruto looked around all over for some person, soon finding the supposed person was small yet bigger than him, and was floating just in front of the girl he was tailing.

The ninja's eyes narrowed into a sad shape, "How come he can fly? I'm smaller!"

Ignoring the ninja and even Orihime Tsubaki sneered slightly, "Don't you hello me girl! You couldn't even notice you've been getting tailed!"

With a blank look Orihime turned around, of course seeing nothing. Slapping his face Tsubaki began rubbing the bridge of his nose. "On your neck."

Without a second thought, or even a first one for that matter Orihime reached her hand around her neck and grasped along her hair, eventually finding something that didn't belong, something alive.

Pulling the being into sight Orihime let out a short gasp, "Are you a new spirit? What's your power?"

Naruto opened his mouth to respond but Tsubaki intervened, flying by Orihime's head and punching it. "Think first girl! If I had to warn you about him he obviously isn't one of us!" With a grunt Tsubaki returned to Orihime's accessory, probably not wanting to get further annoyed.

A slight red mark on her cheek Orihime asked, "Who are you and what were you doing on my neck?"

Naruto bit his lip, if he told Orihime about Tatsuki it could potentially ruin their friendship. One of them could torture him, hell both of them could! Yet if he lied he would have to roll with it and for a dimwit like Naruto that would be pretty hard. Not to mention this Rukia girl he was also looking for.

Time was running short and he needed to answer, with a bead of sweat sliding down his face Naruto screamed in response

11132212211222111222211.content:
Stepping back into her house Orihime let out a happy sigh, taking in a deep breath of the smell of home. On her shoulder lie Naruto or Kutsuu as his false name said, he seemed to be keenly investigating the entrance for something suspicious, Kutsuu or Naruto he was still supposedly spying.

Tsubaki along with the other Shunshunrika were back in pin forms, the only way Orihime could concieve to stop Tsubaki from injuring her newest friend. Stopping by the side of her door Orihime slid of her shoes, and stepped out further into her home.

Turning around a corner Orihime entered her living room, a large room with a small table in the center with small sittle pillows for sitting surrounding it. Against a wall was a large shelf that seemed to hold various things ranging from awards to decorations. What Naruto focused on was something which lie opposite of the shelf, also against the wall was what appeared to be a shrine. On top of the shrine was a picture of a young man, he had to be no more than twenty and wore a hairstyle that reminded Naruto of his friend Sasuke in a way.

Orihime noticed the tiny ninja staring and quickly explained, "My late brother Sora."

Frowning and showing signs of clear guilt Naruto lowered his head, feeling bad for snooping his way into such a topic. "I'm sorry.."

The gigantic girl seemed not to mind, instead she smiled a sort of nostalgic smile. "It's okay. He's at peace now thanks to Ichigo."

Naruto's curiousity got the best of him, "Thanks to Ichigo?" The name sounded familiar, it took a moment for Naruto to realize Ichigo was one of the people he was supposed to spy on.

Pausing for the briefest of moments Orihime nodded once, taking care not to knock over her fan. "Yeah, you know what he does Kutsuu. The only reason I can do what I do is thanks to him."

Nearly freezing up Naruto shot a quick victory pose out of Orihime's line of sight, this was the kind of information he wanted! "Oh yeah....I don't know too many of the details though." Naruto couldn't help but smile, he was on a roll here! If he could manage the facade long enough he would find out all he needed.

Turning her head Orihime looked at Naruto with a sort of understanding. "Well I can't really explain it too well, but as a fan of mine you know the basic story right?"

Naruto felt his eyes droop, Orihime was seriously buying the fan idea, either he's a better liar than he thought or Orihime needed some help. "Uh....yeah....but can you explain it anyway? I wanna make sure I have it right."

"Like I said I'm not too good at explaining things." Orihime turned silent for a moment, "But I think Rukia could explain it well. Plus you're a fan of her too! It's a win-win!" The shrunken ninja opened his mouth to speak to was quickly drowned out by the sounds of a cell phone. Without even waiting for a response Orihime somehow pulled out a phone and started dialing a number.

Placing the device by her ear almost immediately Orihime started talking. "Rukia! Come over to my place! You'll never believe it!" Rukia's response was unintelligible from Naruto's perspective but she seemed to be complaining and asking confused questions, but as she did with Naruto Orihime seemed to ignore her and hang up.

Stepping back into her entry hall Orihime leaned against a wall with Naruto still at her shoulder. "And now we wait!" And that's all they did, Orihime like a child was waiting intently by the door for her friend to arrive. Any attempts by Naruto to speak didn't even register in her mind.

They were two massive feet that dwarfed Naruto's one centimeter body, in comparison he would be a person and one foot would equal the size of a school building. The feet were hidden by a very thin white sock, so thin that it was more or less see through to the tiny ninja, he could clearly make out ten toes that were flawlessly painted dark red.

Taking a look up Naruto saw the girl he had utterly forgotten about, the greatest complication to his spying, Rangiku Matsumoto.

Staring with a seductive smile at the tiny ninja Matsumoto bent over and lifted the tiny via her hand, it took a lot of effort just not to crush him. Matsumoto knew easily that if she were to hold him normally she could pop the little head she held without even realizing it.

As if awaiting the question Matsumoto answered without even needing to think first, "Whatever I wanna do. If I wanna see you struggle to climb my feet that'll be it. If I wanna feel you squirm around in my mouth then we'll do that. If I wanna crush you under my sexy butt there we go. If I want you to climb my breasts than you better start climbing!"

The tiny ninja was at the mercy of Matsumoto and with any luck Rukia was on his way to save him....or make things worse. Only time will tell.....

Vaguely he recalled lessons where he was instructed on the process, more or less they entailed either creating a new profile entirely or mixing together the lie with reality to help make things easier. Being dimwitted Naruto couldn't do the first in his dreams, and the second while easier was still gonna be tough.

"Well......uh....." Naruto nervously rubbed the back of his head, he could feel Rukia's eyes glaring into him. "My name's Kutsuu....which you already know. I come from a town called Konoha."

"Konoha? Doesn't that mean leaf?" Rukia asked quizzically.

Starting to piece together his story Naruto quickly answered, "Yep! All of us are the same size so the village is on a giant leaf!"

Hearing the exclamation Rukia couldn't help but burst out laughing, it took tremendous self control on her part to stop herself from turning over but she did it. " A village of little people.....on a leaf?!"

Naruto nodded once, chuckling a little bit himself. "Yeah. My best friends are named Sakura and Sasuke. Sasuke is this cool-acting tough guy who's always good at everything but he's just a punk."

"Sounds like someone's J E A L O U S" Rukia playfully spelled out her last word, using finger motions to the beat of her voice.

Turning slightly red Naruto turned around, pointing his back to Rukia. "Am not! Anyway Sakura is an absolute babe. I kinda have a thing for her but she only has eyes for Sasuke."

"Yep you're jealous."

Turning around Naruto turned redder, "Am not!"

Laughing Rukia smiled gently, "Sorry, continue.

"Um......" Naruto thought for a moment, he didn't want to reveal too much about his friends, nor his village or what he does. " I....run around doing odd jobs with my two best friends and a nice guy named Kakashi." Inside Naruto was laughing, his story was coming along so well and half of it was true!

Rukia nodded once, "What kind of jobs?"

Naruto struck a heroic pose, his ego grabbed the better of him as he spoke. "Oh tons of stuff! There was this one time we were bodyguards to a bridge builder and ended up fighting this bad guy named Zabuza. One time we had to protect a town. Find a cat. Heh....yeah being a ninja is pretty cool eh?"

A silence hung in the air, Naruto quickly realized what he had said but it was too late to take it back. Rukia's suspicons returned immediately. "Ninja? Protect a bridge builder? Sounds to me like these aren't the things a guy a centimeter tall would do. Ninja maybe but bridge builder? What would be the point when chances are it would get wrecked by someone passing by?"

Naruto had no reply, he had effectively screwed himself over.

Rukia leaned her head forward, careful not to knock Naruto from her stomach. "You know what? I think you're lying. And remember what I said I'd do if you lie?"

Naruto shivered, the idea of an evil giantess harem while very very hot was not what he wanted.

Rukia sighed.....
11132212211222111222211212212212112.title: Caught in the Lie

111322122112221112222112122122121122.content:
"I'll give you one more chance but if you screw this up no mercy. But tell me this first: why'd you lie?"

"In my village we have a saying, 'the only thing more destructive than a lie is the truth.'. Besides, people believe what they want to, even if your honest if you don't tell people what they WANT to hear, they label you as a lier anyways."

Rukia winced, that was harsh but it was true.

"You sound like your life's harsher then Rukongai's Zaraki district." Rukia said, she had the dreadful feeling that his name, Kutsuu, made perfect sense.

Naruto caught the look in her eyes. "Rough life too, huh Rukia?" he asked.

He let the mask he wore over his emotions fall for once. When Rukia saw how much agony, sadness and rage filled his eyes, she screamed and backed away from him as though he held the plauge, knocking him off her stomach in the process, bitter memories of Rukonga haunting her.

"W-w-what ARE you?!" she asked in horrified pity.

"Someone sick of false smiles." he said with a false fox-smile on.

1113221221122211122221121221221211222.content:
In response to Rukia's sudden scream Rangiku stormed into the room, clad in nothing but a towel that left little to the imagination. She hadn't even had a chance to dry, evident by her soaked skin and hair and the trail of wet foot prints. "I heard screaming!" She waved something before her, something that resembled a circular green pill. Naruto had no way of knowing this but this was Soul Candy which when ingested would turn Rangiku into her Shinigami form.

But Naruto didn't know, all he saw was a scandily clad drinker who was waving a piece of candy around like a weapon. Still wearing his fox smile he flapped his hand in the giantess's general direction, "Relax, just had a little mishap." His voice, his aura, his entire person seemed to change from Kutsuu, the cat was out of the bag so Naruto was once again himself although at the moment he was feeling a tad out of character.

Hearing Naruto Rangiku turned to Rukia who nodded slightly. Slumping slightly Rangiku dropped her battle poise, "Someone mind filling me in?"

Rukia spoke up, "Basically Kutsuu's been lying, and when I caught him in the lie he seemed to turn into a different person entirely!"

Rangiku frowned at the tiny ninja who smiled sadly at her. "Lied huh? Sounds to my like my pet idea was just what he deserves."

Before anyone else could respond Naruto threw his voice out there, " I'd rather not. I only lied to protect someone."

Simaltaneously the two girls blurted "Who?"

Naruto wagged a finger. "If I told I'd be doing a pretty bad job. I never liked lying to you guys, just had to."

Warily Rukia took a step forward, "Then why mention it?"

"Guess I'm feeling honest."

Like Rukia Rangiku stepped forward too, creating a sort of squelching noise due to her wet frame. " Then while you're being honest spill it. Tell us the truth."

The ninja shrugged, "Why not? To start with my name's not Kutsuu, it's Naruto Uzumaki, and I'm not of your world. I come from a world of war, where ninjas and samurais engage eachother in constant combat be it mental or physical. I suppose I'm something of an eccentric who desires peace, something that everyone says is impossible to achieve,"

Naruto took a deep breath, the two giantesses were utterly absorbed into his story, a story he thought over every day of his life. " I started out as garbage, everyone in the village hated me, and it wasn't even my fault. I was used to seal a monster and everyone feared me as if I were the monster. I grew up with no friends or family, except for one man. Roughly when I became a ninja I started to get more friends, started to mature, and that pretty much led to this. I can give you hours of stories but I don't wanna."

Both girls mouthed "Wow."

An uncomfortable silence ensued, lasting several minutes. It was only Rukia's question that ended it, "Naruto? Other world? Just what are you?"

"A ninja down on his luck."

Both girls grew solemn, memories of their own childhoods flashed in their minds and in them they found a sort of kinship with Naruto, rough childhoods with little to no family. All Rukia had was Renji and a couple of others, all Rangiku had was Gin.

Still smiling sadly at the two girls Naruto shook his head with a slight chuckle, "I usually don't act like this. I guess I'm just feeling kinda emo." He eyed Rangiku specifically now, "Am I still in trouble?" It felt weird, Naruto felt almost as if he was watching another person speak to the two girls, all the troubles he held seemed to take over and form a new person entirely.

Rangiku paused...."Well.....
1113221221122211122221121221221211222.title: The Truth

Both girls stared coldly at eachother, Rangiku Matsumoto clothed in a black kimono wielding a short sword that slowly vaporized into the air, and Rukia wielding a pure white Zanpaktou pointed at Rangiku. The Gigai the two wore now had their mod souls within them and stood on the side of the room beside Naruto, each cheering their partner on.

"Come on Rukia! Hop!" Chappy shouted in Rukia's body.

Rangiku's Mod Soul Momone gave similar cheers but due to being clothed in a short wet towel Naruto didn't exactly focus on her words.

Both Shinigami looked at the other with a fierceness that scared Naruto, "Why is it girl's are always scary!!!"

Both Mod Soul's in their partners bodies turned to the little ninja, "What's that supposed to mean? Hop." Chappy asked.

"He's kinda cute...I bet he's working with a lot down there...." Momone muttered with a blush.

Naruto stared fearfully at the two Mod Soul Giantesses. As far as he could tell Chappy was a cutesy kid-like person and Momone was a bit of a pervert. Both were bad to be around especially in this case.

A loud boom caused everyone to turn and look back at Rukia and Rangiku, to gain more room for their fight they burst through the ceiling and into the sky.

Rukia pointed her palm at her opponent, "Pale Fire Crash!" Rukia's charged energy escaped from her hand in the form of fire, and now three fire balls were heading in fast for Rangiku.

All she did was smirk as she pulled her blades hilt back as if it still was a sword, "Come on Haineko!" She yelled as she brought her sword forward. The gas-like being that was Haineko followed the blade hilt and intercepted Rukia's attack, blocking it with relative ease.

Chuckling smugly Rukia vanished and reappeared beyond Rangiku, sword held high, The lieutenant seemed to anticipate this and deflected it with Haineko as she did the fire balls.

Back in Orihime's house Naruto, Chappy and Momone watched with awe.

"They started fighting over me?" Naruto marveled.

Chappy turned to Naruto with her cheeks puffed out, "That's right and if miss Rukia gets hurt it's your fault! I would make your life suck. Hop!" It took some self control for Naruto not to laugh at the hop part.

Momone also looked at the little ninja, "I wouldn't mind playing with him a bit myself."

Naruto paled, he was not liking where this was going......

(Remember for the first choice the two Mod Souls are in Rukia and Matsumoto's bodies.)

1113221221122211122221121221221211222211.content:
As she deposited Naruto into Rukia's breast pocket Chappy smiled coyly at the little ninja, then at her fellow Mod Soul Momone who stared at Chappy with blantant disappointment. "Aw... I wanted to play with the big man...." She then quickly laughed at her own little joke.

Chappy placed a finger against Momone's mouth, "We will, we just gotsta sneak aways hop."

Inside his pocket prison Naruto flared up, "WHAT!? You said you'd protect me!"

Pulling her school shirt out some Chappy stared at the little ninja, "I'm supposed to guard you fwom Miss Matsumoto, not me and Momone hop."

Naruto made a sarcastic expression, " Talking is just not your thing." He muttered under his breath so he wouldn't be heard.

Momone still in Matsumoto's body leapt for joy, causing Matsumoto's large breasts to bounce along with her. Catching a faint sliver of it Naruto couldn't help but watch with a blush.

Chappy grabbed her friends shoulder and placed a finger against her own lips, "Shh. We gots to be super quiet or else Lady Rukia and Matsumoto will be real mad hop." Momone nodded in understanding as she and Chappy began creeping away.

Momone didn't even bother to place any clothing on Matsumoto's gigai so she was dressed in naught but a towel running through town alongside a girl in a school girl outfit, needless to say they got some weird glances.

Soon the two Mod Souls arrived in what seemed to an empty grove save for a few trees. With their Mod Soul abilities the two ran well over five miles in a couple of minutes, ending up in the forest by the town cemetary.
