1113221221122211122221121221221211222212.content:
The pair of mods, to Naruto's relief, turned back to the fight when an outraged scream reached the trio's ears.

"ARAUGHA! DAMN YOU RUKIA!"

Rangiku's hair stood on end and surrounded her head like the pettles of a sunflower, the half surrounding the right side of her head was covered in hard icecles that looked like they were growing out of Rangiku's head and on the left, it was singed and burnt.

Seeing that, the three in Orihime's house couldn't help but laugh.

Back with the fight, Rukia scowled. She couldn't get past that damn ash ability Haineko used enough to do any real damage. Sure that last kido combination with Sode no Shirayuki had a rather comic result, but it just made Rangiku mad...and give everyone else that saw her a sore gut from laughing so hard.

She gulped...hating that she had no choice but if growing up in Rikongai had taught her anything, it was that those who were or had been outcasts needed to watch eachother's backs. She pulled the showing a black tatoo with a purple outline.

"Release."

As soon as Rukia said that, black reiatsu with dark purple outline enveloped her. When Rukia was revealed again, she now stood a good head or so taller. Clutched tightly in her right hand was a massive, double edged scythe. Her hair had turned lavender, as had her eyes. Her sandals had dissapeared sometime during the transformation. Her hakama was no longer black, instead it was the purest shade of white, and red on the inside. It was far from natural, tattered at the sleeves, shoulders, and even more so at the bottom, showing off long and slender legs.

If anything else, her body had grown as well. She had...matured. She now looked like a full grown woman. A tattered yellow sash was tied around her waist, which now strained against the kimono-like robes she was wearing. The chest area of her new attire was pushed out quite a bit as well. Basically she now rivaled Rangiku in that department.

Rukia snarled and lashed out with her scythe, nearly beheading Rangkiu.

==

As Naruto watched the fight, guilt welled up in him. He'd done this. As he wished there was something he could do to make things right, to make sure this whole fight was forgotten as if it had never happened, he suddenly doubled over screaming and clutching his stomach. What the hell...he felt the spot with the seal that kept Kurama inside his body buldge outwards, something trying force its way out through it! Time stopped for him as agony took it place and he kept screaming. Naruto felt something long push its way out of the seal and he fell on all fours, panting and sweating.

"Damn Shinigami-forged seal...what the hell was that?" Naruto groaned, his hand involentarily closing around the object that had shoved its way out of the seal. After he'd caught his second wind, he stood and looked at the object only to stare.

In his hands was a sword that was in a scabbard made from polished and steel. The hilt was also jet black, with silver trimming along the edges. The center of the hilt bulged out, before it slimmed down, and then flared out at the pommel, and the circular silver hilt guard. The hilt was wrapped in black leather, to better aid in gripping, and was made of solid silver metal. The sword's pommel was tear-drop shaped, set with a clinohumite gem the size of a small egg that was held in a claw that went all the way down and formed a sort of cage around the gem as the claw's points all joined together and the claw looked like it belonged to a dragon. The scabbard was jet black, with a silver cap at the end, and a silver ring around the top, where it met the hilt guard. The scabbard was wide, about three inches, and was three and a half feet long. The end of the scabbard tapered down from the top, and came to a point with the bottom.

Naruto gently grasped the hilt, before drawing the sword from its sheathe. The blade, like the scabbard and hilt, was black. It looked like black onyx, reflecting the light like a crystal.

The blade of the sword was narrower then the scabbard, being about one and a half inches long from the cutting edge to the back. The blade curved gently back like a katana, and made for one-handed swordsmenship. Towards the point of the blade, about seven inches below it, the back of the blade flared out, before running straight towards the point. The cutting edge tapered down to meet the bottom, creating the point and the cutting edge was serrated all the way from the hilt's guard to the point.

As he gawked at the blade, a dark gray reiatsu with a bloody red outlined the weapon in a sinister aura. As it did, Naruto felt himself mutter something. What it was, he didn't know. All he did however, was that he said the word "Erase" at the end and as soon as he said it, the black of unconsciousness took him and he felt drained of all energy.

==

Rangiku and a still-transformed Rukia both froze. What where they doing?

"Why're we fighting? WHO where we fighting?" the squad ten lieutenant asked.

Rukia groaned and rubbed her head "I don't remember."

"Miss Rukia! You've gotta get back down here! Hop." Chappy shouted and the two Soul Reapers landed through the holes in Orihime's roof. They spotted Kutsuu...or rather, Naruto, as they now knew he actually was called, for some reason, they remembered everything up to busting a pair of holes through the roof of Orihime's house but after that, it was a blank page in their memories. As they neared the mods and the fibber, they noticed that Naruto was out cold and seemingly exausted.

Rukia leaned over and was surprised to see a sword and its scabbard laying next to Naruto, flickers of reiatsu fading away came from the weapon. Her eyes widened. A Zanpakutō?! But How?! Then it dawned on her...It was him! He was why they couldn't remember!

"So that Zanpakutō he's got is like an absolutely flawless memory-based version of Kyōka Suigetsu in a way, it can even channel memories and go as far as to solidify them and bring them to life in addition to manipulating them the way Kyōka Suigetsu's Complete Hypnosis controls the five senses to the point that it can make the target misinterpret another person's form, shape, mass, feel and smell and all that? There's a yikes." Rukia said. Rukia shivered in spite of herself. The utter mastery over memory could allow one near-imunity in nearly every situation. Gaining information by erasing actual memories and implanting false ones in their place, combat if you removed your enemy's knowlage of how to fight, stealth since you could make people forget to look for you or make them seem to "remember" you were an ally...and those were only a few examples.

Why'd he use it on them though? And how could a living human even HAVE a Zanpakutō in the first place? This would take some looking into. She nudged the blond young man with her toe and almost instantly Naruto cuddled up to her foot. Seeing as he was already asleep, it was a natural reaction to inch closer to the nearest source of warmth, which in this case just happened to be Rukia.

Seeing that, Rangiku broke into a giggle fit "Seems he was honest enough about being a fan of yours at least, Rukia."

The Kuchiki huffed and looked away. In spite of herself, she felt the need to examin Naruto now...that or wait until he woke up to interrorgate him. She spoke to Rangiku about it and the lieutenant agreed.

After a while, the two female Soul Reapers decided to...
1113221221122211122221121221221211222212.title: The blade of Memory Mastery

11133.content:
Tayuya smirked at the bug as it hopped into her sandal and stood between her first and second toes, marveling at their size.

"Hooh, that wasn't too smart bug!"

Tayuya squeezed her toes togeather then rubed the bug between them slowly, then released her grip and kicked outwards. Sending Naruto flying and then smacking to the ground.

Tayuya then quickly thrust her foot right on top of Naruto, roughly pinning him beneath her big toe. As he struggled to free himself, He heard the Tayuya begin to laugh and as he gazed up from under her toe, he saw the sound ninja standing triumphantly on top of him with her hands at her hips, sadistically grinning at him. Tayuya then adds a little more pressure and watched Naruto squirm some more under her toe, giggling as she did.

Naruto was almost certain that death is not far now and expected the redhead to squash him under her enormous big toe any minute now, but she doesn't. Instead Tayuya began to slide her big toe slowly up and down his body, grinding his face into the underside of her toe and leaving Naruto with a very sour/salty taste in his mouth. Naruto then heard the godess laugh at his struggling. The kunoichi then starts to slowly roll him under the ball of her foot all the way to her heel and repeatedly rolls Naruto's body under her foot for about a minute. By the end of that minute he was so exhausted and covered in her foot sweat that he didn't even notice that her foot was no longer on top of him. Meanwhile high above, Tayuya is watching with interest to see if she killed the bug.

As soon as she saw that the bug was still alive, she once again placed her foot on the ground besides Naruto, only this time it wasn't on top of him, instead he found her foot's stench to be a little more powerful and Naruto was shocked to find that she had him in the space between her big and second toe. Then before Naruto even had a chance to try and escape, a great force hit him in the back and forces him face-first into the sweaty skin between her toes. Naruto was having a very hard time breathing as he was roughly being grinded between her toes, but Naruto did get a glimpse of what was pushing him and was surprised to find that its Tayuya's index finger.

Now Naruto realized that Tayuya was in fact torturing him, or what she thinks is a bug, by shoving him in between her toes and she was actually enjoying it too, he could tell from the random outbursts of laughter. After what seems to be an eternity, the flute playing kunoichi stoped thrusting him in between her toes and lets his exhausted body slide down the side of her second toe. Tayuya then grabed Naruto, which is soaked in her sweat and slowly rised him toward her face.

Tayuay brought her right index finger to tickle used the bug. A pointless, yet amusing, gesture.

"Kitchy-kitchy-koo! Kitchy-kitchy-koo!"

Tayuya laughed at the bug as it struggled while she tickled it, then she started to bat the little creature with her finger. She didn't know why, but rather than kill it like she did every other bug she saw, this particlure one made a good plaything.

111331.content:
The evil Kunoichi smiled mockingly at the bug sized Naruto. "Normally I just crush bugs like I crush my opponents...but something about you makes me want to try something different..." The girl's eyes seemed to be appraising Naruto for worth, he felt like she was stripping him with that gaze. Needless to say Naruto struggled, but it was also needless to say that being a knucklehead there was no plan behind it; he was struggling for the sake of struggling. To Tayuya it was just the bug suffering between her fingers; for some odd reason torturing it gave the same satisfaction as torturing a person...if not more so. It was then an idea came to mind.

"Bug...I'll allow you to live on...as my obedient servant. I am God now, you are a measly speck lower than the dirt that graces my foot. I am such a higher being that you probably can't even comprehend what I'm saying, but you can probably understand the basic message so I'll make this quick. You will submit body and soul to me bug, your little bug family and bug friends will never see you again; you are merely property, property of my feet." As soon as Tayuya began this rather demented speech Naruto's struggles increased, pathetically still doing nothing even as the Kyuubi's chakra came to slight aid. His angered roars almost drowned out Tayuya's words, and he wished they had.

Tayuya paused for what seemed to be an evil laugh, "Hahahaha! I'm talking to a bug! Boy this is a weird day for me." Her eyes coldly looked at Naruto again, "Now, don't bother panicking and overworking that microscopic brain smaller than my eyelashes. I saw you jump on my sandal, and I remember how you felt at my feet, and I know you lived. You liked it, and you can endure it; and most importantly I like it. So this is your fate, to be my foot toy. Sure on occasion I will be merciful and grace you with something like my ass, but most of your fate will be underfoot, like the bug you are. A speck at my toes until my feet finally just absorb you or somehow end your meager existence in a pathetic way that suits you." After a brief pause to catch her breath Tayuya grinned, "I'm not very patient so I'll put you in your place right away."

Much to Naruto's dismay Tayuya wasted no time, in less than a second she had bent over and had her hands near her feet. But before she even moved them, she did something odd...she licked Naruto as well as the edges of her fingers. When he saw her mouth open Naruto expected to get eaten, like the ramen he constantly wolfed down...but no...just a lick....a rather disgusting one actually. Instantly afterward Tayuya quite roughly placed him between her big and second toes, the flesh seemed to swallow him eagerly. And then Naruto realized why Tayuya licked him....the saliva mixed with the footsweat....he was stuck....where the smell and sweat were the worst, with no hope of movement....pissed was an understatement for what he felt.

Not even bothering to give her bug a second glance Tayuya rose up to her feet and began walking. Her thought was filled with clear evil, If this bug lives through it he will be broken in three days....he may not even know what bowing and worship is but I will make it learn! Her demented chuckles came out even scarier than she expected. Here she was treating a bug like a shrunken person...boy Tayuya needed help....not that she minded one bit.

Poor Naruto suffered through each step, the wind brushing him up and down as he was forced to inhale directly from Tayuya's toe cleavage...it was almost like fresh air was mocking him...and Tayuya's twisted laughs did nothing to better that. He would have done a knucklehead move like bite Tayuya...if only he could. He was actually so carved into Tayuya's meaty foot that he couldn't move his mouth more than a couple centimeters. Not enough to bite...hell not enough to even breath...but just enough for footsweat to roll on in. He hated this day with a passion while Tayuya adored it....
111331.title: Tayuya keeps the 'bug' as a foot-plaything

choices: "It's your wedding day, bug...and BOTH my feet are your brides!"
1113311.content:
Naruto whimpered, laying on his side in the fetal position, his whole body shaking uncontrollably. He was on top of Tayuya's nightstand, took freaked out to consider escaping, knowing that she'd make him suffer a "playtime" with her if he tried to do so.

It had been three days since Tayuya had "claimed ownership" of him, thinking he was a bug. She hadn't acknowledged him at all except for her "playtime" ideas...she didn't even figure out he was human, she just kept considering him a bug, not noticing he was actually a person...which may or may not have been a good thing.

If she treated him the way she did when she was out to use him to amuse herself and thought he was just a bug, he didn't want to THINK of what she'd do to him if she learned he was actually a shrunken person! The first day was proof of that!

FLASHBACK:
After getting back home, Tayuya went into the kitchen of her apartment and took out a large bowl and what looks like three different flavors of ice cream. From the looks of it, they were a case of cookie dough ice cream, a case of Mint ice cream and a case of Vanilla ice cream. Naruto really didn't like where this was going as the terrifying kunoichi put three scoops of each flavor into the bowl and then hums to herself as she puts the ice cream away. Naruto was shaking in fear as Tayuya proceeded to add whipped cream, walnuts, and what look like rainbow sprinkles into the mix.

Then Tayuya brought her rather large sundae up to the table and sniffs it before looking down at the foot where her big and second toes held him captive. "A RATHER BEAUTIFUL AND DELICIOUS LOOKING SUNDAE, DON'T YOU THINK, MY LITTLE BUG?!" she asked in a rather malicious tone. "THAT'S RIGHT, WHO CARES WHAT YOU THINK! I OWN YOU! I GUESS I'M JUST SO RAVENOUS TONIGHT! ALTHOUGH, IT'S NOT PERFECT; I DON'T HAVE ANY CHERRIES! BUT THEN AGAIN, YOU'LL DO IN A PINCH!" With that, Tayuya snatched Naruto up from her foot and he shivered as she held him in front of her face and then smirks evilly before she snaps her teeth in his face and gave him a view of the inside of her mouth.

Then she plopped her bug down on top of her ice cream. "HOPE YOU LIKE THE VIEW OF THE INSIDE OF MY MOUTH," says the sadistic and very huge redhead. "BECAUSE YOU'RE GONNA SEE THE INSIDE OF IT! WE'RE PLAYING A NEW GAME! ALL YOU HAVE TO DO TO WIN IS STAY INSIDE MY MOUTH WHILE I EAT MY ICE CREAM, WITHOUT GETTING SWALLOWED IN THE PROCESS!" Naruto let out a scream and that she-devil laughed before digging her spoon into the ice cream and taking the first bite with him inside it.

Before Naruto could recover from being unceremoniously plopped into the giantess's mouth, she begins to eat more and more of her ice cream and the shrunken ninja had to swim through some ice cream just to survive as he coughed on the whipped cream that hit him in the face. Naruto planted your feet back on the tongue but tripped on a walnut before the tongue pushed him to the side of the giantess's mouth into some chocolate ice cream. Desperately, Naruto grabbed hold of Tayuya's gums for dear life and have to move down as he was nearly crushed with several walnuts by her teeth. Then some mint cream hits him and pushed Naruto towards the throat. He looked back to see the black hole that lead to a painful demise and worked his way through the ice cream as he climbed desperately up the tongue to avoid going down Tayuya's throat.

Then that giant she-devil sadistically sprays whipped cream into her mouth and Naruto was trapped inside the bubble. He worked his way out of the whipped cream but now it was in Naruto's eyes and he can't see and what's worse is that the tongue was moving around so fast that he was slipping and slipping and having trouble climbing through a wall of ice cream as your mistress greedily keeps filling her monstrous world-breaking mouth until she finished and pulled him out of her mouth, laughing at her bug before Tayuya made her way into the bathroom and then she shoved Naruto into her armpit and He got bombarded with a wave of stench and sweat as Naruto coughed a few times.

 Then he heard Tayuya humming as the giantess gets into her shower and then she turns the shower on, making Naruto yell in pain because the water was hot. Tayuya then squeezed her bug tight, and Naruto gagged and then she placed him on a bar of soap before placing the soap on her shoulder and pushing it down her back. Naruto yelled and hung on tight to the soap as it slid down Tayuya’s back and then it starts to slip down to her butt crack just as Tayuya slammed her butt into the wall, sandwiching Naruto and the soap between her butt cheeks as she grinds her butt into the wall. Naruto had to hold on tight to the soap but then screamed as he slipped into the black hole that was Tayuya’s rump. When it looks like her butt was about to eat him, the demented redhead held it up and bent over, causing Naruto and the soap to slide down her back again.

Naruto tried to run but kept slipping before the female sound ninja grabbed him again. Tayuya then ferociously scrubs her private area with the soap and Naruto tried to run up the soap and climb away but he couldn't maintain a grip. “No! No! No! No! No!”

“Yes! Yes! Yes! Yes! Yes!” Tayuya then took the soap and scrubbed Naruto into each armpit as his screams were muffled and some of the soap even got into his eyes. Before Naruto could even recover, Tayuya then places her bug on her head and puts shampoo through her long, rose red hair. Naruto was slipping through the hair as he tried hanging onto the strands to avoid being washed away and forced himself to try and climb the forest of hair in front of him. However, the flute-player’s huge fingers try to grab at him and after a few times rooting around, succeeds and then Tayuya turns the water off then walks out of the shower and takes a towel and some tape. Naruto grunted as she tapped him to the towel and then used it to dry her body, pushing him into her skin, not the least of all, she ground her bug into her butt before pulling him off and then giggling.

"Well...that was a lovely way to enjoy you abn home for the first time, wasn't it, little bug?" she asked mockingly.
END FLASHBACK

After that, Tayuya had used him as a foot toy most of the time. Sure on occasion, she used something like her ass or another one of her sadistic tormenting playtime ideas, but most of Naruto's fate wwa be underfoot, like the bug Tayuya thought he was, just like she had promised.

Then there were the "Concerts". Tayuya would drop him into the holes of her flute...then play it, with him inside the thing! That was nothing short of a nightmare. It was like being caught in a jet turbine from the noise and the the sound waves made him feel like he was going to shatter, while the air from Tayuya's blowing into the flute made it like a gale force-wind tunnel! It was a miracle alone that he wasn't rendered deaf! Two hours every day in practice and scales, finger exercises, breathing exercises, tongue exercises and then, some of the damn hardest songs she could find. Then she enjoyed watching her "bug" struggle as afterwards, she threatened to squash him unless HE maintained the flute! He had to clean the thing, making sure there was no water, spit or fingerprints in or on it; this was to keep it in perfect condition.

He hated it, come to despise it.

What was worse than that however, was for the past three days, Tayuya had been working on a "Surprise Project" that she told him she was going to do to him. Whatever it was, she was pretty excited about it...which meant misery and woe to him as far as he was concerned.

He tensed at the sound of a familiar booming sound and Tayuya came in, wearing some white socks for some reason. She put her hands on her hips and smirked.

"Well, bug...taken three days to get ready, mostly because I'm an overachiever, but I hope you're ready for the BIG event!" she stopped and laughed before plucking him up and dangling him in front of her face by her thumb and forefinger.

Naruto whimpered as the giant redhead carried him through her place, and stopped in a room that had the lights off and then, Naruto was pretty sure Tayuya smirked, talking to him.

"Going down, bug!" her voice said before he felt her let go of him.

"WAAA-uh?" Fortunately, it wasn't that far of a drop. Naruto ended up landing on something. Before he could wonder what the heck that was all about, the entire room suddenly lit up, revealing what seemed to be a church of some sort that was his size. Wait...no! it wasn't his size, it was a model of one that was made inside of a cardboard box that had the top removed.

"What the...?" Naruto asked, only for something to catch his attention by rubbing softly across his back, the feel of fabric, rough on his skin. It caught his attention and he whipped backwards and saw one section of the box had been given holes in it like a medieval stockade, but this one was made out of the box, so not only was it cardboard,but this one was made so that a person's feet are locked in place around the ankles.

And the one ankles they were around was Tayuya! Her feet propped up on either side of him and she flexes her toes inside the cotton of her white sock-covered feet.

Looking up, Naruto paled at the site of Tayuya's face looming over him. She cackled with delight and leered down at her bug. "Well now, this is gonna be fun! There's a good reason for the white socks today, bug. Wanna know why?"

Naruto gulped, having a feeling in his gut that he wouldn't much like the answer. And he was proven right as Tayuya told him what this whole set up was all for!

"Well, my pet," Tayuya cooed...

11133111.content:
"Hope you're excited. The two blushing brides couldn't wait much longer to marry you after getting to know you so well, so I got everything set up. Even got a brand new pair of socks just for them." Tayuya said down to the bug sized shinobi. Naruto quickly looked around for a way out, but the only way out was to climb the walls of the 'church'. Even he knew he wouldn't be able to climb it quick enough to escape his rose haired mistress. Seeing her bug look around, Tayuya quickly stated, "Don't think about running now, little buggy. I don't think your brides will be very happy with you standing them up at the altar. And when they aren't happy...," Tayuya trailed of before cracking the knuckles of her toes. "They get really violent. You would probably live, but do you want to take the chance?" Tayuya asked. After hearing her threat, Naruto couldn't do much except look at her feet in fear. "Since you stopped moving, I'm going to assume you decided not to. Good job. Now to get this show on the road." Tayuya said.

Tayuya was about to start when she realized she forgot one crucial part. "Oops. Looks like I forgot to make a tiny priest to marry you. Oh well. Guess I can play that part." Tayuya said. She quickly pushed Naruto between her feet with her hand and started. "Do you, buggy, take my wonderful feet to be your beloved wives? To constantly serve and worship them no matter how bad they may smell or how dirty they may be? To always be under and near?" Tayuya asked. "Noooo!" Naruto screamed. "You do? Excellent." Tayuya said, not hearing what the blonde Uzumaki said. "And do my feet take this little bug to be their husband? To have under you and between your toes to toy with? To make clean and care for you? To make sure that he never escapes?" Tayuya asks. "We do." Tayuya says for her feet. "Then by the power vested in me by me, I now pronounce you bug husband and feet wives. You may now press against your husband." Tayuya finishes. "Wait, what was that last part?" Naruto asks after hearing the last part.

Before he can move, the two feet quickly smash against each other, trapping Naruto in between. "Oh, you look so cute together. I'm so glad we went through this." Tayuya said as she playfully crushed Naruto between her two feet. She then started to rub her socked feet together as best as she could, taking naruto for a ride. As she did, she was quickly getting the tiny props she had placed inside of it out for the next part. After getting it all out, she quickly picked Naruto up from between her feet and held him in front of the toes on her right foot. "I think it's time you kissed your brides little guy. Better not keep them waiting." Tayuya said before bring him closer to her pinkie toe. All he could do was kiss it, seeing as she wasn't moving him any more. She quickly brought him to each toe before bringing him to her big toe. Instead of holding him, she pushed him against it and pinched him and her toe together. Sh waited for a minute before moving him away to her other foot. "Slow down you two. Save some for tonight." Tayuya said as she smirked down at Naruto. She then had him do the same for her other set of toes on her left foot before she grabbed him.

"Now then. Time for the next part. Every groom should dance with his bride, or in this case brides." Tayuya said while holding him. She quickly unbound her ankles from the box and blocked the holes in it. She then stepped inside the box and dropped Naruto in front of her feet. "Good thing I used a bigger box. Otherwise you wouldn't be able to dance." Tayuya said from above him. Before Naruto can look around, a shadow came up from above him. Looking up, all he could see was the underside of Tayuya's foot just before she brought it down. He scrambled out of the way as the foot came down, but didn't get any rest as the other foot quickly rose up and came down for him. Naruto tried to run, but could do nothing as Tayuya continued to stomp her feet down around him. With one last jump, he landed on something soft. Looking down, he quickly realised just what he had landed on. "Huh? Well then, I guess you want to get to your honeymoon if you're jumping on my foot like that. Well, I guess we can do that now, but your wives will have a lot more energy. Better hang on tight. Don't want to be lost on the floor now." Tayuya said before heading to the door. Naruto can only hang on tight as the foot carried him to the door. As Tayuya reaches it, Naruto hopes something will happen before Tayuya gets to her room.

What happens next?

All the while saliva and minor bits of unchewed food clung to Naruto in a way that just digusted him....soon he was just floating in a thick gooey pond of Tayuya's saliva.

1113322.content:
Naruto felt the muscles of the redhead's throat shifting as he went down the path that lead into the kunoichi's stomach. He couldn't believe this, digested by a sound ninja...what a humilating way to die, why couldn't it be on the battlefield with a kunai in each hand, in service to konoha, the way a ninja SHOULD have the dignity to die?

As he headed to meet his doom, the orange-obsessed blond noticed something very weird: The muscle fibers of Tayuya's stomach pulsed and glowed dark indigo blue and her stomach juices were a deep electric purple. If he had to guess, it was an effect of the Curse Mark, but what the heck was going on with Tayuya's body?

As soon as that thought cross his mind, a black smoke-like fluid substance suddenly rose up from the body fluid and formed itself into a rough outline of a human before it solidified and grew more and more detailed until it became an exact copy of Tayuya in her cursed seal's second level.

Naruto landed in the copy's hand and was disoriented by the impact as she brought her hand to her face. "Well, well, well...what have we here?" the cursed-state duplicate of Tayuya cooed as she looked over Naruto's shrunken form in her palm.

Naruto sat up and shook his head to clear it and then let out a loud yelp at the giant face looming over him. the duplicate of Tayuya laughed as she curled her fingers and Naruto, who was backing up, bumped into them.

"Wha-what the hell is going on here?! Tayuya SWALLOWED me and this is happening?! I thought I was gonna be digested!" Naruto shouted.

"Surely you don't want to be digested vthen crapped out afterwards, though, do you?" the horned redhead asked, to which Naruto quickly shook his head to the negitive.

"I don't, but what's going on here?!" he demanded, causing the copy of the kunoichi to actually snicker.

"Well that I can answer: As it turns out, the resaon I have the summoning contract with the Doki, the Rage Ogres if you translate the literally meaning of what their called, is that I have Oni blood in my veins...the Curse Mark from Orochimaru just brings it to the surface," the demonic-looking version of the redhead said. Then she leered at Naruto, a razor smirk reaching across her face, "and judging by your size and that demonic aura emitting from you...you'll suit my needs just fine!"

Naruto gulped, knowing he was going to regret this, but asked anyways "Wh-what needs? and what dose your bloodline have to do with what's happening here?"

The cursed-form laughed "You see,the Oni tribe was engaged in a great war with the Genma, a race of demons that were born out of chaos by a demon god born in the confusion of the beginning of Earth. After losing this war, the Oni suffered considerable losses and their remanining numbers were scattered. So...we need to find exceptionally powerful demons to take as..." she stopped and smiled, shaking with minor convulsions of laughter.

"As what?" Naruto asked with a sinking feeling.

"Mates." she finished. "And you, little one, sit those requirments..so that's why I can't allow you to be digested. I noticed your demonic aura when you were going to land in the stomach juices and that's why I saved you. Of course, I could always keep you as a pet if that dosen't work out. At your size, refusing wold be just plane stupid and downright suisidal...or I could always drop you and see if I can absorbe your demonic powers by digesting you."

Naruto's heart sank...his status as a jinjuriki had gotten him into trouble before...but THIS?!?

Well, small-fry...what's it gonna be? I can either cause you to be burped up, after which you'll need to choose between wedding bells or a pet's cage...or you could refuse that option all togeather and I tip you into the stomach and you end up a meal. Tick-tock..." she said.

Naruto felt himself break out into a sweat...Oh, he hated the fox sometimes...and this was one of them! He didn't want to end up an Oni-girl's pet, but he wasn't ready to consider getting married! But if he didn't go with eather of those, he'd be dropped into what was basically a living vat of acid and desolved by a scorned woman!

"What'll happen if I get belched up?" Naruto asked to give himself time to think.

The oni-Tayuya shrugged "You get to live, I go into my second state form permanently, and the hereditary instincts and memories of the Oni tirbe wake up in me as well, and YOU become mine for life, either as my husband or my pet, I'll evel let you pick which one. If you don't like that idea...well..." she said jerking her hand and Naruto screamed as the stomach acid bubbled eagerly far below him, urging him to refuse.

Naruto gulped and then announced that he would...

Thankfully that unlikely scenario didn't happen, Rukia bounced a couple of times and was secure in Orihime's cleavage. Were Rukia any smaller or were this any other girl she would have slid right through most likely to her death, but Rukia was the right size for Orihime's rack. The way her pink bra was Orihime's breasts were just tight enough together that Rukia wasn't able to fall through, yet she still didn't have to worry about the two mountains squeezing the life out of her. What little light came from that opening and whatever light made it through the shirt and Orihime's breasts, not much but just enough so Rukia could see her own hand and Orihime's mile long breasts...maybe even two miles long actually. It was even sort of...cozy in there...sort of like Ichigo's closet Rukia grew to love.

Course she judged it too soon, with a single skip Orihime shook Rukia's entire world, literally. Gravity and Orihime together made Rukia's position Hell on Earth, her boobs was bouncing up and down in a bouncing motion that just made Rukia dizzy at the experience, and of course this was only step one. Around step four or five Rukia was really dizzy and even slightly nausias, would she be going through this the whole time? The answer was a big fat yes, and Orihime being the ever innocent ditz didn't even consider checking up on her pet. She just kept skipping and humming happily.

No wonder she doesn't have any pets. Rukia was borderline puking by the time Orihime arrived at school, so tired and dizzy she just wanted a nap...which the long classes of Orihime doing nothing would be the perfect opportunity for such. A loud school bell said classes were starting, and not even five seconds upon entering Orihime was greeted with an ever familiar face.

"OH my lovely Hime I love you!!!!!!!!!" The redhead lesbian Chizuru appeared from nowhere and groped Orihime's voluptous chest. "Did you miss me? I missed you! How about we go for a nice long walk an-" Like Chizuru a second person came from nowhere, this one kicking Chizuru off of Orihime.

With a disgusted look Tatsuki walked up to Chizuru, "Get real! Quit trying to hit on Orihime like that all the time. Have some sense!"

1211312221111.content:
A sound rang along the heavens at that moment, a sound that seemed to save Rukia from any more of Orihime’s affection, the school bell. Up front the teacher turned to her students, “Okay class, sit down now. Class is about to begin…” She eyed Orihime for a second, no doubt noting her shirt unbuttoned; but she didn’t say anything, at least…not aloud. She just turned her back to the class as they began sitting down.

Orihime let out a small, discontent sigh at the command, but she listened to her teacher and sat at her desk beside Tatsuki. Rukia, in contrast, let out a content sigh as she was freed from Orihime’s cheek. Saved by the bell…She chuckled, and who knows; maybe during the boring school day Orihime will notice Rukia isn’t a bug. She had her fingers crossed. When Orihime sat at her desk she placed Rukia near the corner, safely out of the way as she placed her pencils and papers in front of her. Rukia stared at the sharpened pencil with a mild sense of queasiness; it was like a blade at her size, and in the gigantic hands of a ditz like Orihime…a deadly blade.

For the umpteenth time the redhead didn’t catch the negative feelings though, she began whispering to her pet, “Okay Anty, I won’t get to talk to you during class, but don’t feel left out. I’ll make sure you have a good time!”

“I’d rather have a nap or something.” The small girl mumbled. Naturally Orhime didn’t hear her; but true to her word, she didn’t talk as the teacher, Misato Ochi. Mrs. Ochi began with some basic history lessons, lessons which Orihime began copying post-haste. The loud scribbling of her pencil drove Rukia a bit nuts, but it was better than dealing with Orihime’s unbelievably ditzy attitude. Not that Rukia had anything against Orhime, she just didn’t particularly enjoy conversations with a woman who could justify not only keeping an ant as a pet, but bringing it to school.

And the Ant just had to be me…Rukia slumped, deciding to sit down in the corner as she attempted to relax with Orihime looming beside her. Speaking of which, Rukia never really noticed before, but…Orihime was big. She knew the entire time of course, but with all the weird adventures going on she never had a good chance to measure it out. Orihime’s chest was about level with the desk, and Rukia honestly never saw anything quite that big. It looked like something that would take days, maybe even weeks to climb. Hell, the nipple alone would probably take days! She hugged her knees as more and more size comparisons made Rukia feel more and more puny.

-------------------------------------------------------

Orihime, meanwhile, smiled softly as her pencil wrote out her notes. With her innocent eyes she exchanged looks with, the teacher’s lesson, her notes on the lesson, and of course her pet ant. She could see it in the corner, sitting still, almost like it was a person acting depressed.

Poor Anty…I should really do something for her…The redhead caught a glance of her pencil and got an idea…

-----------------------------------------------------------

BOOM

A loud crash started Rukia, who, amidst her depression, was on the verge of sleep. She jumped up to the sight of a grayish black mountain right in front of her, with edges as sharp as daggers. It was the edges that told Rukia what is was, not even ten minutes ago she was worried Orihime might try something with it, it was pencil lead!

She looked up to the gigantic redhead smiling down at her, “Don’t be upset Anty, you can play with that while I do my school work…We can do notes together!” She carefully whispered. To avoid suspicion she quickly rose back up and focused on school work again, but Orihime gave extra glances to her ant.

Rukia stared at the lead mountain with a blank face, “Only Orihime could think exchanging notes with an ant makes sense. I’d rather write a note to get her attention…” A light bulb lit up when she said that.

-------------------------------------------------------------

Several Minutes Later…

Writing a note was a lot harder than Rukia thought, it took a good five minutes alone to get a sizable chunk of lead she could use, despite the fact it made her hands completely gray; and she was still working on writing a single line. Damn desks…why don’t they let students write on these anymore…! The shrunken girl complained. At her size a note to Orihime already seemed ludicrous, but the desk was hardly showing anything at all, it was all faded and hard to see.

“It’ll have to do…” Rukia sighed, starting the next line.

It took ages to actually get anything written, in fact, a couple hours passed before Rukia managed to finish Orihime’s name. Not just because of her height, but because Rukia had to make the letters absolutely enormous. Because if they weren’t lines as thick as Rukia herself, or as big as herself, then it might as well be invisible; at least with this there was a mild chance of success.

The rest of class proceeded like that, Orihime didn’t seem to want to interrupt her frantically working ant; and luck finally gave Rukia a break too. There was no gym today and Mrs. Ochi was responsible for the other classes, long story short, Orihime would stay at that one desk, giving Rukia plenty of time to write. And when Lunch came around, another stroke of luck, Orihime didn’t bring luck, so she didn’t make any moves that could compromise Rukia. Tatsuki and Chizuru arrived and began chatting the girl away, but they gave Rukia no mind at all, mainly because she was an ant, mildly because Orihime asked them to. That was perhaps the luckiest thing Rukia had happen to her since shrinking.

When Lunch ended the rest of the day proceeded like the rest before it, nothing special. Rukia was nearing the end of her note, but it was also nearing the end of school. She picked up the pace as fast as she could. And by some miracle, when the clock hit three, Rukia finished.

It was small, maybe a thumb wide at best, but it was at least visible. Rukia eyed what appeared to be a plain of text, “Orihime im rukia not an ant!!!” In retrospect, the exclamations weren’t necessary, but it made Rukia feel better. It left no time for correct grammar, though it didn’t really matter. The tiny girl prayed the goddess-sized Orihime would notice it.

The bell began to ring, school was over…

(Note to readers. In case it isn't crystal clear, the second option also means Orihime does NOT see the note. Tatsuki's hand blocks it)
1211312221111.title: Schooltime with Orihime

12113122211112.content:
A shadow came across her, Rukia looking up to see a titanic hand from the sky. She barely dodged out the way as the hand hit the desk with a shattering boom. She looked up to see that the hand belonged to Tatsuki, who was chatting with Orihime. A twitch of part anger part annoyance filled her. Tatsuki's hand was blocking the note! Rukia rushed the closest part to her, the index finger, tackling the wall of skin. Considering her size, it was fruitless. She managed to catch the last part of their conversation as she still struggled and pushed..

"-You could come over and sleep at my place tonight."Tatsuki's voice rang through the heavens. Orihime's equally booming giggle followed."Sure! Even Anty will come!"

Rukia sighed. Her one moment of salvation was ruined by a casual movement from Tatsuki's hand."How life hates me...."She mumbled to herself.

Tatsuki's sigh followed hers."Sure Orihime, even your pet ant can come....."

Another giggle of joy from the godlike ditz."You hear that, Anty?"Orihime addressed her 'pet', poking her with her finger."We're going to have such a good time tonight!!"

"I'm just oozing joy."Rukia knew her sarcasm couldn't be heard, but speaking aloud was the only thing keeping her sane.

Orihime reached down, plucking Rukia up between her fingers. She brought her down once again to her enormous cleavage, Rukia braced herself to fall into the expansive valley or get absorbed into the nigh-planetary boobs. Orihime suddenly stopped."Hey Tatsuki, you wanna carry Anty?"She asked.


"Uh....no thanks."Tatsuki replied.

"Oh come on, you two really need to bond! My best friend and my pet!"Orihime urged. Only she could establish a relationship between a speck and a teenage girl.

Tatsuki reluctantly took the speck into her hand, looking at Rukia stangely."Trust me, you're not the only one who hates this."Rukia yelled up, even though she knew fully well that she couldn't be heard.

Tatsukiplaces Rukia...

121131222111121.content:
Rukia could already see it coming when Tatsuki’s socked toes wiggled in the open air. The girl’s tennis shoe was raised up to about knee-level, with her fingers she, rather roughly) plucked the poor girl from Orihime’s desk and dangled her over the opening of her shoe. Her head was turned from Orihime so she couldn’t see, but Rukia saw Tatsuki’s cold, emotionless expression.

The classroom was emptying so no one noticed anything, but Orihime realized what her friend was up to. Her hand reached for the wrist of the girl, “No! You’ll hurt Anty Tatsuki! Hide her in your hair or something!”

For once, I am glad Orihime is so weird. Rukia smirked.

---------------

Tatsuki’s disgusted expression revealed itself, a look that scared Rukia. The last thing she wanted was to put this damn bug on her head; it’d probably reproduce and next thing she knew, she’d have a hair full of ants. She’d do what needed to be done, kill the damn bug beneath her foot like it belongs. But Orihime had already grown attached to it, another bug. It wasn’t the first time the redhead befriended an insect, and it wouldn’t be the first time Tatsuki crushed it. It was for Orihime’s own good, having an insect for a pet was just unhealthy and could lead to an infestation. If she didn’t do anything there was no telling what would happen. She wasn’t too fond of stepping on a bug with her socks, but it was the best she could do given Orihime wanted her to carry the thing.

She put on a normal face when she turned to Orihime to respond, making it up as she went. “But bugs….love….feet….” She had to admit, it was pretty weak. There was no way someone, even Orihime, could ever buy that.

“Oh really? Why didn’t you say so!” The redhead smiled kindly at her friend. Both Tatsuki and Rukia looked at her with the same dumbfounded expression. Huh?! Orihime continued, “That explains so much! Like, why they’re always by my feet. I’ve been told I have cute feet; there was this guy an-“ Tatsuki covered her friend’s mouth with her hand, bring Rukia dangerously close to the cavernous maw. “Don’t say it!”

Orihime, ever like the ditz she was, stopped and continued to smile. “Alrighty, I won’t hold you guys back anymore. Have fun Anty! I’m sure Tatsuki will take great care of you until I show up!”

--------------

With nothing left in her way Tatsuki smiled as Rukia was brought to her shoe’s opening again. There were no words like what Orihime would do, She wordlessly released what she saw as a worthless bug. Tatsuki’s victorious expression was the last thing she saw in the light, the open space grew limited as she landed in the shoe with a squishy sound. Rukia looked up just in time to see the looming toes of Tatsuki overcome her.

-----------

Ever proud of yet another bug vanquished and Orihime stopped from doing something risky, Tatsuki stepped out of the classroom at long last, giving a firm stomp just as soon as Orhime was out of ear reach. She could feel the near microscopic bug under her foot, still alive, still struggling. Its stubbornness annoyed the tomboy, God, just die already like the others. She stomped her way out of the school, but still the bug refused to die.

“I think I’ll run home.” She laughed out loud; it felt silly to talk to “Anty” like that, but if the bug somehow understood her then it could at least fear for its last few moments alive. Taking a deep breath Tatsuki took off running for her house.

----------

Being underfoot was indescribably painful; the entire weight of a planetary object was focused solely on Rukia, intent on crushing her at that. The footsteps Tatsuki took were murder, enough that Rukia actually coughed out blood at the first step. Several bones cracked from the pressure, maybe even broke. Then came another step, more blood, more broken bones. At this rate Rukia wouldn’t even make it out of the school alive. But she was stubborn, more stubborn that Tatsuki gave her credit for. She wasn’t any Unohana, but she knew some decent healing spells. Every single ounce of Spiritual Pressure she had was focused on keeping her alive.

It took all her focus, and with Tatsuki’s constant pounding she couldn’t even do her decent healing. It was all Rukia could do to prevent herself from getting any more injuries. Her focusing on the spells helped block out a lot of the pain and smells, but when Tatsuki began to run things grew hectic. The chaos in the girl’s shoe was so horrid Rukia couldn’t even keep up with what was happening. One second she was beneath the arch, the next she was crashed into a toe. Tatsuki’s running was sending her everywhere! Though, in an odd way…it actually helped Rukia. Now Tatsuki’s entire weight was only on her about half the time. Any other time she was just smacked against her toes or shoe. It helped her stay alive; she could continue her method of healing and actually make progress.

Near about halfway Tatsuki’s foot began to sweat, thankfully her sock absorbed it. But after a few more minutes, the sock was moist. So when Rukia slammed into her foot she also got a disgusting taste of foot sweat. Regardless, she continued to focus on healing herself. Her Shinigami training left her able to at least sort-of focus in the harsh conditions. And slowly, her injuries managed to get healed; and by that time, Tatsuki arrived home. Rukia was so focused on staying alive she hardly noticed the torture and humiliation.

--------

Tatsuki panted with a faint smirk as she entered her home and grabbed a drink. Sipping at the cool water she removed her shoes and sat on a couch in her living room. Propping a foot on her knee, she looked for the bloody remains of the ant. But there was no blood, nothing she could see. Yet blended against the black fabric of her sock, the ant was there, still alive.

She plucked the bug from her sole and held it before her face in disgusted anger. “What the-“

DING-DONG
Someone rang Tatsuki’s doorbell, grunting a bit she continued to hold the bug as she answered. On the other side was Orihime, and she wasn’t alone…
121131222111121.title: For Her Own Good

1211312221111211.content:
One of Tatsuki's eyes widened, while the other went down in contempt. Orihime greeted her with a happy wave."I hope you don't mind, but I brought over Matsumoto as well. The more the merrier, right?!"The ditz laughed. The Blonde bombshell beside her was equally ecstatic, holding up a bag of party favors."I brought some food and games!"She said. And even some alchohol for myself. She thought to herself. The two stepped inside, Tatsuki slamming the door behind her. She was very wary of Rangiku Matsumoto. She just pops out of nowhere into their school, and assimilates into their classmates hearts. To Tatsuki, there was no FRIGGIN' way that woman was a teenager.

"Ooh, Anty!"Orihime squealed, rushing over and plucking the speck of a bug out of her Tatsuki's hand. Rukia had sat in silence this whole time, recovering from the trip inside the tomboy's shoe."Matsumoto, I would like for you to meet my pet bug, Anty!!"Orihime held out her hand in front of her face, allowing the Soul Reaper in disguise to get a clear view of the 'bug'. Rukia scrambled back, still amazed at how big everything was...Rangiku's beautiful face was proportioned large enough to be an entire landscape to her."Wow..."Matsumoto boomed, her voice echoing inside Rukia's ears and her breath a mighty windstorm."That's the smallest bug I've ever seen!"

Tatsuki walked over to them, crossing her arms."Well?"She grumbled."Can we get this sleepover started already?"

----

In the hours dwindling into the night, the only two who seemed to be having any fun were Orihime and Matsumoto. Tatsuki tried to participate in their childish endeavors, but the thought of that bug that Orihime held in her palm kept her from the fun. She wanted to end it! She had to, Orihime may seem a bit lacking in the upstairs department, but even she should have enough brains to know bugs are not pets. They are simple annoyances that sometime get in the way. And when they do, they needed to be squashed.

While watching the two, Tatsuki had began to form a plan, yes a plan, to be rid of the bug that was unknowingly Rukia. Her eyes had wandered to Matsumoto's revealing attire, her massive chest, tripled the size of Orihime's, fluttering carelessly about in a unbuttoned pajama top.

"Hey, Tatsuki!"Orihime's voice interruted her train of thoughts."Wanna play?"She pointed at a boardgame they had just made up from various bits and pieces of toys lying around. The game made absolutely no sense, considering that they changed the rules every few minutes. Tatsuki smiled secretely, and walked over, sitting in criss-crossed legs between the two.

Their senseless game went onn for about half an hour or so before Tatsuki enacted her plan. While Orihime rolled the dice with one hand, Tatsuki gently tapped the other hand holding Anty, that simplest movement sending Rukia the speck flying through the air. Orihime had no idea of this, so her naive mind was focused on the game at hand. Only Tatsuki's eyes followed the speck descent into Rangiku Matsumoto's...

On the other hand was Tatsuki, who wanted to crush Rukia, who she thought was a bug, into the ground like one. Then there was Matsumoto, enough said. That girl was a wild card in and of itself. So of course, it was only natural that fate would have the girl who hated Rukia, Tatsuki, flick her into the air. And as one would expect, she landed on the girl who probably felt nothing for the “Ant” Matsumoto, specifically her cleavage. Rukia already normally felt insignificant in comparison of the woman’s chest, this just made it even worse. Matsumoto’s boobs were each the size of someone’s head, probably a dozen times Rukia’s breast size. Right now, they were probably a few thousand times bigger than the Shinigami herself. Needless to say, Rukia was a little bit red in embarrassment at how insignificant she was. To be between a woman’s breasts was just embarrassing, and it made her own chest seem oh so small.

Matsumoto didn’t seem to notice at all though; she just kept her usual flirty smirk and took another sip of her sake bottle. Probably exactly what Tatsuki wanted; one jump in glee from the voluptuous giantess and Rukia would meet her maker. Either that or she’d fall through to her doom through the loose valley…or maybe the mountains would just get smushed together and crush her that way. Regardless, Matsumoto’s cleavage was a valley of death to the miniscule girl.

It made Rukia turn a little red with embarrassment again, but she knew she had to gain the Vice-Captain’s attention before she got killed. So she did really the only thing she could do; she tried rubbing the breast in order to gain some sort of attention. After a couple rubs it crossed the small woman’s mind she was basically massaging the much more superior breast, a thought that made her look to her own boobs with a disappointed expression. Now wasn’t the time to worry about boob-size though, now was a time to try and focus on not dying in between the breasts she envied. She put a little more force into her massaging.
-------------

The moment Rukia landed on Matsumoto she knew that Orihime’s pet landed there. Her alertness as a Shinigami made that easy. Although in all honesty, it was sort of hard to miss Tatsuki’s glaring at the bug all night, as well as her flicking it. Then the landing made it pretty obvious, the Vice-Captain’s breasts were rather sensitive after all. She was initially going to take the bug out, but first things first; she took a hit of her sake. As she lowered the bottle she prepared to lift the bug, only it began to massage Rangiku’s breast somehow. Surprising, but even more so was the fact it actually felt good. “Don’t call me that…” The tomboy mumbled, eyeing the bug in Matsumoto’s cleavage. It was sort of funny seeing her stare so hatefully at another woman’s chest, or at least it did to the Shinigami.
------------------

Matsumoto buttoning her shirt did help a little bit. At first Rukia thought she was getting discovered; or, worst case scenario, Rangiku was removing her top entirely. Rukia wasn’t too sure she wore a bra either. But no, just another button on her (stolen) school shirt. It did wonders, it closed the gap below so Rukia wouldn’t fall. It tightened the place a little bit, and it actually sort of made the small woman’s place rather…cozy.

All of this from the bust of another woman. Rukia felt her chest seemingly shrink in comparison. Her eyes looked to the never ending vastness of boob around her. Sensual mounds of skin that went on far enough to probably be a moon. Directly above was Matsumoto’s face, her beautiful…flawless face…Rukia began to feel insignificant again. “Well at least my lower body is better!” She told herself aloud. And it was true too. Her feet, legs, even butt, all of it toppled Rangiku’s in overall appeal. It was Rukia’s best feature. That and her feisty attitude.

Wait what am I doing? I need to get her attention before I die! She began massaging again at a renewed pace.
-----------------

Several minutes (and drinks) passed as the three normal-sized girls continued their game. Rukia continued to persistently massage to try and get the massive Matsumoto’s attention, unaware all she was doing was making the girl a bit horny. Matsumoto had just won a round and cheered when her senses picked up something. It was faint, very faint, but it was Reiatsu. Rukia’s Reiatsu. From…her cleavage? The woman looked down to Anty curiously. The ant was small, so small it can hardly been seen…but…with the idea in mind. Anty started to resemble a human, to resemble Rukia.

Can it be? There had been stories of shrinking people before, usually waved off as myths. This bug seemed to know how to massage, an odd trait for a bug. And most bugs didn’t usually keep at a massage for a good hour…There was only one way to be sure. Matsumoto lowered her head to reach for her sake, but secretly she eyed Rukia on a closer level. And sure enough, it was the Shinigami, small and somehow clothed, although her clothes seemed a bit worse for wear…no doubt due to someone like Tatsuki. It was now, without a doubt, confirmed. But what to do? Matsumoto decided to think on it as she took another sip of her newest sake bottle.

Some time passed again, and quite a few thoughts came through Matsumoto’s mind. Naturally, help Rukia, get her normal, maybe get Tatsuki some bug-therapy. Keep her a secret and try to take her away where she can get help. Telling the others about her and awaiting ideas. Or even, this may have been the alcohol, but using Rukia like a little slave. Her feet, her butt, her boobs, hell, all of Matsumoto needed pampering. Her Captain worked her too hard. Tatsuki and Orihime could even join in. Or maybe just say nothing and enjoy the show. So many possibilities.

Rangiku decided to push the envelope a bit. During the game she asked the question, “Hey guys…what would you do to a shrunken person?” Normally this question would seem unusual and weird, but it was Matsumoto and Orihime, this was about as normal as it got. Unfortunately, Rukia saw it as fate messing with her again.

Orihime paused for a moment, “Well…I think it’d depend on who.”

“Yeah.” Tatsuki nodded.

“Well…let’s say…Rukia?” Rukia was sure fate was messing with her.

The ditzy red-head got a little quiet. Orihime was jealous of Rukia…jealous in so many ways…even someone as nice as her…on some level Orihime wanted to torture Rukia. The rest of her just liked the idea of being able to play with her friend, literally. They could take playing “Dolls” to a whole new level. “I think me and her would do…a lot of things together…”

Tatsuki had a small bored look, “Well…personally I got nothing against Rukia. But I don’t like things too small either so I can’t really say for sure. I think I might mess with her for a bit, maybe do something like tease her. I’ve been told stuff like I sweat a lot, or have smelly feet. Nothing too mean, just a little bit of fun.” Her eyes shifted to Anty, He on the other hand will get crushed and mutilated.

Rangiku nodded, laughing. “I see…” That conversation carried on for a bit, mainly Matsumoto checking out what they were capable of. Orihime seemed nice and all, but a majority of her scenarios with tiny people seemed more…playful than anything. And if Rukia learned anything it was that playing with Orihime was the same as torture. Tatsuki on the other hand, was a bit more open with how she’d mess with people. People who she didn’t like would get stuck worshipping and massaging her. People she did like would get small sessions of getting teased, maybe a humiliating task, and just overall messing with them. Tatsuki made sure to mention any guy would have a lot of time near her butt or chest, but not allowed to touch it or anything. She did after a while though that the idea of torturing someone small was sounding nicer and nicer. Matsumoto chimed in a bit herself, honestly. She mentioned how overworked she was and how she could use a little worshipper. Not necessarily to be mean, but just because she liked to be pampered. But if they pissed her off, she could get mean real quick.

Long story short, if they discovered Rukia it didn’t sound too good. And Rukia noticed this and quickly stopped massaging. It never dawned on her Matsumoto found out it was her. Speaking of Matsumoto she…

The large plains of pure white, the valley below, the pillar leading up to a massive form, this wasn’t the description of a paradise (Except perhaps for males and lesbians), but rather of Rukia’s current postion; on the collar of Chizuru Honsho’s shirt; the pillar and form being her neck and head, the white being the shirt, and of course, the valley being her cleavage, which was slightly exposed due to Tatsuki’s kick earlier. Little Rukia paled at the sight of the massive redhead. Out of the three women she could’ve landed on, she was the worst. Orihime is perfectly nice, just ditzy; Tatsuki would likely be a devil unless she realized the small ant was in fact her friend. And the person she landed on, Chizuru, big or small, found or unfound Rukia was in trouble with her. The woman was a Grade-A pervert, no doubt having fantasies of about every fetish out there, and knowing Rukia’s luck…one of them would involve bugs or shrunken people. And if she knew Rukia was shrunken, that would be a hundred times worse; a horny teenage girl with a deep passion for everything perverted, along with a tiny girl powerless to disobey her. No matter how she looked at it, Rukia saw trouble if she was with the massive redhead.

However, leaving the redhead seemed a tad problematic; Rukia landed on the collar of her shirt, there was no jumping from there, and other people were simply too far away to jump on to. The shrunken woman looked up at Chizuru, catching nothing but her chin, nose, and a faint trace of the eyes and lips. She shivered at the idea of being around her like this, but what to do? It was rather obvious, although without a doubt difficult; Rukia would have to climb her way down Chizuru’s mountainous body. A brief look down gave no confidence with that plan; the floor was so far away it was blurry.

Why does the world seem to hate me lately? Rukia sighed, wasting no time in beginning her descent.

The task however, was impossible. To Rukia, the one collar of Chizuru’s shirt seemed to stretch for miles; it would take days-maybe even weeks before she’d get remotely close to the ground below. Not mentioning the fact Chizuru was a bundle of energy, hopping around Orihime like an overjoyed child; groping, flirting, getting kicked, Chizuru wouldn’t even sit still for a second. That basically meant one thing, Rukia tried to climb down…but every time the giantess moved, she was forced to stop and tighten her grip to avoid falling; leaving her unable to make any real progress on her futile task.

This isn’t going to work, Rukia realized with a sigh; but what else could she do? She didn’t have enough power for Kido, she didn’t have her Zanpaktou, and Chizuru didn’t even realize she was there. But a faint light of hope came when Rukia realized, Orihime would notice she was gone! She’d ask, and the black dot along the pure white collar would be completely obvious. All Orihime needed to do was notice…

….Which she did not. In her fantasy of getting saved Rukia forgot one key detail, whenever Orihime was with Tatsuki, Ichigo, or any of her friends really, the world basically vanished around her. At the moment, as she was chatting up Tatsuki, she probably didn’t even remember she had a pet ant. Orihime was in her own little world, a world where everyone were giants to poor little Rukia.

She let out a disappointed sigh for the millionth time; I should’ve expected as much of Orihime…I’m on my own here. But what can I do? She gave another look at Chizuru’s looming face, almost goddess-esque from the perspective. At the very tip of her head Rukia caught sight of a small sliver of skin, Chizuru’s ear.

Sigh…I guess if I wanted to live…THAT’S my only option…Rukia started her feeble climbing back upwards, still having the same issues as before of course, but at least her goal was within a much more reasonable range. Being found and…god-knows-what by Chizuru, beat dying without anyone knowing…or at least that’s how Rukia rationalized it.

Then came what seemed to be a gift to Rukia, the school bell. Finally a chance to climb without Chizuru constantly jumping around! The whole class went to their seats, Chizuru’s to the back of Orihime’s for stalking and romantic purposes. For Rukia, the walk was no issue at all compared to the giantess’ jumping; all she had to deal with was a mild shake of her boobs as she went to her seat. Nothing like Orihime’s, who had breasts so large they not only bounced and jiggled, they actually rippled; Chizuru’s much more humane-sized rack was far more pleasurable.

When she took her seat, Chizuru wasted no time in pulling out a notebook as the lesson began. But it wasn’t notes she was writing, it was a disturbing picture of a fantasy with Orihime, it was literally a notebook of Chizuru’s perverted fantasies as she sat beside her love. This particular drawing really bothered Rukia as she climbed, because after 40-minutes she realized what it was, a drawing of Orihime pleasuring herself…with a shrunken Chizuru.

And I’m going to this woman for help? Rukia wondered, started having second thoughts, hopefully Chizuru only enjoyed being small instead of big. She continued to climb without much issue, all she had to avoid were the shoulders due to the writing and that wasn’t hard at all. Rukia worked her way to the base of the neck when, yet again; fate deemed it time to mess with her. Chizuru stared at her drawing, now finished, with eyes of lust and signs of drooling; but like most perverts she tried to hide being so obvious…at least during class. How did she do this? She tried swallowing her saliva to stop the drooling. Normally that wouldn’t be an issue, but Rukia was at the base of her neck, and when Chizuru swallowed…

It was sort of like getting hit by an elevator, Chizuru’s Adam’s apple sliding down her throat; and it sure packed a wallop, enough force to make Rukia lose her grip. She tried clawing for support, but when you lose a grip on skin, you don’t get it back at that size. Her desperate grabs did get her one thing though.

WHAM!

Chizuru shook her hand with disgust, “Damn bugs, trying to bite my neck. That there is reserved…” Another lust-filled glance to Orihime made her smirk.

Chizuru’s smack dazed Rukia, rendering her immobile as gravity took effect. The girl fell back, too dazed to even tell how far. But she did know it got dark, must’ve gone in Chizuru’s shirt or something. The feeling of impact managed to snap Rukia back to normal though, but where did she land? A quick look told and horrified the girl…

Compared to the smell inside the shoe, the one here was bearable. Still, that was not Rukia's preffered holiday location.

Suddenly, Tatsuki squeezed her toes together, leaving Rukia minimal space for move or breathing. Rukia squeaked when the pain returned and started squirming around, hoping to make her way out of this hell. To her surprise, Tatsuki started laughing.

"Hahaha! This tickles, little buggy!" She laughed on, Rukia's every move resulting in intensification of laughter. What was worse, Tatsuki apparently enjoyed the process, squeezing her toes even tighter, thus making Rukia's escape harder and harder.

Desperate, Rukia started thinking about finding some alternative way to get out of this hell. Maybe if bitten, Tatsuki will ease her grip?
1212212212.title: Squirming between her toes

choices: First she leans forward to mock "The Bug" but notices how weird it looks
She doesn't give a damn, the "bug" hurt her. Time to end it
12122122121.content:
The option was a no brainer. Tatsuki had messed with the wrong bug-sized girl! She had done nothing but make Rukia suffer in her shoes and at her feet and now it was time for payback. In a rapid movement Rukia leaned forward and bit the side of Tatsuki's toe as hard as she possibly could, ignoring the taste of sweaty feet in her mouth. For an instant Rukia was worried about the unlikely, what if her bite wasn't as effective as a bugs? Biologically they were designed to bite bigger things...Rukia was built to eat smaller things...would her bite have the same effect?

The answer was, thankfully, a big yes; in seconds Tatsuki winced in a yelp of pain. And as planned the toes grip on Rukia loosened too, and she fell to the floor where she began running away instantly. Looking over her shoulder she saw Tatsuki rubbing and examining the spot she bit, red and even bleeding slightly. That's what you get for messing we ME! She thought triumphantly. Rukia ran as fast as she could, but it was clear by the miles of floor she was getting nowhere fast....if anything it might take her a full day just to get to the door out of Tatsuki's house....which meant....she was stuck in the house of a girl she just bit...

I really shoulda thought that out more. She admitted with a faint blush. Well...if I get lucky she'll pick me up and notice who I am...now is that a good thing?

Behind her Rukia heard Tatsuki's loud angered grunt, "That hurt ya little punk! Where are ya! I'll show you just how much my foot can hurt you!" Without even looking around she started stomping around, "When I get you you're DEAD!!" Rukia started running away faster. Least I killed her buzz She laughed.

What Tatsuki said next made her blood freeze over, "Found ya!" Several loud booms said Tatsuki was coming in FAST, and Rukia kicked it to an even higher gear. Not that it mattered a damn bit, in less than a second the shadow of Tatsuki's foot loomed below her. And looking up Rukia saw her death in Tatsuki's sole, death under the foot of a teenage girl...kinda sad really. With a loud thud Rukia was pinned underfoot. The small girl let out shrieks of pain as her back cracked under the immense weight. Rukia's already sweat soaked clothes began tearing under the pressure and the weakening from the mixture of fluids. Much to Rukia's embarassment her clothes seemed to shrivel from the tattered rags to nothing, she was now naked and it was practically like....like Tatsuki's foot was... Violating her...the footsweat was reaching her...special places.

And Tatsuki was definitely mad enough to kill her...but would she?
12122122121.title: Bite Tatsuki

121221221212.content:
Tatsuki was ready to end the bug. Rukia screamed under the immense pressure of her foot, loud enough almost for Tatsuki to hear her, but her massive foot drowned out those screams.

Finally Tatsuki forced her foot down as hard as she possibly could, Rukia's body popped and became an instant smear.

"See what happens when bugs don't know their place!" Tatsuki yelled down, twisting her foot from side to side, effectively grinding the 'bug's' remains underfoot.

Rukia had been squashed like a bug.
121221221212.title: She doesn't give a damn, the "bug" ...

121221222.content:
Rukia was within a clenched fist that held her tightly without mercy. Feeling her bones creak and crack Rukia looked up at the one holding her. She had to rub her eyes, all the foot odor and sweat must have been affecting her vision because it wasn't Tatsuki holding her, in fact it was Ichigo's little sister Karin.

After clearing her eyes Rukia saw it was no illusion, Karin was indeed holding her tightly in her left hand, Tatsuki almost directly behind her, both wearing smirks that sent chills down Rukia's tiny spine.

Karin's mouth formed into a large O shape for a minute before muttering "Wow..."

With a giggle Tatsuki raised her head up smugly "Yep, I found me a bug that could take a whole soccer game and still come out alive. I can torture it all I want knowing that it can take pain like that."

Eyeing Tatsuki Karin laughed "That's really twisted Tatsuki."

"You don't like the idea?"

Karin paused. "No, I LOVE IT!!!!"

Karin's shriek practically shattered Rukia's eardrums while she struggled within the teens grip.

"I am a highly renowned member of the Kuchiki clan, I will not be outmatched by a teenage girl's hand!" Rukia screamed angrily as she kept struggling.

Tatsuki noticed Rukia's struggles and pointed at her with a smug expression. "Aww I think the bug wants to get out of your hand!"

Chuckling Karin nodded. "I think so."

The two eyed Rukia's frail body in a way that terrified her enough to where she actually froze up, unable to struggle anymore.

The two girls seemed to be communicating on an almost telepathic level, plotting out what to do to Rukia.

"Are all human girls this demented?" Rukia muttered sarcastically.

Soon Karin and Tatsuki reached an agreement and ended up placing Rukia....

They get Yuzu involved and have Yuzu dominate Rukia with her feet too

Karin and Tatsuki remove their feet off the bug and Karin gets a close look at the bug

"I KNOW WHO THAT IS!!! IT'S RUKIA!!!" Says Karin
