"Yeah lets do it!" Says Karin
1212212221.title: Rukia is between their feet

choices: Yuzu saw what Tatsuki and Karin were doing and rescued the "bug"
Tatsuki and Karin thought of some other way to play with/torture the "bug"
1212212222.content:
Rukia screamed as she was popped into Tatsuki's mouth.Was this demonic teenage part Hollow or something? It would certainly explain things. Suddenly, Tatsuki spit Rukia out of her mouth and the shrunken Kuchiki screamed anew as she saw where she was falling towards: Karin's open mouth. Rukia landed on the tongue of Ichigo's dark-haired sister and felt Karin running somewhere before she was launched into the air again and returning to Tatsuki's mouth.

The two of them were playing a disturbing variant of catch, with Rukia being used as the ball--a spitball.

Bug she could handle, but spitball was over the line.

Rukia heard Tatsuki laugh as she sailed through the air to bounce on Tatsuki's tongue again.

"Heh! I LOVE this bug! I've never had this much fun before!" Tatsuki's enormous voice boomed after spitting Rukia back towards Karin.

Rukia wept as Karin spat her back into Tatsuki's maw, she wished these two would quit. To her relief, they stopped spitting her back and forth.

They quit because...
1212212222.title: spit shot

choices: Yuzu is being more protective than ever
12122122221.content:
Rukia breathed a deep breath of relief when her torture ended. The moment the torture ended a loud panicked voice screamed "What are you guys doing?!"

Everyone traced the voice and found themselves looking at Karin's sister Yuzu. Frowning Yuzu walked forward and snatched Rukia out of Tatsuki's hand. "Shame on you! This poor bug doesn't deserve this!"

"There is a god..." Rukia muttered as she fell back on Yuzu's palm.

Karin averted her gaze, appearing somewhat ashamed whereas Tatsuki stood proudly. "We did nothing wrong. We can do anything we want to bugs."

Yuzu leaned forward and started to raise her voice. "No you can't! Bugs have feelings too! I mean look at this poor little fella, he's traumatized!" Yuzu pointed towards the 'bug' on her palm, to which Tatsuki leaned forward and stared at it.

Rukia felt like she was under a microscope as Tatsuki's massive eye scanned her.She stared intently at the bug for several moments, before muttering, "I don't know about traumatized...but thats a weird looking bug..."

"Huh you're right" muttered Yuzu as she looked at Rukia.

Karin leaned forward and stared with a blank expression at Rukia. "It looks kinda like Rukia." She blurted aloud.

Tatsuki turned to her and laughed. "That's silly, theres no way....." Tatsuki let her voice wander as she saw what Karin meant.

"Wait...is that Rukia?" Karin asked.

"I think it is...." Tatsuki responded.

"That changes everything!!" Yuzu spoke up
12122122221.title: Finally found

choices: Ichigo stepped on the running bug...
121221222211.content:
"What?" Tatsuki and Karin asked at the same time.

Yuzu squeezed the "bug" in her hands, "Rukia is the one who always keeps Ichigo away from us! I can tell!"

Karin shook her head, "Um, Yuzu, come on. I think we should leave Rukia alone. She's already pretty beat up... She is a bug- after all." Suddenly, Karin clamped her mouth with her hand and her face turned red. Tatsuki was doing the same. They both burst out laughing. "RUKIA'S A BUG!! HA HA HA!!"

Rukia squirmed in Yuzu hands. Wait, she thought, I AM bug sized, aren't I? Rukia took a big breath a bit Yuzu.

"Owie!" Yuzu yelped as Rukia fell.

"Ah! I'm falling to my DOOM!"

*SHOOMP!*
121221222211.title: Yuzu joins in Rukia's torture

choices: On the floor around her....were a shrunken Yuzu, Karin, and Tatsuki....PAYBACK!!
1212212222111.content:
Arms flailing all throughout the air Rukia screamed for dear life. Who would've thought, that this was how it was gonna end; death by falling off of a little girl's hand...honestly she didn't see it coming. Although in retrospect in may have been a blessing in disguise, Rukia had gone through hell the last few hours with Tatsuki and then Karin cruelly torturing her without even knowing she was a person. And then when they finally do find out Yuzu the good child wants to join in! Maybe death really was preferable to being the shrunken servant of three young teens; but boy what Rukia would give to have some payback....being Tatsuki's foot toy, being spat around (Which was grosser than belief), hell just being this size period was scary. Rukia was but a speck, an ant in size and even if she had all of her Shinigami power at her disposal she couldn't win against Tatsuki, Karin and Yuzu; the three were gods compared to her right now. As disgusting as that was it was the truth. Still...if Rukia had anything to do with it she was gonna live through this, and make sure these three suffered for all they put her through.

Her eyes shut for an instant, opening up to reveal fierce determination. An inch, a centimeter, a milimeter it didn't matter. Rukia was gonna live through this! She was in a gigai....no means to become a Shinigami...but she still had her Kido and her hand was aimed at the floor. Rukia's spiritual pressure flared to the point it was visible. This is my best shot....

There were so many spells at Rukia's disposal, so many options with them, but she already had a simple plan in mind. Originally when she first began living with Ichigo Rukia questioned everything, and that included when she watched the supposed missions to space. The machines used fire to propel themselves...she had never heard of such a thing; but at that time she wanted to try it and see if it was true, and now came her chance. It's weird how such a random point in time came to mind, but it helped. Eyeing the ground Rukia shouted with all her might, "HADO 33, SOKATSUI!!!" A large crimson red fire emerged from Rukia's hand, and for a moment she felt like she really was going to start flying like a rocket....but even if it was unintentional the giantess' around her still got in her way.

"A....ACHOO!!!" Tatsuki sneezed very loudly, small almost microscopic snot flying everywhere. This would have just been annoying if the sneeze didn't also create a large gust of win. Much to Rukia's dismay her improvised Kido Rocket technique was extinguished. Still, there was hope...she just had to charge another spell an-

"ACHOO!!!" A second sneeze from Tatsuki, this one started to send Rukia flying. But that wasn't the main issue, some of the snot shot right out at her like a meteor, and with no time to react Rukia was stuck in the goo. Too distracted to cast Kido, stuck so no physical movements....Rukia was officially screwed. Everything had happened in only about ten seconds, and now her death would come in the next ten...she felt her heart race. Memories of everything....Byakuya...Renji...Kaien...Ichigo....all her loved ones came to mind....and Rukia smiled nostalgically. "They'd die of laughter if they knew I'd die like this...." The floor came zooming in fast...not even a second left and Rukia closed her eyes, ready for death.

She collided against the floor in a loud impact.

------------------------------------------

Almost drowsily Rukia opened her eyes, and instant was shocked. She had fallen- to her death! What was she still doing alive? Looking around things just kept getting weirder...everything was normal sized! "Was it all just a weird dream?" She asked aloud. Everything...the suffering....the disgust....the giants...it all seemed so real....was Rukia just having a really effective nightmare?

She took a single step forward whilst wearing a confused look. If what she saw wasn't a dream...then where were Tatsuki, Yuzu, and Karin? Was it a dream or not? Dozens of questions littered the girl's mind as she walked, but she quickly noticed something....
1212212222111.title: Is it Over?

choices: There were multiple people torturing me....it's only fair I do the same to you.
Yuzu and Karin can worship my feet. While you Tatsuki, you get to climb me.
12122122221111.content:
Very carefully Rukia started to walk, not even making so much as a sound. It was all too weird; whatever she experienced was far more than some measly dream. A vision? A memory? A call for help? It could've been anything, and it made Rukia cautious because of that. She....she collided with the ground, she died! How was she alive, let alone big? Not to mention details like how she and her clothes were in perfect condition, as if nothing had happened at all. Rukia began to get a headache just thinking about it, nothing made any sense! But in the next instant, Rukia did not care in the slightest. Right before her socked feet were what appeared to be three specks of dirt, with slight squeeks seemingly coming from them too. With her recent experiences, be they real or not, Rukia knew what that could mean. She leaned down and brought her face before the the three.

"Why hello there little ones."

Before her were the very three who were torturing Rukia for so long, Yuzu, Karin and Tatsuki were now the size of ants with Rukia the size of god! The trio were obviously scared beyond belief, not just at the sudden change but at the fact Rukia, the one person who would never help them, had found them. As her deafening voice roared throughout their ears the young siblings nearly fainted, and Tatsuki was petrified. Rukia did nothing but smile. From her side came a hand, her hand with her index finger outstretched.

Tatsuki gasped when she saw it; "She's gonna crush us!!" The surge of fear broke through her petrification, in a hurry Tatsuki grabbed ahold of Yuzu and Karin and attempted to run. Of course it did absolutely no good, Rukia's hairs grew faster than Tatsuki could run. Her finger reached and scooped the trio up in no time at all. With them in hand/finger Rukia stood back up, that demented smile of hers only growing worse with each passing moment. She could not only see, but literally feel the quivers of the three shrunken girls atop her finger. They knew that they were hers, little more than pets at the moment; especially given recent events. The shrunken trio knew exactly what Rukia felt now, and Rukia felt the exact pleasure and joy they did at being the big ones.

"So what's it like? Now that the tables have turned? Eh bugs?" Rukia sounded so smug...and if the others had any reply they were too small or scared for it to be registered. So the giantess proceeded, "And I will be calling you bugs for at least a day. After all, I was just a "Bug" a few minutes ago wasn't I?" The vengeance shined brightly in Rukia's eyes, nothing was going to stop her from enjoying this to the fullest. A small prick came from her finger, but it only served to make Rukia laugh when she figured it out. "Sorry little ones. I'm not like Yuzu, a little bite won't bother me. Now if I were you...I'd kiss that boo-boo before it starts to irritate me. Who knows what could happen then?" She could faintly see Tatsuki, Yuzu and Karin turning around and most likely doing what she asked. And it brought forth such a rush to see them do it!

About a minute passed when Rukia bade them to stop, "Now don't think it's gonna be that easy. You three did some bad stuff to me. And I am going to make you pay for it, each-and-every-little-thing."

A very shrill shriek came from Rukia's finger, the person screaming just loud enough to be understood. "But Rukia!!! I never did anything to you!!!!" Rukia smirked, "Why is that you Yuzu? You may not have done anything to me; but you planned on it. And that is just as bad, but...." She was sure she saw hope in the little girl...well...she saw something. "I won't punish you too badly yet. Because unlike you three I can show some kindness." Rukia bent over, one hand stretching her sock out a little bit. Her other hand (Specifically her finger) hovered over the opening. "That's where you'll be for exactly one hour Yuzu. Or until I feel like pulling you out." The little girl started to protest but Rukia silenced her with a small blowing of her lips. Although it was almost strong enough to bring all three little girls into her sock; thankfully it was only Yuzu. Rukia released her sock and with a slap it came back around her leg; she didn't know where in her sock Yuzu had landed, and she didn't care. If anything the little brat deserved to suffer between her toes. But Rukia wasn't going to be that cruel, at least...not yet.

Back to her full height she eyed the remaining two with a smirk, "Now what to do with you two? The big duo who did the torturing? Don't think you'll get off easy like Yuzu." They shouted pleas for mercy, but Rukia flat out ignored them and pondered what to do. Getting payback for something like being in Tatsuki's shoe was nice, but at the same time she wanted to be original with it...

It was like a lightbulb clicked in her head at that moment, and two ideas arose. One would be perfect; although it provided a risk that Rukia would lose her slaves albeit at literally double the torture. And yet the other involved bringing Yuzu out, she had just put her in her sock. Pulling her out right away might make Rukia seem a tad bit like a liar. She wanted to prove herself better than the three who were against her (But obviously not better enough to be above payback), not become worse then them. Then again...they're the size of dirt, does it really matter?

Rukia decided to go with her gut, and with her deafening voice she silenced the little ones with her sentence. "Okay bugs, I have thought of a good way to start my payback. Although you obviously won't like it...
12122122221111.title: Time for Some Well Deserved Payback

Some girls from school are out at the park...they're quite easy to manipulate

At her statement both Karin and Tatsuki started screaming a wave of protest, to which Rukia ignored and placed her thumb on top of them; both silencing them and providing a decent way to kill time. Getting other people in on this was going to be risky, very risky. She'd need someone who would believe her no matter what, or someone she could easily manipulate into being on her side. Best case scenario; both. But who would work for that?

While maintaining her bored torture for Karin and Tatsuki Rukia slid her shoes on (Catching a horror filled shriek from Yuzu within her sock while doing so) and left the Kurosaki household. Wherever her fellow torturer would be; it definitely wouldn't be inside of that place. Rukia wandered aimlessly around town thinking, that is when she passed by the perfect place and got an idea...

12122122221112.title: The End...or a New Beginning?

121222.content:
Tatsuki bent over and picked up Rukia, still not recognizing her friend, She quickly used her free hand to check around her school uniform for a pocket, finding only one pair at her waist.

Carelessly Tatsuki slid Rukia into her pocket and began walking, skipping a little in her steps. After giving a short farewell to Orihime Tatsuki left.

Upon entering Tatsuki's pocket Rukia was instantly cramped within the small space, slowly being shoved deeper into Tatsuki's pocket and in turn her waist. Tatsuki's foot steps continously bouncing her up and down gave Rukia a sense of naushia

Out of the blue Rukia heard Tatsuki's thundering voice. At first she believed Tatsuki to be thinking aloud but in face she was actually addressing 'the bug'

"You're lucky little bug. Normally I just squish you guys under my feet, but for some reason I don't wanna kill you and I make it a policy to trust my instincts. So I won't kill you...yet. Gotta have some fun first."

"Fun?" Rukia repeated nervously as a bead of sweat slid down her face.

Almost seeming like she didn't have a care in the world Tatsuki happily walked home with her school bag flung over her shoulder. She allowed her mind to wander, imagining the numerous things she could do with this bug. The possibilities were near endless.

Tatsuki had daydreams of her eating the bug,sitting on it, smashing it between her C-Cup breasts, shoving it between her toes, up her nose, in her ear...numerous thing, all of which spelled trouble for Rukia.

Lost in her thoughts time flew and before she knew it Tatsuki had arrived home. She entered and after briefly greeting her mother Tatsuki went up to her room and pulled 'the bug' from her pocket, pondering just what to do.

Rukia looked down horror-struck as the canyon below her widened egerly and Tatsuki released her Rukia screamed as she fell and landed inside Tatsuki.

Rukia instantly gets smashed into a wall of snot and begins struggling to move. "Hey that tickles!" exclaims Tatsuki. After a while, Rukia manages to break free of some of the snot and climbs down Tatsuki's nose to the nostril. Tatsuki feels this and quickly digs the "bug" from her nose. She then looks closely and relaizes that it's Rukia!
"Oh my god! Rukia, i'm soo sorry, I didnt know it was you!" Rukia mutters something and a bright flash erupts into the room. When it's gone, Tatsuki is staring at a giant pair of tabi shoes that the shinigami's wear. Somehow her and Rukia switched sizes!......
1212222.title: In Tatsuki's nose!

12122222.content:
Tatsuki looked up, silently praying that she was too small for Rukia to see. Sadly, Rukia was already looking down towards her unlucky ex-tormentor.

"Putting me in a pocket, huh? Tormenting like a bug, stuffing in your nose and so on, huh?" There was no doubt. Rukia was furious and Tatsuki's going to regret her deeds. She rose up to her feet and started running like hell. In vain. Rukia's enourmous hand grabbed Tatsuki, enclosing her in a prison of flesh. Then Tatsuki felt Rukia rising her hand.

After a minute Rukia opened her palm, dropping Tatsuki on her bed. The height was not great - about 20 centimeters - but enough to have Tatsuki stunned at impact for a while. Rukia was pinning her down with her finger - pushing so as to immobilise, but leave Tatsuki unharmed. Her devious smile gave Tatsuki the creeps.

"So, let's think..." Rukia said almost playfully. "That pocket you'd put me in was most uncomfortable. Frankly, I'd be most glad to have a massage... Starting from feet." She giggled "I bet you know some karate tricks to make this tiny body of yours strong enough to turn your punches and kicks into a pleasant massage. Or..." Rukia giggled once again, showing a pair of tweezers on her other hand "...we can see, how it feels to have your nipples, butt and other curves squeezed tight. Some women love that quite a lot, you know."

Tatsuki gulped, terrified.

"Whatcha going to do now human?" Loly mocked.

Orihime appeared too scared to think, almost too scared to move but she found a way and she began running away desperately, that is until she slammed into a second pair of boot clad feet. Looking up Orihime saw Loly's partner in crime Menoly.

One of the two throws Orihime into their boot
122121.content:
Menoly and Loly discussed it briefly, eat or torture Orihime with their feet. Well they didn't discuss exactly...it was more like an arguement and with each passing shout Orihime quivered a little bit more beneath Menoly's boot. Ever since she arrived in Hueco Mundo these two Arrancar have done nothing but torture and abuse her...and now here she was...probably a couple inches tall if even that, with these two debating on how to torture her.

" Ichigo....help me " Orihime mentally plead, despite knowing that chances were near zero Ichigo was even in Hueco Mundo let alone was coming to rescue her. It was kind of horrifying, to be beneath Menoly's boot like this, to be in essence a bug beneath her. And what made Orihime saddest of all was that in a very small section of her mind...she probably believed she was a bug, a punishment for being weak enough to have to go to Hueco Mundo in the first place. She sensed this and all it did was make tears start sliding down her face, which when combined with the dirt beneath Menoly's boot was now smearing Orihime's flawless face with it. This wasn't even remotely involved with the physical aspect of this too. Being beneath Menoly's foot...needless to say it didn't feel to great, Orihime didn't have the protective shell of a bug and the slightest bit of pressure felt like a whole building was falling on her, and Menoly was applying much more than a slight bit of pressure. Orihime's nice white dress was already torn in several areas, he undergarments probably were too, her hair was mussied and her torn clothes were slowly turning black from the dirt, if she stayed beneath Menoly's foot much longer she would honestly start to resemble a bug.

But neither Arrancar even noticed Orihime's suffering sniffles and wails, they were too busy arguing, but Loly won the arguement with one simple statement. "If you eat her it means the end of her suffering and our fun!"

Menoly opened her mouth to reply but was silent, "Oh yeah...I didn't think about that..." Her cheeks flushed slightly with embarassment.

Now that the two were calm again Orihime's muffled wails were audible, and it just made the two sadists laugh. "If you think the boot is bad guess what Princess? We got socks and barefeet for ya that are even worse!" Loly taunted.

"God I would love to feel her squirm beneath my bare foot...I haven't washed in ages you know." Menoly sounded like she was almost in love.

Loly nodded at her friend, "Me either, all the more reason Princess belongs there, with the dirt on our feet."

"Maybe we can have her lick it up later too." Menoly snickered as she raised her foot off of Orihime. Whilst she did this Loly removed her boots amazingly quick, leaving only her two black socked feet. The smell was almost visible as it wafted into the air, to the Arrancars unless they bent over it was nonexistant but to the small and much closer Orihime, it was nausiating, beyond description, it made her puke.

Loly and Menoly noticed this and Loly figured out why quickly and reacted properly, she slammed her foot on to Orihime loud enough for a crack to echo in the room. "You little bitch! Vomit at my feet?! You're just a bug and I'm going to prove it! Lick your vomit off the ground or prepare for a long day as my insole!" Menoly almost looked sexually aroused as she watched, slowly slipping off her own boots.

Orihime whimpered like a wounded animal, the sweaty and clearly dirty sock hurt....Orihime was certain a few of her bones were broken in various places. Not to mention the sickening smell was no literally her entire air supply, luckily Orihime had nothing to vomit this time. To further worsen matters Loly's foot body heat was beginning to warm Orihime enough to sweat, her body was actually getting squished into the sock enough that she was where skin would normally be. And then there was Loly's pure out evil request....and Orihime complied. Tears were outright pouring down the poor girl's face as she nervously stuck her tongue out and licked the acidic pile of what was once food, it tasted almost bad enough for Loly's foot to be preferable.

The Arrancars saw her submission and laughed, "You see Princess? You're just a bug beneath my feet! And you haven't even gotten a taste of my bare soles yet too!"

"But she can get a taste of mine." Menoly added, looking down at her now bare feet, the toes painted red as she wiggled them with glee.

Loly removed her foot just enough so Orihime's head was visible, where she was licking her own vomit with tears. Menoly knew what to do and strode to the Bug Princess with a sadistic grin and pep in her step, planting both side beside Loly's Menoly planted her own foot on top of Loly's and added her own pressure, putting Orihime in even more levels of pain beyond belief. And even eviller, with her other foot Menoly used her toes to grasp Orihime's head and squeezed her into the fresh sock lint between her toes. Orihime could be heard screaming as she was getting the toejam into her face and the footsweat into her pores, but Menoly wasn't done yet. She eased her toes grip on Orihime, just enough so she would fall back towards her pool of vomit but Menoly quickly regrasped her toes, now holding Orihime by her hair which she took great pleasure in rubbing between her toes and no doubt causing Orihime more pain.

"You're hair makes good toe floss!" Menoly laughed, "Hell I'll have her lick my toe jam up herself!" Loly added sinisterly.

The duo kept laughing monstrously as Menoly took her torture even further, still squeezing Orihime's hair between her toes she used her foot to push Orihime's face into her pool of vomit, literally rubbing her in it. "Keep licking your vomit bug! We're your gods and you must obey us!"

Orihime was shivering in sadness as she obeyed, her hair was toe floss, her body was smushed into Loly's sole, her entire body was covered in dirt,footsweat, and toejam and she was licking up her own vomit. Orihime the bug wanted to kill herself.

Still she did what she was supposed to, and despite her body feeling on fire from retaking her acids she looked back up at her goddesses for confirmation, in response they in perfect unison spat right before her. "Now lick that up!" Loly jeered.

Again Orihime obeyed, now contemplating biting her tongue as a means of suicide. Her life was a hell but she started to believe in her mind, she was a bug and Loly and Menoly were her gods....
122121.title: Place at Loly and Menoly's feet

choices: They do something else with Orihime or she escapes somehow
Loly and Menoly assassinate anyone who might save her, trapping her for eternity
1221212.content:
Loly and Menoly decided it was time to end this and throw her into a permanent torture chamber. They began whispering to eachother while down below Orihime was stuck under Loly's stinky black socked feet.

"We have the perfect solution" Loly and Menoly said in unision. They proceeded to remove their feet from orihime who was exhausted and unable to move. Loly began peeling off one of her stinky black socks while Menoly took out a pair of scissors and grabbed one of her own stinky black socks. Menoly cut a strip of her sock that was long in length. She then picked up Orihime's motionless but conscious body and proceeded to wrap her body up with the strip of stinky black sock. The only thing left exposed was her head. Orihime was tightly wound in this strip, and was completely unable to move, only squirm like a worm. Then Orihime was dropped into Loly's extremely stinky black sock. Both Loly and Menoly joined together to perform a kind of arrancar version of a hado, and made it so that Orihime could not pass out or vomit. As Orihime plummeted into the Loly's sock, she noticed the smell increased with every inch further she went it. It was unreal, and she surely would have passed out before even entering the sock had they not placed the hado on her. Orihime tried fighting it but she was still bound by the strip of sock and foced to stay awake. She smelled all of it, every single bit of stench in Loly's sock. When she reached the bottom of the sock the air was very heavy and thick. Orihime could almost feel the stench entering her nose. She fought with every fiber in her being but it was no use.

"Watch out little bug, here comes your new best friend forever!" Loly exclaimed. Loly stuck her sweaty foot into the sock. As it entered Orihime could smell the smell getting exponentially worse. She saw Loly's shiny black painted toes coming closer and closer. Finally the length of Orihimes body was under Loly's foot. Her head was in the crevice under her toes, and the rest of her body under her sole and arch. "Finally for the finishing touch!" Said Loly and Menoly. Loly grabbed Menolys boot and put it on. Orihime wanted to die so much. At this point she was searching for every possible avenue of death. She new there was no way out. No way to escape. They would never let her go. And as Orihime is in soul form, if they never outright killed her, she could not die. She felt the full pressure of Loly's foot and Orihimes face was pressed into the crevice under Loly's feet. Orihime, being bound by the previous strip of sock with only her head exposed, could not even re-adjust her position. Her faced was soaked in foot sweat and it was getting in her mouth. Her nose was under constant foot odor assault. The heat had increased since Loly put on Menolys boot and Lolys foot was sweating even more, increasing the stench. There was no escape for Orihime. She was under Loly's feet, in Loly's sock, wrapped in Menoly's sock, in Menoly's boot. The combined smells would have killed any ordinary human, but alas no such escape was available for Orihime.
1221212.title: One of the two throws Orihime into their boot

choices: Naruto blows down an entire wall and uses his Pesquisa to find Orihime
Menoly spits out Orihime and lets Loly have some fun
122122.content:
Menoly lifted her foot off of Orihime and laughed as the girl tried running away in the opposite direction before she picked up the girl and brought her to her face. Orihime began to feel bad vibes on what she was about to do. And sure enough, those vibes were right. Menoly opened her mouth and threw Orihime inside. At first, there was no movement, which gave Orihime a chance to look at all the gargantuan teeth that made up part of the floor and ceiling of her slimy cavern, dripping with saliva. Not to mention that big tongue she was standing on. Soon, however, the tongue began to move around violently, tossing Orihime everywhere in the mouth except for the pit that served as a gateway to her stomach. It was a very rough ride, coupled with the fact that she was completely covered in saliva. Menoly giggled, it was a good thing that Ulquiorra never let Naruto near the room when the Cuarta was guarding Orihime. The fourth Espada was one of the WORST guards all of the afterlife put together!

Just then...
122122.title: Orihi-morsel

1221221.content:
"And for the big finish!" Menoly muttered as she used her tongue to flip Orihime onto her molars. Slowly she began to lower them, showing Orihime the makers of her demise.

"LEAVE HERE THE HELL ALONE!!" A loud voice screamed as a very high level cero burst through the wall and through Menoly. With a huge hole in her torso Menoly fell over but was caught by a male arrancar. Upon getting blasted Menoly's teeth stopped their descent and her fall caused Orihime to fly out of the mouth and into someones' hand.

Looking up Orihime saw Naruto, who was looking at Menoly with utter fury in his eyes, he had caught her by the throat and was choking her. He appeared as if he would kill her for a moment but grunted and tossed her near dead body to a very terrified Loly.

"Get her medical treatment." He growled. Loly nervously did as she was told, picking up Menoly and running out of the room.

Gently smiling Naruto looked at Orihime in his hand. "I'm glad you're safe. I'd hate to leave you again but I have to go report those two troublemakers to Lord Aizen. Do not worry though I'll be leaving you in very caring hands."

"That would be me" a familiar female voice said. Turning her head to the source of the voice Orihime found herself looking at...
1221221.title: Saved by Naruto

12212212.content:
Orihime looked to see a new Arrancar with two differently colored eyes, one sky ice blue and one amber, the latter eye had a red ring outlining around it, much like both of Naruto's deep ocean sapphire eyes. Her chin-length hair was blue and her mask fragment was on the top of her head with a horn in the middle much like that of a unicorn. A uniform that consisted of a white jacket with shoulder-length sleeves and gloves, black sash, white hakama, and black socks with white sandals and white gloves.

"Orihime...this is Apache, my sole Fraccion and also one of the Fraccion to the Tercera, Harribel. She'll be looking after you while I report those two...I'm gonna KILL Ulquiorra!!!" Naruto snapped. He handed Orihime to Apache and vanished using Sonido.

"So...your the Tercera's and the Medio-Espada's subordinate? I guess that makes you the Medio-Fraccion then." Orihime said.

"Medio-Fraccion? First time I've been called that, good title though..." Apache said. The female arrancar decided she'd calm Orihim down.
12212212.title: Apache

choices: It was just Orihime's imagination, they'e taking good care of her as promised
They were lying to Apache, and prepare to torture Orihime
122122121.content:
Apache frowned as she saw how tense Orihime was, she was literally twitching. "It's okay...I won't hurt you..." She cooed, using her thumb to gently rub Orihime's back.

"Oh...that feels nice...."Orihime said sleepily, calming down suddenly within Apache's palm. She stretched out and lay on her stomach, allowing Apache to have an easier time.

(You'd never think she'd be so kind with a face like that) Orihime thought, in all honesty Apache looked kind of scary, although oddly she seemed somewhat reminescent of Tatsuki to Orihime and that brought the most comfort of all to her.

Orihime heard the familiar whap of sandals hitting the concrete floor, telling her Apache had begun walking, still massaging Orihime's stressed self.

"So what do you think of Naruto?" Apache asked as she begun walking through a long eloquent hallway.

"He's definitely one of my favorite arrancars here...I don't wanna sound mean but most of you guys are kinda scary." Orihime whimpered.

Apache's thumb stopped dead in its tracks, for a moment Orihime thought she had upset her but instead Apache just burst out into a loud deafening laugh.

"Haha thats probably because you haven't met...the best arrancar. Loly,Menoly,Grimmjow...you've been meeting all the pyschos. Although we probably fit under the 'evil' category we're not all that different from Shinigami. We feel, we hurt, mourn. The land of the hollows is a rough place though so most of us gentler souls hide our true selves..." Apache seemed to just be talking to herself at this point, forgetting about Orihime entirely.

"Wow...I never would have thought..." Orihime muttered.

Apache smiled weakly." That's the problem, hollows look just like monsters and act like them too but we just do it to live. Shinigami started the battles first...and now with us arrancar they just naturally assume we're just as bad." Apache looked at Orihime who was awestruck in her hand and laughed weakly. " It looks like things got a little deep there huh? We're here anyway."

"Here?" Orihime repeated, looking at a large doorway they had approached. "Yes, I have to go give the report to Lord Aizen with Naruto and his spiritual pressure would simply crush you at your size, I'll be entrusting you to my dearest friends whilst I am gone."

Orihime appeared nervous for a moment before happily saying "Okie dokie!"

Apache opened the door with her free hand and entered a large chamber, inside of which were the other two Fraccion of Halibel Sun-Sun and Mila-Rose. Apache explained the situation to the two arrancar, entrusting Orihime to Sun-Sun when she finished.

"Please take good care of her. There's no telling how long this report will take." Apache told them.

"Don't worry we will," Mila-Rose said confidently, placing a fist against her chest.

"Indeed." Sun-Sun said apathetically.

"Okay, I'm trusting you guys." Apache muttered as she vanished with a Sonido.

Mila-Rose looked at Sun-Sun with a smirk. "Let's get to it then.."

"Hmm?" Orihime grunted. It seemed that the two arrancar were up to something...
122122121.title: Entrusting Orihime to Sun-Sun

1221221212.content:
Mila-Rose and Sun-Sun chucked darkly. Orihime gulped at the unsettling gleam in the eyes of the two Fraccion.

"Poor Apache, she's so kind-hearted and naive at times, I almost regret going to do this!"Mila-Rose laughed.

Orihime was set down on the floor and begin backing up. She didn't like this.

"While Naruto and Apache may have good streaks, there's no way WE'D pass up a chance like this." Mila-Rose smirked.

"Take turns torturing this little mouse based off our Resurrección forms?" Sun-Sun asked, Mila-Rose nodded enthusiastically. With that, the two released they're zanpakutou.

Sun-Sun had a snake tail replace her legs and her three hair clip-like fragments had now grown to the back of her head like a crest of sorts. Mila-Rose's release seemed to make her look more feral, she gained a more armored attire, longer hair, like a mane of sorts with a streak of brighter colors to her usual brown running down the middle.

Orihime let out an "eep" as the two slinked towards her.

Who tortures Orihime first?
1221221212.title: Predators that had  "lied" in wait

choices: Mila-Rose wants to play a simple game of Cat and Mouse
Mila-Rose just wants to torture Orihime.
12212212122.content:
"Me first." Sun-Sun stated, drawing out the 'st' in first to show her forked snake tongue.She slid forward and began teasingly circling Orihime, letting out low hisses occasionally followed by a girlish giggle.

"What to do, what to do....I would just step on you but....." Sun-Sun beckoned to her snake tail with a laugh. "I can't really step on you with a tail, but I can do this." Sun-Sun raised the edge of her scaly tail and slammed it on Orihime, smacking her into the pavement.

"Ugh" Orihime grunted, she felt as if she had been slammed into a desk by a flyswatter.

Pinning Orihime underneath her tail Sun-Sun started listing various things to do to the little human. " I suppose I could give you some fun in my cleavage but that's just not evil enough, sitting on you is kind of out of question, I suppose I could eat you..."

"The hell you will! Then I won't get a turn." Mila-Rose piped up from another side of the room.

Orihime literally let out a small squiek at Mila-Rose's statement, it reminded her that even if Sun-Sun was easy on her there was more to come.

"Oh what to do..." Sun-Sun repeated, sticking out her forked tongue at Orihime as if she wanted to eat her.

"Get on with it!" Mila-Rose piped up again, clearly getting impatient.

With a sigh Sun-Sun nodded, "Fine, I was just trying to think of something creative but I suppose I have to settle for something a little more dull."

Sun-Sun gently released her tails grip on Orihime's body, she broke out in goosebumps as the scales slithered by her body. Sun-Sun's palm came extending towards her, just enough so that her hands could be seen past her unusually long sleeves.

"Nice and simple." She stated as she slammed her palm onto Orihime, slamming her harder into the ground than her tail did.

With a vicious smile Sun-Sun leaned forward and smiled, baring her fangs at Orihime "Don't think I'm done with you..." She warned as she begun to back up.

Slithering away Sun-Sun reverted back to her reglar arrancar form, disappointment evident in her face.

"MY turn" Mila-Rose shouted as she stepped forward.
12212212122.title: The snake circling the mouse

choices: Mila-Rose and Sun-Sun torture her together now
Mila-Rose attempted to continue her plan but....Halibel shows up
122122121222.content:
Mila-Rose walked proudly to Orihime's terrified self, swaying her hips confidently as she came to stand before the shrunken human.

"I'm not like Sun-Sun. I'm not gonna pull any fancy stuff of tease you, I'm just going to do as I please." She stated with a toothy smile. Bending over the amazoness arrancar began tugging away at her Ressurecion forms boots and slowly the boots began to slide off, revealing two dark tan feet,

"Time for the 'little' human to learn her place!" The arrancar said triumphantly as she slid her foot over Orihime's body, pinning her head between her toes.

Orihime was assaulted by the odor of Mila-Rose's feet and began to feel sick, holding back what she believed to be possible vomit.

Mila-Rose just smiled, showing off her fangs. "I'm just beginning." She muttered as she raised her big toe upwards a certain amount. At first Orihime thought that the arrancar would be ending her foot torture, far from it though. That look of relief in Orihime's eyes was replaced with pure terror when the toe stopped rising and began to drop!

Instinctively Orihime attempted to run away, forgetting the fact her body was pinned beneath Mila-Rose's sole. Needless to say Orihime didn't get away in time and Mil-Rose's big toe slammed right onto her head, bouncing it against the concrete floor due to the collision.

With an evil smirk Mila-Rose repeated her motion, basically dribbling poor Orihime's head against the floor. With each slam into the pavement Orihime felt blood ooze from her mouth, teeth falling out into the ooze; with her powers she would heal herself later but the pain would still be remembered and experienced and the two arrancar knew that well.

Enjoying her torture far too much Mila-Rose began laughing hysterically, using Orihime like a hacky sack for her feet.

"Time for the Coup De Grace." She said happily, she pinned Orihime once more beneath her sole and using her cat-like flexibility she obtained one of her discarded boots.

"Guess who's getting some quality time with my feet?" She asked teasingly, pointing at the boot. Through her blood and tears Orihime saw the boot and wished for them to just end it, death was preferable to this.

Out of nowhere Sun-Sun appeared by Mila-Rose, holding her shoulder with her human hand. "That's enough, have her heal herself first, lest she 'break' " She muttered apathetically.

With a grimace Mila-Rose raised her foot off of Orihime "You heard her, heal!" Wanting the pain to stop Orihime began to heal her wounds, knowing full well that she would just get tortured more. Once the glow of Orihime's power stopped she was once again appearing flawlessly beautiful like before any torture occured.

Mila-Rose and Sun-Sun think of something to do with Orihime

She didn't blame Naruto and Apache for trusting her to Mila-Rose and Sun-Sun. After all, she'd felt Aizen's presence before when she was first brought to Las Noches. choices: they give Orihime to Cirucci Thunderwitch
Menoly and Loly show up and fight  with Sun-Sun and Mila-Rose over Orihime

Hmm... seeing her jump around avoiding Cirucci's Golondrina DOES sound entertaining...but I still don't want to share." Mila-Rose gripped.

Hearing that decided it.

With that Mila-Rose reinserted Orihime and her foot into her boot and thus the two fraccion began walking, Mila-Rose made sure to put extra weight on her feet just to further torture poor little Orihime. When she could see again, Mila-Rose and Sun-Sun were nowhere to be seen and she was being held by a female Arrancar with shoulder-length purple hair, tear drop markings under each eye, and a mask remnant resembling a hairpin over the left side of her forehead. Cirucci Thunderwitch.

Cirucci smiled at Orihime and told her...
12212212122212111.title: Cirucci Thunderwitch

122122121222121111.content: Don't Worry Naruto is one of my closest friends I won't hurt you," she said stroking Orihime's tiny cheek playfully. " R-Really?" asked Orihime. 122122121222121111.title: Don't worry, Naruto's one of my closest...

choices: She would have Orihime beg her not to harm her, for her amusment
She would play a dangerous game with her pet.
122122121222121112.content:
Cirucci smiled deviously at the redhead, " You look like a fun plaything, lets see how you fare." Carelessly she hoisted up Orihime by her leg and held her upside down, looking over her body.

"At your size so much is possible....I could just stuff you in my boot or something....maybe.....eat you, nah Mila-Rose and Sun-Sun would kill me. Maybe stuff you in my breasts..no you don't deserve that." The arrancar began to list various tortures she could perform, each more horrifying than the last.

"Please just let me go." Orihime pleaded, Cirucci stared blankly at her pet, before she burst into a fit of laughter.

"Hahaha! Seeing you beg is definitely the best! I wonder how much you would beg to avoid my torture?" She smiled evilly as she stroke her finger gently along Orihime's body, giving her the chills.

Cirucci then decided on her action,
122122121222121112.title: Evil Cirucci

choices: Have a friend grow/shrink with her
1222.content: Okay, that last option didn't leave much room for freedom so here's a second one. Should Orihime shrink or grow? Or perhaps she should shrink/grow with someone else?
1222.title: Choices

12221.content:
"Uhhnn...."

Orihime Inoue sat up from her previous position of laying flat on her back, her forehead throbbing slightly and a terrible feeling aching in the pit of her stomach. She groggily stood up, swaying back and forth on her heels as if in a drunken daze."Ow...."She clutched her stomach in pain, holding back the urge to yelp at the adominable soreness."Ooh...wow....what...what happened?"She said to herself, trying to open her eyes and force away the shadows that clung to the corners of her vision. It was blurry, but it seemed she was in a desert of some sort...

You conked yourself out. Kinda hard to believe, considering how hard your head is."

The ditzy teen jumped at the voice, and not at the fact at how sudden it was, but at how loud the voice was. It was as if the voice was amplified through a dozen megaphones, then converted to an entire thunderstorm roiling through the sky.

Now fully aware and awake, the voice acting as a strong jumpstart, Orihime looked around for the source of the voice, no sign of any other being except for herself."God...? Is that you...?"This was the only conclusion her childish mind could come up with at the moment. The voice giggled, a series of laughter punctuated with thunderclaps."No, I'm not God, you little airhead. But to you, I could be a deity...."

"......I'm confused."Orihime simply stated.

Another chuckle from the voice, and as she listened, Orihime began to figure that it had a slightly feminine undertone in the deep bass boom."Okay, I suppose I should try to shed some light on the situation for you. Look around, where are you right now?"

"A desert."

"No...look closer."

"Okay..."Orihime looked around, trying to pay closer attention to her surroundings. The concentration sorta hurt her head. But as she examined the area, she began to notice that this world was not a desert. The ground was not made of sand, but of some strange soft material that oddly imitated human skin. The air wasn't deadly dry, but comfortably mild. And their was no blistering sun overhead to scorch her, but a strange orb with a white outline, a colored inside, and a black center that reminded Orihime of an iris. But, it couldn't be. That was just plain silly, a scenario Orihime's silly imagination would've come up with. Others had told her that her overactive imagination would lead her away from what was important one day, but she loved it. Now, this was reality, not her imagination though. There must've been something logical to explain everything.

"What do you see?"The voice followed up her question with another.

"Well, I'm not in a desert.....too skinlike for that. And there's no sun or moon in the sky, but a giant eyeball."

"Good!"The voice congratulated her."Now, I'll give you a more. About thirty minutes ago, you were in your home, yes...?"

It came back to her. She was enjoying dinner with a friend, but she couldn't exactly remember which friend it was...

"Yeah..."

"You ate something strange, drank something weird, which explains the stomach pains and headache."

"But how...how did you know....?"

"Cause..."The voice sounded reluctant with a tad hint of guilt mixed in the words."I caused it."

"......I'm still confused."

"You accidentally ate some....special rice and sake I brought with me. You weren't supposed to eat it. I was supposed to bring it to the Soul Society for testing, but I must've put it on our dinner table....Sorry..."

"Who....who are you?"

"............."
12221.title: The Smallest Princess

choices: "Play a game! What did you have in mind?"
"Go to sleep...But...can I sleep with you?"
122212.content:
Sudden realization kicked in, and it kicked Orihime hard, as if the very words were physical in harm. This was not a dream or one of her silly imagination quips, this was reality, and her situation was quite strange at the moment."Rangiku....you're so big!!"The tiny ditz screamed from the tip of the Soul Reaper's index finger.

Rangiku chuckled in reply, a thunderous volley of sound that penetrated Orihime's ears."Technically I'm not big, you're small. VERY small at that. I had no idea that food was so potent..."

"What was in it anyway?"Orihime asked, trying to recall her meal earlier. Yes, it was all coming back to her in waves of images and thought. It was dark out, and Orihime had been waiting for dinner. She thought it would be rude to begin without her roommate, whom she was currently sharing her apartment with. Rangiku walks in...and they immediatly begin to set up their meals. The blonde Soul Reaper had set down the sake and bowl of rice to the side, and had left to go get some plates. Orihime, being the airhead that she was, mistook the sake as water, and the rice just an average entree to the meal. First, she gulped down half of the 'water', leaving her mouth tasting sour and her throat burning. Ignoring this, she next took the rice and devoured it down to the last scraps in the bowl. Rangiku returns in another minute, shocked to see Orihime standing up, looking deathly sick. In another few seconds, she had toppled over, letting the darkness swirl over and overcome into the comforting bed of unconsciousness.

"Well....I can honestly say that I don't exactly know. Some kind of special spices and herbs in the rice to be grounded down for chemical purposes, and the sake...well, for me. It was a new type of alchohol, and that Urahara can be one mean businessman..."

"So..am I...stuck like this?"

"Possibly. I don't really know...your body may digest the food and you'll stay small forever, or shrink even more!!"

"Or, or!"Rangiku continued, trying not to freak her out."When the food's fully digested, your body will expel the unnatural toxins, and you'll return to normal size. All we can do is wait and see."

"What do I do until then? It's gonna be hard to sleep for me at this size...everything's all big and scary."Orihime replied, plopping down on the finger-landscpae, Rangiku's eye overhead shifting into a worried look."Oh, don't worry Orihime, I'll stay up with you."

She perked up at her words."Really?"

"Of course! I'll keep you safe until we see the err....results."

"Thanks!"Orihime bent down, trying her best to give Rangiku a hug by embracing the ground beneath her. Looking down at the miniscule speck on her finger hugging the skin, Rangiku kinda "awww'd" at her. Why must everything miniature be cute?

"It's no problem, Orihi-mini."Rangiku chuckled."Like the nickname I gave you?"

"Yeah, it's cute!"She jumped back to feet, now feeling reinvigorated. The pains of before had passed, and her headache was clearing. Orihime hoped that meant the food was digesting, and that she would be big again in no time If by chance her situation were take a turn for the worst, she was glad Rangiku would be near to take care of her."What are we going to do until my food's all finished, anyway?"She called up to the monolithic Matsumoto.

"Well..."The Blonde mused."Let me think..."

"We could always play a little game. You're just so cute right now!"

"Or..."Rangiku yawned, another echoing thunderbolt to Orihime's ears."We...could turn in for the night. I'll be with you, so I kinda feel tired...unless you want to. I'll let you decide."

"Okay."Orihime nodded, despite Rangiku not even being able to see such a small motion from the tiny girl.

A sense of movement, and Rangiku had turned and lowered her finger towards the nearby table to deposit Orihime, so she wouldn't have to hvoer her figner near her eye so much. As she went lower and lower, Orihime's sense of scale began to set in. She was simply...in awe for a moment or so. If simply Rangiku's finger was a wasteland and her was the sun, once everything was in perspective, she realized just how puny she was. First Rangiku's face came into view, a whole galaxy of pure beauty and delicate skin with a cosmos of golden flowing hair. When she went lower, two orbs casted a shadow over her, Rangiku's massive breasts could easily be counted astronomical in size alone. Miles and miles she was lowered, revealing a Rangiku who just went on towering higher and higher for countless miles. When she was finally settled down on the table, Orihime just gazed up and mouthed the word:"Wow."

"So, what's it gonna be?"Rangiku asked, and even from a further distance, her voice acted a deep bass of god. She positioned her hands on her wide and lovely hips, the movement creating a soft breeze for the tiny.

"Well,"Orihime yelled up, still deciding. In a few seconds time, the answer came to mind."I want to.."She cupped her hands around to her mouth to get her words across to the titaness that loomed an infinite amount above.
122212.title: Mega Matsumoto

choices: Orihime thinks she's still dreaming and continues her rampage
Ichigo and Rukia arrive to tell her it's all real, and she runs off
12222.content:
A low, rumbling sound echoed across Japan, sounding like a mixture of a booming roar and an annoyed yawn. The noise seemed to echo from the small, unassuming Karakura Town. It was early morn, the first fingers of sunlight thinly stretching their way from the horizon across the land, and if one were to wake up at such an early time, they would notice a dark shadow casted by an enormous figure looming over their town, a god sleeping amongst them...

Orihime Inoue, teenager, ditzy airhead, and the occasional associate of spirits beyond mortal realms turned in her sleep and mumbled something in a half daze, feeling something small go crunch underneath her side. She really needed to stop eating in bed, she wondered to herself. All of those crumbs in her sheets would probably attract bugs. She could hear tiny, tiny voices. Squeaky, minute, and whispered. Voices you would imagine coming from something incredibly small. But these voices weren't real, they were simply part of the dream she was having. But to her semi-conscious self, it seemed so real. She could feel something touching her, the gentle breeze of wind against the naked parts of her body, she did like sleeping in her intimates once in a while, something small tickling her toes, and even those voices continued to reach her ears. She couldn't really understand them without focusing, and she didn't want to. Now was not the time to try focus and figure out a dream, now was the time to sleep. With a content sigh, she rolled over once more, feeling those crumbs break underneath her once more.

---

All of Karakura Town was awake now, and they could not begin to grasp what laid before them. A massive female body rose up like a mountain range across their residence, towering above any of their pitifully puny buildings. The giantess was unrecognized at the moment, considering her face was a good mile or so away from the rest of the town, but the lower portions of her body created devastation. Whenever she moved, entire neighborhoods and city blocks were crushed underneath in a wave of debris and smoke, but fortunately she only remained in one spot, just twisting herself around to get comfy. At first, police tried subduing her with firearms, but were shocked to find that their bullets merely bounced off her massive toes as if her her skin was bulletproof. For now, a safety perimeter had been set up around her, consisting of yellow-hazard tape and police cruisers, but that wouldn't keep the giantess down if she awoke...

---

"Are you....seeing this?!"

"I am...and it's not good at all."

Ichigo and Rukia were the only residents of the Kurosaki household awake, the two staring at a flickering television screen relaying the report of the sudden appearance of the gargantuan woman.

Rukia sat silent for a moment before turning to the substitute soul reaper."You can feel it too, can't you?"She asked.

"Yeah..."He nodded, cold sweat dripping down his forehead."That's Orihime's spiritual pressure all right...but it's so...powerful now!"

"For some reason, her spirit pressure took a massive spike in leaps and bounds, and her mortal body had to compensate for it somehow."

"You're saying her power made her big. Look at me! Not bragging or nothing, but I've gone toe to toe with some of the heaviest hitters the Soul Society and Hueco Mundo has, and you don't see me godzilla sized!"

"That's because you're not mortal Ichigo...partly. It affected Orihime differently, however..."

Rukia jumped to her feet and began walking towards the door."You coming?"She asked over her shoulder, her normal attire replaced with robes of black and a sword holstered to her side.

"Wouldn't miss it."He was already in shinigami garb, zanpakuto readied.

---

Slowly Orihime awoke, sitting up and stretching. She got to her feet in a slothlike manner, wiping the sleep from her eyes and the dried spittle from her lips to get ready for the new day ahead. As she wide and bright eyes opened to the sun's light, a curious sight stretched out before her. She was no longer in her room, that was true. She was outside, a lush, green landscape dotted with various sights went on for a distance, and it seemed a fog was just over her head. She took a step, only to find her bare foot crushing something small underneath. She peered down to witness a partially destroyed, miniature cityscape around her, and it seemed so incredibly detailed. Small dots she assumed were people were everywhere, multitudes of houses that were cornered in neighborhoods were small enough to fit on the pad of her finger, and the taller, central buildings weren't even comparable to the tips of her toes."Wow!"She breathed."I feel like a giant!"She knelt down, her knee's generating small quakes once they hit ground, destroying whatever remained beneath.

She bent her face close to the ground, surprised to see that the specks were people! Hundreds if not thousands of them and their itty-bitty cars, all running from her."Wow..."She repeated, but whispered this time."I must be dreaming..."She mused to herself as she stood back up to her full height, positively dominating the landscape with her size."Might as well have fun before I wake up. It must be one of those...lupin dreams? No..."She tapped her chin to exactly remember what the term was."Lappin' dreams? That's not it..."

A small force down by her right big toe interrupted her thought process. Peering down, the redhead was surprised to see tanks, barely bigger than a mote of dirt, firing at her. She grinned. Obviously this was a dream where she could play the role of a giant monster. The thought pleased her, and since it was all a dream, nobody would get hurt!

"All right then...fee-fi-fo-fum! Look out little city, here I come!"Orihime raised her foot overhead then slammed it down, creating a massive earthquake and cracks in the ground. When she began walking, she had left behind prints easily a thousand feet deep, her massive frame of three miles tall trodding the landscape and ready to bring destruction, all in a playful manner.

With each step, a good portion of Karakura Town was destroyed, but Orihime grew bored of this easily."Can't just use my feet,"She wiggled her plump and round rear tightly clad in Don Kanonji panties, setting it down forcefully, downtown instantly devastated by her butt."Gotta make use of what I got!"The airhead said to herself happily as she scooped up a chunk of land in her left palm, bringing it up to her face to examine it more closely. Buildings obviously without power laid in the dirt, and she could make out tinies running around, even some cars accidentally driving off the broken edges of the streets to fall to their doom so far below."Such a vivid dream!"She quickly noted the detail. She had never had one such as this. Everything felt so real, but she knew it couldn't be true. The girl had seen terrifying monsters, battles that were waged across multiple dimensions, and beings with abilities that confounded the mind, but even this was a little far-fetched. How ridiculous was the idea of a giantess anyway?

With her examination of the landmass done, Orihime titled her palm until the chunk of civilization fell out, only for her voluptuous chest to catch it with a slight bounce and jiggle. She couldn't help but chuckle as it collapsed into her cleavage, even some survivors scrambled against the soft flesh, tickling her.

"I love this dream!"Orihime Inoue gleefully exclaimed to herself, unbeknownst to the chaos she was causing.
12222.title: Lucid Dreaming?

12223.content: How about Rukia, she should keep her in check!
12223.title: cant let the gigantic/tiny ditz go unsupervised!

123.content:
"Ow my head...Where am I?" Mumbled Ichigo after awaking from being knocked unconscious.

He looked around, the first thing he noticed were two big feet on either side of him...He heard a giggle, "So Ichigo, Whats it like to be the size of my pinky toe?" The female voice said.

Ichigo looked up and saw...
123.title: Ichigo (Shrink)

1231.content: To Ichigos shock he was looking at a gigantic Rukia! "You did this to me!?" In turn Rukia nodded smiling "yep ive always wanted a little pet" Ichigo responded furious "What?! Im no ones pet!!" Suddenly Rukia stomped her foot mere inches away from Ichigo " What was that my pet?" Ichigo looked fearfully at the dominating Rukia "Nothing mam" She looked happy "good you can start by...
1231.title: Rukia

choices: He has no choice, he does it.
Ichigo still has pride dammit! He'll take whatever Rukia dishes out
12311.content:
Rukia grinned as she eyed the shrunken warrior beneath her toes, " I must say you feel pretty nice down there. Almost like you belonged there all this time." She giggled slightly as Ichigo defiantly struggled against her foot. "What happened to that fear you had a moment ago?"

Ichigo didn't respond for a moment, mainly because Rukia's toe blocked his mouth and he wanted no taste of it anywhere inside there. But he managed to push himself free slightly so he could speak safely, "I just realized you wouldn't hurt me. After all we've been through you wouldn't really hurt me, I mean we're best friends basically."

The giantess's eyes lit up with an intriguing flare, " True, very true but you're forgetting something Ichigo." Applying extra pressure to his diminutive frame Rukia leaned forward so her face was twice as close; just so she could glimpse Ichigo better.

Due to the increased pressure it took the Shinigami a moment but he managed to cough out his one worded reply. "What?"

Rukia smirked, "Orihime, with her little power she could bring you back no matter what. In other words I can do whatever I want to you, I could turn you into a pile of blood between my toes right now if I wanted to and I could just Orihime to fix you right on up."

Ichigo stared blankly at his friend, "Wow you really thought this through."

Rukia rose back to her full height, smiling her soft false innocence smile. "Thank you, I'm glad you recognize true genius."

"I recognize a big ego."

The brunnetes brow twitched, "What did you say?"

Ichigo shrugged, "I'll live no matter what I do right? If that's the case I won't satisfy you by playing the poor slave."

For a brief moment it looked like Rukia was going to kill Ichigo in a womanly rage but immediately afterwards her face calmed, reverting to its normal cocky smirk. "That's why I shrunk you Ichigo. Humility is a virtue you definitely need."

"Says who?!" Ichigo's voice sounded angered, like Rukia hit a sensitive topic.

Rukia shrugged, " Most of your teachers, quite a few of the Captains, and...me of course."

"So shrinking me is just another annoying lesson?"

"Basically...." Rukia's lips twirled into a slightly demented grin, "But I can choose how to teach you this any way I want. Like for instance, say I wanted to see you worship my feet; it doesn't get much more humiliating then that."

Grimacing Ichigo looked back down at the sweaty foot pinning him to the ground, it gave off a weak odor but it sweated like Rukia was just outside for a couple hours and her sweat soaked toes were ruining his Shinigami uniform. "Trust me, I'm close enough to your feet as is. I doubt I wanna worship them, licking,kissing massaging...yeah...not happening."

Still smiling slightly innocently Rukia increased the pressure of her foot to the point it rivaled torture, she spoke with her voice in a soft but authoritative tone, "Maybe I didn't make that clear, worship my feet or else."

"She's lost it!" Ichigo thought in the midst of his torture, once more his brown eyes trailed to Rukia's foot. She wanted him to kiss, massage...to lick her feet? Ichigo couldn't imagine Rukia asking that kind of thing but she was, Ichigo shrunken brought out a new side of her altogether; and if he didn't appease this goddess of a friend who knows what could happen. But....would he go through with it? Sell himself out to Rukia's feet just to survive? Could he handle it?
12311.title: Rukia's order

choices: Ichigo HAS to worship now that his plan was ruined
Sode no Shirayuki (spirit) manifests herself and gets Ichigo out of there
123111.content:
Ichigo was NOT about to give in to a power-drunk Rukia. However, he didn't count on one thing...

"Hey! You heard 'mother', make with the submission!" Hichigo snapped at him from inside his head.

...being double-teamed. And by his inner-Hollow no less.

"NOT A CHANCE!" Ichigo thought ferociously before what the Hollow had said fully registered with him. "Wait...did you just say "mother"?"

"I did. Hell, of all people, YOU should have figured it out first! The events leading up to me even existing all happened because of 'mother' giving you her powers that night! Now do what she's ordering already!"

Ichigo was stunned, but after thinking it over, he had to confss it did make sense. He was surprised that his inner-Hollow was calling Rukia 'mother', but he did have a point. Ichigo was brought out of his thoughts as Rukia twisted her foot on him. Ichigo yelped as he cut off Hichigo.

"Well...what's taking so long?" Rukia demanded, removing her toe from Ichigo's mouth.

"I can't do anything but lick your foot, you'll need to get off if I'm going to do a good job!" Ichigo shouted up at her.

Rukia thought about it and got off him and proped her foot up in front of Ichigo. "Good point. Now get worshipping."

Of course Ichigo had no intention of worshipping a bonkers soul reaper, as soon as he had cut off Hichigo earlier, Ichigo had formed a plan: trick Rukia into getting off him then run like hell. Simple yet effective.

Yet when he tried moving, his arms and legs wouldn't respond to his brain's commands. Puzzled and more than a llittle scared, Ichigo looked at his body and screamed. His body was normal, except that his arms and legs had been hollowfed!

Hichigo had been a step ahead of him.
123111.title: double trouble

choices: Rukia gives Ichigo a big kiss
Rukia gives Ichigo a break between her breasts....as she goes to visit Orihime
1231111.content:
Gritting his teeth Ichigo struggled to move his limbs, his hollows hold over his body not fainting the slightest. "I thought I got all the control back!!" He moaned as he continued his attempts at movement. Before him Rukia's feet still stood, almost eagerly awaiting Ichigo's worship.

"Go ahead Ichigo, don't be shy." Rukia taunted, obviously not noticing Ichigo's internal struggle at all.

It didn't make him happy to admit it but Ichigo had no choice. His inner hollow was preventing escape and Rukia would likely get angry if he stood there doing nothing. Blushing out of slight embarassment he eyed Rukia's barefeet some more. Every crevice, every piece of lint, every bead of sweat, it was all clear as day to him and he would be forced to worship that? It disgusted him.

"I'll do it..." He whispered, not for himself nor Rukia to hear but his inner hollow. Instantly after Ichigo said that the hollowfied limbs the Shinigami had vanished, disappearing as maniacal laughter rang faintly in Ichigo's head. Dragging his feet along the wooden floors of his own room Ichigo walked towards his best friend's feet, mentally screaming at himself for being weak even if it was far from his fault. Stopping just before Rukia's big toe the strawberry felt awe, he was half to three-fourths the height of it when it layed flat on the ground, that meant he was barely an inch if even that! He looked up at Rukia, faintly hoping to see some sympathy, maybe see her sticking her tongue out and saying "Just kidding!" but no such luck, Rukia was relishing the sensation of Ichigo at her feet. The titanic brunettes toes wiggled eagerly, awaiting Ichigo's submission, and he gave it to them.

The shrunken teen closed his eyes, trying to get his mind as far away from the real world as possible. When he seemed comfortable enough Ichigo leaned forward, stopping when Rukia's body heat told him he was face to face with her toe, and he opened his mouth and licked. Ichigo hoped it wouldn't be bad, that it wouldn't really harm him but just be humiliating, no such luck. That one lick tasted of salt rivaling sea water mixed together with body oils, whatever flavor socks gave it, and whatever else Rukia stepped in that day; in short, it was horrifyingly bad, bad enough to make Ichigo recoil back to reality from his "Happy place"

Rukia on the other hand had quite the opposite reaction, the moment Ichigo's tongue made contact with her foot goosebumbs ran all along her body as the sensation tickled her nerves. It was funny, a Captain class Shinigami was at the mercy of her feet,needless to say it felt exhilarating.

"Don't stop Ichigo!" The giantess shouted when she saw Ichigo's recoiled frame, "That felt great! Not to mention you have a whole lot more foot to go."

"Don't remind me." Ichigo grunted as he eyed Rukia's happily wiggling toes. Leaning forward again he took another lick, this one not tasting as bad as the first but still pretty bad. He stayed strong though, and Ichigo repeated the process, managing up to seven licks before he had to pull away. That was how the process repeated for a few minutes, until Ichigo finally managed to just keep licking until the task was done, which took about the sixth or seventh try. With each lick Ichigo felt more and more displeased with himself, Rukia's footsweat was sliding into his mouth where he was forced to swallow and his tongue was giving her feet a bath, right now he hated himself. Still if you had to do a job, do it right or at least that's how Ichigo reasoned it; between licks Ichigo actually kissed Rukia's sole, massaging in circles with his hands as he did so. He didn't want to but while many times he seemed like a fool Ichigo knew that if he did a poor job Rukia was likely to only make things worse, at least with that method Ichigo had a faint hope of getting a break later.

During all of this Rukia struggled not to burst out into a laughter. When she first got the idea of shrinking Ichigo it seemed kind of dumb to be honest, but as she tinkered with the idea it soon became a goal of hers. She didn't plan on injuring him, nor keeping him as a pet, just some harmless fun to fulfill her fantasies. Although plans could change, and if Ichigo was this good of a slave the idea of keeping him as a pet didn't seem too farfetched.

That was mainly how things went for the next hour or so, Ichigo worshipping Rukia's feet as Rukia pondered what a good pet Ichigo would make. Time almost seemed to fly by when Ichigo finally finished, panting for air between Rukia's feet. He had defeated arrancars, bested Captains, achieved Bankai and Ichigo had to admit, worshipping Rukia's feet was one of the hardest things he had ever done.

Rukia smiled softly at Ichigo, cheeks a slight flush of red as she continued to imagine him as her pet. "You did a good job Ichigo, if you loved my feet so much you could've just said so. Tee hee."

He was exhausted but Ichigo managed to pull enough energy to scream back, "I don't love your damn feet! I only wanted to do a good job!"

"Then you love being my slave then, regardless I feel like you deserve a little something......"
1231111.title: Worshipping Rukia

choices: If you really love me.....would it be okay if I....well...you know...with you...
Rukia grins, "Told ya I'm a good actor! And now I know ya like being my pet!"
12311111.content:
Rukia's eyes lightned up slightly, still ever mischievously smiling though she asked out of the blue, "Ichigo....do you think I'm cute?" She was answered by a slight blush from him as well as mild stuttering, "W-Well...I-I mean...you aren't ugly. You're......." He couldn't find the words to say, and in his mind he wondered; why the sudden question? And why did Rukia seem....so much gentler all of a sudden?

The domineering mischief filled expression Rukia had worn amidst her power craze seemed to vanish, replaced by the soft kind expression Ichigo had seen on many occasions. Her lips smiled softly at the edges as her fingers gently grasped Ichigo by the shoulders, which in itself was a feat given Ichigo was barely big enough for her nails to grasp him. Rukia brought him up to her face, about level with her nose and continued to smile. She interrupted his embarassed words with her own heartfelt ones, "You've done well so far Ichigo....I think this lesson is really working. In fact, you deserve this great reward from me personally.

Memories of Rukia being...well evil and her attitude made Ichigo mentally ask the question, Is this chick Bipolar or something? One minute Rukia is a power crazed goddess-sized dominatrix type, next she seems...almost in love....it was weird. Well....maybe not too weird given the things Ichigo had gone through over time. But the witty thoughts and mental remarks cut themselves short when Rukia surprised Ichigo further, she began kissing him in one elongated and absolutely wonderful kiss. Less than two minutes ago she had Ichigo licking her feet, now they were making out....things seemed odd to say the least.

Ichigo's face matched his hair in seconds as his entire frame was pushed against both the giantess' lips, and in the faint corner of his eyes he saw Rukia had a similar skin tone. For some reason Ichigo suddenly thought of Rukia, not in that sarcastic sense he was a moment ago; but a more...romantic sense....heck he didn't even know why. All of the sudden Rukia just seemed....beautiful...lovely...a goddess.....

Man now I'm doing emotional 360's. But she is cute.... Neither Ichigo nor Rukia moved for several minutes, just lost in that one kiss. Neither one gave off negative emotions or anything either, in fact...to an onlooker they would appear in love. A girl and her lover, a woman and her boy, a goddess and her pet. For a single moment, Ichigo didn't mind being small if this is what it meant, then with a blush he realized something. T-This is my first kiss....and it's with Rukia....
