But Ichigo was no idiot, he had already cleverly plugged his nose with two small cloths he tore from something, despite this clever manuver Ichigo still experienced a portion of Karin's foot odor, enough to make him gag.

Seeing her big brother suffer at her feet Karin surprisingly smiled darkly, "Don't mess with me Ichigo you love my feet. In fact, I bet you would just love to kiss em." As if to beckon him Karin's foot rose into the air slightly, the toes bending as if telling Ichigo to come.

Narrowing his eyes Ichigo looked at his sister with annoyance in his gaze, "Do I have to?"

"Of course Ichigo."

With a shake of his head Ichigo kept stalling, "But....what did I do to deserve this?"

Seemingly awaiting this Karin's smile grew wider, "Deserve my feet? Well first off feel honored! Second I've seen you around in that black Kimono, holding that badass sword. I figure you deserve a little reward now Kiss!" Quickly growing impatient Karin stomped her raised foot into the ground, reminding Ichigo of the power she held.

Ichigo.....
1233111.title: Experiencing Karin's feet

12332.content: Okay, a captain or vice captain? (lieutenant)
12332.title: A Shinigami Captain or Vice Captain

123321.content:
Okay, since there's only two captains this outta be easy ^^

Soi Fon or Unohana?
123321.title: Which captain shrunk Ichigo?

choices: She squeezes Ichigo's body between her toes
She has Ichigo clean Suzumebachi (Her Zanpaktou)
1233211.content:
Looking past the massive toes to his sides Ichigo found himself staring at the short haired captain Soi Fon who was wearing a domineering smirk. "Hello Kurosaki." She muttered calmly.

"Soi Fon? What's going on?" Ichigo asked in utter disbelief. Frowning for a second Soi Fon responded "Thats Captain Soi Fon to you. As for what's going on I shrunk you obviously. You see...I don't like the idea of you a mere substitute Shinigami being so 'buddy-buddy' with all of the other captains and more importantly Madam Yoruichi!"

"Yoruichi? Is that what this is about? You're jealous that me and Yoruichi are friends and so you shrunk me? That's pathetic." Ichigo taunted.

"Silence! Thats Madam Yoruichi to you Kurosaki!" Soi Fon yelled with a strong stomp of her foot and in turn Ichigo. "You're a fool for antagonizing me Kurosaki, you forget that this 'pathetic' girl holds your fate in her hands. I can kill you with a flick of my toes at the slightest urge and you dare talk back to me?!"

Taken back by Soi Fon's burst of anger Ichigo smiled nervously "I'm sorry Captain Soi Fon. It was very foolish of me to question you."

Smiling Soi Fon said "Good, but you deserve punishment for speaking to me like that."
1233211.title: Jealous Soi Fon

12332111.content:
A wicked smile crosses Soi Fon's cold expression after watching Ichigo brace in a defensive stance out of instinct, but also out of fear in the realization that Soi Fon is an enemy that can’t be trusted, reasoned with, or predicted.

Soi Fon's colossal and dirty barefoot rises in slow motion as large bits of debris previously covering her foot or stuck to it caused by the force of her stomp are pulled back down by gravity and rain upon Ichigo while Soi Fon positions her foot over him. "Punishment eh? Lucky for me, I'm undefeated in dodge ball!" Ichigo yells with sarcasm while continuing to jump around, successfully dodging the focused attacks of debris falling from Soi Fon's barefoot in his direction.

"HA! I win!" Ichigo proclaims proudly, but is too focused on his victory to notice Soi Fon has vanished. In an instant, a sudden warmth and pressure is felt surrounding him from all sides as he’s captured in between the toes of Soi Fon. "Arrogance...losing sight of your enemy in the heat of battle...to brag about a perceived victory that exists only in your narrow, unenlightened mind…" Soi Fon states in annoyance, as she athletically bends her standing leg down and lifts the one holding Ichigo in between her toes up towards her face, glaring directly into his eyes, as if to give him a taste of his own medicine and mock his helplessness.

“You are defeated, I don’t usually take prisoners, and you’re in no position to offer me terms of surrender, Kurosaki. All that I offer you is a bug jar to dwell in and live out your pathetic existence at my whim…if I allow you the privilege…which I could be persuaded to grant; assuming you tell me the whereabouts of Yoruichi and all information you have regarding her.“ Soi Fon sternly chastised Ichigo while interrogating him. He didn’t know whether she was exaggerating or not, she isn’t easy to read, but he suspected she was trying too hard at trying to rub in the satisfaction of her victory.

The grip of her toes tightened and Ichigo displayed noticeable pain as he tried to make out the words of his last will and testament: “Geez, if you’re gonna kill me…just do it…before your smelly feet do! I’m gonna pass out! Do you know what soap is!?” An angry anime X appears beside Soi Fon’s head as her teeth gnash and she growls before screaming as the ground shakes “YOU INSENSITIVE LITTLE JERK! I CLEAN MY FEET EVERYDAY! MAYBE THEY DON”T SMELL AS FEMINIME AS THE OTHER FEMALE CAPTAINS, BUT THEY ARE JUST DIRTIER FROM MY INTENSE DAILY TRAINING AND ALL THE WALKING AROUND BAREFOOT! I CAN’T BELIEVE YOU ACTUALLY SAID THAT TO A GIRL! YOU WILL NEVER HAVE A GIRLFRIEND! EVER! YOU STUPID IMMATURE UNCARING JERK!

The rumbling of the ground stopped with newly formed cracks along the surface, stretching for miles like after an Earthquake as Soi Fon breathed heavily with weakness, recovering from her vicious tirade while the redness of the anger in her face slowly receded. “Girls are scary…” Ichigo thought to himself, but not without realizing this moment of fatigue on the part of his captor and the time she’d need to recover, he broke free from the weakening grasp of Soi Fon’s toes. He reached behind for his sword and performed the fastest BANKAI transformation with a flash step escape combo in all of recorded history.

“That was a close one, she’s crazy!” Ichigo said under his breath in exhaustion. Unfortunately, his hasty escape was so fast and directionless that he didn’t bother to plan out where he had just flash stepped or noticed he was suspended in the air. As Ichigo felt the lack of solid ground beneath his feet, he started falling, landing...
12332111.title: She squeezes Ichigo's body between her toes

choices: Nanao notices Ichigo in her tea before sipping
Ichigo spilled out of Nanao's tea onto the table when she picked it up
123321111.content:
Ichigo looks down towards an approaching pool of strange liquid, emitting slight steam before he’s submerged and descends to the bottom of the cup. He tries desperately to climb to the top and endure the heat of the tea as the figure of a woman with glasses slowly crystallizes into view as he swims to the surface.

A tiny *plop* went unnoticed by the Shinigami Women’s Association meeting, presided over by Nanao Ise. Her hand resting on her cup of tea out of habit; she continues to address the few members that bothered to show up which causes a frown of disappointment at the lack of manners now demonstrated by the absent members. White glares of light reflect off her glasses as her eye brow slightly twitches in annoyance after witnessing the bored and inattentive expressions of her audience trying not to fall asleep at the table. The snoring of one Yachiru Kusajishi was particularly audible and presented an obstacle to breaking Nanao’s concentration during speeches.

“Why is Yachiru still the president of this club…?” Nanao ignores the thought as she continues to report facts to the group as though she were a news anchor woman after pushing her glasses up. “Reports of random shrinking in male subjects of both Human and Soul Reaper have become more prevalent. The reason for these cases remains unknown at this time, but we’ve learned…this strange condition has also affected and is most common in Hollows…which has made them somewhat…less intelligent…” Seven tiny hollows appear buzzing above Nanao Ise’s head like annoying flies as they attempt to terrify her.

With one calculated motion, Nanao’s hand lifts and swats all seven hollows into oblivion, effectively administering the killing blow with one swipe. The small group of members suddenly sits up in their chairs and look on with interest at the act of skill demonstrated by Nanao and each member holds up a small card with the number “10” displayed as though they were judging the act.

Ichigo gulps and considers climbing out of the tea cup to gain the attention of someone else. He was happy to learn that he wasn’t the only case and a sense of hope filled him at the idea of Nanao being able to understand his situation, but after witnessing her swatting of the hollows without so much as a look to determine if they were truly hollows or not, maybe gaining Nanao’s attention wouldn’t be a smart move. Maybe Soi Fon was behind all the shrinking and Nanao was in on the plot, it’s safer not to take the chance…just as Ichigo attempted to reach for the wall of the inside of the cup, a sudden violent shaking and a wave of tea push him against the side.

“Any questions?” Nanao asks coldly while lifting her cup of tea in a sign of disapproval of the members conduct thus far. Nanao looks down at her tea as she lifts it to her mouth.
123321111.title: in Nanao Ise's tea

choices: "There's a rude, orange-haired boy in my tea."
1233211111.content:
Nanao anticipated the familiar taste of her favorite tea as the cup approached her lips. Ichigo, resigning himself to his fate and the futility of his efforts, screamed one last insult in frustration at Nanao’s ascending direction before he would flood into her mouth along with her tea. “YOU FOUR-EYED BOOKWORM!”

Nanao froze and her eyebrow rose after hearing the offending comment, she slowly pulled back the cup and peered down into the circular pool with an annoyed expression.

The flood reversed as Ichigo managed to kick off a wall to the surface and jump to the top of the cup with the leverage of the current, his arms hanging across the edge of the outside of the cup slightly while catching his breath. He heard a low-pitched growl from above and coughed upwards in the direction of one very annoyed Nanao Ise.

“GET ME OUT OF HERE! YOU HAVE TO HELP ME! COME ON ALREADY!” Ichigo screamed up at Nanao’s face in hopes of rescue, but with a mean tone.

Nanao continued to death glare at the incredibly rude figure that had insulted her and persisted in barking orders for assistance without him noticing her expression.

After Ichigo took a break from yelling at Nanao and a few seconds of silence had passed while she stared directly at him hanging across the edge of the inside of the cup, he resumed his screaming; but with more force to his voice. “ARE YOUR OWL GLASSES TOO THICK!? HOW DO YOU NOT SEE-“

Ichigo was cut off as the top he hung across was pushed against him than suddenly stopped, causing recoil. He belly-flopped hard on the surface of the pool from a great distance and sunk. He screamed underwater in pain from the force and position he had landed in. He tried to suppress the stinging pain across his body and reach the surface, but he was unable to as the current swished and swirled him around like an underwater whirlwind.

Nanao’s expression remained unchanged before and after she had jerked the cup in his opposite direction to send him flying, lowered the cup beneath where he would land down to the table, pulled the cup up fast at the right time so he would slam on the surface, and tilted the cup in a circular stirring motion repeatedly.

Nanao was too annoyed and occupied with the rude person she was continuing to swirl in her cup to notice the splash of tea she spilt on the table. She concentrated as if she was reading a book and didn’t notice everyone in the room staring at her curiously.

“Ms. Nanao, you must be more careful.” Retsu Unohana took the initiative, standing up and walking over toward Ms. Nanao with a motherly aura, holding a napkin in her hand and approaching her to clean up the mess of spilt tea on the table.

Retsu looked at Nanao up close in puzzlement while Retsu’s napkin in her hand wiped up the tea. “Ms. Nanao...are you ok?” Retsu asked in a tone of concern as she watched Nanao continue to tilt her cup in a circular motion while she starred into the ripples and bubbles popping along the surface.

Nanao’s hand stopped as she heard Retsu speak and she turned slowly to face her after hearing Retsu’s question. Nanao prepared to speak with a cold, emotionless expression while her other hand raised to her glasses, as if she were daring to remove them as everyone in the meeting gulped in her direction before she spoke:
1233211111.title: Nanao notices Ichigo in her tea before sipping

choices: Yachiru's idea: Female Shinigami Associations new pet.slave!!
Kiyone's idea: plan ways to help out Ichigo.
12332111111.content:
Nanao eyed her tea sternly, staring daggers straight through Ichigo. "Least she's not gonna drink me...." He muttered as he floated in the steaming liquid.

Due to practically whispering Nanao didn't hear Ichigo, probably a good thing. Instead she continued to stare at him, almost as if transfixed by the shrunken Shinigami who mere moments ago would've probably been swallowed without her even noticing.

"Are you okay Nanao?" The question came from Retsu Unohana who wore a worried look, breaking her gaze from her tea Nanao noticed everyone at the table was eyeing her like that, except for Yachiru who was busy playing with a Hell Butterfly she brought along.

For a brief instant Nanao averted her gaze, pondering exactly what to say; she decided the truth would be best. "It appears I have a rude, orange-haired boy in my tea." Finishing this sentence Nanao looked around the table, as expected no one believed her, taking it in as an unfunny joke.

"Is that so?" Isane Kotetsu asked, clearly not being serious about her question.

Nanao nodded, "Let me show you." Gently Nanao slid two of her slender fingers into her tea cup, wincing slightly at the heat. Using these two fingers Nanao plucked up Ichigo by his head, trying not to crush his head into oblivion but even so Ichigo still felt as if his head would do just that.

Lifting the orange-haired Shinigami into sight all of the women in the room stared in silent amazement, even Yachiru. Lowering him gently Nanao placed Ichigo on the wooden table, everyone almost instinctive leaned forward to stare at him.

From Ichigo's perspective he was feeling rather uncomfortable, there were at least six female Shinigami staring at him. Among the eyes were, Nanao's, Unohana's,Yachiru's, Isane's, and Kiyone Kotetsu's. He recognized well over half of the group but Isane and Unohana were people he only knew in name, he had no clue what they looked like due to never actually meeting them.

Interrupting everyone's transfixed gaze Nanao cleared her throat, "New order of business. What shall be done about our shrunken Shinigami?"

Immediately someone spoke,
12332111111.title: New Order of Business

123321111112.content:
A gloved hand rose “As women, it’s our duty to protect and restore tinies back to normal without abuse. We must set aside our differences to create a world free of inequality or accidental squishing!” Kiyone Kotetsu screamed in a serious tone as a slight fire of purpose burnt in her eyes.

The sound of crickets were heard in the background as everyone including Ichigo felt embarrassed for Kiyone’s childish outburst and idealism, but they applauded after a few seconds to spare her feelings from being hurt. Kiyone mentally congratulated herself for being a genius. “Is she really a girl?” Ichigo thought to himself as he stared at her obnoxious gloves.

Isane Kotetsu placed her hand on Kiyone’s comparatively small shoulder; as if she were taking responsibility for her. “I think it’s a wonderful goal to achieve Kiyone, but if it were so easy…it would have been done already.” Isane regretfully informed as she looked into the disappointed face of her little sister. Kiyone turned away from her big sister to look at the ground; she felt empty trying to think of a response and so she didn’t answer. Isane felt her pain in a way that only sisters can. She wanted to cheer her up and make her feel more like a part of the team. “Kiyone, can you help us? How would you restore Ichigo to normal? What are your plans to help him in this situation?”

“Hmm…” Kiyone lifted a gloved finger to her chin and looked up as she thought hard about the question while her eyes closed. She knew this was her big chance to show everyone that she wasn’t just a burden for them to bear during these important meetings!

“She’s a real burden to bear in these meetings eh?” Ichigo asked in a dismissive tone as he turned away from the direction of Kiyone and looked up at Nanao from his view on the table. Nanao ignored him and stepped to the side without taking her eyes off Kiyone “I’m not speaking to you” she thought and crossed her arms while exposing her shoulder in his direction.

A cold breeze blew past that made him shiver and exhale visibly as a tiny igloo appeared beside him. “HEY! I DIDN’T ASK TO BE A PART OF YOUR DIET YOU SKINNY TOOTHPICK!” Ichigo screamed up at Nanao in anger and pulled his sword back as if he was going to throw it at her but the sound of her gasp and the sudden fearful expression on her face stopped him.

“Huh?” Ichigo said aloud as he relaxed and looked around the room to see the others with a strange expression, they appeared to be facing the direction of Kiyone. “HA! Scared of a little girl? You call yoursel- WHAT THE!?“ He screamed and tripped backward as he stared in disbelief at big white puffy clouds hovering above Kiyone’s head with tiny animations inside!

One cloud had Kiyone stretching Ichigo up and down by his arms and legs like he was an accordion or on the rack. Another cloud had the end of a tire pump in Ichigo’s mouth as Kiyone pushed up and down on it repeatedly. And another cloud strangely enough had Kiyone wearing a dominatrix outfit standing with a whip in her hand over a tiny Ichigo bound and helpless at her feet as she laughed.

“I got it!” Kiyone proclaimed with excitement while jumping up and down. Her hovering thought clouds disappeared as she opened her eyes. “Just leave everything to me!” She said reassuringly with her gloved hand stretched out; making a V for Victory sign. Ichigo’s body shook uncontrollably as Kiyone approached. She was so immersed in her brilliant ideas that she didn’t even notice he was looking around the room; silently begging for help. They only looked at him with an expression of empathy, feeling frozen and overwhelmed with curiosity and fear at what she was going to do to him; though everyone felt she was going to snap his arms, legs, and body apart by trying to stretch him out.

A looming shadow covered tiny Ichigo standing on the table as a giant Kiyone stood before him. He unconsciously let out tiny squeaks of fear as he craned his neck to look up at Kiyone’s child-like innocent smile, the sides of her collar stood up evenly as though she were Dracula.

“Does he really deserve this…?” Nanao’s hands clenched tight and she started to feel guilty for how she had treated Ichigo earlier. She only intended to play with and scare him; not be an idle witness to his murder. “What should I do?” Her feelings began to take over her analytical mind as she looked down at Ichigo and felt his desire to be saved in her own heart. The expression on her face remained unchanged as the moral dilemma forced her to accept that she’d be responsible if anything happened to him.

“This may hurt a little…” Kiyone cracked her knuckles and Ichigo knew her gloved hand would reach down for him any second.

“I’M SORRY! I’LL DO WHATEVER YOU WANT JUST SAVE ME PLEASE!” Ichigo fell to his knees and cried; apologizing and pleading for his life in Nanao’s direction.
123321111112.title: Kiyone's ideas to the rescue?

choices: It involves her thoughts about the dominatrix thing earlier.
1233211111122.content:
With lightning level speed Kiyone's hand flew down to Ichigo, quickly lifting him up and bringing up to about level with her chest. Staring into Kiyone's eyes Ichigo shivered, her eyes had the same look Don Kanonji's always had and that thought alone was enough to make Ichigo shiver again.

She had already pondered to a visual effect, stretching him like a rubber band, air pumps, and for some reason being a dominatrix to a shrunken Ichigo, anything she came up with seemed to worry Ichigo at this point.

All around Kiyone the various girls stared intently, interested in exactly what the usually silent girl would do. The only ones not to do this were Nanao who still felt bad about Ichigo, and Isane who felt embarassed by her sister.

A silence formed in the room, no one budging not even the eager Kiyonel; she appeared to be thinking, as a guess Ichigo ventured that she was making this up as she went along. "That's reassuring" He whispered beneath his breath.

Finally Kiyone made her move, using her other hand Kiyone grabbed Ichigo's arms, using the one that held him she lowered the fingers to his legs. Nanao stared blankly at her, jaw agap like her fellow female Shinigami. "She isn't...."

Sure enough Kiyone did as everyone predicted, she began pulling Ichigo by his arms and feet in a childish attempt to make him grow again, the plan seemed straight out of a cartoon.

Everyone around Kiyone sighed, expecting some big plan but they didn't do anything to stop her, let her have her moment. Ichigo on the other hand was basically begging her to stop, the sensation of his limbs being pulled in opposite directions was a base equivalent of medieval torture, the young shrunken Shinigami could feel his bones cracking.

"Stop this hurts like hell!!" He pleaded, unfortunately the flame in Kiyone's eyes was even worse than before "Just cause it hurts doesn't mean it's not working!" Kiyone began to increase the strength she was using, somehow stretching Ichigo to one and a half times his normal height, at first it appeared he was actually through some miracle growing but this was an illusion created by Kiyone's method, all she was doing was stretching his body to the brink.

Ichigo didn't give up with his screams, in fact they worsened, but same as before no effect on Kiyone. The girls all around began sighing, embarassed that they even knew Kiyone.

A loud rip caught everyones attention, Ichigo's clothes were beginning to rip apart. "Hell no!" He screamed, finally stopping the peaceful act and forcing his way out Kiyone's grip. Glowing with spiritual pressure Ichigo charged as much energy as he could into her legs, no idea if this would work or not but he kicked his strengthened legs against Kiyone's fingers, successfully removing her fingers from his legs.

Without her others hands assistance Kiyone wasn't stretching Ichigo at all, in no time he returned from his stretched form to his regular shrunken one.

"Man I'm gonna have stretch marks for years." He complained , turning to Kiyone who finally snapped out of her frenzy.

"Why did you do that?! You were getting bigger!"

"You were stretching me!" Ichigo retorted.

"But you were getting bigger anyway!"

Finally getting angry Ichigo screamed, this time his voice filled with evident rage, "I don't wanna get bigger like that! It wouldn't work!"

Kiyone stopped, giving out a short sniffle, "It wont?" All around Ichigo all the girls shook their heads in disapproval, now Ichigo seemed to have become the bad guy in this situation.

Taking a deep breath Ichigo nodded, "Yeah, I appreciate the help but I need something that isn't gonna kill me."

"I guess that rules out Captain Kurosutchi." Isane joked, lightening the mood of the room.

Kiyone ignored her sister, focusing on Ichigo. "I have one more idea."

Ichigo shrugged, Kiyone wouldn't try to hurt him again. "Go ahead."

After a nod Kiyone wrapped her entire hand around Ichigo instead of holding him by his arms, then she wrapped her other hand around the first one. While holding Ichigo like this she brought him closer and closer to her chest, soon he was essentially inches from his perspective away from Kiyone's surprisingly noticable breasts.

The blonde girl took a deep breath, "Now........" She quickly tightened her grip on Ichigo and brought him between her small breasts, giving him essentially a bear hug of death.

"What the hell are you doing!?" Pretty much everyone asked.

Kiyone's eyes flared with their determination again, "True love conquers all!" Pretty much everyone was rendered silent, but their thoughts were clearly, "What are you, five?"

Ichigo gritting his teeth roared, "I barely know you!"

"Oh yeah........" Kiyone released Ichigo from her death grip and once again merely held him in her clenched fist.

"Please no more ideas...." The shrunken Shinigami prayed, silently as to not harm Kiyone's feelings.

Nanao sighed, raising an index finger, "One more idea Kiyone then we try someone else's approach." In response Kiyone nodded once, she already came up with one more idea too.
1233211111122.title: Kiyone's childish ideas

choices: Throws Ichigo in the center of the table and points him out to everyone else
12332111112.content:
Nanao looked at everyone for a moment before smiling somewhat softly, "I'm fine, just kind of gagged a little. Memories of my Captain and some of the things he's done." All the girls in the room made sounds of understanding and turned away from Nanao, her Captain was Kyoraku...that alone gave her a great deal of slack. But they didn't notice her menacingly staring at her tea cup. Her large pupils were focused on the tea soaked rude Shinigami wading in the cup for desperate survival.

Everyone in the room began talking about the various things the Female Shinigami Association discussed, the perfect cover for Nanao as she whispered at Ichigo. "Watch your mouth idiot, can you imagine what could happen if someone like Lieutenant Matsumoto got their hands on you?"

Ichigo pictured it for a moment, a needy,lazy, and demanding slob who complains too much.....not a pretty picture. He'd probably end up living in her sock or a bottle of perfume and end up being little more than her slave. "Uh sorry four-eyes, I was just kinda freaking out because you had almost swallowed me."

A nerve seemed to swell on Nanao's temple, "Four-eyes? Please call me Lieutenant Ise or at the very least Nanao." It was diffilcult to speak to the tiny Shinigami while being discreet but luckily everyone was distracted by Yachiru and Matsumoto, who apparently somehow entered an arguement over flat chests against large breasts, odd and immature but an ideal distraction.

"Um...Nanao?" Ichigo began, "Can you...I dunno...get me out of your tea before I have a stroke?"

Nanao smiled softly at him, "Afraid not Kurosaki. It's the best I can do to hide you right now, unless you like sweaty socks that is?"

Ever anger prone Ichigo roared back like an idiot, "Come on Nanao! You're smart for gods sake! Hide me in your ears if you freaking have to!!"

Ichigo sounded very disrespectful, and Nanao responded accordingly, "Listen you little runt, if you don't behave I will shove you in my sock or worse! Remember you are wading in tea!"

"You wouldn't dare!"

"Try me." Nanao smiled victoriously, she was almost tempted for Ichigo keep acting up, the idea of him struggling in her socks and mouth seemed interesting. It was true what they say, it's the quiet ones you have to lookout for.

Ichigo gritted his teeth and looked like he was about to try something that would likely end in some miniscule blow that would only anger Nanao further. "Okay...can you please put me in your ear and out of this tea cup?"

Nanao shook her head slightly with a smile, "No, you have to work for it I'm afraid."

"WHAT!?!" Ichigo was pure red with rage.

"Nothing big, just say I'm a beautiful goddess. Flatter me a little is all, I won't do anything horrible to you...unless you act up."

Ichigo blushed and opened his mouth to yell a retort, but fell back, "Nanao...you're a beautiful goddess...."

"Good, now say you're a bug compared to...my feet let's say."

Ichigo didn't stop himself, "Hell no you ugly bitch! Goddess my ass, try troll!!"

Nanao's eyes narrowed in anger as she clicked her tongue, "Such a fool..." Not so gently she plucked Ichigo's drenched body from her tea, naturally he flailed for dear life. But was free from Nanao's tea to save the least...but it wasn't safe where he was going.

Nanao...
12332111112.title: Not so Smart Ichigo

choices: A girl suddenly grabs him, (Readers Choice)
1233211112.content:
Staying afloat in Nanao's cup of tea was no easy task for Ichigo, clearly it had just been made; the heat rivaled the hottest hotsprings the shrunken Shinigami ever visited. Of course the heat was nothing compared to what Ichigo experienced once he saw Nanao lifting the cup to her lips, barely giving it a second glance.

Reeling back in a mixture of shock and terror Ichigo's face was comically priceless for a moment but it quickly became serious as he swam for his life against the tides. Nanao began tilting the cup back in the simplest of gestures, totally unknowing of Ichigo's plight.

"Nanao stop! It's me Ichigo!" Reaching the opposite end of Nanao's cup he started clawing desperately at it, attempting to find a means of holding on. As he did so Ichigo turned around and saw Nanao's mouth sucking away the steaming liquid.

"Is she trying to chug it all down!!?" The shinigami screamed in anger, ironically enough Nanao was doing just that, she was drinking as much tea as possible to calm her nerves, it took all the restraint she had to not scream at her lazy group members.

Looking at the glassy wall before him Ichigo saw an opening up top, a possible means of escape, but all he could do is run up it, and he was nowhere near fast enough for that.

"Oh wait, Shinigami....duh." Ichigo's face was once again, in a humorous expression as he said so. Quickly taking a last peek at Nanao's cavernous mouth the shrunken Shinigami smirked, "Sayonara" Using the combined speed of his bankai and shunpo Ichigo leapt out of Nanao's tea cup, landing with a thud on the hard wooden table, but he was alive and that was what mattered.

But he wasn't out of the woods yet, he was still shrunken and needed help. Looking around Ichigo saw the group of female Shinigami all around, the ones angering Nanao. Rangiku Matsumoto and Yachiru Kusajishi sat side by side, both of them asleep and snoring, with Yachiru's head comically in between Rangiku's breasts.

Lucky for Ichigo Soi Fon wasn't there, with his recent experience with her he wouldn't want to see her again anytime soon. Among the remaining people were Hinamori Momo, still appearing as if she had died inside, Kiyone Kotetsu and her sister Isane.

Looking at the unusually tall female it clicked in Ichigo's mind that Isane was a lieutenant, of Fourth Squad, she could help!

"Worth a try." He muttered, once again rising and running toward the giantess, no real plan in mind, just attempting to reach her.
1233211112.title: Escape from Nanao's Tea

choices: Isane only raised her hand to yawn
Isane slaps Ichigo off through the air
12332111121.content:
"I suppose the meeting has ended. Ms. Isane?" Nanao stated as a matter of routine in the direction of Isane Kotetsu. Isane sighed and reached down, lifting the entire table over her head quickly with one hand, showing no sign of effort as members threw heavy objects and clothes on top of it. After the meeting, it was Isane's job to pick up everything. Whither it was reaching the top shelf, carrying large vases, or opening tight jars; Isane was always there to lend her Amazonian stature.

Ichigo was spring boarded off the table through the air so hard he crashed into the ceiling! A still-image of a giantess Isane clutching to a building holding Ichigo in her hand while swatting at planes appeared in his mind.

After the daze faded, he descended past the table on the side of Isane’s hair that was braided, barely catching a stray braid on her shoulder before sliding off the sleeve of her arm; he used the braid like a vine to swing around, landing safely on her other shoulder and successfully canceling out the force of the fall.

Unfortunately, Isane’s free hand reached up to slap at her shoulder and pull the braid back down into position. Her hand was large by normal standards but now, he was sure it would send him flying through the wall if it connected. “Why me?” Ichigo screamed in anger and tried to dodge, but he couldn’t move, realizing the mixture of the tea and his clothes caused him to be snagged by the metal of her braid!
12332111121.title: Indiana Ichigo and The Attack of Isanezilla!

choices: I have no idea where she is
I've kinda always wanted a shrunken person.
123321111211.content:
Ichigo froze up, coming at him at unreal speeds was Isane's open palm. Even if he had went full speed he wouldn't get away in time, not that he could. For some reason the Shinigami's legs chose now to not move, all he could do was stare at the incoming palm and possibly his death.

However it seemed Ichigo was mistaken, either that or extrodinarily lucky. Isane's palm went right past her shoulder and Ichigo, and instead went before her mouth where she let out a yawn. Everyone including Ichigo stared in amazement, the near amazonian woman was holding a table, several dozens cups and plates, as well as Ichigo's shrunken frame (as little as that weighs) with only one arm.

Seeing everyones shocked faces Isane stared nervously at everyone, "What? Is there something on my face?" Everyone remained silent, leaving Isane once again nervous. Finally it was Nanao who spoke, "We're just kinda shocked, at your strength I mean."

Isane blushed slightly, "I can't help how much I can lift...." Everyone was in an uncomfortable silence so Isane left to put away the items she was carrying.

The moment she entered the hallway Ichigo acted, cupping his hands together "Isane! Isane!" Being so close to her ear Isane heard Ichigo, stopping in the middle of the hallway. "H-Hello? You're not a ghost are you?"

The shrunken Shinigami's eyes narrowed in annoyance, "Ghosts? That's her first assumption?" This was naught but a mere whisper but immediately afterwards he spoke in a loud yell again, "No, It's me Ichigo! I'm on your shoulder!"

Isane chuckled, "Come on that can-" In midsentence she turned her head to look at her shoulder and sure enough, Ichigo was standing there in his drenched bankai outfit, Tensa Zangetsu at his side.

Seeing the shrunken person Isane turned pale, her lip quivering. "......WAH!!!!!!!!" After a delayed reaction Isane fell over, somehow still holding everything above her head.

Ichigo, using Shunpo leapt up to Isane's nose as she leaned against the wall, "It's ok. I'm not out to hurt you or anything. I just wanna return to normal."

Isane's eyes piped with interest, "The Captain could help."

"My thoughts exactly."

Isane averted her gaze, "But..........
123321111211.title: Finally Found

choices: a big freak, like, a really huge one!
sweet and care about others feelings over your own.
1233211112111.content:
“I have no idea…where she is…“ Isane whispered in a weak, embarrassed tone as she felt a few of her top teeth bite down gently on her bottom lip in an unconscious act of shyness.

Ichigo expected her answer, but something felt out of place…was she lying? “Hey, why are you nervous? I’m the one who’s supposed to be intimidated here.” Ichigo accused and leaned in, looking at her eyes for signs of guilt. He stood defiantly on her nose, taping his foot as she tried to look at him with confidence, but her gaze kept deviating away and she didn’t respond. “WHAT ARE YOU HIDING!? I’LL BEAT YOU UP AGAIN IF YOU DON’T TELL ME RIGHT NOW!” Ichigo roared and pointed his sword at her as tea dripped off the tip of it.

“You feel safe…around me?” Isane asked with a shaky voice to an unexpecting Ichigo. She reluctantly lifted an open hand as an offer for him to jump on. “Huh? Sure, you’re one of the coolest. I can’t trust those other girls.” Ichigo responded with a smooth tone, but he still didn’t know why she was nervous. He jumped into the palm of her hand without fear, taking in the sheer size of it with amazement.

Isane cracked a smile at his response and stood up to walk down the hallway, satisfied with his answer. She felt better about herself after knowing Ichigo trusted her as he sat comfortably in the palm of her hand. She was picking up a guy, literally!

“Why do you like me?” Isane gathered the confidence to ask as she turned through a door belonging to the 4th division, hoping Ichigo wouldn’t notice her increasing heart beat and heavier breathing.

Ichigo’s hand went under his chin in deep thought as Isane placed the large table in her other hand down gently on a big counter next to a sink. “Well, you’re…” Isane looked at him lovingly as her arm slowly lifted over her heart and she smiled, awaiting his response...
1233211112111.title: Isane's feelings

12332111121111.content:
Ichigo nervously averted his gaze, his cheeks turning slightly pink. "Well you're tall...."

In response Isane stared blankly at her shrunken companion, herself turning slightly pink too due to the fact her size caused her more trouble than benefit. "You....like big women?"

The shrunken Shinigami shook his head, "No, I mean that being that tall must've made you sort of like a big freak to everyone."

Isane flared up in anger, "WHAT!?"

Ichigo quickly raised a hand, pointing his palm at Isane to basically say be quiet, "Not what I mean. I mean I like people....who are treated like that."

Isane calmed down slightly, still shaking somewhat in anger, "So you like girls who've been abused basically?"

"NO! Let me finish. I'm like girls like that because I've been there, my hair has basically put me in the same situation. I always get jumped because people assume I dye my hair to be different."

Calming down completely Isane blankly stared at Ichigo, blurting out "You mean you don't dye it?"

"NO!"

Hearing Ichigo's defensive scream the giantess couldn't help but laugh, his little attitude was actually rather cute. "Relax I don't mean any offense by it, it's just unusual to have natural orange hair."

Ichigo smirked, "Not as unusual as being freakishly tall."

Isane quickly blushed, "That's a low blow! And plenty of people are as tall as I am!"

"Name three."

Isane lifted her head up, staring at the ceiling while thinking, "Umm........Jidanbo is taller than me."

The orange-haired shinigami couldn't help but laugh, "The giant gate keeper is the only guy you can think of?!"

Isane's cheeks turned even redder. "Don't laugh!"

Stopping his laughter Ichigo just flashed a smirk, "Just meaningless fun, I can't even think of one guy in my situation."

Isane calmed down a bit, yet her cheeks were strangely turning even redder, "But you do like me?"

Realizing what Isane meant Ichigo himself turned bright red, never before had a girl been so....direct about it. "Um......
12332111121111.title: Chat between Ichigo and Isane

choices: Isane takes Ichigo to her room
Unohana walks by and sees the two
123321111211111.content:
Nervously averting his gaze Ichigo lowly muttered, "Yeah.....I guess I do...."

Isane appeared so happy that she could've burst from her body at that moment. "Really?!"

"Yeah...." Ichigo's face was redder than ever, but he managed to make eye contact with Isane. "Do you like me?"

The amazoness turned as red as Ichigo but she answered almost immediately, "Well.....you DID look really cool when you saved Rukia, and you are cute.....so yes."

Unconcious about it Ichigo smiled, it seemed weird that he ended up liking this girl he barely knew and yet...it seemed right somehow. "Um....does this mean we're going out?"

Somehow blushing even further Isane fumbled around with her words, "Well....I mean......if you wa-want to.....but does......does that bother you?"

Ichigo averted his gaze. "Well......"

"Well what?" Isane asked nervously.

"I've....never really had a girlfriend before...."

Isane sighed in relief, "That's all? No problem! I'd love to be your first!"

Slowly Ichigo turned back to his normal skin tone and smiled a warm smile at his giantess girlfriend. "Then I guess we are going out."

The Fourth Squad Lieutenant was shaking with happiness, "I'm so happy.....I could....oh come here!" Using her left hand Isane lifted Ichigo from the table, slowly bringing him to her face.

Blushing Ichigo instinctively struggled, to no avail though. Slowly he was brought to Isane's face where her lips puckered and she planted a long firm kiss that covered Ichigo's entire body. Dragging out the kiss for several minutes Isane eventually pulled him back, opening her hand so it was open for Ichigo to move around, he looked dazed.

"My first kiss......" He muttered with an amazed blush above his grinning lips.

Isane giggled, "Glad you liked it, just wait until I put on some lipstick of lip gloss."

Ichigo smile stayed on as he nodded, he probably didn't even hear Isane. "How did you like it?"

Playfully and with a hint of teasing Isane licked her lips, "Tasty, you tasted like tea,"

"Blame Nanao for that." Ichigo replied with a laugh.

Isane's eyes looked at Ichigo lovingly, "You're so cute..."

Ichigo looked at Isane in a similar way, "You're beautiful...."

The two continued this little flirting session for quite some time, until.....

Ichigo couldn't believe what he had just heard, the shyest shinigami in the entire soul society, just said she wanted a shrunken person. He understood the wanting a person to yourself fantasy, but the shrunken part was completely insane. "What do you mean Isane?" Ichigo said, his body shaking a bit.

"I kinda want to keep you, I could always return you to Captain Unohana when I'm done with you, does that sound okay?" Isane asked as she held the shrunken boy between her fingers. He immediately began to flail about.

"HELL NO!!!" Ichigo shouted. "Take me to her right now!" Isane flinched a bit, but managed to stay in control, she sighed, she tried being nice.

"Okay Ichigo, based on your rude behavior, I'm going to...
1233211112112.title: I've kinda always wanted a shrunken person.

123321111212.content:
Ichigo rocketed through the air as the propulsion of Isane’s hand had batted him through a doorway before she fixed her hair. He felt it was somewhat justifiable as he smashed through one delicately constructed wall after another since he hadn’t apologized to Isane for the time he pushed her to the ground into unconsciousness.

Ichigo could take a lot of damage but Isane’s superior strength mixed with his previous injuries made her current attack beyond his limit. He felt his knees get weaker and lost control of his arms as they felt heavy, forcing him to let go of his sword in mid-air against his will as he approached a concrete wall he was on course to smash into; one that he would splatter against and not pass through. “Forgive me…” Ichigo said under his breath in a drained state as his life, family, and friends flashed before his eyes as his bloody and paralyzed body approached a concrete wall at an intense speed.

Ichigo’s vision blurred as a sudden light streaked across followed by a paleish sky that covered and immediately enveloped him into complete darkness; he was defenseless without his sword and couldn’t move. He laid in the dark with his eyes closed. But there was a strange comfort in the surrounding darkness and gentle warmth pressing softly against him that was reminiscent of his mother hugging him as a child. A trickle of strength coursed through his body and he was able to summon enough to breathe. He recalled the soothing scent of peach with every inhale. He opened his eyes slowly to see the darkness recede into expanding pillars stretching across the sky, realizing they were a woman’s graceful fingers releasing their safe grasp upon him.

Ichigo stared upwards into the space and stars with no control over his body as his back pressed against the feminine peach-scented palm he was laying across. He could feel the intense pain and the loss of blood that coursed slowly outward as electrical signals sent the messages of his torn muscles and broken bones to his brain. Before the pain became unbearable, a strange light resonated around his body and the pain alleviated slowly over time while healing him. He closed and reopened his eyes to see a female’s beautiful face looking down at him as though she felt his pain. Her head and hair eclipsed the moon behind her, giving off a heavenly aura of moonlight enhancing her appearance.

“Are you a Goddess?” Ichigo asked as the heaviness of his eyes were forcing them to close slowly. He could only make out her gentle features and the attractive movements of her lips as she spoke what he felt were words of comfort; but he couldn’t hear her say anything or assign an identity to her face. He noticed her expression and lip movements become more frantic as his eyelids finally closed and his head tilted to the side.

Ichigo finally opened his eyes and awoke in…
123321111212.title: Isane slaps Ichigo off through the air

choices: Stick with Momo for a little bit
1233211112121.content:
Deep within his dreams Ichigo imagined various ordeals; ranging from being at the mercy of the more demented women he knew, or simply running for his life in a desperate attempt to survive at his shrunken stature. But no matter what the ordeal the ending was always the same, Ichigo would expect death from something and instead he would open his eyes to see the woman who saved him before he passed out. Even asleep Ichigo couldn't place who it was, the girl was very familar with her short hair tied into a bun, kind eyes and Shinigami robe. Her eyes were kind but...they felt sad too, like this girl experienced some unbelieveable trauma and suffered severely from it. In a way it heightened the goddess-like aura the giantess was giving off, but in another way the sadness seemed to bring her down to Earth, giving her a small aura of regular humanity. The shrunken Shinigami felt his lips curl into a smile as this mystery woman embraced him.

Eyes flying open Ichigo's world filled with light once again, the environment clearly belonged to the Soul Society or specifically a room within the Soul Society but unlike every other place that seemed filled with possible death and fear this place felt safer...almost like a Haven. In Ichigo's hand was Zangetsu, not his Bankai but his Shikai, passing out reverted him to normal attire and his sword reverted too. Every little wound Ichigo seemed to have suffered during his time shrunken seemed gone too, no burn marks from Nanao's tea, no bruises from Isane slapping him, not even a stain from his brief stint with Soi Fon.

"Was it all...a dream?" He wondered aloud, quickly catching on it was not. The world around him was familiar but it was also still gigantic. In the corner laid a pair of sandals that Ichigo and his whole group of friends could fit in from his perspective. Perhaps what made it clearest of all was the fact someone with very soft hands had their fingers wrapped around Ichigo, not in a constraining way more like....a blanket, whoever this hand belonged to it smelled faintly of peach lotion. Curious to see his savior Ichigo traced the hand back up the arm, it quickly disappearing into a Shinigami robe. Beyond the robe was the person's torso, whoever it was was clearly a woman given the noticable bust size despite the fact Shinigami robes were amazingly loose. Finally Ichigo saw the girl's face, her chocolate brown eyes staring kindly at him. He couldn't believe it, the "Goddess" from Ichigo's dreams was his savior, and more importantly he realized who she was now, Momo Hinamori.

"You're okay! What a relief." Momo muttered softly, releasing her fingers from around Ichigo. With nothing holding him anymore the Shinigami took a quick look around, he was standing on Momo's relatively flat robe covered stomach as she laid outstretched on the bed. He noticed her feet were bare and she wasn't wearing her Lieutenant Band, if Ichigo had to guess Hinamori was off duty.

Turning back to the woman he mistook for a goddess with a blush Ichigo replied, "Yeah, I take it you saved me? Thanks."

The giantess shook her head with a kind smile, "I didn't do much aside from clean up your wounds. You kind of got here on your own. I'm not sure how you did it but you came flying through the air and ended up right on my lap. At that close of a range I recognized you."

Ichigo laughed a little bit, "Yeah the orange hair helps with that. Anyway thanks a ton Momo."

Momo smiled with a red tint of embarassment in her face, "Not at all but...what are you gonna do now?"

It was a good question, Ichigo had no idea who he could trust after all it was a Captain of all people who shrunk him! Maybe Unohana of Fourth Squad could help but...what if she proved to be as sadistic as Soi Fon? Ichigo didn't want to have to go through foot duty again. Eyeing Momo Ichigo was halfway tempted to stay with her, at the very least he seemed safe with her; he could use this as a time for some much needed R & R.

"Um...I think I'll...."
1233211112121.title: Saved by Momo

choices: Hollow Ichigo takes over and fights back against Momo!
Momo suddenly comes back to her senses!
12332111121212.content:
"Um...I think I'll stay here for now; it’s not like I have anywhere else to go." Ichigo answered without care, as he felt the slight rise and fall of Momo's tummy beneath him.

"Is that the only reason?" She asked with an almost hurt concern to her voice as she gazed in Ichigo's direction; only to notice he had turned his head to look around her room with his arms folded.

"Well...ya! Who would want to be stuck in this dump? Look at all those tissues on the floor! Do you ever throw anything away?" He laughed under his breath with a slight satisfaction in his own superior cleaning habits as he continued: "I’m glad I don't have you as a roommat-"

A silent fear gripped his heart as the realization that he was being lifted in the air slowly dawned on him. He looked down as the distance between himself and the safe haven of her soft embrace became greater...and more dangerous. The back of his collar had been roughly grabbed by two of Momo’s slender fingers and she slowly drew him closer. He took notice of her betrayed expression as she sat up in her bed and held him dangling near her face mere inches away.

“I’m not some girl you can just use and throw away! Why’d you have to be just another ungrateful jerk that only pretends to care about others feelings when he needs something? Those tissues are there because I cried over you. I put all my heart into saving your life and healing your pain only for you to insult me in my own room? This is how you repay me!?” Momo’s hurt turned into anger and converted into a desire most forbidden to Momo’s gentle nature…to abuse her power and be cruel solely for her own satisfaction.

“I’m sorr-“

“NO! SHUT UP! I don’t believe you. I don’t believe ANYONE! I won’t be taken advantage of again…not again…not ever…” Momo bared her teeth as she lifted Ichigo above her slowly opening mouth prepared to drop him in. The view of her delicate but powerful teeth below threatened to rip him apart…a real threat that needed to be reacted too with instinct within seconds…or be at the mercy of his enemy…
12332111121212.title: In Momo's Room - Survival of the Most Unstable?

choices: The Hollow Cut her up, duh she's mad!!!
123321111212121.content:
Ichigo felt his heart rate go up at the sight of Hinamori's angered face. A mere flick of her wrist, maybe a flapping of her tongue, wiggling of her toes, anything would essentially end his life and the giantess was more than angered enough to do all of them. He had to reason with her, "Come on Momo, calm down. I didn't realize you were this sensitive. I'm sorry."

Momo's face showed a flicker of the gentle girl within, but that was all that appeared, a flicker, instantly it vanished and became replaced with the angered woman who held the shrunken boy. "Don't lie to me! You're only apologizing because you know I can crush you under my foot like a bug!"

Hearing the simile a mental image of Ichigo beneath Hinamori's sole entered his mind, needless to say it was far from pleasant. His mind and conscience told him to try to reason and calm down the girl, survival instinct on the other hand said to use Zangetsu to cut and run. Ichigo shook that idea away immediately, he may have barely known her but Hinamori was a friend and her mental condition was not his fault, it was Aizen's. Thanks to the manipulative bastard Hinamori was essentially a bundle of nerves, anything she did couldn't really be blamed on her. A familiar sensation gripped the Shinigami's heart, a feeling darker than any anger the bigger Shinigami could ever grasp, the feeling of a hollow.

"What are you sitting around for dumbass?! Slice her fingers than go for the throat!!"

Ichigo cringed, his face pointed straight down so it was no longer in sight; he didn't want Hinamori to see his hollow attempt to take over. "Stay out of this! She's my friend!"

"Who needs friends?! All you need is power!!"

Gritting his teeth Ichigo shook his head, "No! I refuse to let you take over!"

Warily Hinamori eyed the Shinigami between her fingers, he almost looked like he was getting possessed, not to mention his Spiritual Pressure was fluctuating wildly. "What are you d-" Was all Hinamori managed to get out before it happened.

"GAAAAAAHHHH!!!!!" The Shinigami's face moved back into view, covering half of it was the striped mask of a hollow. Screaming like a madman Ichigo swung Zangetsu at Hinamori's fingers, successfully drawing blood equivalent to a bad paper cut. Her Shinigami training kicking in Hinamori leapt back and reached for the Zanpaktou she had placed beside her bed. On the floor a couple feet from her was Ichigo who landed safely from his fall, still grinning insanely.

He pointed his blade towards the sky, "GETSUGA TENSHOU!!!!!" Instantaneously the blue discharge of Ichigo's Spiritual Energy formed an energy wave directed at Hinamori, specifically her left foot. It was roughly the size of a piece of paper so Hinamori dodged it fairly easily, but it made contact with one of her discarded sandals and Momo saw the power behind the attack, in a sudden explosion that one Getsuga Tenshou destroyed both her sandals and severely marked the corner of the room.

The giantess looked back at the Hollow/Shinigami with apparent fear, no less than a minute ago she had all the power and now it seemed the problem had flipped, but combat instincts took over. He was the size of a bug! Hinamori felt that even if he had the strength of ten Captains he still couldn't win that easily. At the very least she could hold out until Ichigo came back to his senses, or she could beat and batter the hollow into submission.

Hollow Ichigo wasted no time in attacking again, still screaming like a mad man he vanished with a Shunpo, reappearing right on Hinamori's shoulder. It was like watching a small blurr move as fast as a Captain but Hinamori managed to keep up enough to successfully block the Hollow's sword strike with her palm, the blade scraped against her skin creating a nice cut. Wincing slightly Hinamori leapt back, the hollowfied Ichigo again landing on the floor with grace.

"God Ichigo sucks. He couldn't come to whip your pansy ass? He deserves to be some girl's pet but since I'd suffer with him I can't let that happen."

Hinamori kept looking at Ichigo with wariness and evident fear. He was so small that she...she just couldn't react properly. Her sword was too big to be used for properly blocking his attacks so she had to resort to her own hands but that would ineveitably end in her getting harmed. Not to mention each attack Hinamori would do, while big, would be simple for Ichigo to percieve and dodge. He was the worst kind of enemy Momo could fight in her small room.

The Hollow gripped his sword for another attack, but suddenly he let out a yelp of pain, Zangetsu falling right out of his hands. Ichigo's left hand reached for his face and began attempting to pry off the mask. Momo stared in blank wonder as the inner battle reached its climax. The mask finally came off and crumbled away, Ichigo was back to himself again. He fell to his knees, eyes locked on Hinamori's relatively small but nonetheless present wounds. Guilt now gripped Ichigo's heart, guilt at harming a friend.

The giantess sheathed her blade and calmly strided her way towards the shrunken Vaizard. She wore an unclear expression, heck her mind wasn't clear at that point. Did the hollow's appearance forgo forgiveness or was Hinamori even madder? Even she wasn't sure...
123321111212121.title: Hollow's Counterattack

choices: “You’re that creepy weak old grandma that never fights!”
“You’re Captain of Squad Four; Retsu Unohana!"
1233211112122.content:
Ichigo felt the paralysis of his muscles fade as he regained his strength under the covers. "Was it a dream!?" He asked as his hand lifted to the side of his head. He looked at his arm and didn't see any blood or feel any pain as he sat up and looked across at...his closet. A surprised expression formed on his face as he looked around to confirm the familiar vision of his room. He looked down to see his dirty socks still discarded in the middle of his messy room. He sighed, feeling safe and at home with the faint darkness that allowed him to view everything in his room at night.

He laughed as he realized it was all a dream as he fell back on his bed and stared up at the ceiling. He stopped laughing slowly as his eyes scanned the strange black line running across the top of his room. "Was that always there?" Ichigo asked himself as he pushed the covers off and swung his legs over to place his feet on the wooden floor as the texture of it conformed to his step. He walked around looking up at the barely noticeable thin black line connecting and running across his room in a square.

“Weird…” Ichigo said under his breath as he pulled back the chair at his desk and sat down. His hand stealthy reached under his bed and pulled out a girly magazine as he placed it on his desk. He grinned mischievously and flicked the switch at his lamp…but it wouldn’t turn on. “Damn, the bulb’s out.” He said in a disappointed tone as he turned around in his chair and walked towards his door to go get a new bulb but something moved out of the corner of his eye. He stopped and looked out his window as he stared at a large blue circle with pieces of wet black rope cascading around it. He walked over towards it while squinting, trying to decipher what it was but he didn’t expect it to move on its own!

He screamed and fell on his backside as the blue circle ascended out of his view through the window and disappeared. His room shook as he looked up with a hand across his chest in an instinctive act of defense. The roof came apart at the thin black line from one side to the other. A further ceiling above revealed itself but part of it was suddenly blocked out by a strangely designed mixture of white and black that led up to the blue circle he’d seen through the window.

“So my tiny sleepyhead is awake. Are you feeling better now?” Retsu Unohana smiled and looked down towards her tiny patient looking up at her as he shook in fear. Her hands cupped together down near her knees as her wet unbraided black hair wildly fell across her shoulders and back.

“WHAT ARE YOU!?” Ichigo screamed as she slowly descended towards him to provide a better view of her face. “I’m not a big scary monster, little Ich…I…go?” Retsu slowly punctuated the syllables of his name cutely as she spoke it in a motherly tone. He calmed down after hearing his name spoken and he started to recognize her. He was so used to her hair always being braided and dry that he didn’t recall who she was until now. He breathed normally and felt a strange attraction to her with this hairstyle he hadn’t seen before.

A few seconds of awkward silence passed as Ichigo realized Retsu was looking at him in that specific way as if to say “What’s my name? You better remember…” that sent shivers down his spine. All of the questions in his mind were pushed to the side as he used all of his concentration to remember her name. Ichigo snapped his fingers and looked up at her with confidence as he pointed.

Retsu was impressed with her tiny patient’s expression and she anticipated hearing Ichigo say her name.
1233211112122.title: Ichigo wakes up...in his bed?

choices: I was wondering if you could do the same for me?
I was just asking, I dont exspect anything from you.
12332111121221.content:
"Your that woman who never fights, the one thats old and not as AGH!!!" Ichigo was cut off as the womans pinky pinned him down and applied little pressure, but thats all that was need to get him in line. Unohana smiled as she kept applying pressure to the boy. He looked up to see her smiling. "Kurosaki Ichigo...." He stared at her gentle expression as she spoke his name with the most soothing voice he ever heard. "See I remebered your name." Unohana giggled. "I'll give you one more chance to guess my name." Unohana exclaimed. Ichigo's eyes darted acrosse the room for any hints of her name. His eyes stopped on her right breast. "Ret..." Unohana covered up her name tag with her free hand. "No cheating" She said playfully.

Ichigo was stuck there for a good 10 minutes when it finally came to him. "Ah Retsu Unohana!" She smiled and released Ichigo who streched after being pinned down for so long. "It's polite to remember a womans Name Ichigo." He rubbed the back of his head resisting the urge to yell out an insult after the display of massive power he just witnessed. "I did not intend to harm you, but how you adressed me was very inappropriete!" SHe said waving her index finger back and forth. "I felt a little dicipline was in order" Ichigo took a couple of steps back as the smile said welcome but her actions said BEHAIVE! "Now Ichigo, how did you get so small?" Unohana said bending down letting her chin meet the table as her colosaal face covered Ichigos entire view.

Ichigo explained his entire adventure to Unohana as she listened in intrest not getting distracted for one second. "So Soi-fon made you her foot slave?" She asked in amazement. Ichigo nodded. Unohana blushed as she got closer to Ichigo. "Did she say you were any good?" She asked in curiosity. Ichigo tool a few stepped back. "What are you asking?" Ichigo managed to say through all the fear going on through his micro head right now. "I'm mearly asking if you were any good at foot massaging" She said smiling playfully giving Ichigo the creeps as he was getting ready to make a run for it. "What did you have in mind?" Ichigo asked asked waiting for her answer.
12332111121221.title: Thats impolite Ichi-bug

choices: Ichigo continues to insult, struggle, and be disrespectful
12332111121222.content:
“You’re Captain of Squad Four; Retsu Unohana!" Ichigo smiled with joy, knowing his salvation was finally at hand as he stared up into heaven in the form of Retsu and her unusual lovely long-flowing wild wet unbraided black hair.

"That's right little one, and you're Ichigo Kurosaki; one of my more frequent patients." Retsu resonated with a motherly tone as she lowered her hand into the miniature dollhouse replica of Ichigo's room. Ichigo tensed up at the sight of her hand coming toward him and he couldn't help but imagine how easily she could crush him with miniscule effort. Yet, there was a strange calm with Retsu that made him feel at ease as he watched her hand gently fall flat on the floor beside him.

"Hop on little guy, I have to physically examine you to know if you're fully healed. Don't give me any trouble; get your butt over here now." Retsu declared playfully, but with a sense of prediction and knowing the inevitable events that were about to take place. She hoped it would be different this time...

"I'd never give you any trouble Ms. Retsu! If I do, you can spank me ok?" Ichigo laughed as he stood up from sitting on the floor and walked towards her hand. He looked up at her with an eager desire to conform to her wishes. He placed his foot on her bare hand and was ready to keep walking than sit down in her palm as she had ordered…But, he suddenly froze at his foot made contact with her bare hand...something was out of place...his foot felt bare too...he looked down at his foot, his leg, his body, and realized he was naked!

He screamed and covered himself between his legs with his hands then dived under his bed – his feet barely hung out as Retsu looked downward, disappointed in him. She knew what she had to do now since he was unwilling to cooperate. “I warned you, Ichigo. I wanted to do this peacefully, but you don’t have a say in the matter now; we do this my way.” Retsu declared with determination as her hand grabbed Ichigo’s foot from under the bed and slowly dragged him out.

“GET AWAY FROM ME YOU OLD PERVERTED HAG! I’M FINE! HELP!” Ichigo whined, literally kicking and screaming. He grabbed the blanket on his bed just before she pulled him up and out of the dollhouse. He continued to beg and plea as he was being held upside down around his ankle with two fingers skillfully, as though she had mastered the technique. Ichigo held on to his security blanket for dear life with his hands firmly dedicated to covering himself up below his waist with it. He continued to push his arms up with his blanket to stealthy conceal himself while upside down in Retsu’s grasp.

“Last chance; let go!” Retsu warned with a voice that sent shivers down Ichigo’s spine. She gave him a few seconds to comply; he did not. She quickly poked him in the stomach gently and tickled him; weakening his grasp on the blanket and with one sudden motion, she easily swiped the blanket away and out of view. With another lightning fast motion, she grabbed both his arms and stretched them over his head; he was fully exposed - Ichigo never stopped whining.

“SOMEONE HELP! I’M BEING VIOLATED! I HAVE RIGHTS! NOOOOO!” Ichigo still tried to move with all his might but was simply overpowered by Retsu as she began the examination. She twisted and turned him in every direction, closely inspecting every millimeter of him thoroughly for any sign of lingering injury. She was a perfectionist, after all.

Ichigo felt her prying eyes on him at every inch and he never stopped whining and insulting her. Suddenly, Retsu stopped as she was patiently examining his butt. She twisted him around to face her directly. He was exposed toward her but she seemed to only be fixated at glaring deeply into his eyes. “You don’t have anything I haven’t seen before. I’ve given you plenty of warnings and I have continued to endure your rude and hurtful comments. You will not say another word until this is complete. You will not resist me once more or else. If I have to stop my examination again; you’ll be eternally regretful you ever crossed me. Are we clear?”
12332111121222.title: Retsu Unohana’s Examination on tiny Ichigo

choices: Unohana does something rather inappropriate with Ichigo (Readers Choice)
The Physical Examination is over, now its time to test Ichigo's reflexes
123321111212221.content:
Ichigo had his moments but he was no fool; he was going to comply with Unohana's wishes, no matter how violated he felt. He wanted to fight back, maybe toss an insult but in light of recent events the shrunken Shinigami realized that was a bad idea. He was knocked unconcious by a lieutenants careless swatting, he almost drowned in a cup of tea, and almost became Soi Fon's foot pet, Ichigo could've had the Spiritual Power of all of the Captains combined and he would likely not even be a match for Unohana's foot. Allowing his muscles to stiffen Ichigo eyed Unohana with pure defiance, he hated how the situation had played out but he knew it was best to shut up and take it.

Unohana was careful, but it still seemed like violation in Ichigo's book. Here he was, completely nude as the Giantess Captain softly dragged her fingers along his body, gently caressing Ichigo's muscular frame. The little orange-haired hero struggled not to break out with a nosebleed or to blush; because....well Unohana gently stroking him with her fingers like this...it was kind of a turn on. Like she had the aura of a mother yet...it still felt okay to feel attracted to her, that was the kind of aura Unohana always gave off each time Ichigo spoke with her.

She remained cordial through it all, asking valid medical questions such as "Does this Hurt?" Or "Do you have any inner pains?" They were normal enough questions Ichigo answered with little problem but...it almost felt like Unohana was enjoying it all.

"So how do you think you ended up like this?" The Captain asked kindly, trying to take Ichigo's mind off of his rather embarassing examination.

Ichigo groaned, "Soi Fon, something about jealousy because me and Yoruichi are friends."

Unohana kept going without batting an eye but her muscles seemed to stiffen, "You're accusing a Captain of shrinking you? That's quite the accusation, if she ever found out...."

"What you don't believe me?"

Her finger at Ichigo's back Unohana shook her head, "No not at all, it sounds very likely with Captain Soi Fon. She's always...had poor social skills and let her emotions get in her way often, especially in regards to Mrs.Shihoin."

Slightly nervous about expecting Unohana to check somewhere inappropriate Ichigo laughed nervously. "I understand what ya mean, she almost turned me into some kind of weird foot pet. I mean who does that?"

Unohana shrugged with a calm smile, "Apparently Captain Soi Fon does. Were you any good?"

Ichigo almost leapt off of Unohana's palm at that moment, "Please don't tell me you want to...."

The Captain giggled, "No not at all, just simple curiousity. Although if you're interested we can discuss it later. Work is hard you know."

"NO THANKS!!!!"

Unohana giggled, now examining Ichigo's rear but remaining entirely professional about it. As soon as Unohana touched it the shrunken hero yelped, almost like a girl. "Careful!"

The giantess didn't show any signs of reaction, "So sorry dear, please just bear through it."

Ichigo did, although he really didn't like it. "So um....how come your hair is like that? Just come out of a shower?"

For the first time Unohana stopped her examination and began stroking her fingers through her hair. "Yes, I found you several hours ago and figured you would still be unconscious by the time I returned. So much for that." The two laughed softly.

"Can you fix me?" Ichigo asked when Unohana restarted.

She stiffened, "It depends on how Captain Soi Fon supposedly shrunk you. Some ways are reversible, other ways....."

"I'd be running from girls all my life." Ichigo laughed, remembering all of his near death encounters with women.

The two were silent for a few minutes, Unohana continuing the examination and Ichigo bearing through it with a blood red face. She checked everywhere even Ichigo's...."special" areas and so far it seemed like all was well. As a precaution she double checked everywhere though, that Ichigo really hated, but eventually the examination was over.

"We done now?"

Unohana smiled softly, "Not quite....

Unohana proceeded to take off her sandels and socks. She held out her hand for the little Ichigo to hop on, and he knew the drill even though rather quite embaressing. He reluctantly hoped on worried about why Unohana had taken off her footwear. "So little Ichigo are you ready?" She asked in a motherly tone. Ichigo almost couldnt say no when ever she used it. I am going to put you on the ground and try and stomp on you with my feet. this will last for five minutes and that gives me plenty of time to evaluate your skills." Unohana held Ichigo to her eye, Ichigo slumped over as he was drwared by a single eye. "is that all right with you ichigo?" Unohana asked gently.
1233211112122212.title: The Physical Examination is over, now its time ...

choices: Unohana's enjoying the foot play a bit too much, she's keeping Ichigo down there
Unohana did as asked, remaining perfectly professional
12332111121222121.content:
The sight of Unohana’s bare foot brought forth Vietnam-style flashbacks of Ichigo’s encounter with Soi Fon. Although, like the rest of Unohana, her feet radiated a sort of…cozy warmth; Ichigo didn’t really mind it too much. He smiled softly at Unohana, “Couldn’t say I’m a big fan of the idea but as long as you don’t squish me or something.”

“Are you implying I would be so careless as to let that happen?” An innocent question, but Unohana’s tone brought a few goosebumps.

Ichigo quickly jumped at the Captain's darker tone, “N-No no no! I didn’t mean anything like that! You’re the best doc I know!”

"Technically Head Medical Officer."

"Best Head Medical Officer!" Ichigo corrected

Unohana gestured to the floor, “Then please jump to the floor so that we may begin.”

“J-Jump?”

She nodded, “Of course, even an unranked Shinigami can make this jump. I know it looks scary but it’s a good way to test your acrobatics in this state.”

Ichigo still appeared uncertain, his escapades at this size had him pretty worn out after all. But he did as told and jumped, it seemed…easier than expected, and with an unnatural grace Ichigo fell to the floor with a soft tap. “H-Hey! I did i-“

BOOM

A shadow suddenly overcame Ichigo and instinct allowed him to dodge at the last second, it was Unohana’s foot. “What the hell!! Are you trying to squish me!?!”

Unohana, now standing on her feet, smiled and nodded. “But of course, just because I bent the rules doesn’t mean I intend to throw our sparring match.” The giantess clenched her toes at Ichigo, “I’ll be doing my best to win.”

Ichigo paled at Unohana’s words, but he did respect what she meant. He’d probably have done the same thing. Still, he didn’t like the situation at all…well…there were a couple highlights. Unohana still had that kind aura, and her feet did seem…more welcoming than Soi Fon’s if that made any sense. Big bonus though was the fact Unohana was wearing a white nightgown underneath her Captain’s Jacket, at this angle it was a…pleasurable sight.

BOOM

Another step, again another close encounter, “Pay attention Kurosaki! Your response time is lacking heavily, at this rate my toes will finish you off!” It sounded harsh but Unohana was clearly looking out for him; shame it had to be in such a situation.

Ichigo was already running away, “I didn’t need that example!!!” Hot on his heels was Unohana, calmly walking towards him. Every foot fall her toes scraped along his back, no doubt Unohana toying with him. Ichigo was running full speed and this woman’s calm stroll was besting it, not the best moment for pride. Ichigo eventually clicked his tongue, as if to say “Enough.” And with a single second he vanished.

The Shinigami reappeared on the other side of the rather large room, completely alone, “Thank god for Shun-“

BOOM

“Pooooooooo!!!!!!!!!!” This time Ichigo’s reflexes weren’t fast enough, he only survived through luck that Unohana missed, but the shockwave did send him flying. Behind him Unohana shook her head, “Focus Ichigo, your speed is adequate at best and you’re hardly taking this seriously…” Unohana then smiled, “And…I can use shunpo too.” The next second the Captain vanished, and Ichigo cursed. With hardly enough time to act, Ichigo shunpo’d too. Thank god he could see Unohana and at his size she would struggle to see him…or so he thought. Ichigo reappeared a good distance away, confident he got away for a few more seconds. To be safe though he started running again, only to run into something soft moments later.

“I’m really starting to think you have an obsession with my feet Kurosaki.” A familiar voice laughed. Ichigo pushed himself away from what he crashed into, Unohana’s pinky toe. The scent of coconut lotion wafted into his nostrils, just another perk in comparison to what he had dealt with before. No time for admiring the small things though, Ichigo shunpo’d again, and again, ran into Unohana’s toe.

“At this rate I may have to pry you away from my feet Ichigo. I understand they look nice but please keep this professional.” Ichigo grunted in anger and vanished again, and again…do I need to say it? It continued about four or five more times, just Unohana’s own little game. More jokes about her feet came too, but nothing worth mentioning.

With the last collision Unohana said, “One minute left, I’d better get serious.” Ichigo vanished before he could find out what serious meant, but he saw anyway…Unohana was running after him! Ichigo was on the verge of running too but…something…shock probably, rendered him immobile; and at that position he noticed something as Unohana ran…her breasts bouncing…the tiny hero began to blush intensely. Needless to say his lack of action resulted in Unohana catching up, and she didn’t just step on him. She jumped into the air, both feet over Ichigo’s form. Ichigo rose his arms up in defense...

The loud smack of bare skin against wood rang out all throughout the room.

After the fervor died down Unohana blushed, “Oh my! I lost a bit of control there. Ichigo, are you okay?”

Below the woman’s foot came an unintelligible grunt, Unohana sighed in relief.

Ichigo repeated his grunt, much louder now. “You won! Get OFF me!!!”

Unohana…
