123321111212221212.content:
Unohana smiled as she stepped off the substitute shinigami and let him rise to his feet. "Kurosaki, you preformed...how should I say this....um poorly. " Unohana teased the bug still taking in breaths after the humiliating defeat at Unohana's....feet. "WHAT!?" Ichigo screamed up at the goddess that stood before him. "But Kurosaki, you were stepped on several times, and I was holding back to be honest. Ichigo cleched his fists and groaned. Unohana saw this and smiled. "Kurosaki, dont look down on this," Unohana said smiling gently at Ichigo, "think of it as a chance to improve. Maybe this is a perfect chance to train your abilities." Ichigo stared at the goddess. Her beauty enhanced from the angle and lighting. "And I will gladly help you train. we will host sparring matchs like the one we had a minute ago?" All that Ichigo could do was nod in agreement with the goddess. Unohana started down at her foot and noticed a splinter in her big toe.

She sighed and sat down in a nearby chair to take a closer look. "ugh it looks like while I was researching your skills, I must have gotten a splinter chasing you." Ichigo hated to see Unohana in pain. "Wait!" ichigo said making Unohana turns towards him. "Yes Ichigo? She sked giving off that motherly tone of hers. "I'll get that for you." He said taking a deep gulp. Unohana smiled and set her foot down infront of him. He marveled at the mear size of her foot. It was godly compared to Ichigo, no wonder why he lost to Unohana. "Ichigo?" Unohana said moving her foot out of the way to see Ichigo. This snapped him out of the trance. "Are you going to get it out?" She said flexing her big toe. "Oh yeah, I am I'm just..." Unohana giggled. "Its ok ichigo, I wont squish you" She said giving off that loving aura. "Its not that, its just how big your feet are..." Unohana's expression changed from gentle to anger. "Are you saying my feet are big?" Unohana said now giving off a death like feeling. Ichigo couldnt believe how she could have this kind of effect on him. "No thats not it!" He said shaking his head and waving his arms. The next thing he heard was a gentle giggle. "Its ok Ichigo, I was just playing with you, now please help relieve the pain." Ichigo noded and procced to climb. He reached the big to after 3 minutes, and put his arms around the giant piece of wood. "Grrr its lodged in prett tight!" Ichigo tugged and pulled finally taking the splinter out. He lost his balance and fell off the toe. Unohana gasped. "Ichigo!" She yelped as she looked past her foot for any sign of him. Sh sighed a relief once she saw the miniscule form holding the piece of wood. "Thank you Ichigo" She said getting back up to her large stature. "Ichigo, I know this may sound impleasant but....
123321111212221212.title: Maybebeing this small isnt as bad as it seems

choices: "I've been meaning to paint my toe nails...perhaps you could help?"
"We tested your speed, now we should test your strength no?"
1233211112122212121.content:
"Could you possibly massage my feet? Stomping around has gotten them rather sore, being a medical officer I probably should've been more careful." Unohana turned the faintest tinge with embarassment, not just at the slight annoyance to her feet, but also due to the fact she allowed her time with Ichigo to cloud her judgment. It was one of her biggest flaws; she cared about her patients too much.

Ichigo blinked at the request, moments ago he was getting chased by her feet, had a battle with a splinter on it, and now a massage? At this rate he was going to end up a foot toy like he was with Soi Fon. The thought wasn’t exactly reassuring; but Ichigo lost his spar, it was the least he could do. “Sure thing, after all I did lose.” He grinned.

Unohana smiled gratefully as she gracefully fell to the floor with the softest of thuds. Leaned against the wall, feet stretched out to Ichigo, the Captain eagerly wiggled her toes. “That I did Kurosaki, so I expect a good job from you. Think of it as part of your training.”

The young warrior was already at her left sole, rather amazed at how big it was. He was maybe…half the size of her toes? So with her foot fully raised up Unohana’s sole literally towered over Ichigo. She seemed to notice this at the same time he did, “Oh my, I’m sorry Kurosaki. I would help but…well it’s a bit embarrassing but my feet aren’t exactly the most flexible…this is the best I can do.”

He wasn’t worried, “No worries. I get some climbing practice!” Unohana giggled, and again flexed her toes. “Then by all means…”

Ichigo talked big but to be utterly frank…he didn’t have the slightest idea what the hell he was going to do. Unohana’s feet may have been heaven compared to previous ones but he still felt a mild paranoia getting so close to them, let alone touching them. And it wasn’t exactly likely anything he could do would really work either…he was small after all. But a deal’s a deal, so Ichigo stepped up to the tip of Unohana’s sole and just did some mild squeezing motions. For a normal person they’d just have to rub to relax the muscles, for Ichigo he’d have to put a decent amount of force to adequately relax the muscles. Again, he had no idea what he was doing, but it seemed to be working; evident by a soft moan shortly after he started.

“Oh my…no wonder my fellow Captain had you down there…Kurosaki you’ve got quite the talent. At your size you’re tending to the muscles better than I’d have thought possible…have you ever considered a career in this field?”

Ichigo smiled weakly, “After all I’ve been through I don’t even wanna see another pair of feet when I return to normal…”

“So my feet disgust you…?”

Ichigo recognized that tone, “N-Not at all!! Just the other cases…” Unohana seemed to accept that answer. That or she was playing with him...probably both.

Regardless of what he said, Unohana’s words did give Ichigo a renewed vigor in his massaging. Now he at least knew he was doing a good job. But now came the hard part…climbing up. Good news was that Shinigami could simply use Reiatsu to float up…bad news was Ichigo sucked with Reiatsu. He tried, and did rise up a bit. But it was very unstable… at any moment he could fall, so he had to work fast. Ichigo sped up his pace, using his massaging technique in a renewed haste. For safety reasons he brought himself closer to Unohana’s foot, one of those wrinkles could end up saving his life if he fell after all. His noise was just short of the bare foot skin, again coconut scented lotion wafted into the young Shinigami’s nose. No dirt either, well...aside from what she gained chasing Ichigo. Some sock lint but not much either...as akind gesture Ichigo plucked off pieces as he came across them. The little things went a long way, he knew Unohana was very careful about her appearance.

All in all Ichigo was an extremely lucky guy. Out of all the weird people who could’ve found him he got found by the Captain of Fourth Squad. Things were a bit different than expected but…all in all he couldn’t complain. If someone like Orihime found him he’d have probably been accidentally squished. Rukia or Matsumoto would be a lot like Soi Fon…ugh…Soi Fon was in a category all her own. Still, none of that mattered, Ichigo lucked out.

It didn’t take long for Ichigo to reach Unohana’s toes oddly enough. But the toes themselves were a bit of a challenge. For one thing, no matter what Unohana did they couldn’t remain still; motions unknown to her threatened to throw Ichigo into the air. But with a good grip he held his ground, working his way through each toe and the skin between. Slightly exhausted, Ichigo gently floated back down to the floor.

“Whew…”

A soft surface poked him on the head, “Don’t forget one Kurosaki!” Unohana giggled, retracting her toes. Ichigo sighed but the smile was clear on his face as he began to repeat the process on the other foot. It didn’t take long before that foot too, was done.

Ichigo gently landed back on the floor, eyeing Unohana. “Now, did I forget some third foot?”

Unohana knocked him off his feet with a quick sweep of her toes, “Did you forget what one could do?” A moment later the two chuckled.

After the short laughter Ichigo grew a bit of a more serious look, “What now Unohana?”

“What, no formality?”

“Oh! Uh-“

Unohana giggled, “Relax, it’s nice to hear my name like that. As for what to do…well I have two ideas, that is if you really want to know.”

“Sure!”

“Well…

12332111121222121211.title: "I've been meaning to paint my toe nail...

choices: Being your brush for a little bit."
123321111212221212111.content:
One bottle stood out to the young Shinigami more so than the others, black, the dark color seemed to suit Unohana perfectly. Not cause of darkness or anything, the reason was actually pretty weak…her hair; it matched her hair, and her Shinigami robe for that matter. All the other colors…well they didn’t really seem right. “How about the black one Unohana? I think it’d be pretty nice.”

Unohana smiled, “I agree, it seems we have a similar mindset about this sort of thing Kurosaki.” Calmly she set aside all the other colors and placed the black one nearby her feet. With a soft, careful motion; Unohana lowered her soles onto the ground, planting her toes before Ichigo. None of them had so much as a shred of paint, Ichigo was about to fix that.

But first came a more important matter, “Uh…Unohana…? I don’t think I have the um…strength to open that bottle.”

A chuckle escaped the giantess as her hands re-lifted the vial, smiling playfully. “Such a man, leaving a woman to do everything…” With a small motion she twisted the cap, opening the bottle, and set it down back near Ichigo. “Ready now? For that little bit of help I expect a top quality job now. Understand?”

Ichigo grinned and gave a mocking salute, “Yes mam!” The bottle only rose slightly above Unohana’s toes; which, considering Ichigo climbed her sole not too long ago, was no problem at all. It didn’t even take a minute before Ichigo was beside the cap, arms at the rim. The cap, not including the brush it had, was about two or three times Ichigo’s height; but he shouldn’t have any problems carrying it, it was just a brush right? Wrong, the damned thing had to have weighed at least fifty pounds! Not that Ichigo had any trouble lifting it up, but given its size plus the weight, maneuvering it would prove challenging.

He wouldn’t have said anything but the black hairs of the brush were dripping with black paint…if Ichigo messed up things could be bad. “Um…Unohana? I think we have another problem.”

Unohana, who had peacefully closed her eyes, opened them and frowned. “Hmm?”

“This brush is…a little bit big for me…I don’t think it’d be a good idea for me to do this…”

Unohana shrugged it off with a smile, “Nonsense, I’m sure you’ll do just fine…I believe in you Kurosaki.”

The encouraging words brought a blush to Ichigo’s face, quickly followed with a smile. “O-Of course! I’ll give it my all!”

Using the same method he used to climb earlier, floating, Ichigo started working his way towards Unohana’s awaiting toes; the huge brush on his back. Ichigo had to take extra caution too, Unohana had already proven herself a bit…moody, and any sudden movements could result in spilled nail polish. So…Ichigo, who was already bad at controlling Reiatsu, was floating via it, trying to be extra careful, carrying a fifty pound giant brush, and was nervous about upsetting Unohana and/or doing a good job; it was a disaster waiting to happen. But so far so good, Ichigo made it to Unohana’s big toe without disaster, floating just inches away from it. Now came the hard part, painting. Hell, at his size handling the brush was a challenge in itself, but Ichigo somehow worked his hands onto the thin pole attached to the brush and aimed it at the nail before him. He started with a cautious stroke of paint…it spread nicely and the world didn’t end, maybe Ichigo could do this. His confidence rose up a bit and Ichigo began applying paint faster and faster…but he started to lose caution, and that messed him up.

Ichigo’s arms were growing tired from the fifty pounds of giant brush, but he stubbornly continued; the mistake of that being, the growing pain was slowly nagging at his focus. Soon enough to the point Ichigo was on the verge of yelling. It was right about then Ichigo’s concentration on his floating grew a bit weak, and his foot caved in a bit. Now that would have been just fine on its own, but when his foot stumbled Ichigo dropped a bit of paint, and his concentration just got shot to pieces when he saw it land on the top of Unohana’s foot. Without concentration…Ichigo wasn’t floating, he was falling…fast. The surprise of the sudden turn of events caused Ichigo to let go of Unohana’s brush, which was falling towards the tip of her toes. Ichigo mentally screamed as he made contact with the ground, Unohana would kill him!!!

“Hmm?” The giantess felt something between her toes and looked to see what; between her toes was the brush, and the tips of those toes…jet black. Unohana saw Ichigo on the ground and pieced it together, “Hmm…maybe you were right about the brush being an issue…” She chuckled, lifting the brush from between her toes. Ichigo rose up and gave an apologetic bow, which Unohana simple giggled at. “Relax Kurosaki; I can just wipe this off.” And as she said, a simple swipe of her thumb removed all traces of paint from Unohana’s toes.

Ichigo was still on his knees, “Um…are you mad I can’t do this?”

Unohana blinked in surprise, “Mad? Why would I be mad? It’s not a matter of effort or ability, you’re just too small to paint my toe nails.” It was like an arrow struck right through Ichigo, his pride taking another hammer blow. Unohana examined what was done on her nail thus far though, “But…you did do quite well for that short amount of time. It seems your size is good for spreading it out, but you need a means to do so.”

“Any ideas? I can’t stand to leave something unfinished.”

Unohana looked at him, “Just two, one will be strenuous, the other will be humiliating.”

Ichigo slumped, Great Choices!! “Um…what are they exactly.”

“Simply put, one is to apply it by hand, or even feet if you want. Just dip your hands in the paint and proceed from there. The other….” Unohana seemed hesistant to speak, “The other…well with your hair style…you would make for a suitable brush…and since you can move you can apply the areas I miss as we go along. It would be much faster, but as I said…a bit humiliating. Not that I would think less of you.”

Ichigo groaned, Great choices, bad and worse! But he did owe Unohana, “Okay, I’ll just deal with…

12332111121222121211122.content:
Unohana paused to look her window, “It appears to be getting late Kurosaki. Would you like to stay here and rest with me?”

The way the question was asked, coupled with the evening sunlight’s angle on Unohana, brought Ichigo to the completely wrong conclusion. “W-What?! Where did that come from?! I mean-“ With a mild perverted impulse Ichigo eyed Unohana’s exposed cleavage, her voluptuous rear, gorgeous face, and even her feet for a moment. The woman was stunning in the greatest sense of the word, but this had come from out of nowhere!

The giantess hid her lips with a finger and giggled, “Relax Kurosaki, I’m flattered you consider me attractive but that is not what I meant. I meant sleep in a literal way. I couldn’t exactly place you in the Medical Ward at this size, nor could I trust you alone outside. There’s too much danger out there for now. Of course, if you’d rather rest with another I more than understand.” The entire time Unohana spoke she gave off that motherly kindness that soothed Ichigo.

“O-Oh…uh sorry about that. Anyway yeah! It sounds like a good idea to me, I’m beat!” Ichigo grinned stupidly.

Unohana flexed her toes with a smile, “I’d bet, but I must thank you again. Never have my feet looked and felt so wonderful. I can actually see myself in my toe nails! I can’t blame Captain Soi Fon for what she did, if these minor things feel this amazing I can only imagine the greater…” Ichigo turned as white as a ghost. “But I won’t do that to you Kurosaki; that violates my Medical Oath.”

Ichigo sighed in relief, “Good…”

“Plus I’m grateful…so I wish to give you a reward Ichigo…” Ichigo looked confused as Unohana brought him closer to her face, but it quickly became apparent what she intended to do. With the utmost caution, Unohana planted a firm kiss along Ichigo’s entire body. The two soft, pink cushions threatened to swallow the Shinigami whole, both metaphorically and literally. Someone as attractive as Unohana kissing Ichigo? Even if he didn’t realize she was beautiful the young Shinigami would’ve been happy as can be at the gracious gift. But just as quickly as it came, Unohana finished. Even if it didn’t feel 100% right, Ichigo was saddened by that. In the end, he was a teenage boy after all.

Both were blushing at one another, “That felt nice…” Unohana smiled. “Y-Yeah…” Ichigo muttered.

The awkward silence followed, Ichigo breaking it. “Uh…does Isane know I’m here?”

Unohana shook her head, “No, she is an excellent medical officer but she’s…how should I say this…”

“A klutz?”

“Exactly.”

Outside the window the sun had finally set, now the moon was on the rise. Unohana looked even more beautiful in its bask, “We just seem to keep stalling don’t we?” She chuckled.

Without further adieu Unohana stood back up, stepping towards her bed. “I’m going to have to keep you close to my bed Kurosaki for safety reasons. So if you have any troubles whatsoever, please flicker your Spiritual Pressure, or do something that awakens me. I’ll assist you right away.”

Ichigo nodded at the giantess, “Can do, but where will I sleep?”

Unohana froze, he raised a good question…where would she place Ichigo for the night?

1233211112122212121112211.content:
The night went by unexpectedly well considering how Ichigo’s last few days have been. No nightmares, no horrific images of Soi Fon torturing him; no, it was only dreams of him…and Unohana. He was still shrunken, still at her feet, only he was happy…no…not just that, he was content. He was happy with her. Ichigo didn’t mind one bit as his dreams had him massage, paint, and even kiss Unohana’s delicate soles. Ichigo, without hesitation, buried his face into the vastness of the Captain’s foot. In his dreams Ichigo not only loved being small, he loved being at Unohana’s feet. Was his subconscious trying to tell him something? It felt as if Ichigo was on the verge of grasping an important truth, and that was when the stirrings of a particular giantess awoke him.

The loud sound of Unohana’s yawns made Ichigo’s sock-bed vibrate with sound waves. Not only waking him up, but giving him a small vibration too. If that did nothing though, Unohana’s foot was on the move and it would have done the trick. The dream still fresh in his mind Ichigo looked at Unohana’s toes. It was dark, but there was a small amount of light coming through the sock between Unohana’s toes. What Ichigo saw was…beautiful. At some point over the night Unohana grew a bit hot, and sweated a bit; most notably her feet given where Ichigo was. But it didn’t disgust him; in fact, it seemed sort of…attractive. The dim lighting along with the shimmer of foot sweat gave Unohana’s feet the oddest of allures…Ichigo was turned on. Heck, his clothes had some sweat soaked in them and he didn’t even mind that!

“Careful Ichi-toe.” Unohana cooed as she slowly removed her foot from her sock. A blinding light made Ichigo cover his eyes; taking several moments to adjust, Ichigo slowly began to see Unohana in the outside world, and the light…with its blinding white rays gave her an almost…divine look. Through the opening of her sock Unohana and Ichigo looked at one another, and Ichigo realized what his dreams meant. “He may have had a thing for feet at his size, he may have a foot fetish, but that wasn’t important. What was was the fact that it was the owner of the feet he was attracted too. At some point he developed a gigantic crush on Unohana…maybe even loved her. Even if it was just her toes Ichigo wanted to be with her…with an inner awe he realized this.

The Goddess outside smiled at Ichigo, “Ready for another sparring session Ichi-toe?”

Ichigo smirked, “Looks like my nickname is sticking eh? Ah well, when I win I’ll make sure you stop calling me that.”

Unohana lifted her sock up, “In that case, let’s fight!” As expected of an enemy Unohana immediately turned her sock over, letting gravity get Ichigo out of there. Being a Shinigami he managed to land unharmed, but fast behind him was a barefoot at a million miles an hour. Ichigo expected this though, and shunpo’d away in the nick of time. He’d learned from yesterday, and came up with a strategy. Unohana could step on him if something was in the way, right? So he reappeared beneath her bed.

Far above came Unohana’s comment on the plan, “I see you’ve got a plan this time Ichi-toe, glad to see you’re focusing this time. I enjoy a good challenge.”

From beneath Unohana’s bed Ichigo watched the giantess’ bare feet step around the bed. He could feel an inner craving stirring around, a lust for those feet. But he held it in, his love for winning a fight toppled it a hundred times over. Soon they stopped at a certain spot though, what was Unohana planning? It was quickly revealed when, with one single hand, Unohana lifted her bed up. The thought of that never came across Ichigo’s mind, he was stunned. And in that moment Unohana gave one firm stomp, sealing her victory.

She wore her soft, motherly smile at Ichigo, “I win.” She chuckled, twisting her foot around playfully.

Unlike before, Ichigo laughed at his defeat “Yeah! Looks like I got my ass kicked again Unohana-chan. What now? I did lose, so what do I gotta do?”

There was only one thing bothering her, Unohana decided to further test whether or not Ichigo truly loved her feet. “I won’t make you pay a huge price Ichi-toe. All I ask is that you kiss my foot.”

It was like an arrow shot Ichigo in the head, “C-Come again?”

“You heard me.” Unohana applied slight pressure.

Ichigo looked questioningly at Unohana’s bare sole before him, his heart said do it, his mind questioned why. It was pretty much agreed on though that Unohana wouldn’t be too happy if he didn’t do it. So Ichigo puckered up and planted a nice kiss right on Unohana’s soles. She only asked for one so he stopped there, but as he pulled away the Shinigami unconsciously had his tongue lick where he had just kissed. He didn’t do that, apparently his body’s lust had been great enough to force itself.

Unohana noticed this, it utterly confirming her idea that Ichigo loved her feet. But she didn’t mention it to him, she simply removed her foot. “Thank you Ichi-toe, but now I have some bad news.”

“What bad news?”

He isn’t going to like this…”As much as treating you matters to me, I do have other duties to fulfill as Captain of Fourth Squad. I have to leave in less than an hour.”

Ichigo’s eyes widened, “But you can’t just leave me! I’m a patient!” What the hell am I saying?

Unohana solemnly shook her head, “I’m well aware, which is why I’ve decided…

1233211112122212121112212.content:
Not even minutes after the lights went out Unohana was snoring soundly, but beneath a couple of her toes, Ichigo was deep in thought. His time with Unohana was a true pleasure…but did he really like her feet? Here he was in her sock of all things, using her big and second toes like a blanket! Did he really have a latent foot fetish? That question prevented anything even remotely resembling sleep from coming. Within the dark confines of Unohana’s sock Ichigo couldn’t exactly get his mind off of it either; every time he tried his eyes would wander to the soft, delicate soles of the Captain and with a blush Ichigo would avert his gaze and ask himself yet again.

Still…Unohana’s sock and toes were kinda comfy, Ichigo didn’t exactly mind his position too much. When he would finally get to sleep he would no doubt be as comfortable as if he were in a bed. Even if things were a bit…odd, Unohana was treating Ichigo well; the exact opposite of Soi Fon. Man, just the lingering memory of what she was doing made Ichigo shiver. He probably would’ve ended up living a lifetime of eating gunk off her feet for survival, and being only an inch to half of one tall Soi Fon would abuse him to no end with only a single toe. Thank god she couldn’t find him though…

Tap

It was a small, almost unnoticeable sound; but at Ichigo’s size it stood out like a sore thumb. The sound of something landing against the wooden floors…There was a faint Reiatsu, heavily but not completely concealed; someone was there, someone who didn’t belong.

Whoever it was was a master of stealth, Unohana didn’t so much as move in response to the intruder. Ichigo couldn’t handle someone of this level at his size…he’d need to awaken Unohana, but before that he had one question to settle…He tried to look through the fibers of Unohana’s sock for the intruder, after having worked himself free of Unohana’s toes.. Instantly their silhouette stood out in the shadows, a shape Ichigo recognized right away. Wearing a fear filled expression Ichigo jumped all the way back between Unohana’s toes. Damn!! She found me!! I-I have to warn Unohana!!

He remembered what Unohana’s advice was if something was amiss, sharpen his Reiatsu to grab her attention. His focus was essentially shattered from what he saw but Ichigo knew how to flare his energy. He started building it up, slowly dispersing it in small waves; almost like a smoke signal. But the rest was getting built up, for one big Reiatsu Alarm Clock.

He was almost there too, but his method also got the intruder’s attention. With a simple pinch between Unohana’s toes they had captured Ichigo and stopped his plan. To ensure he wouldn’t continue trying, the person applied a heavy force on Ichigo’s torso, literally leaving him breathless. Ever so gently the person began using their grip on the sock (And Ichigo) to remove it. They were very delicate, as if performing surgery; after all, a single mishap would awaken the Captain of Fourth Squad. Ichigo prayed that would happen, it didn’t. To his utter horror the intruder had Unohana’s sock completely off, with Ichigo inside. And with their stealthy skills they vanished out of the room in a heartbeat.

Not even a moment passed before the intruder was before their own room, having used a very high level Shunpo. A sneer escaped their mouth as they reached their fingers within the sock. Coming out with them was the shrunken form of Ichigo, not even the size of their pinky. Ichigo was literally ghost white as he looked into his captor’s face.

“Did you think you can escape your Goddess?” Soi Fon laughed.

Ichigo struggled for freedom, “Let go of me you bitch!”

He was answered by Soi Fon applying enough pressure to break bones, but with her precision it didn’t…at least not yet. “Don’t talk to me like that you pathetic insect, you’re my property. Did you really think I would not look for you?”

“When Unohana finds out about this you’re dead!!”

Soi Fon chuckled, “But she won’t find out. You see, I switched her sock with one of the same size and type. One I had a small red splat placed in. When she wakes up she’ll think she crushed you in her sleep, after all…what could be expected of having a bug sleep there?”

Ichigo froze up, if even half of what Soi Fon said was true then he was, utterly and completely, fucked. If he had any hopes of escaping it would have to be by his own hand, “I don’t need her anyway! I got away once, I’ll get away again!”

The giantess smirked, “That was because you had your Bankai activated if memory serves.” Soi Fon pulled out something from her pocket; something Ichigo knew well, Zangetsu. “I happened to find this while looking for you…” The next instant Soi Fon clenched her fist, turning Zangetsu to dust. Seeing his Zanpaktou destroyed seemed like a knife in his heart…without that sword he was practically defenseless.

“No more Bankai…” Soi Fon mocked, “After all, Bankai is a power reserved for Gods, and you are a lowly insect.” Ichigo seemed too stunned to even speak. Soi Fon smiled at that, “And I happened to find you quite a while ago, so I watched…and I noticed some peculiar things.” Soi Fon stepped into her room, sealing the door behind her. “You have a passion for feet…and I find it important for bugs to love what their life will revolve around….Prepare yourself my slave…”

Ichigo, for the first time ever, cowered. He’d run away from Ms. Anger Management…what would she do to him?

Soi Fon sat right on the floor with her back to the wall, "Are you ready?"

123321111212221212111221212.content:
(Warning you now, this chapter has MUCH Blood and Gore, and is too long for one chapter. My apologies on the latter.)

Even though Ichigo didn't say anything else to anger Soi Fon, the giantess had found some reason for her emotions to boil over. The Shinigami expected her to start screaming her lungs off, maybe even torture him; none of that. What was really scary though, was that Soi Fon didn’t even look mad anymore, not even upset…she just seemed to…radiate the darkest aura Ichigo ever encountered. Her eyes casually looked back at Ichigo as if nothing was even there. She was radiating nothing but pure malice…hatred or anger couldn’t even come close to describing her at the moment. “If you’re going to continue to be such an insubordinate bug then I’ll have to show you what I do to such nuisances.” Her voice held no emotion whatsoever, almost like a robot had spoken it.

This new side to Soi Fon scared Ichigo more than he ever thought possible, just looking at her seemed to crush all hope of anything remotely resembling happiness. This was only furthered by the fact Soi Fon had finally placed him at the floor before her toes. With the fear rising they seemed to loom even higher than before to poor Ichigo, and soon they actually would.

“For starters bug, I have to lower the chances of your escape. In fact, I have to crush anything remotely resembling rebellion; so prepare for a second course of what began all this…” Soi Fon pointed her index finger at Ichigo, and he quickly pieced together what she meant. “Wait…do you mean…? NOOO!!!!!” Ichigo’s echoed screams continued as a small azure beam fired from Soi Fon’s finger. It hit Ichigo with perfect precision, and once again he found himself shrinking.

It was a horrifying thing to see, for Ichigo to see Soi Fon’s toes, which started as maybe twice his height, go to the size of towers, and soon enough…mountains. Ichigo paled as he saw specks of dirt that even he couldn’t see before, soon topple him. Soi Fon had become so large he couldn’t see past her feet without things growing to a blur. He was…basically microscopic.

“How does it feel to be a millimeter or even less than that insect?” Soi Fon chided, mocking Ichigo with her still robotically cold voice. “On second thought…a bug outranks you…from now on you’re simply dirt, dirt at my feet. Accept that as the word of your God.”

Ichigo was too awe and fear struck to speak.

“But do not think this is the punishment Dirt, me becoming more of a goddess is hardly a punishment. The punishment comes now…”

Ichigo couldn’t imagine what could be worse than this, he quickly found out. With the same finger she used to shrink Ichigo Soi Fon pinned him, and with her second and third fingernails she pinned each arm. She seemed to softly smile at him, a smile that held nothing but demented pleasure. “Oh how easy this will be…my fingernails could slice you into ribbons my Dirt…but that would not ensure the lesson is learned.” The Goddess’ words got Ichigo to look at his arms, getting cut as if by a blade by the fingernails of God. It was nothing compared to certain battle wounds though, so Ichigo was able to take it like a man. But that wasn’t even the beginning.

With her assassin skills Soi Fon had the utmost precision, her eyes could keep up with the smallest and fastest of things, her hands held the steadiness of surgeons. These two abilities were keys in what she had planned. Very carefully the giantess spread Ichigo’s arms straight out, fingernails still stabbed into his shoulders, with her thumbnail at Ichigo’s throat. What came next seemed too cruel for words…Soi Fon, with her nails still inside Ichigo, used them like blades and began slicing her way towards Ichigo’s hands, leaving a large path of her cut embedded deep into both Ichigo’s arms. Blood squirted out like a fountain, Ichigo screamed with the greatest agony known to humanity. He could feel his bones and muscles getting sliced into pieces by Soi Fon’s nails; and what did the giantess do? She continued to smile as the blood of her dirt got on her fingernails.

Ichigo was biting his lips so hard they had split almost in half, “Please….PLEASE STOP!!!!!!”

Soi Fon batted an eye at him, still proceeding with slicing through Ichigo’s arms and smiling. “This is the price you pay for disobeying God Dirt, and this is only the beginning.” Ichigo wanted to fight back…but the pain was simply too great, and with another blade of a nail at his throat he was pinned down anyway. Utterly powerless as Soi Fon began the next phase.

Her fingernails had finally sliced their way through Ichigo’s arms, basically leaving both limbs halved. But it wasn’t over, Soi Fon brought the same fingernails over Ichigo’s elbows. “I made sure to avoid the bones her Dirt…so I could do this…” Without warning or mercy Soi Fon forced her fingers, not just the fingernails, on Ichigo’s elbows; shattering every bone in the entire arm in a fraction of a second. The pressure was so great that both arms ruptured, splattering blood all over Soi Fon’s fingers, the floor, and of course, Ichigo himself. Ichigo was beyond horrified by this, he was watching as his arms simply…ceased to exist. The blood that once pumped through his own veins was all over his face. And the pain…the pain was so great Ichigo’s mind couldn’t handle it.

“AHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”

All the screaming in the world couldn’t so much as lessen the pain inflicted on the Shinigami. His arms were no more, taken away by his Goddess. He couldn’t move…Ichigo was in so much pain he just twitched while screaming. It wasn’t just a matter of getting shrunken over Yoruichi anymore, Soi Fon in her entire being, despised Ichigo and enjoyed being his God.

Soi Fon didn’t so much as bat an eye, “The Lord giveth…the Lord taketh away…”
123321111212221212111221212.title: True Torture, Pt 1

choices: Spend the night cleaning beneath my toenails as I rest..."
May show your love to my feet while I sleep..."
1233211112122212121112212121.content:
But even that wasn’t the end; Soi Fon gave Ichigo a moment of screaming before whispering, her mere whisper silencing him in fear. “Be silent…I want you to watch this…”

Like a well trained servant Ichigo became silent, looking at what Soi Fon gestured towards…her feet. Both soles were raised over something, and with a blank look of despair Ichigo recognized it. Both feet were hovering over what was left of his arms, the splinters of bones, the blood, and the small stretches of tissue that remained. “I want you to watch as I eradicate this insignificance from the world…” Soi Fon didn’t waste any time, with her God-Sized feet she slammed them both on either side of Ichigo. Her finger served as a divisor so the main body itself wouldn’t be hurt. The cracking…the squelching of his blood…and Soi Fon’s stomp at point blank…his ears were temporarily deafened. With her feet Soi Fon twisted them on what little was left of Ichigo’s arms, in seconds there was no trace they even existed. The Goddess re-raised her feet, the sight enough to bring bile to Ichigo’s mouth. Blood…his blood…the dust that were his bones…they were all over both of Soi Fon’s soles; like a sign of warning, a message to never disobey God.

Soi Fon finally released her finger from Ichigo, and examined her hand. At the tips of her second finger and thumb was the blood of the recently destroyed arms. And what did she do then? Soi Fon poked her slender tongue out and licked both fingers clean. And with the recently cleaned hands she pointed at her feet, “Let that be a warning of why to never cross me. I have no need for you, keeping you alive is only a whim. At any moment I can kill you and never look back, never forget that.” Ichigo was in shock from all he had encountered, unable to respond…unable to even be with reality; but his grand fear allowed Soi Fon’s words to reach him.

The blank empty look Ichigo had was enough to make Soi Fon smirk, “It seems the lesson has been learned…so now Dirt. Lick your vile, wasteful arms off of my feet.”

Not even a second passed before Ichigo rose to his feet, blood dripping from the holes in his torso like a faucet. If he still had Zangetsu his hollow probably would have come by now, and he would regenerate his wounds…but Soi Fon destroyed Zangetsu, it would take time before he would return…and Soi Fon would undoubtedly destroy it again. But as Ichigo walked his way to Soi Fon’s bloody feet, the blood soon stopped dripping. Ichigo was running so low on blood there wasn’t even enough to drip out…it was barely enough to even leave him alive.

He soon arrived before the towering soles; Ichigo looked at them with vague, empty eyes. And without even a hint of hesitation, he began licking his own body parts off of the feet of Soi Fon. His own blood…licked, his own bone dust…licked, Soi Fon’s foot sweat…licked, this was Ichigo’s purpose in life now. He was now, utterly and completely, Dirt.

“Now Dirt, who’s feet are the prettiest and you love the most?”

“Yours my Goddess…”

Soi Fon smirked with victory, Ichigo continued licking. He didn’t even seem to register it was his own arms he was licking off, he just did it. Given his size there wasn’t much to lick off, but even beyond that Ichigo proceeded to lick the rest of Soi Fon’s feet like the pet he was.

Soi Fon had won…he was now her foot dirt.

“It’s getting late Dirt…I’m going to go to sleep now. You can…

123321111212221212111221212112.content:
Both Isane and Unohana exchanged looks, Unohana speaking first. “But what do we do? We have no idea how Captain Soi Fon did this, not to mention how to fix it. And that isn’t even beginning to mention how to treat his mental state.” Isane was silent, wondering the exact same things. The diminutive Ichigo with them stared at the two goddesses with a faint admiration, they were treating him like an actual person…it felt like an eternity since one had done that.

“Um…my goddesses…do you need your feet cleaned? Perhaps some dirt along your soles?” Ichigo asked like an utter servant.

Again the two exchanged a look, Isane speaking first this time. “Man, he’s really in bad shape. We’d better handle his mind first…but what do we do?”

Unohana opened her mouth to speak, but a much louder, much more intimidating voice interrupted her. “I have an idea.”

Everyone looked around to see where the voice came from, but no one was around. It became dreadfully obvious though, when the ceiling was pulled off. Above the Fourth Squad Captain’s chambers was a giantess, the true goddess, Soi Fon, smirking down at the insects by her feet.

“W-What’s going on?!” Isane screamed, Unohana was silent-struck by the turn of events. And Ichigo…his broken mind eyed his goddess with a forced joy.

Soi Fon raised her foot at Isane’s question, “Simple, God is taking her Dirt back.” No remorse, no sign of mercy, Soi Fon stomped her foot and both Isane and Unohana were gone without a fighting chance. Yet somehow Ichigo himself survived, the toes had come millimeters short of crushing him, but his Goddess was merciful.

“My Goddess! You have returned!!”

Soi Fon frowned, “Silence! You dared to escape again…”

“But they did-“

“SILENCE! You disobeyed me, and last time I took it easy, now you must pay with your life.” The giantess raised one toe, her big toe; and with a slight nudge forward she lowered it. Ichigo had no hope of escape, in seconds the toe came upon him and crushed the life force from his body.

------

“WAAH!!!” Ichigo sat up screaming, Soi Fon just killed him…didn’t she? He looked around, quickly recognizing where he was. He was still beneath her toe nail…still armless…

“I must’ve fallen asleep.” He realized, seconds later it was like a light bulb clicked. “Wait!! I never even got to start cleaning my Goddess! There’s no telling how much time has passed, I have to hurry!”

Without delay Ichigo fell to his knees and began licking Soi Fon’s toes clean. Underneath her toe nails you would expect Soi Fon’s feet to be perfectly clean, they weren’t. Dirt, sock lint, crumbs, all sorts of things had found their way their over the years. And they never went anywhere, they simple aged and aged…heck: One of the crumbs appeared almost fifty years old. But this didn’t slow down Ichigo the Dirt one bit, he continued licking like his life depended on it…which it probably did. Fifty year old crumbs, swallowed, sock lint, swallowed, foot sweat, drank. Nothing was left on Soi Fon’s toe aside from Ichigo’s own glistening saliva when he was done. For his own personal bonus Ichigo got on his stomach and hugged Soi Fon’s toe…granted without his arms it wasn’t much of a hug. His dream was still fresh in his mind, like hope was dangled before him and snatched away, leaving him even more broken than before. But Ichigo did love Soi Fon’s feet, that much he knew. Whether it was a foot fetish or his Goddess’ teachings, he didn’t know, nor care. He simply accepted his place beneath Soi Fon.

Enough of his love though, he still had other toes to do. Thankfully he still managed to manipulate his Reiatsu to an extent, allowing him to float towards the next toe and do his job. It didn’t take long before all toes were cleaned, Ichigo was out of saliva, and Soi Fon was worshipped. He collapsed from exhaustion not even a moment later, no dreams this time. It was maybe five hours before he was awoken.


“Wake up Dirt!” Soi Fon yelled, giving her foot a hard shake.

Shaken awake, Ichigo fell out of Soi Fon’s toe nail with a hard thud, landing on the floor. Above he could hear Soi Fon mumbling about how useless he was being.The sudden light blinded him, leaving him unable to even see his Goddess. “Good morning my Goddess…what can I do for you?”

Soi Fon smirked, “That’s more like it! Keep that attitude and things will go smoothly. I want you to begin your day, and I mean every day, not just this one. With…

12332111121222121211122121211221.content:
Not even a second after compliment her Dirt Soi Fon gave a stomp of authority, “Tell me Dirt…are you hungry?”

Ichigo was taken back by the sudden, kind question. “Well…uh…I guess so.” He hadn’t even noticed he was hungry, but now that his goddess mentioned it, he was famished.

Soi Fon closed her eyes, and maybe it was his imagination but Ichigo swore he saw a faint smirk. “I thought so, which is why I had a special something saved up…” Ichigo instantly wonder what, when he saw saw Soi Fon lean her hand forward and drop something. It was something he’d seen a million times over, but at his size it was probably the best meal imaginable; a single potato chip. A massive structure of salty goodness that absolutely dwarfed Ichigo. It landed about thirty yards away with a slight crack, but remained perfectly intact.

Ichigo couldn’t hide his excitement as he began running towards his gift from Soi Fon, but a quick blockade of her foot caused him to stop. “I never said to begin eating, did I Dirt?”

The slave fell to his knees and bowed, “My apologies my goddess…I was impatient.”

Soi Fon grunted, “I suppose I’ll allow it to slide, now…watch and you’ll know why I stopped you.” Ichigo obeyed, and he watched with an eager foot obsession as the towering figure raised her bare foot into the air, and with a single stomp crushed the chip into crumbs. With that same foot Soi Fon loomed over Ichigo’s body, the entire potato chip debris along her sole.

“Now…bon appétit.”

Not just a chip but her feet too?! The slave was going to get spoiled at this rate. With a wide grin Ichigo ran towards his goddess’ soles and began lapping the crumbs off of her smooth luscious soles. The chips tasted amazing…and with Soi Fon’s foot…better. Granted it was likely because he was broken, but the idea didn’t even cross Ichigo’s mind. He just chowed down like the no good dirt he was.

However, it didn’t take long before the great amount of salt intake drew Ichigo to dehydration. Soi Fon seemed to notice this right away and sighed, “You’re lucky I’m in a good mood Dirt…” With a soft sound of phlegm, Soi Fon spat on the floor. “My spit is more than you deserve but I’m feeling generous.”

Ichigo ran to the gooey mountain of Soi Fon’s saliva, “T-Thank you my goddess!!” He screamed as he dunked his head within, drinking it without even a hint of hesitation. Soi Fon just watched with an amazed pleasure, to have broken Ichigo so well so fast…she truly was a god of sorts. Her pride had never felt better than that moment.

After a quick drink of spit Ichigo turned right back around to licking crumbs from the perfection that was his goddess’ feet. His life would be like this forever, living off of dirt at Soi Fon’s feet, dirt such as himself. And in his broken state, Ichigo felt happy about that. It wasn’t long before Ichigo got every single crumb, Soi Fon began to pull her foot away but Ichigo held on dearly. “Please my goddess! Not yet!! I wish to spend more time in your presence, I want to finish cleaning your feet!”

Soi Fon frowned, but on the inside she smirked. “Is that so? Well prove it, beg.”

Ichigo complied right away, “Please Goddess Soi Fon! Allow me the honor or worshipping you…of worshipping perfection! I’ll do anything!”

It was short but it did the trick, “Very well then.”

Ichigo let out a short cheer as he proceeded to continue licking Soi Fon’s foot. His true love in life was her after all…odd how it felt like it wasn’t always like this. Ichigo couldn’t remember what came before, not anymore. Unknown to him the trauma was so great he blocked it out, the trauma of going from hero to dirt. Leaving this mere shell of a man, a mere pet. But at least Ichigo…or it would be more appropriate to refer to him as Dirt now, was happy.

It didn’t even take an hour before Soi Fon’s soles were glistening with the love filled saliva of her pet.

“Good job Dirt, but I already have another task for you…”

“What is it my Goddess?”
