“Five more minutes…” Rangiku pleaded, while sleep-rolling over and placing a pillow over her head. Ichigo climbed over to stand in front of her ear. He gathered his breath and screamed as loud as he could: “RANGIKU!” She immediately sat up to full attention while saluting “I was in no way sleeping, sir!” Rangiku declared with authority, looked around, and didn’t see anyone, than flopped back down.

The sudden movement caused Ichigo to grab a strand of her wavy hair and pull as hard as he could! There aren’t many things that can get Rangiku’s attention, but damage to her hair is one of them! Rangiku quickly grabbed the strand of hair and a mirror to observe the damage, as if contemplating whither surgery would be necessary to ensure the health of the hair follicle.

“It’s all right; you’re going to be fine! I’ll take good care of you.” Rangiku looked down in concern. “All right, it worked!” Ichigo felt a sense of happiness…until realizing she was talking about her strand of hair. She got up and walked over to the bookshelf and pulled a book out, Ichigo watched in amazement while clinging to her strand of hair, as the entire bookcase raised and displayed hidden shelves of hair care products! She immediately moved to the product she needed and walked over to the desk. She positioned the spray over her hair strand but before she could spray, Ichigo jumped on the top of her nose.

“IT’S ME! ICHIGO! DON’T YOU REMEMBER ME? RANGIKU!” Ichigo waved In hopes of getting her attention but Rangiku was in her own world. She held the mirror up to make sure her hair was fine but then suddenly, the color left her face as she stared in the mirror at the tiny thing on her nose. “B…B…BUG!” She screamed and jumped back as Ichigo landed on the desk. “DO BUGS TALK IDIOT!?” Ichigo didn’t notice Rangiku position the spray bottle at his side until it was too late.

A wave of fog dispensed in his direction with the force of high speed winds that pushed him along the desk. The fog stopped and Ichigo coughed while feeling the sticky substance engulfing him, but before he could recover, the bottle was positioned over him at an angle that again sprayed him further across the desk. “YA! TAKE THAT! AND THIS! AND ONE OF THESE!” Rangiku screamed and emphasized each spray just as Ichigo was about to move, while she was in her obviously drunken, but cheerful state. This was now fun to her! The force of the spray at an angle was pushing the bug across the desk. Rangiku stopped for a moment to laugh obnoxiously at the little bug and give it a tiny bit of hope of escape.

Ichigo gathered his last bit of strength to jump towards the door, but the distance he could cover was nothing compared to hers. The spray bottle appeared at the closest range it had ever been before. “HEY BUDDY! GOT SOMETHING FOR YAAAA!” Rangiku screamed while pushing down the nozzle, forcing Ichigo into the wall. Rangiku laughed while seeing the bug slide down the wall slightly, but realizing it stuck firmly to the wall due to the range and force of the blast! She continued to spray little mists on him at a distance, just to see him squirm in-between his coughs. This was all justifiable to her; a woman's hair is sacred!

After thoroughly enjoying herself, Rangiku walked over while she tried not to fall down. She pushed her hand against the wall on the side where the bug was as she leaned in to get a good look at it before she’d give it the final spray; now feeling the full effects of her drunkenness. “Hay dar yur kinda dorable aint ya?” She laughed and pointed the can directly on top of him at close range. “Wel lats se ya try ta survive one of thes N YUR FACE!” Rangiku laughed in Ichigo's face with her breath covering him as he prepared for the eventual final spray but...
1233211122.title: Rangiku is waken up...by a bug!?

choices: I gotta finish you off with the spray
I think you'll make a good bug boy pet!
12332111221.content:
Placing the nozzle of her spray bottle just short of Ichigo's face, he could smell its strong scent envelop him, now he smelled like a store fragrance department. Looking somewhat serious despite being drunk Rangiku leaned forward, staring deeply at Ichigo.

"You're a weird bug...what are you?" The wafting air of heavy alcohol emenated from Rangiku's breath, making Ichigo almost get second hand drunk himself.

He shook his head, ridding himself of any drunken feeling he was getting. "I'm not a bug I'm a person, er Shinigami.....whatever! Point is it's me Ichigo!"

Matsumoto shook her head, several strands of her long hair falling down and landing on the floor, Ichigo couldn't help but marvel at their size. "Hahahaha! That's a good one buggy boo, but Itsigo is as tall as I am. I'm not sure if your as big as my toe!"

Ichigo's eyebrow twitched in anger, a clear anger mark on his cheek, "Itsigo? Toe?" He was about to yell but instead he took the high road, taking a deep breath and answering Rangiku. "It is me Ichigo. I just got shrunk by Soi Fon!"

Matsumoto stared at Ichigo blankly, "Shrunk....by Cappytain Soi Fon? That is possible?"

Ichigo placed a hand on the bridge of his nose, wiping in frustration. Matsumoto's drunken speaking was annoying not to mention the heavy smell of alcohol. "Yeah it's possible, please help me out."

For a moment it looked like Rangiku sobered up but nope! Instead she once again started laughing, "Good one! I almost bought it! Cappytain Soi Fon can't shrink Itsigo, he'd whip her ass. Good story though."

Again appearing angry Ichigo muttered under his breath several curses, coupled with a promise of vengeance on Soi Fon. Raising his head moments later he looked into Rangiku's curious eyes. "Will you help me?"

Matsumoto shook her head, "Nope!"

Ichigo finally snapped, "Why the hell not!!!?!?"

Matsumoto chuckled, "Duh! Because.....
12332111221.title: Chat with a drunkard

choices: Rangiku realizes Ichigo has a point
12332111222.content:
"AND TAKE THIS!!!" Rangiku dramatically slammed her thumb onto nozzle, wincing Ichigo closed his eyes and flinched; he'd been hit in the face with spray before....it hurt like hell, and at his size it would hurt a lot more. But what was expected to be a torrent of disgusting yet oddly sweet smelling liquid came out only as a couple drops that even to Ichigo were nothing.

"Huh? Did I push too hard?" Rangiku again pushed down on the nozzle, and again, repeating until about three minutes later she realized it had run out of its liquid.

Ichigo sighed in relief, no spray meant he was safe right? The shrunken strawberry's happiness was cut short when Rangiko made an angry sort of groaning noise, "URGH! THAT WAS MY FAVORITE SPRAY!!!!! DAMN YOU!"

Ichigo's eyes narrowed into a blank stare, "She is blaming me because she was too drunk to realize she was using up her favorite perfume?" His voice sounded very sarcastic, to the point where it wasn't even funny.

Somehow Rangiku heard him, "Are you mocking me!? I could crush you beneath my sandal!" Any witty sarcastic expression Ichigo had vanished, along with any color he had.

With a short hiccup Rangiku smirked, "That's right you........hic naughty bug boy thing. Respect me, love me and all that good stuff..."

Ichigo didn't say anything aloud, but he was thinking some rather sarcastic thoughts. With a thud he finally fell from the wall onto the floor, before Rangiku's sandal sock clad feet.

"I could just crush your itty bitty body beneath my smelly foot." Rangiku repeated, raising her foot and hovering over Ichigo for emphasis.

The shinigami crossed his fingers, "Please don't fall." His prayers were answered, although drunk Matsumoto kept her balance, but still hovering her foot above Ichigo.

"I could just crush you..........." With a hiccup Rangiku giggled somewhat weakly, it hit Ichigo she was considering crushing him!

"Wait Rangiku! Think about this! Do bugs talk!?" Ichigo plead, Rangiku's foot slowly coming for him.
12332111222.title: Out of spray, no choice but to crush then.

choices: Rangiku catches the two "bugs" and puts them in the empty spray bottle (pets)
They split up. one looks for help returning to normal and one distracts Rangiku
123321112221.content:
read the story "Cracked Mask" on FanFiction.Net before reading this. Here's the link:
http://www.fanfiction.net/s/4867126/1/Cr...
--------------------------------------------
Rangiku lowered her foot and Ichigo screamed but an Arrancar saved him. His rescuer's mask piece made a half-circle around his right eye, while a bottom portion rested on his upper right lip, with a few short teeth. It continued towards his right ear, covering the back of it and ending at a point. His hole was around his upper right pectoral, and wore a open white vest and white pants that were a little baggy for him. As for his face, he had red rings around both blue eyes and six odd whisker-like marks on his face, three on each cheek. On his head was short, blond, spiky hair.

It was the Medio-Espada, Naruto Uzumaki.

"Ichigo...NEVER try and reason with a big-brested drunken woman. Trust me, when I was alive I got more then enough experience with that." Naruto sighed.

"What the? Your the same size I am!" Ichigo shouted.

"LOOK OUT!"
123321112221.title: A reliable alley

choices: Now she finally sobers up and realizes just what her pets are
Still drunk Rangiku tests her pets out
1233211122211.content:
Ichigo turned around, Naruto's sudden warning gave him enough time to see Matsumoto's hand skidding across the ground towards him, but not enough for him get away. Without any sort of resistance Matsumoto's hand slammed into Ichigo and pulled him along with it into the air.

Seeing his companion endangered Naruto used a quick Sonido to arrive at Matsumoto's hand, she had already clenched her fist around Ichigo so the arrancar began tugging futilely at her thumb.

Ichigo swatted his hand at Naruto, "Go! I'm done for!"

The arrancar shook his head, "No way! If I do I can never live with myself!"

Both fell silent, mutual respect for the others selflessness. What else would ruin this moment but Rangiku bringing her hand to eye level and seeing the two bugs. "Aww! One bug came to saves his other fwend." Both shrunken people turned to one another, somewhat annoyed by Rangiku's drunken dialect,

"She must be a hell of a drinker to still be able to speak somewhat normally." Naruto marveled, in response Ichigo nodded once.

Any further speech between the two was cut off when Rangiku bought her free hand into view, in it was her empty spray bottle, the lid was off.

Both men turned pale, "She isn't......." but of course Rangiku did, she placed the two inside her empty spray bottle and quickly put the lid back on. Smiling in delight Rangiku shook the container like a toy, "And now I got two pet bugs!"

Looking at one another in their prison Naruto and Ichigo both wore the same expression, one of annoyance in a comedic form. "She knows bugs cant talk right?"

Ichigo nodded, "And yet she did it anyway."

"Shinigami are dangerous."

All the memories of his adventures while little came into view, Ichigo chuckled at Naruto's comment, "You have no idea."

"Hey no conspiring and what not!" Rangiku yelled, tapping the glass on the container.
1233211122211.title: Captured

12332111222112.content:
Rangiku set the container with her two pets inside of it on her desk and then pulled out a fresh sake bottle. Even by normal sized standards, it looked big enough for six gallons!

Seeing the size of the sake bottle, Ichigo's jaw dropped.

"Sheesh, she drinks almost as much as Tsunade-Baa-chan." Naruto said, rolling his eyes.

"Huh?" Ichigo asked "ALMOST?!"

"Never mind, just thinking about when I was alive for a second." Naruto said as Rangiku downed 3/5ths of the sake. The two were brought out of there conversation as a flushed Rangiku put her sake away and picked up they're prison.

"A itty-bitty black bug and a teen-tiny white bug...and they're both my pets. I know I'll test them to see how fun my pets are!" Rangiku said, making the shinigami and arrancar pale.

"But how should I test my pets? One then the other or both at once?" the drunken giantess wonders.

After thinking about it, Rangiku decided to...
12332111222112.title: Rangiku tests her pets

123321112221121.content:
As Rangiku was trying to decide which bug to test the two were devising an escape plan. the plan went something like this, when the Fuku-taicho opened the lid they would make a break for it towards the nearest exit. It might not be the most inventive plan but some times simple works best.

But before the two could prepare themselves to enact their idea they were thrown all about the bottle, the reason for this was that Rangiku was holding the bottle and idly moving her hand from side to side without even thinking about it.

This lasted for around two minutes by that time Naruto and Ichigo were so dizzy they could barely stand stand straight much less try to run away from the sloshed Shinigami.

It looked as tho the 10Th division second in command had come up with her choice of whom to test first, the busty blond tilted the spent perfume bottle upsides down towards her hand. Her choice is ?
123321112221121.title: test one then the other

choices: Naruto's got the mouth, Ichigo has the feet
Ichigo has her mouth, Naruto has Matsumoto's feet
123321112221122.content:
Remaining silent for a moment Rangiku's lips started to curl up into a smile, a smile that sent shivers down her pets spines.

"I haven't seen a smile that creepy in a long time...." Naruto muttered, his fist trembling slightly. Ichigo smiled nervously, "I don't think I've had the pleasure of seeing something like that." Naruto looked at him weakly, "You're lucky."

Matsumoto finally spoke, her unusual drunken dialect becoming crystal clear. "I'll play with both of you at once. Since you bugs are smart enough to talk I'm sure you're smart enough to be slaves."

Ichigo chuckled nervously, "In a messed up way that makes a ton of sense."

His companion nodded, "Yeah...."

The giantess continued, "Of course I still have to pick what to do with you and I have just the thing." Before continuing the drunk girl bent over, giving both her pets a very nice view of her massive cleavage. Both shrunken men turned bright pink and suppressed a nosebleed, trying their best not to stare,

Blissfully unaware of this fact Matsumoto placed her finger on her left sandal, pulling it away from beneath her feet and carelessly tossing it behind her, she did like wise with the other. Now with two sock covered feet Rangiku placed her finger at the edges, pulling off the socks too. In a similar manner to her sandals Matsumoto removed her socks revealing her bare feet, both shrunken men paled at the site of the two massive lint and probably sweaty feet before them.

With that done Matsumoto smirked, slowly rising back up. "I'm sure you get it, one of you guys will be at my feet. Giving em the best treatment ever, kissing,licking, the whole deal. Wait do bugs have lips?"

The two pets, clearly angry screamed in unison, "WE ARE NOT BUGS!!"

Matsumoto chuckled at this, "Then you can kiss them after all." Again the two paled, giving Rangiku a quick laugh, "Don't worry only one of you will be doing my feet. The other has another interesting task." Opening her mouth Matsumoto pointed at the innards of it, her teeth,tongue, gums all of it. "One of ya is going to be cleaning all of it."

Naruto and Ichigo both turned white as ghosts, Naruto muttering about how amazing it was Matsumoto could speak so clearly while being so clearly drunk.

Not registering that comment Matsumoto smirked, "Now, who does what?" Without waiting Matsumoto chose....
123321112221122.title: Two Slaves, Two Different Tasks

choices: Paper! Naruto is the safe one!
1233211122212.content:
Quickly turning his head Ichigo saw Matsumoto's foot once again coming in, trying to squish him. Too shocked to move it was Naruto's quick reaction that saved him, literally in one second Naruto vanished, the next he was half a mile away with Ichigo's wrist in hand.

Staring suspicously at the arrancar Ichigo kept running, asking questions along the way. "Whats your name?"

Not taking his gaze away from the front Naruto replied, "Naruto, I'm an arrancar."

Ichigo showed no signs of surprise, in fact the only action he took was a quick glance back at Rangiku who in her drunken state had no idea where the 'bugs' went.

"What's your story?"

The arrancar chuckled, "We're on the run and you're asking me about my life?"

The shrunken shinigami shrugged, "I gotta know I if I can trust you."

Naruto turned his head, his bright blue eyes focused into Ichigo's brown. " It's too long for explanation, let's just say I've had it rough, and I'm looking for someone."

The arrancar stopped running, Ichigo did the same. "And your size?"

"Problem while looking." Naruto stated flatly, turning back in Matsumoto's direction. "We're gonna have to go back to her."

He was about to argue the point but before he did Ichigo turned around and saw the problem, the door, their only exit was blocked by Rangiku. He looked calm, hiding whatever nervousness he felt. "Someone's gonna have to be bait."

Naruto nodded, "Yeah....What do you think she'd do if she catches the bait?"

Ichigo shrugged, "While drunk? Who knows."

"Sober?"

Ichigo chuckled, "Who knows."

Like his Shinigami associate Naruto chuckled, "That's reassuring. But who's gonna take a hit for the team?"

The two stared at one another, an eerie wind blowing during their silence. Disrupting their moment the two ran to each other and comically started playing rock-paper-scissors. In perfect unison the two said, "1-2-3 GO! 1-2-3 GO!" Each round they played resulted in a tie until....
1233211122212.title: Who's gonna take one for the team?

choices: follow Ichigo as he looks for help
follow Naruto as he plays keep-away from the giant Rangiku
12332111222121.content:
Ichigo was relieved when he saw Naruto had scissors and he had rock.

"Hey, what was that red energy on your hand right before you made scissors?" Ichigo asked.

"Red...energy..."Naruto said faintly then shut his eyes. Ichigo wondered what he was doing.

In his mindscape, the outraged Arrancar was shouting at a very large, nine-tailed fox.

"YOU RIGGED IT!"

"You said you had experience, so you were the idle choice." the fox replied.

Opening his eyes, Naruto sighed and gave Ichigo some advice. "Good luck, just stay away from anyone's feet and that squad 12 captain guy and you might make it out alright. HE'S the guy who did this to me." the Arrancar said.

Ichigo nodded, "Same to you, and don't get caught, I'll be back as soon as I can."

With a sigh, Naruto used a quick Sonido to arrive at Matsumoto, then dashed off with her giving chase to the shrunken Arrancar, her booze-effected brain still thinking he was a bug.

As his...was it too early to say comrade?...ran from Rangiku, Ichigo escaped to find help.
12332111222121.title: DAMN THE KYUUBI!

123321112221211.content:
Parting ways with his comrade Ichigo took off for the door, enhanced by the speed of his bankai he was making great time. Out of the corner of his eye he saw Naruto distracting Rangiku, running and jumping all over, and whenever she got too close....Sonido.

"I'll be back in time." He told himself, crawling under the door and arriving into an open hall. Arriving in the open space Ichigo looked around for some form of help, the hallway had a fair number of people in it but they were all nobodies, guys who Ichigo never really met. If they were below third seat he hadn't met them, and that also doubled as meaning that they wouldn't be able to stop Matsumoto either.

Seeing his new comrade exit Naruto muttered under his breath, "Good Luck." before using Sonido to vanish once more.

The shrunken Shinigami had to find someone quick so Ichigo started flash stepping his way around, lucky for him his great speed was enabling him to move at the speed normal people could walk, exhausting as it was for him it was good distance in retrospect.

He ran and turned a corner, more unknown faces. It didn't take long before Ichigo stepped out of the Squad 10 Barracks entirely, at this point he was running randomly in the Seireitei for some form of help. Someone who would save Naruto from Rangiku's rampage, arrancar or no Ichigo owed him big.

Turning down another corner Ichigo finally found one who could help, or so he hoped.
123321112221211.title: Search for Help

choices: Momo dashes to Rangiku's office to help Naruto
1233211122212111.content:
Ichigo crashed into someone's foot and was gently picked up (the person kept they're hand open, something Ichigo felt grateful for) and he was brought face-to-face with a brown-eyed female Shinigami that looked at him oddly. She wore plan Shinigami robes and her dark hair was pulled into a bun held in a tied cloth. She was wearing the 5th Division's lieutenant armband. Ichigo felt relief for the first time since this whole mess started, a lieutenant! One major drawback though...he hadn't met her before!

"Hello Mr.Kurosak, I'm lieutenant Momo Hinamori. Before you ask, I've always been good at kidö and detecting reiatsu." Momo said.

Ichigo felt his hopes rise. This girl was GOOD! Even for a lieutenant!

"So you'd like being taken to Unohana for a cure immediately." Momo said.

"No time!" Ichigo explained Naruto's problem (leaving out the fact that Naruto was an Arrancar).

Momo paled.

"Rangiku's been drinking AGAIN? And a friend of yours shrunk to the same size your at right now and is keeping her busy?!"
1233211122212111.title: Momo Hinamori

choices: I'm sorry. I jumped to conclusions.
Then you're as guilty as he is!
12332111222121111.content:
After Ichigo confirmed his story Momo wasted no time in running to the tenth squad barracks, to keep the shrunken Shinigami safe she placed him on her head, where he held on tightly to her blackish purple hair.

"Faster. Use Shunpo!" Ichigo yelled, clearly concerned for his comrades safety.

Momo didn't shake her head for Ichigo's sake but did express her opinion, "No, If I do I just may pass it. We're closer than you think."

As it turned out the distance Ichigo covered wasn't as great as he thought, without a single flash step Momo simply ran and arrived at the door Ichigo exited in a measly ten minutes.

<i> Man I feel small </i> Before the door Momo, careful not to jostle her head too much asked Ichigo whether or not this was the right room. Staring at the door Ichigo was certain, "Yeah, she's in there with Naruto."

Sliding the door open Hinamori entered, Ichigo leapt up, looking for Rangiku. She was found in a corner, her foot unexpliticly bare and raised, like she was going to stomp on something. Realizing what Rangiku was about to do Momo dashed forward and literally tackled her over, the sudden leap caused Ichigo to fall back to the floor; next to Naruto ironically.

"I see you got help." He noted, somewhat relieved he just avoided death beneath a Shinigami's sole.

The shrunken Shinigami nodded once, "Yeah, I got lucky too. I found her just in time to save you."

The arrancar flashed a toothy grin, "Thanks!"

Ichigo was taken aback. "What? Is there something on my face?" Naruto started rubbing a hand over his face looking for such a thing.

"N-No, it's just....you seem human. I feel like I'm talking with another guy my age instead of an arrancar."

Naruto smirked, "Age means nothing. I've been around for ages and I'm still the same as I was when I was 16."

As the two talked Hinamori came back into view, behind her was a passed out Rangiku. "She drank so much she passed out from the tackle." She explained.

Suddenly her attention turned to Naruto, her eyes with their heavy bags beneath them looked horrified, "An arrancar?! You had me save an arrancar?! The enemy!?"

The shinigami stepped forward, "He's different! He's.....my friend." Ichigo turned around, sharing a touching moment with his new friend.

Momo paused....finally saying....
12332111222121111.title: Saved at last

choices: Momo gives Ichigo to Unohana to be cured, but Momo keeps Naruto for herself!
Just great! Hollows are invading and Momo's needed in battle!
123321112221211111.content:
"I'm sorry. I jumped to conclusions. I'm lieutenant Momo Hinamori."

"Naruto Uzumaki, the Medio-Espada, pleasure to meet you Ms. Momo Hinamori." Naruto said pleasantly.

Momo's eyes went wide at hearing who this Arrancar was. Dropping onto her hands and knees, Momo looked at Naruto intensely.

"The half-Espada? As in the shinigami-like Arrancar? The double-agent helping against Captain Aizen because he wants to protect humans living or dead?"

"Captain Aizen? Wait...he was the 5th division's captain? No wonder your a wreck, he tried killing you didn't he." Naruto said, it wasn't a question.

Momo nodded.

Naruto cluched at his lung, and Ichigo swore he heard the name "Sasuke."

"Yeah, that's me. Stories that I kill Hollows for going after humans and human spirits are all true." Naruto said.

Momo smiled and picked up Ichigo and Naruto.

"I know about you because I've had to assert myself as leader of the 5th division because of my rank is closest to captain."
123321112221211111.title: She's heard of him

choices: Wonder how Naruto and Momo will be...
1233211122212111111.content:
Holding the shrunken duo in her hand Momo turned around and started heading to the door, both shrunken men exchanged a nervous glance. "Where are we going?" Naruto finally asked.

Hinamori stopped directly before the door exiting the room, "I'm gonna take you to Captain Unohana of course. She has the best chance of fixing you."

Naruto raised his hand like a school boy, "Woudn't she be obligated to you know report me being in the Seireitei? Isn't intrusion basically death penalty?"

Momo stopped, her eyes appearing distant, a weak smile formed along her lips, "She....won't do that..."

"Why?"

In response Momo apparently ignored him, needless to say this did not help Naruto's confidence too much. Wearing a concerned expression Ichigo stepped forward on Momo's hand and patted his friend on the shoulder, "Don't worry. I'm here for you."

Naruto looked at Ichigo, and for a moment he swore he was looking into a mirror of himself as a human. "Thanks.".

Momo proceeded to exit the room, givng the drunk unconcious Matsumoto a worried glance and finally exiting. Slowly closing her hand she whispered under her breath, "You'll be fine." and brought her hands to her chest, making her appear as if she was worriedly searching for someone.

Of course this was a guise but the method of hiding she used essentially placed Ichigo and Naruto against her breasts. The two weren't perverts by any means but the situation was enough to make them blush, Momo herself realized this too and despite blushing slightly she held them where they were, praying neither of them would do anything too naughty.

Soon enough Momo came to the Fourth squad barracks where she safely removed her hands from her chest, positioning Naruto in one and Ichigo in the other. Balancing the two on her open palms Hinamori entered Retsu Unohana's office where she was eagerly greeted.

"Hello Hinamori, you have the look of someone troubled. Can I help you?" Tilting her head slightly to the side Unohana flashed a motherly smile, a smile that said no matter what she would help.

In response Momo placed her hand with Ichigo by Unohana's desk, the shrunken Shinigami getting the hint walked off and onto the wooden object.

Unohana leaned forward, staring sternly and intently at Ichigo. "Hmm......" While Unohana was focused on Ichigo Hinamori quickly grabbed Naruto and slid him behind the sash of her outfit, lucky for her Ichigo was too focused on Unohana's inspection to notice.

Raising back up Unohana clapped her hands once, "This is a simple case of Shrinkage. I can whip up an antidote in a day or so." Ichigo, hearing this started jumping for joy.

The healing captain looked at Momo, "Are there any other cases you're aware of?"

Hinamori quickly and almost suspicously shook her head, "No! Not at all!"

Ichigo was about to raise his thoughts about Naruto but Unohana's booming voice cut off his meager one, "I see. Then please be on the lookout for more cases."

With that Momo quickly exited....
1233211122212111111.title: One to be saved, one to be sacrificed

choices: Momo kisses Naruto and tells him she's keeping him permanently (pet/boyfriend)
meanwhile, Ichigo's told Unohana about Naruto
12332111222121111112.content: Naruto struggled as he tried to get free of the lieutenant's sash. Not only was he a bit steamed that Momo kept Unohana from knowing that he was in the same position as Ichigo, Momo had put him in the part of her sash that was going around her back so he was pinned between the taut fabric and the lieutenant's butt. As Momo walked, the Arrancar found himself trying to hold on as she made her way back to her living quarters in the 5th squad Barracks. She took him out and set him on her bed, telling him to stay put, then left for a few minutes. When she came back into her room, she was in her pajamas, a plain kimono, with her hair tied in a loose ponytail, Naruto noticed she was still wearing her white tabi socks. As Momo sat down in front of him, Naruto couldn't help but find the scent of peach coming off the lieutenant soothing. Relaxing, the two talked about everything they'd both ever gone through, it was surprising how much they had in common. Momo found herself adoring Naruto and vice versa towards her.
12332111222121111112.title: Wonder how Naruto and Momo will be...

123321112221211111121.content:
Walking randomly along the Seireitei Momo held her conversation with Naruto, "Are you comfortable?" She asked worriedly, gesturing to the sash of her outfit she hid Naruto behind.

After a couple minutes of silence he replied, muffled slightly due to his location, "Yeah, but why did you hide me from Unohana?"

Momo stopped dead in her tracks, this was the question she'd hoped to avoid, but she had to tell Naruto. She reached into the sash on her waist, there between her clothing and the sash itself was Naruto who she removed from there.

She stared intently at him and vice versa, it almost seemed as if the two were speaking telekinetically until Momo broke the pattern in the most surprising way. Naruto, in her clenched fist was brought to her mouth and kissed gently.

Removing her lips from the arrancar the girl couldn't help but giggle, what little lip gloss she applied had completely covered his head, effectively hiding Naruto's blood red face. "Erhm......uh.....what.........was that.....for?" The young arrancar was clearly embarrased, he was sweating bullets and fidgeting with his fingers.

Smiling gently Hinamori kissed him again, accidently sliding his head into her mouth for a second. Once again removing Naruto from her lips she finally explained, "I just....I don't want you to return to normal.....not yet anyway."

Still blushing Naruto asked, "Why?"

Now it was Momo's turn to blush, biting her lip nervously she finally mustered up the courage to say what she wanted, "Well....at your size you couldn't say no......"

"No?" The arrancar repeated, tilting his head to the side in an act of confusion.

"You couldn't say no to being my boyfriend slash pet."

Naruto's face now turned so red it was actually clearly visible through Hinamori's lip gloss, "WHAT!?"

Hinamori smiled guiltily, her eyes showing great guilt at her immoral deed. "I'm sorry....but I just couldn't help myself. Before I knew it....I....."

Naruto raised a hand, pointing his palm at Hinamori, "You don't have to continue. I understand."

Hinamori piped up, any guilt vanishing and being replaced with overflowing joy, "You do? Then, you like me too?"

Naruto bit his lip, finally saying one word
123321112221211111121.title: Kept for personal reasons

choices: Momo takes Naruto on a date
Momo heads to a Woman's Shinigami Association meeting
1233211122212111111211.content:
Naruto looked up at Momo and flashed her a fox-smile. An Arrancar in a relationship with a Shinigami...odd thought that it was, he supposed keeping THAT hidden wouldn't be any harder than the fact that he was secretly aiding the Soul Society against Aizen because the former 5th division captain was insane from all of Las Noches.

"Yes."

Momo squealed in delight as she held him against her cheek and nuzzled him with it furiously. When she pulled him away, Naruto asked her an obvious question.

"So...when'd you...you know?"

Momo smiled, that was easy. She used her Kidö to pull up a screen of Naruto 260 years ago, back when he'd first become a Hollow.

"I don't want to eat humans, they're innocent. I'll gain power and devour those like me." the recording said, then it showed how Naruto had stayed in Hueco Mundo until after he was turned into an Arrancar. It then switched to show all the times he gone to the living world, he'd destroyed Hollows and aided the deceased souls.

Putting him back in her sash...
1233211122212111111211.title: Yes

choices: I wanna see how much of a gentleman you are (Various tasks)
I think dinner is in order.
12332111222121111112111.content:
Putting the young arrancar back behind her sash Hinamori for the first time since Aizen's betrayal showed signs of pure happiness, wearing a smile like a teenage girl she whispered to her tiny boyfriend, well technically not boyfriend yet. "Would you like to go....on a date....with me?" As she muttered these words Momo's lip began to quiver and her cheeks flush, luckily for her Naruto was unable to see it.

Naruto was silent for a moment, due to his location Momo couldn't see him and the silence was nerve racking. Minutes later he broke the silence, saying the one thing Momo wanted to hear, "Of course."

Momo literally jumped for joy, the action of doing so caused Naruto to fly from his position into the air.

"Woah!" The arrancar flailed his arms in the air, his survival instincts apparently leaving him

Hinamori with speed worthy of her Lieutenant status safely caught Naruto, holding him on her open palm with a nervous smile, "Sorry. I kinda forgot your size for a moment."

In response Naruto flashed a smile, " Just make sure it doesn't happen again, I got a date to prepare for." His smile vanished, "Speaking of how do we do it? I doubt there are any restaurants in the Seireitei, and if there are any I highly doubt they'll take an arrancar, or even a shrunken arrancar."

Still walking randomly in the Soul Society Momo yet again smiled, this one being a gentle peaceful smile. "Don't worry. I already thought of that and thought of a perfect evening with just the two of us."

Raising an eyebrow with curiousity Naruto couldn't help himself, "What is it?"

Momo brought her free hand before Naruto, wagging her index finger in front of him. "Ah ah ah, you gotta wait and see."

Naruto sat down with a pouty face, "Aww....." Moments later the two laughed. Mere moments after this Hinamori stopped walking, turning away from Hinamori Naruto saw a building with big bold letters spelling out, "Fifth Squad Hall"

Naruto read the words aloud, beginning to form what Hinamori's plan was. "We heading to your room?"

"Be patient." Hinamori flatly stated, again putting Naruto behind her sash to prevent her fellow squadmates from seeing her shrunken companion.

Minutes later Momo arrived before a slide door, in neatly written letters was her name. Poking his head from behind Momo's sash Naruto read the door, "Fancy. Get your own name on the door."

In response Hinamori playfully flicked Naruto with a finger, "Be nice or I'll leave you out here."

Becoming equally playful Naruto turned to face Hinamori, feigning horror "Why you wouldn't!"

Entering her room Momo and Naruto let out a quick laugh, safer to do so in her room after all.

Gently Hinamori reached her hand for Naruto, pulling him out and holding him eye level in her open palm. Seeing the arrancar she couldn't help but plant him another kiss, this one engulfing his whole body.

Removing her lips Hinamori saw Naruto smirking at her, "Isn't the kiss supposed to come after the date?"

"Isn't the guy supposed to be over a foot tall?" Momo retorted, playfully sticking out her tongue.

Naruto shrugged, "Good point, now will you finally tell me what we're gonna do?" Hearing this question yet again Hinamori finally nodded, "First......
12332111222121111112111.title: On the way to Momo's

choices: Give her a foot massage (Naruto decides to do more for her, FULL-BODY massage)
Momo thinks of something else for him to do
123321112221211111121111.content:
"First I wanna see how much of a gentleman you are." Momo said.

Naruto nodded. It was always important to be aware of if your significant other was going to treat you well in a relationship.

"So how am I going to meet up with your standards at showing your important to me...Peachy?" Naruto asked, giving Momo a nickname at the end. Damn Momo was cute when she was flustered!

For her part, Momo fought down her blush tooth-&-nail before answering the Arrancar, who was rather pleased to see her face was still bright pink.

"Well, I was thinking a few tasks to test how well you treat a woman." Momo said.

"Sure. So I'm being graded on how well I do, how good I do, how polite I am, and how well your treated as well as how pleased you are?" Naruto asked.

Momo nodded.

"Ok, so with that covered, what can I do for you first?" Naruto asked.

"Eager to please, aren't you." Momo giggled.

Momo decided that for his first task, she was going to have Naruto...
123321112221211111121111.title: testing the gentleman-factor of her Arrancar

choices: "Good job. Time for our next task"
"I think you missed a few spots."
1233211122212111111211111.content:
Hinamori's face flushed a bit, gently lowering her arrancar boyfriend on the floor she bent over to her sandals. Gently she tugged at the string of it and removed the foot wear from her foot, doing likewise with her other. A few feet in front of Hinamori Naruto watched with a curious expression.

Lowering her hands to the tips of her toes Hinamori began tugging at her socks, slowly removing them and slowly revealing her bare feet. Naruto wasn't a foot fan by any means but Hinamori's just seemed perfect to him, seemingly no specks of anything on her sole,arch, toes anywhere really. Little to no foot sweat, and her toe nails despite lacking nail polish were just the right length to him, a rather attractive feature at his size.

Her face still a tad pink Hinamori lowered herself to the ground, planting her bottom on the floor as she rested her back against a wall, extending her soles in Naruto's direction.

Wearing a somewhat embarassed yet happy smile she gestured to her feet, "Let's see how well you do at foot massages."

Hearing the unusual request Naruto immediately stepped up, arriving just inches away from Hinamori's sole. Instantly he recoiled back and covered his nose in a barrier created by his hands, "They reek!"

Hinamori's face, which just returned back to its regular tone turned bright pink again, her lip seemed to be quivering also. "T-They stink? But I try so hard an-"

Naruto placed a finger against his lips, "Shh.....It's called a joke. They actually smell kinda nice, like flowers."

Frowning yet still pink Hinamori pushed her foot forward, slamming it into Naruto and knocking him back an inch or two from his perspective. "You jerk!" It was clear from her voice she was playing around.

Rising from his encounter with his girlfriends foot the arrancar flashed another smile, "Is that gonna count against me?"

"Depends on how well you do."

Finishing his fun time Naruto finally started walking to Hinamori's foot, this time intending on massaging. Arriving just before the twin towers Naruto started charging his energy into his palms, a little theory he had to test out.

Seeing the crimson energy forming in Naruto's hands Hinamori stared at the two tiny lights as if transfixed, "Naruto?"

The arrancar smirked confidently, "Not the way I normally do this but the hell with it. It should be weak enough to..." without finishing his sentence Naruto pointed his palms at Hinamori's feet, two long thick beams of red energy bursting from his hands to her feet.

Once the two forces collided Hinamori unconciously moaned, blushing a second at the uncontrollable action, "That....felt really good. What did you do?"

Once again flashing a trademark smirk Naruto said, "Cero. At my size works great for a massage tactic." Hinamori smirked too, "Then get to massaging!"

"Yes mam!" Naruto charged another Cero and blasted Hinamori's feet once more.

But thats not all Naruto did to massage his massive girlfriends feet, he ran to them point blank and started rubbing the stress away with his hands. The skin was soft, slightly wet here and there but soft, almost pillow soft.

Hinamori felt her eyes close, Naruto's massage despite his size was amazing, she swore a pro couldn't do as good, then again she'd never really had a foot massage before, the task was just a random thought Hinamori came up with.

Seeing Hinamori's eyes close Naruto felt a chance to go above and beyond. Eyeing Hinamori's left foot, the last one he had to massage and had just in fact finished, he leaned forward and planted a small kiss. Whether Hinamori noticed or not didn't really matter, it didn't hurt to be thorough.

With a sudden Sonido Naruto vanished at Hinamori's feet, reappearing at her calves. His hands at the ready he began rubbing Hinamori's well toned leg, happily humming to himself.

Feeling the change of position Hinamori's eyes flew open, instantly seeing Naruto's white clothed body by her black clothed legs. She pondered what to do, soon deciding to see just how far Naruto would go. So she once again closed her eyes and relished the feeling, already from the waist down Hinamori swore she was in heaven.

The arrancar massaged and massaged, going from the calves, to the thighs,to the stomach,arms,shoulders, neck, yet he avoided Hinamori's breasts, crotch, and butt, out of respect for Hinamori herself. The girl noted this and smirked at how sweet Naruto was being.

Finishing Hinamori's neck and her full body massage Naruto used another Sonido to return back to Hinamori's feet, still apparently full of energy due to his stamina.

"All done!"

Hinamori smirked,
1233211122212111111211111.title: Task 1

choices: They run into someone on the way
12332111222121111112112.content:
Holding the tiny arrancar in hand Hinamori began moving her slender hand to her sash to once again hide Naruto, before she could however a black butterfly floated nearby. Recognizing it as a Hell Butterfly Hinamori extended her free hand to it, two fingers held out for it to land on.

With utter silence the butterfly landed on Hinamori's fingers, seeing this Naruto tried to listen to the message it held, no suck luck however the message would only be heard by Momo.

Seconds later the butterfly fluttered away, both Naruto and Hinamori stared at it for a second.

"What was the message?" Naruto finally asked.

Hinamori was silent for a moment, her lip was quivering as if she were nervous, "Well, it seems a Woman's Shinigami Association meeting has been called."

The shrunken arrancar blankly stared at Hinamori for a moment, "Isn't that the group full of girls caught doing all sorts of wacky things?"

Hinamori nodded once, "Often yes, but thats just one thing we do. More often than people think we help women in the Soul Society with their various problems, such as say....Captain Kyoraku being accused of harassing a girl. We mainly do things like that."

Little Naruto showed signs of understanding, "Ah..... you gonna show em your new boyfriend?"

In an instant Hinamori's normal skin tone turned from tan to bright pink. "B-b-boyfriend?"

Naruto nodded, "Yeah, of course if you want me......."

Quickly the giantess shook her head, "N-no! I'm just surprised you were so direct about it."

"I tend to be direct a lot."

Hinamori smiled gently at her boyfriend, cudding him against her cheek. "All right, I'll take you with me. Just be careful, a lot of the girls there would probably make you a slave or pet without a moments thought."

"Didn't you say I was your pet earlier?" Naruto asked, flashing a devious smirk.

Again Momo turned pink, "That was different! You're my boyfriend AND pet."

Hearing Hinamori's rather weak self defense Naruto let out a laugh, Momo herself couldn't help but say, "Keep it up and you'll be my slave instead."

It was meant to be something of a threat but Naruto just kept on laughing, "Good, as long as I get rewarded I'll do anything!"

"Don't tempt me."

With their spirits high, and their constant flirting Naruto and Hinamori headed for the Women's Shinigami Association meeting....
12332111222121111112112.title: Time for a meeting

choices: The meeting starts. 1st order of business is a unknown toad-riding pervert
someone bumps into Momo and Naruto is knocked from Momo's sash to the floor
123321112221211111121121.content:
The sway of Momo's hips as she casually walked to the meeting almost caused Naruto to fall asleep, but seeing the possible drop he'd have to deal with if he did fall if Momo's sash wasn't so tight kept him awake. Naruto had to admit, the Seireitei almost reminded him of a ninja village like when he was alive. The thought depressed him slightly. Even if he was an Arrancar, he found Hueco Mundo and Las Noches lacked the charm of places like Konoha and Karakura.

Momo hummed a tune as she got to the meeting hall, attending the Women's Shinigami Association meetings was never required, but they were sometimes enjoyable. Momo saw that Soi Fon, Isane, Kiyone, Nanao, Nemu, and Yachiru were already there as well as several other female Shinigami with others still arriving. Momo adjusted her sash so she wouldn't risk squashing her Arrancar when she sat down. Before long, all the members other than Unohana, Rangiku had arrived (Rukia choice never to attend the meetings).
123321112221211111121121.title: The Women's Shinigami Association meeting

choices: Leave the love birds to what they do
Why not have Naruto be the group pet/slave?
1233211122212111111211212.content:
Carefully Momo began to walk to her seat, the slightest mistake could harm Naruto so she took extra precaution. Walking to her chair Momo felt as if everyone's gaze was on her, paranoia as a result of her boyfriend. Arriving just before her chair Momo believed herself to be home free, at least until Isane arrived before her chair directly next to her.

"Whoops!" Momo turned around, the sight almost in slow motion. The amazoness Isane Kotetsu had somehow tripped and was heading right for Momo. Frozen the Shinigami had no reaction, all she did was whimper "Oh no."

The sound of their collision drew everyone's eyes to Momo, who had Isane directly on top of her. "I'm ok," She reassured everyone, but in reality she wasn't okay. Even though he weighed less than a pound Momo felt Naruto's weight missing from her sash.

She worried about where he was, at least for about one second. "B-bug!" The collapsed Isane jumped back against her chair, freaking out like a child over a bug. Momo let out a gasp, the bug was of course Naruto.

In the other seat beside Momo's was Soi Fon who rose up and stepped over to the 'bug'. "Tch, it's merely a bug. Just crush it." Raising her heel covered shoe Soi Fon prepared to crush the bug underneath the sole of her shoe, allowing him to join the dirt and grime.

Least that's how it would've played out if not for Momo. Screaming "No!" She rolled directly beneath Soi Fon's foot and held it in place in the air, directly by her head was the bug.

Everyone in the room stared at Momo worriedly, every since Aizen's defect they were considered about her well being and this definitely worsened the thought.

Her face a faint pink Momo explained, "This is Naruto the arrancar...........my boyfriend."

"WHAT!??!!!!!"

Every single person in the room screamed in shock, Soi Fon backed up so Momo could lift up her supposed boyfriend. After lifting and placing Naruto on the table everyone took turns examining the arrancar. He felt as if he were on display but he took it silently, soon each girl accepted that it was indeed an arrancar and not just a bug.

With the inspections done Naruto performed a well done Sonido to arrive before Momo, with her arms rested on the table Naruto fell back on Momo's forearm, cuddling slightly to it. Smiling a little bit Momo extended a finger from one of her hands and gently rubbed it against Naruto, almost as if she were petting him.

The sight was a nice one, each girl aside from Momo was happy. Since the Aizen incident Momo basically broke down, any expression she wore was either fake or pained. Yet the smile she wore with Naruto was genuine, perhaps he was the key to her recovery.

Still petting Naruto Momo looked at her fellow Shinigami, each seated around her in a circular table. Obviously all their thoughts were on what to do, Naruto was an arrancar after all.

She decided to just get the topic out in the open, "What do you guys think?"

Isane, Kiyone,Yachiru and Nemu supported the idea, each saying that love cannot be restricted or something along the lines. Nanao and Soi Fon didn't approve too much, but they agreed that it did help Momo, not that they said that part aloud.

All the girls took a quick look with one another, "What to do?" Surprisingly Yachiru, the youngest of the group answered
1233211122212111111211212.title: Discovered

choices: Naruto's given to Soi Fon until the next Women's Shinigami Association meeting
Momo ain't sharing her man! Grabs Naruto and runs!
12332111222121111112112122.content:
Naruto paled. Being the group pet/slave for the ENTIRE Women's Shinigami Association? He didn't think so! Judging from the ungodly reiatsu spike, Momo wasn't fond of sharing either. Too bad that the other ladies didn't share they're views. Murmuring to themselves, the other members all nodded.

"Ok, its decided, Naruto is now the Women's Shinigami Association's pet/slave. We'll vote to see which one of us gets him at each meeting and that person'll have him until the next meeting where we'll vote again to see who has him next! Agreed?"

The Women's Shinigami Association members (except for Momo) all nodded.

"Wait a second! How often does this Women's Shinigami Association hold meetings?!" Naruto yelped

"Ho...once every ten months." Yachiru grinned at the Arrancar.

Naruto REALLY didn't like THAT! For her part, Momo gushed enough reiatsu to make a Vasto Lord-level Hollow piss itself.

"Ok! Time for the first vote to see who gets the W.S.A's new pet Arrancar!" Yachiru announced.

The group voted and...
12332111222121111112112122.title: Group's goodie

choices: Soi Fon teaches Naruto his place
Skip 10 months, to the next vote.
123321112221211111121121221.content:
The group voted, the winner getting the privilege of having Naruto as a pet and or slave for the next ten months. For whatever reason the arrancar didn't run, didn't even put up so much as a fight. It wasn't that he had given up, it was just that he knew that an escape on his part would never work, even if Hinamori helped there were plenty of other lieutenants there as well as a captain.

So he remained still, merely turning pale with each girls vote. Hinamori on the other hand was basically giving off an aura of pure anger, the malice almost seemed to make her hair levitate. Yet the group seemed to ignore them, it was how things usually played out, the group would make a vote and then express their opinions.

Once the votes were tallied Naruto turned ghastly white, Hinamori turning red with rage. The score so to speak was, Hinamori:3, and Soi Fon:4. The vote had been narrowed to the one who was dating Naruto and the only Captain present, a tough choice to be sure but Soi Fon won.

After hearing the result of the groups votes she vanished with a Shunpo, reappearing the next instant with the shrunken arrancar in her tightly clenched fist. Raising him to eye level Soi Fon poked him, wearing a devious smirk. "I think the next ten months will show you your place arrancar." Giving Naruto a tight squeeze she giggled slightly.

The young arrancar appeared to be in pain, yet even as he was getting slowly crushed he extended his hand into the open air, towards Hinamori.

That basically set Hinamori off, rising and kicking her chair to the side Hinamori's hand found itself on the hilt of her Zanpaktou, her spiritual pressure formed a reddish aura that surrounded her body.

"Sna-" Before Hinamori could release her Zanpaktou the other girls leapt in, each holding back a different part of Hinamori, ending with Soi Fon punching her in the gut.

"Na....ru......to" Whispering her boyfriends name Hinamori passed out, Isane began dragging her to the Fourth Squad Medical Center.

"I don't know if we should've done that." Nanao muttered with a sad expression, Kiyone Kotetsu and Nemu Kurosutchi nodding.

Soi Fon sneered, "She'll be fine. In the end it will only make her stronger." The girls turned around, expecting to see Soi Fon also wearing a sad expression but instead they saw nothing, the Captain had used another Shunpo to get away.

Reappearing a good ways away Soi Fon eyed Naruto in her hand, wearing an evil smile. She truly felt bad about Hinamori, but she honestly believed that she will come out stronger from this. Not to mention since the shrunken Ichigo's escape Soi Fon needed a new pet, and Naruto came with the benefit of not having to hide.

The arrancar eyed Soi Fon fearfully, her Shunpo placed her directly inside of her room with the Squad Two hall. "Now arrancar, shall we begin?"
123321112221211111121121221.title: Votes are in and Soi Fon wins!

choices: Soi Fon uses Naruto for a training partner for her kicks and footwork
1233211122212111111211212211.content:
Naruto gulped. Put simply, he was NOT enjoying his situation at all.

Looking up at his capturess for the next ten months, he was reminded of when he was face-to-face Itachi for the very first time. She just gave off the same aura combat prowess and knowledge in ways of death Itachi did. Taking in her features, he shuttered. She was dressed more like a samurai than a ninja; wearing a black uniform and hakama that was covered by a white haori which was tied closed by a yellow sash. Upon the back of the haori was a simple design of a black rhombus that enclosed the kanji for "2" while across the small of her back she carried a sheathed katana. Twin braids, and a razor-thin smile gracing her pale features. But what unsettled the Arrancar most was the hint of mirth held in her steel-grey eyes.

"W-what have you got in mind for me?" Naruto asked nervously.

The female captain smirked and sent shivers down the Arrancar's spine.

"I hear you Arrancar can take a punishment so..."
1233211122212111111211212211.title: Soi Fon teaches Naruto his place

choices: Soi Fon continues to use Naruto as a foot toy
Skip to the end of the Ten Months! And lets see how Naruto lasted
12332111222121111112112122111.content:
Without finished her sentence Soi Fon began sliding her jacket off, tossing it in a random direction. She wore her Stealth Force Uniform, somewhat tight with no material along the back of shoulders. Bending over Soi Fon wrapped her fingers around one of her shoes, slowly pulling it off to reveal one of her bare feet.

The cloth of her outfit even went down to here, while Soi Fon removed her other shoe Naruto noted that her outfit seemed to have a sort of wrap around the ball of her foot. If he had to venture a guess Naruto would say this was to work as a sort of foot wear yet still remain silent, Soi Fon was in the Stealth Force after all.

With her feet bare Soi Fon rose back up, looking at Naruto who was still in her hand. "Now arrancar, I have ten months to make you learn your place and this little demonstration outta give you a hint as to what that is.

Bending over again Soi Fon reached for her left foot, particularly the 'wrap' of cloth Naruto noticed. Pulling back the cloth slightly Soi Fon slid her slender hand within and disposed of the arrancar, immediately releasing the cloth and effectively trapping Naruto beneath the sole of her foot.

The instant Naruto fell into his prison he started struggling and flailing about desperately, yet all he was doing was basically tickling Soi Fon's sole. He understand what her 'lesson' was in all this now, he was supposed to accept he was below her, below all shinigami, lower than their feet. But the arrancar was confident he would last these ten months and see Momo again.

Taking a few paces around her room Soi Fon tested out her insole, actually impressed how much more comfortable her foot felt. "Maybe this can be a regular thing." She sneered aloud as she exited her room.

Although it was merely walking down a hallway Naruto was utterly suffering, and Soi Fon knew this and didn't hold back. She had to get the message across he was nothing more than a bug, a slave, a pet to her and all female Shinigami.

So she walked, applying full pressure on the tiny arrancar with each step until finally she arrived at the squad training ground.

The training ground was a small field, a square surrounded on all sides by a building. In this small square were a handful of training dolls, exactly what Soi Fon sought out. Stepping into the grass the captain felt a minor tickling sensation, the grass seemed to teasingly brush against her sole as she walked gracefully.

Arriving before a doll Soi Fon slid into a battle position, instantly throwing her leg into a kick against the dolls head. Pulling her leg back she did the same with her other leg, this time kicking it in the side. Repeating the process Soi Fon kicked various spots on the doll, making sure that each time she kicked with the foot Naruto was on she would be sure he made contact with the doll in some way.

From Naruto's perspective it was all hell. Just the simple action of Soi Fon walking seemed torturous, her foot and him would be elevated and then BAM! Her foot would grind into the ground and further grind the arrancar into her sole.

And that was before the training began! Each kick the Captain delivered made Naruto experience what could have well been light speed for him, that coupled with the sudden shockwave from Soi Fon's kick, her sweat, any foot odor, as well as his constant contact with the doll led to a hellish time. If it weren't for his Hierro he would have long since been dead, but he did have it, and he did survive.

And this was only day one of a ten month long period
12332111222121111112112122111.title: Training Session

choices: Soi Fon heads back to her room to have Naruto give her a foot rub & peticure
Yoruichi stops by for a visit
123321112221211111121121221111.content:
Six hours later, Soi Fon much to Naruto's relief, ended her session with the training dummy. Even with his herrio, he hurt like hell as his demonicly-induced healing factor by being the host of the Kyubbi undid his injures. Naruto moaned as he was soon stareing up at Soi Fon's face as she wiggled her toes and they bash against his head. Soi Fon smirked, she'd knew from the moment she'd saw him that he was overly strong-willed. As far as she cared, that just ment she'd fully enjoy every last second of him being hers. There was something else about the Medio-Espada that she just liked: his personality was highly compatible with Yoruichi's, Soi Fon could already just tell.

Looking up at Soi Fon, Naruto struggled to free himself, all that did was tickle the captain.

"So trying to run are you?" Soi Fon teased. "Your staying mine regardless of what the Women's Shinigami Association says. I've never felt more relaxed my foot-property." Soi Fon sighed blissfully, putting her socks and chinese Kung Fu shoes back on.
123321112221211111121121221111.title: Furtrher plans in store for her foot-property

choices: Soi Fon simply has him do something else
1233211122212111111211212211111.content:
Wearing a highly out of character smile Soi Fon headed back to her room. The six hours of training she went through got her clothes covered in dirt and scratches along with a fine line of sweat along every crevice of her body. "Heh if I'm like this the arrancar must be something really horrific" Soi Fon thought with a blissful grin.

As Soi Fon imagined Naruto did look horrible, his white clothes had actually turned dark gray from absorbing so much of Soi Fon's sweat, coupled with that the edges of his sleeves and pants had already began to tear slightly. Yet this was only his clothing, the arrancar himself looked terrible. His skin seemed pale, whether from sickness, disgust, or just somehow bleached from Soi Fon's foot it definitely made Naruto look worse. His spiky yellow hair was all greasy and all over the place, his fiery blue eyes seemed distant but they retained the fire in them somewhat. All of this was hidden from even Naruto's gaze in the darkness of Soi Fon's shoe.

The walk was nothing, the same from before the training but after the hell Naruto just went through it might as well have been heaven. The relatively minor yet nonetheless painful pressure the giantess applied was nothing, in the last six hours the arrancar redefined torture and this minor feat was no torture,

"Heh, compared to Soi Fon's feet I think Aizen is preferable." The arrancar muttered weakly, knowing full well the act of speaking resulted in him having to probably taste more foot sweat and no one would hear him anyway. While the trip to the training ground seemed hellishly long the trip back seemed amazingly short, time flew when you enjoyed yourself afterall.

Stepping back into her room Soi Fon shut her wooden slide door, walking towards her bed which lied in a corner. Resting her bottom on the firm mattress the captain raised a foot, removing the shoe and sock revealing an extremely sweaty foot covered with a couple dozen pieces of sock lint, no Naruto however he was in the other shoe.

Even with only one foot free Soi Fon felt herself sigh in pleasure, the cooling air on her feet was near heavenly, but nowhere near as pleasurable to a personal foot slave in her book.

"Time to come out and play....." Soi Fon teased, raising her other foot and removing its sock and shoe. Same as her other foot this one was covered in sweat, dozens of pieces of sock lint all around and on the middle of her sole was a roughly one inch tall Naruto who had been smushed into her sole.

"I know you love my feet and all but get out. I have a task for you." Lowering her foot near the wooden floor the captain crossed her arms and wore a cruel impatient look.

"Heh, sure don't help the guy who just suffered through six hours of hell." Naruto thought humorously, trying to make the situation lighter than how depressing it was. Still, Soi Fon was not going to help so the arrancar had to struggle and struggle until a limb came from and using that limb he slowly forced himself out, the process of simply getting away from Soi Fon's foot took ten whole minutes.

Staggering away from the fleshy tower he had spent the last six hours with Naruto took a deep breath of what he thought was nice fresh air, sadly because he took so long to get out Soi Fon's foot odor had time to permeate and there was no clean air for Naruto being as close as he was.

Frowning Soi Fon raised her foot and pushed Naruto back with her big toe, "You took too long. I said I have a task for you."

Smirking weakly Naruto looked into the girl's cold eyes, "What is it?"

Before answering the girl shook her head, "That won't do. It should be, 'What is it my Goddess? or Goddess Soi Fon. I'm definitely liking goddess."

Again smiling like a little joker Naruto played along with Soi Fon's power trip, "What is it my Goddess?"

In response Soi Fon shoved her feet back in front of Naruto, "Simple, I want a foot massage and a pedicure."

The arrancar looked confused, "I'm not even sure what a pedicure is!"

"Then you better learn fast."

Grumbling Naruto took a step forward, already being a step away from his Goddess' feet. Stopping before the left one he raised his arms and began using his hands to rub the wet skin. As he did so he pondered what a pedicure was, he had a feeling it either had something to do with the nails or the sole.

Meanwhile Soi Fon couldn't help but smirk, she expected resistance, a witty remark, but none of that happened. Naruto simply began. This was a big victory in her book.

Still massaging Naruto just shrugged, hopefully a pedicure was somehow tied in to the massage. He'd rather do nothing than the wrong thing when it came to this girl.

So he massaged and massaged, his thoughts mainly on Hinamori about 99 percent of the time. Finally, he finished an hour later.
1233211122212111111211212211111.title: Next job: Massaging Soi Fon's feet

choices: Soi Fon wiggles her foot inside her slipper, further bashing up Naruto
Soi Fon takes a reast and allows Naruto to simmer in her footsweat
12332111222121111112112122111111.content:
Grinning, Soi Fon inspected Naruto's handywork. Little Arrancar was absolutely amazing with how well he did, still grinning, the captain looked at the Medio-Espada.

"I admit, I'm nearly impossible to impress, but you managed to do it." Soi Fon admitted, prodding her new possession with her toe.

Hearing he plased her, Naruto gave a weak grin as he gasped for air.

"Aww...Goddess's itty-bitty pet all run down? I SUPPOSE you earned a rest so I'll let you sleep while I think of what you get to do for your Goddess. I've even got the PERFECT bed for you!"

With that, Soi Fon grabbed him between her toes and reached down, taking hold of a fluffy slipper and holding it open with her hands.

As he was brought over it, Naruto noticed it was the kind that completely covered someone's foot. Suddenly, Soi Fon released the Medio-Espada and he fell into the slipper, looking up at his Goddess.

"I know you love my feet and I don't want you getting lonely so..."

Soi Fon inserted her foot, trapping him under her sole.
12332111222121111112112122111111.title: Soi Fon is impressed

123321112221211111121121221111111.content:
Although Naruto was once again beneath Soi Fon's foot he felt rather comfortable, probably because she wasn't walking,excersising, or even moving her foot. Take out the odor,sweat and pain and Soi Fon's foot actually made a fair blanket. The arrancar felt his eyes slowly closing, despite the odor around him he was falling asleep.

However back on her bed Soi Fon formed her lips into a little smirk. Without raising her foot from the ground the captain began bobbing her foot up and down a couple of centimeters, each time slapping her arrancar against her sole.

Jolting from what was soon to be a peaceful sleep Naruto muttered a curse beneath his breath, "I thought I got a break!"

Giggling at the ticklish sensation on her sole Soi Fon spoke, "I assume you're wondering why I'm interuppting your break. Well you're getting your break like you wanted, this is simple me doing all the work. If it's a problem then too bad. My pet,my foot, my rules." and with that Soi Fon continued wiggling her foot around, now not even bothering to keep it against the floor.

Naruto gritted his teeth in a mixture of anger and pain, leave it to his 'goddess' to find such a simple loophole. Still, the arrancar tried to make the best out of it, his body was getting pummeled but he could use the chance to rest his aching muscles.

The situation remained the same for a good twenty minutes. Naruto was getting bruised and beaten by Soi Fon's sole, her foot sweat returned and drenched him further, and despite his best efforts not to excert any form of energy he wasn't feeling any better. Of course Soi Fon was having an absolute ball, completely loving the ticklish feeling she got from rubbing Naruto against her soles.

Still, the game soon got dull and Soi Fon wanted to shake things up. "Arrancar, if you want to get out start licking my foot. And I don't mean one or two, I want you to lick every square inch of my foot several times and eat any blemishes you find on it. If you don't well you can just stay there."

Naruto gulped, both choices seemed equally horrible.
123321112221211111121121221111111.title: Take a break, NOT

choices: keep playing with him in her slipper
check on her pet (he's ether unconscious or waiting for the chance to escape)

Having MORE than his taste of Soi Fon's footswet, Naruto felt like crying and going into his Resurrección and commencing with a bloody slaughter all at once. He was hot, tired, practically drowned, smothered, and beaten nearly senseless all in one day and to add the straw that brakes the camel's back, Soi Fon had decided to permanently keep him for herself! Too bad Soi Fon had taken his sword before her training session earlier. He wished he could release Rey de Zorros and shread Soi Fon's foot apart.

Not feeling any licking, Soi Fon assumed her Arrancar had either defied her or had passed out. She considered checking on her pet. No matter how much punishment a person could take, there was a limit. How unresponsive her pet was being was starting to worry her...a little. She was keeping Naruto. Saying Ömaeda had eaten him would work as a excuse. The problem was not hurting Momo any further than the girl already was. Being betrayed and losing someone close, Soi Fon knew THAT feeling.

Soi Fon decided to...
1233211122212111111211212211111112.title: Stay in the slipper

choices: Get to licking and we'll see
12332111222121111112112122111111121.content:
Still wearing her cold expression Soi Fon smirked and shook her head, whether or not he was okay was irrelevant. She said if he didn't lick he would remain in her slipper and she was going to keep her word. Although she never did specify a time, a thought crossed where she kept Naruto beneath her foot forever. The thought brought a disturbed smile to the captains face, still the lack of specification could be used to her advantage.

Wiggling her foot some more Soi Fon attempted and succeeded in bringing Naruto to the toe section of her slipper. He made no movements, he seemed to be unconcious. Shrugging Soi Fon decided to have some fun anyway.

With some skilled footwork the captain positioned the unconcious arrancar between her big and second toe, where she proceeded to rub her toes together against him. It brought forth a pleasurable, almost orgasmic feeling, whether it was the power rush or the actual action didn't matter, what did matter to Soi Fon was that she liked it.

Increasing the pressure and strength of her toes Soi Fon felt little pops from Naruto, his body was cracking at random points but she merely shrugged it off.

Moments after Soi Fon intensified the pain Naruto awoke, screaming and flailing about. Realizing instantly Naruto awoke Soi Fon put her plan into action.

"I don't believe you licked bug. For that you can just stay there.....forever"

She couldn't see it but Soi Fon imagined the arrancar turning pale, out of nowhere a tiny voice spoke. "I'll lick now if you let me out." Somehow Naruto screamed loud enough to be heard.

Flashing a smile Soi Fon said,

choices: Naruto finally brakes and accepts that he's Soi Fon property
