123321112221211111121121221111111212.content:
"Too late for that. Besides, I already told you: Your mine forever."

"Can I AT LEAST get my injures treated?" the arrancar pleaded.

"They'll heal on they're own. If I let you out you'll just run from me."

I wonder why you think I'd run from you, all you've done is torture me. Naruto thought sarcasticly.

"You feel intoxicating." Soi Fon moaned, bobbing her foot up and down again. loving the feeling and the power trip.

"Goddess Soi Fon...please stop it."

"That's my good little pet. your learning your place as my property." Soi Fon cooed, stopping what she was doing. If he was learning that she owned him, she'd have to play with (in Naruto's case the word was "torture") him less. Deciding she DIDN'T like that idea, Soi Fon started scheming on how to give her pet a little false hope of escape so she'd get to punish him.

"I never allow my prisoners to escape. Just accept my slipper is your new home from now on and we'll get along fine. I've already got an excuse so no one takes you from me." Soi Fon said.
123321112221211111121121221111111212.title: Naruto's New Home

choices: Show the new Naruto to another girl (Readers choice)
Proceed to explain the rest of Naruto's life
1233211122212111111211212211111112121.content:
The next hour or so Soi Fon continued her chosen activity, occasionally taunting Naruto about how her feet wanted a kiss of how it must taste so wonderful. Near the end of the hour Naruto let out a lone tear, he had been ripped away from not just one but two romantic partners not including the time he was alive. A picture of Hinamori floated into his mind, yet it seemed far away impossible to reach and Naruto knew why, it was his subconciousness's way of saying that it was impossible to see her again.

Along with that realization the arrancar heard a loud crack, he looked around in the pitch black prison beneath his Goddess's foot but saw nothing, not that he could. A random thought crossed his mind and Naruto somehow knew it to be true.

What he had heard break, was not a mirror nor anything in the physical world for that matter. What had broken was his will, Soi Fon's constant tortures broke him, slowly his lips began muttering a phrase. "I live only to please my goddess......" Although Soi Fon couldn't hear this she did feel a change in the air.

Naruto's voice was distant, heartbroken, almost unrecognizable from his usual cheery self. No matter what he always tried and tried, never giving up, both in life and death, and yet what had it earned him? An unfulfilled life, shrunken, at the mercy of some cruel woman's feet. It just wasn't worth it anymore and Naruto finally accepted that. Memories of his companions from both life and death filled his mind, forming almost like a family portrait, the good, the bad, the deceased, all Naruto ever cared about forming into what looked like a happy family to him. Smiling weakly the arrancar pushed away the image, "I'm sorry."

The usually big blue eyes that always shined with hope were now dim, almost gray in color, and the pupils were narrow to the point it almost looked as if Naruto had become feral.

He was broken, he was nothing more than a bug to Soi Fon and her feet.

Leaning forward the arrancar was face to er toe with Soi Fon's big toe, and he did the ultimate act that confirmed his submission. Opening his mouth Naruto stuck his tongue out, and licked a large almost minute long lick, purposely dragging his tongue slowly against his goddess's toe.

The act did not go unnoticed, with a surprised shriek Soi Fon focused on her foot, moments later the ticklish sensation returned. She knew what it was instantly, Naruto was licking her foot. Soi Fon expected a smile, a victorious laugh, but she was just shocked, her face was literally one of pure shock. She expected Naruto to fight against her will for months, possibly even all ten months if she kept her word, but to break on the first day?

"I guess.....I'm greater than I know." The captain muttered, strugging to search for the proper words.

Low muffled sounds came from her shoe, from Naruto. Leaning forward and focusing Soi Fon heard another shocking thing, Naruto was repeating over and over again between licks, "Nothing but a bug to my goddess" in an almost hypnotized chant.

Using his hands Naruto began massaging the toeflesh, stopping his chanting and starting a new pattern licking and kissing between licks. That was all he was doing and all he intended to do.

Finishing one toe Naruto proceeded to lick between the toes, not even hesitating to eat something he found there, he wanted to remove any blemishes on his goddess's foot. Moving on to another toe Naruto worshipped, all of Soi Fon's toes, her sole, the ball of her foot, her nails, and even the top of her foot. Eeriest of all was that the entire time Naruto walked on all fours, like a bug would.

Finishing his job Naruto screamed loud enough to be heard, "Let me do the other foot!" Soi Fon didn't even move, she was too shocked. Still she did do it after a couple moments, removing her slippers and holding Naruto's next to the other one, true to his word the arrancar on all fours went to the other slipper where Soi Fon inserted her foot.

This was now Naruto's life
1233211122212111111211212211111112121.title: Broken, beaten.

choices: Yoruichi reminds Naruto of who he is
Restoring a broken spirit takes a while, but Yoruichi isn't the type to quite
12332111222121111112112122111111121211.content:
Yoruichi stood there with her arms crossed over her chest, her eyes hard and a dark, deep frown on her face. She looked into Soi Fon's window from the adjunct building's roof. Seeing Naruto so submissive ticked her off. The blond and her had compatible personalities and so she KNEW he'd sooner use a Gran Rey Cero to blow off his own head then give up and blindly follow orders like some mindless puppet. She remembered her spar against the fox-themed arrancar, he hadn't even needed his zanpakuto facing her. Damn good fight with subtle undertones of flirting present...Heheh.

Seeing him as he was now...it was just against the laws of the universe he be like that...the Shihoin women'd be damned if she just stood by and let him stay with his bright spirit and strong will broken! Using shunpo, Yoruichi snatched the arrancar from Soi Fon's room and got out before anyone could even blink. Stopping at her place, Yoruichi looked at him and winced, he was a wreck, using kido to heal him was easy, now for his spirit.
12332111222121111112112122111111121211.title: Yoruichi to the rescue, snap out of it Uzumaki!

choices: Fine! If it'll make you feel better go ahead!
I think Momo needs to see what you've become
123321112221211111121121221111111212112.content:
Lowering herself into an indian style sitting position Yoruichi examined the arrancar held in her hand, same as from a distance he looked weak, tormented. Pulling back a finger she flicked Naruto in the head, "Snap out of it you idiot! A pair of feet made you like this? Don't make me laugh!"

"Do you want your feet worshipped too?" Naruto raised an eye without moving his head up, almost like he was glaring at his savior.

"Idiot! Why would I want that? I mean it sounds nice and all but dammit you're a warrior act like one!"

Lowering his gaze away from Yoruichi Naruto spoke, his voice again sounding frightfully distant." A warrior? No, that path has done nothing for me. All I'm good for is as a foot pet."

"Grr...." Pulling back her dark brownish tan finger again the girl flicked Naruto again. "Quit sounding so emo! You're a hyperactive knucklehead that's a fine man despite being an arrancar."

"Was" Naruto corrected, his gaze still lowered. Gasping slightly Yoruichi realized he was staring at her feet.

"Don't make me hurt you dammit! You are not a foot toy! You're a man so act like one!"

Naruto rolled his eyes, "Go ahead, hurt me. I probably deserve it. In life and death I've done nothing but fail." Yoruichi looked horrified, Naruto was far worse than he thought. A mere shell of the person he was.

"Can I worship now? It's about all I'm good for....."

Clicking her tongue Yoruichi said.....
123321112221211111121121221111111212112.title: Fallen hero

choices: Recovery: Naruto vs. Yoruichi, Round One--FIGHT!
See how the Woman's Shinigami take Naruto being missing
1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.content:
Cursing her old student for being such a control-freak, Yoruichi sighed in exasperation.

"Fine! If it'll make you feel better go ahead!"

The demoralized arrancar vanished and reappeared by Yoruichi's feet. The Were-cat was too caught up in trying to think up a way to change Naruto back to notice how he'd done it. From what she'd learned about him, Yoruichi knew when Naruto was alive that he learned best through his body and practical application so there HAD to be a way to...

"Eh?" Yoruichi asked, looking at her feet as countless Bala struck her feet.

"Hey, how'd you get down there?"

Naruto shrugged "Sonido."

Yoruichi's eyes widened. Sonido and Bala. Naruto used those to fight, not to serve as a foot pet...Bingo! Hold his new zombie-personality's purpose over his head and FORCE him back to himself! Yoruichi felt proud of herself for her brilliance.

"Ok Naruto, I'll make you a deal: We'll spar everyday, if I win THEN you worship my feet, alright?" Yoruichi asked, pleased when he twitched for his odachi.
1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.title: the light at the end of the tunnel

choices: A girl steps inside the room.
1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.content:
Pulling out his blade Naruto pointed it at Yoruichi, forming a battle stance. Likewise Yoruichi did the same, it was almost funny, debateably the strongest woman in the Soul Society was about to get into a fight with for all intents and purposes a bug.

Not wanting to kill the arrancar, or end the fight for that matter Yoruichi took it simple, she merely swung her bare foot forward to the arrancar. Her foot moved fast but not as fast as one would expect from 'The Flash Goddess' so Naruto had no problems handling it.

With a Sonido the arrancar vanished, reappearing on the top of Yoruichi's foot with his blade raised and pointed at it. The girl found her lips forming into a smile, "Yes!" she thought happily.

Screaming some sort of a battle cry Naruto swung his sword down against Yoruichi's foot, both he and her expected a cut to form, some sort of a wound but the worst case scenario occured. Yoruichi, when taking in her size compared to Naruto's her spiritual pressure was so great that the blade couldn't cut her, similar to how Kenpachi Zaraki fights. The blade merely scraped against the massive dark tan foot forming sparks.

Feeling a hint of pain Naruto looked at his hand as it clenched the sword, it was dripping blood. The power difference between his and Yoruichi with their sizes in the mix was so great when it collided no matter what he was the one injured.

Biting her lip nervously Yoruichi quickly reassesed the situation. She forgot about how the size of Naruto would effect his attacks on a spiritual level, as if he wasn't down enough! Yoruichi took a quick look at Naruto, sure enough he wasn't in a battle position anymore, he was just.....there...standing on top of Yoruichi's foot staring at the spot he futilely struck.

"I can't win......." The arrancar muttered, naught but a whisper but a whisper Yoruichi heard nonetheless.

"That's a load of crap! You just give it your all in each swing! Try one more time, I'll let you!" Like her hopes Naruto's blade rose high into the air again, his small yet nonetheless powerful spiritual pressure engulfing him like an aura of light.

Focusing her own power Yoruichi did the opposite of Naruto, she lowered her power as much as she could. Swinging his blade down Yoruichi winced slightly, her foot instinctively jerking and in turn tossing the tiny arrancar off of it.

The two stared at the spot on Yoruichi's bare foot, although it was nothing more than a papercut Naruto had cut the girl's foot. Both found themselves smiling smiles of accomplishment, slowly but surely Naruto's spirits were rising.

"Don't get too cocky." Yoruichi muttered with a catlike smirk.

Again attacking via a slow kick Naruto again reappeared on top of her foot and dealt another blow and again Yoruichi would toss him off. The process repeated for a while, soon the top of both of Yoruichi's feet were covered in cuts, nothing big but it was progress.

Naruto on the other hand was slowly slowing down and Yoruichi noticed it. Being a good sport she attempted to slow down to match Naruto but as he prepared another strike, even if for the briefest of moments Yoruichi's competitive side took over and in less than a second Naruto was on the ground pinned beneath her big toe.

Frowning slightly Yoruichi was mentally hitting herself, losing would surely make Naruto worse than ever. Strangely a laughing sound came from beneath Yoruichi's toe, removing her toe Yoruichi saw the weirdest thing. Naruto was laughing, "I was so close!"

The cat girl found herself smiling too, "Don't forget what you gotta do if I win."

The arrancar gave her a thumbs up, "I'm still a foot pet, no prob!" Yoruichi sighed slightly, he was feeling better but Naruto still seemed to think of himself as a bug, still progress was progress.

Sitting down Yoruichi propped her feet up, "Get to worshipping."

His spirits a bit higher than what Soi Fon had left him in, Naruto began to get to work on Yoruichi. First thing he started with was mending the damage he'd done.

"Yoruichi, I've got to warn you this is going to hurt." he warned.

"I'll try not to kick out then." the Flash Goddess said, knowing he was serious.

Naruto chucked, when he'd died, the energy he used changed from chakra into reiatsu. It wasn't impossible, after all, energy was energy, so the change had been automatic upon his death. He ran his hands over scratch-riddled flesh as red reiatsu flowed from his hands and restored the dark brownish tan skin so completely. they're match may very well never have happened.

Yoruichi yelped. That energy...it relaxed her intoxicatingly but made her feel like her blood was on fire all at once. She kicked.

"Naruto!" Yoruichi cried.

He just stood and shook himself off with a laugh. "Compared to Soi Fon, that was nothing."

After that...

1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.content:
After his long three hour foot worship ceremony, finishing one last lick against Yoruichi's big toe Naruto rolled around and felt his legs give away under him. Collapsing on his bottom the arrancar rested his head against the freshly licked foot of his new, far gentler goddess.

With a gentle smile the arrancar fell asleep, dreaming of himself and Hinamori and oddly even in his dreams worshipping her feet. Boy Soi Fon did a number on him.

Quickly realizing Naruto was done and asleep Yoruichi carefully lifted him up, carrying his near motionless miniscule body until she placed him on the top of a tissue which lay on a desk by Yoruichi's own bed. Shivering a bit at the sudden soft cloth Naruto instinctively cuddled up to it and soon wrapped the item around his body like a blanket.

Yoruichi found herself smiling like a mother as her head hovered over the boy, despite probably being even older than her he still was but a child. In maturity he hadn't changed at all since he was alive, a trait that only he seemed to possess.

Thinking for a moment Yoruichi realized she was probably wrong, there was one other who would most likely be like Naruto even in death, Ichigo Kurosaki. The two despite effectively being opposite races, and generations apart the two were strikingly similar. Ichigo was a brave but powerful idiot and Naruto was the same, the comparison seemed fitting.

Yoruichi took a quick look out a window, the sky was dark and her instincts said it was midnight. Feeling a sudden tired feeling Yoruichi turned out her bedroom lights and rolled into her own bed, wearing the restricting clothes she hates so much so Naruto won't be anything perverted. "That would cheer him up." She giggled, remembering the time Ichigo saw her bare.

That morning Naruto awoke,
1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.title: A Well Earned Rest

1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.content:
Yawning, the arrancar got up and spotted the still-asleep Yoruichi. He smiled. Yoruichi was a heck of a lot better to be the foot-pet for then her old protege. He decided to go get some training done and stretch his muscles. For some reason seeing Yoruichi's bare feet left him feeling conflicted, he SHOULD be worshipping her feet right now, but for some reason he wanted to go and get some training done and get ready for the next spar instead. Why was that? He tried thinking why that was but he couldn't remember. What foot-pet Naruto couldn't recall was the the real Naruto-personality that Soi Fon had caused him to forget LIKED training up to the point where he was practicality addicted to improving his skills. As he tried making up his mind, Yoruichi peeked at hi as he muttered about how he SHOULD be worshipping her feet but felt like he WANTED to train. She smiled, looked like the real Naruto was fighting to make a comeback. She knew it'd take more than a day, but it was progress.

Which side won the debate?
1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.title: Conflicting interests

choices: I think a visit to Hinamori will cheer ya up
1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.content:
For a mere second Naruto felt as if he would not worship Yoruichi's feet, in fact he would train for his next spar with her. At least this was the plan until an image of how Soi Fon reacted when he did something similar appeared, despite knowing Yoruichi would never act nearly as cruel as her former student the broken side of Naruto won his mental conflict.

Utilizing one of his precise Sonido's Naruto had vanished from his spot atop the desk by his goddess's bed and reappeared by her feet as she lay on the bed asleep. Not realized his goddess was in fact awake Naruto began his morning worship.

Crawling his way to Yoruichi's toes the arrancar spotted a fair amount of black sock lint and dirt, Soi Fon's torture led him to consider this a meal so Naruto did what any foot pet would do. Sticking his head between the cat-girls toes Naruto began licking, any material he licked up would be his breakfast so to speak.

Despite being the most horrific thing ever to touch his tastebuds the feet of Yoruichi seemed to taste decent, Naruto was getting a taste for the flavor.

Quickly finishing up his questionable breakfast Naruto began licking between all of Yoruichi's toes, just to do the job right. Once done with that he gently kissed the center of each toe a total of three times each and using his strength popped them so they would feel nicer to his goddess.

Then Naruto slid from the toes and ended back at Yoruichi's sole where he licked, massaged, a kissed with a content smile on his face.

Noting all of this Yoruichi shook her head, feigning it as a movement in her sleep for her friend. Naruto was making good progress but the whole foot pet thing really didn't become him, after it was all over Yoruichi would be sure to give Soi Fon a piece of her mind

Still licking Naruto was interrupted by Yoruichi who now revealed herself to be awake.
1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.title: worshipping Yoruichi's feet

choices: Yoruichi gets dizzy following him circling her and accidentally sits on Naruto
Naruto actually manages to make Yoruichi fall over & she admits defeat
1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.content:
Naruto grinned and used Sonido to appear on the floor. Smiling, Yoruichi simply slid out of her bed and stood before her patient/opponent. Just like yesterday, Yoruichi swung her foot at him in a sweep kick. Naruto, however, tried a different tactic than last time. A orange ball of energy formed in his hand and he slammed his Cero into the floor as it was being aimed at the limb of the Flash Goddess. the energy exploded outwards towards her foot and not only did Yoruichi jerk her foot away to avoid the blast, but a small part of the floor was carved up.

Looking down, Yoruichi noticed Naruto had vanished. She grinned. Using the environment as part of his countering her kick? Those kind of tactics being used was a real positive sign of his recovery. She felt a barrage of Balas slam into the back of her knees, trying to trip her and tip the scales to her whisker-faced friend's advantage. Yoruichi laughed.

"If you think this is going to stop me, your crazy!"

"Crazy like a fox!" Naruto quiped in response.

Getting a beat on his voice, Yoruichi slammed her heel into where it was coming from. But when she pull her foot away, he was already gone.

"Heheh...here kitty kitty!" Naruto teased.

Yoruichi rolled her eyes but smiled, Naruto was fond of witty banter, so it was a good thing.

"Why not come to me instead?" she giggled.

"Heh. Enjoy being chased do you? Fine by me!"

Yoruichi slapped her cheek as a papercut appeared there.

"Missed me, missed me, now ya gotta kiss me!"

Yoruichi laughed again. "Isn't the kiss given to the winner?"

His reply was to launch a gumball-sized Gran Rey Cero into her stomach and she faked a wince, sure Naruto hadn't put everything he had into that attack and there was how the size difference between them effected they're spiritual powers, but it never hurt to boost his faith in himself with a little acting.

"If that's the case, I have a really good reason to win, don't I?" Naruto said, reappearing before her. But he suddenly cluched his stomach and buckled over. His "breakfast" was catching up to him. The arrancar vomited and Yoruichi stopped to rub his back with a finger, concern all too clear all over her face.

"You ok?"

Panting, Naruto looked up at Yoruichi. Planting his sword into the floorboards, he used it like a cane and supported himself with it until his ill feeling passed.

"I can still go on." Naruto stated.

Closing her eyes and shaking her head, Yoruichi had to admit he was a stubborn one. Still, it was what she was hoping for. Yoruichi grabbed his head in between her big toe and her index toe. Naruto's head was stuck between her toes. She then gets an idea and kicks backwards, releasing her grip and tossing him onto her bed.

"Take ten just in case." she said.

Naruto complied with her instructions and then dashed around her in a circle using Sonido as he peppered her with a seemingly endless barrage of Balas.

How does this round go?

Using in rapid sequence Naruto sonido'd in a rapid circle as well as using bala's and or cero's between Sonido's. The result was a nice one, he was little more than a blurr traveling in a circular motion with beams of energy of varying speed and power coming from him.

Ignoring the relatively minor damage she was receiving from the barrage Yoruichi found herself beginning to smile, even though she was debateably the fasted person in the Soul Society Naruto managed to move fast enough for even her eyes to have trouble keeping up. His size was mainly why, normally Yoruichi would have to squint slightly to see the arrancar so now that he was traveling at full speed she couldn't properly get a good look at him. In terms of speed she was by far the faster though.

Yoruichi raising one of her hands upwards, it formed into a chopping position. Naruto was moving fast and all but he was circling the same area and because of that Yoruichi knew where to strike. With speed that lived up to the title of Flash Goddess Yoruichi chopped her hand into the bed, directly before where Naruto would soon be.

Expecting a small thump to hit her open hand Yoruichi was honestly surprised when not only did she not feel it but Naruto's miniscule voice rose up in a taunt. "You took the words right out of my mouth."

Quickly batting an eye away from her hand Yoruichi still saw the blurr that was Naruto circling around. He had predicted her move and changed course! With her foolish mistake Yoruichi left herself utterly open. Smirking she said, "Should've taken this a bit more seriously."

Roaring like an animal Naruto used his technique at full power and hit Yoruichi directly at the hip. He smiled eagerly as he saw Yoruichi tip over as if she were struck by something strong enough to physically push her.

However the joy was short lived, Yoruichi lost her balance and began to fall. Turning around Yoruichi fell and her butt covered by the tight black sweat pants was heading straight for Naruto.

The arrancar stood still with a nosebleed as he was suddenly slammed beneath Yoruichi's fair bottom.

1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.content:
Leaning her head against the room's wall Yoruichi stretched her body to its fullest on the mattress, her bare feet ending up before Naruto who did the same.

"I think we should just chat for a bit."

Naruto's response was heard to interpret due to his size but with her keen senses Yoruichi heard him. "What do you wanna talk about my goddess?"

Yoruichi raised a finger as if lecturing. "First off please don't call me that, it's kinda weird hearing you of all people calling me that."

Pausing for a moment Naruto seemed to think about this, "Okay.......Yoruichi."

"Much better." The giantess muttered with a happy sigh.

The two were silent for a minute, each wondering what to say. Finally Naruto asked his question, "So why are you so desperate to 'save' me?"

The question threw Yoruichi off guard, she forgot Naruto's lack of subtlety. "Well....when I saw you like that with Soi Fon....it just wasn't right. I heard all about you and Hinamori, word flies around the Seireitei fast, and it was just wrong. That's why I don't like the Female Shinigami Association too much, no matter what is brought up it has to be voted on. Yachiru, the president nomianated the idea of you as a pet and everyone pretty much had to agree. It was just wrong."

"So you saved me due to a sense of rightchousness?" The question was said with all of the seriousness Naruto had but his face wore an amused smirk.

Like Naruto, Yoruichi also wore a smirk "Anything wrong with that? ANT man?"

"Ant arrancar." Naruto corrected with a laugh.

Yoruichi let her smile vanish, "My turn then, why did you give up like that? The Naruto I knew would have probably fought stubbornly for months hell years before giving up, but you did it in one day."

The pleasant aura from Naruto's face vanished, instead becoming replaced with a distant sad look Yoruichi was all to familiar with. "It's just......I've never given up before. On anything, and look at what it got me." Yoruichi's eyes widened as Naruto looked up at her with a sad smile on his face along with a few tears in his eyes.

"Failed to save my dearest friend, Lost those I loved, died, lost the ones I loved again, ended up more or less alone, and then shrunk and at a girl's feet. Not giving up has brought me nothing but grief in life and death. I figure I gotta change something and at my size a foot toy is about all I'm good for." Letting the sentence hang in the air Naruto quickly laughed, it wasn't a happy go lucky laugh, it was more of a troubled, life sucks kind of laugh. To hear it come from him was eerie, like he didn't belong with the particular sound.

Silent Yoruichi brought her hand before Naruto and quickly pulled her finger back and flicked the little knucklehead on his head. "You really are an idiot. You're blaming all your worst moments due to not giving up but what about all the good times? Hell, what about now? You're at the mercy of a sexy cat-girl goddess." Yoruichi laughed slightly at her little joke.

Bewildered Naruto shook his head at the giant. "Some good, tons of bad. It's simple math."

"You suck at math!"

Naruto chuckled, "Maybe but even an idiot knows when he's beat. The time I've spent with you is wonderful but I know that unless I either return to normal or find something worth living for I'm nothing more than a toy to be used by some person."

Yoruichi appeared as if she would cry herself, "Naruto......."

1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.content:
Yoruichi smiled at the little arrancar, "I'll head to the human world, meanwhile you can relax with Unohana for a bit." Naruto thought for a moment, before he was officially with Hinamori he had visited Unohana along with Ichigo, that's all that he knew though.

"Crap! I forgot all about Ichigo!" The arrancar realized, causing Yoruichi to widen her eyes in shock too. "Ichigo's shrunken too?"

"Yeah! I dunno how but I ended up with him like that and together we managed until me and Hinamori got together. Last time I saw him he was with Unohana."

Yoruichi's worry faded away as her relaxed poise returned, "Good, Unohana wouldn't harm him, So long as he didn't make her mad."

A silence hung in the air, even the wind made more sound than Yoruichi and Naruto.

"Let's hurry."

"Yeah."

Placing her hands together Yoruichi cupped them around Naruto into a sort of dome so he would remain safe; and with a Shunpo that lived to her nickname Yoruichi was gone, vanished like the wind. Even Naruto couldn't keep up with her and he was right with her!

One...two...three Shunpo's and Yoruichi stopped, opening her hand and revealing Naruto to a very familiar room, Unohana's office. Behind a desk in a well made chair was the captain, smiling at Yoruichi as if she expected her all along. "I take it I'm watching Naruto for a bit?"

Yoruichi chuckled, "Nothing gets past you eh? Yeah that's the situation." Placing her hands near the top of the large wooden desk Yoruichi allowed the arrancar to leap off and gracefully fall into a landing on the large wooden desk. " Sorry for the lack of explanation but I gotta go!"

"Have fun" Unohana waved a hand and just like that Yoruichi was gone, leaving her and Naruto alone.

The arrancar turned around to the captain, "Um...hiya. Name's Naruto."

"I know, and I'm Captain Unohana, perhaps when we get better aquainted you could call me Retsu."

Taken slightly aback by the Captain's politeness Naruto nodded, "Okay Captain Unohana!" Naruto took a quick look around, "Where's Ichigo?"

Unohana seemed to smile even more, "He's right here, just out of sight in case someone enters."

It made sense to Naruto, all it would take was a careless glance and word would spread like wildfire, "May I see him?"

"Of course."

Unohana kicked her seat back some as she bent over and began rifling through various things behind the desk, as she bent over Naruto blushed as a small portion of bare skin was revealed along with a small portion of pure white panties.

"He's right here."

Unohana.....

1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.content:
To Naruto's infinite relief, Unohana put Ichigo on the desk completely unharmed. However, Ichigo was asleep. Naruto sighed, glad to see his comrade alright. The miniature Arrancar looked up at Unohana. The woman had a serene yet powerful aura about her. It sent a chill down Naruto's spine, it was sort of like the feeling Aizen gave off, but not nearly as menacing. Added on to that she was a captain-level soul reaper and the size difference...not all that pleasant for the Konoha-shinobi-tuned-Arrancar.

Seeming to feel his unease, Unohana smiled at him reassuringly. She had no intentions of harming him, he'd had a hard enough time as it was.

"Uhm...Ms.Unohana...what exactly is going to happen to me?"

Smiling softly, Unohana leaned forward and lightly pressed her lips against him. It was nothing major, just the kind of "you'll-be-alright" kiss mothers usually give to young children.

"Well I WON'T allow you to be hurt."

Despite his weariness, Naruto felt he could trust Unohana.

1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.content:
"Thanks" Naruto replied with a smirk. Staring at the sleeping Ichigo he asked, "So what happened while I had my adventures?" Naruto sounded jealous, Ichigo was sleeping soundly and with a serene smile. While he had been suffering Ichigo had been relaxing with debatedly the only sane girl in the Seireitei.

Unohana kept her gentle but powerful smile on, staring at Naruto with her large blue eyes. "Well...it's a little bit of a long story. Are you sure you wish to hear it?"

The arrancar shrugged, "Go ahead, not like I could do anything to stop you if I didn't wanna."

The giantess giggled a little bit, "You might want to adopt some better manners for the moment. Remember currently we're little more than strangers." Unohana had her powerful smile on so Naruto felt chills as she said this, "So-rry!"

Yet again the captain giggled, "It's okay, now for the story......"

---------------------------------------

-Yesterday-

Hinamori exited Captain Unohana's office, clearly hiding something but the Captain didn't stop her. On her desk was Ichigo who seemed to be in an angered worried state. "Come on Unohana! She has Naruto!"

Unohana shook her head, her expression neutral and her voice firm. "No, I know she has the arrancar, I could sense him, but Hinamori won't harm him. I can guarantee that."

Ichigo calmed down slightly but still showed evident signs of anger, "That may be but you can't know for certain! Save him to be sure!"

Once more, Unohana shook her head. " No, that look in Hinamori's eyes.....it was the same as when she looked at Aizen. She won't harm him."

Feeling all his rage and worry melt away Ichigo fell silent, he had heard all about it from various Shinigami. Hinamori more or less worshipped Aizen in every way, she was obviously in love with him to an extreme degree. That was why his betrayal devastated her so much, her entire world had left her, leaving her a mentally exhausted shell of herself.

Sensing Ichigo's calm Unohana continued, "She may still be a tad unstable but that arrancar may be able to set her right once more. Both he and you are a lot like Aizen, not the real Aizen, the one we all believed to be real. A kind selfless man who had courage beyond belief. Although his brains did go farther than you twos."

A red X appeared on Ichigo's temple as he glared up at Unohana, "What's that supposed to mean?"

Not even registering the Shinigami as a threat Unohana merely let out a kind warm laugh, "Relax Kurosaki. I am merely playing with you." The smile she wore slowly became nostalgic. "Although I really do believe that Naruto will be able to help her, even if only a little."

Ichigo fell silent, he didn't know Hinamori all that well but he did feel extrodinarily sad for her. If Naruto could ease that even if by a little it would be wonderful. "Alright....I trust you."

Unohana shook her head, " Don't trust me, trust her."

"Alright."

With her index finger Unohana gently stroked Ichigo on the head, as one would a pet. " Are you unharmed? Do you require medical attention?"

As the thought popped into his mind Ichigo felt all of the weariness and overall pain from the past few days. Through pure adrenaline he had ignored and blocked out everything until it came all at one in a flood of exhaustion.

Losing the strength in his legs Ichigo collapsed on the desk. Unohana laughed slightly, "I suppose that is a yes." Finishing her sentence Unohana charged her energy into her hand and held it above Ichigo's shrunken body, healing him.

-------------------------------------
-Today-

"And he fell asleep shortly after I started and has been out ever since." Unohana finished.

Naruto frowned as he looked at the peaceful Ichigo, "I've worshipped feet, fought, and went through a dramatic personality change and all he's been through is getting fixed up!?"

"Yes that is correct."

Naruto walked to Ichigo's unconcious body, cracking his knuckles. "Why I outta...."

Before he could finish Naruto was held back as Unohana's finger blocked his way, " There will be no battle or conflict within the walls of Fourth Squad. Understand?" Unohana was smiling but it had the same Aizen-y feeling to it, Naruto felt fear and nervousness overwhelm the anger he had. "Yes mam...."

"Good."

"So what now?"

Unohana let her gaze drift around for a bit. "Well.......I have had a long day and you HAVE been essentially becoming an expert on foot worship......"

Naruto began to turn white, "Please tell me you're joking....."

Unohana turned to him, still wearing that smile. "Well....

1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.content:
Unohana lifted up the young arrancar, delicately holding him in her slender hand. The arrancar smiled at her, her hand smelled of sweet fruit lotion and her aura was a gentle one, powerful enough to instill fear but gentle enough to cancel it out for him.

With Naruto in hand Unohana backed her seat up, soon standing upright and walking into the open area of her room. Naruto noticed she was barefoot, probably as an act of comfort in her own home like area.

She smiled gently back at the grinning arrancar. "Naruto, you've been through a great ordeal. Would you like a rest? You most certainly deserve it."

Naruto stared at Unohana in blank amazement, "I can finally get a real break? No catch?" Unohana nodded in response, the simple act was almost enough to bring tears of joy to Naruto's face.

"Yeah, please. I really really want to just fall asleep." For a moment Naruto looked back at the sleeping Ichigo, and pointed a finger at him. "Like that lucky bastard. All I've dealt with is feet and torture and it's damn time I got a break."

Unohana seemed to find Naruto's little speech humorous, evident by her laughter. "I see, trust me when I say you will get that well deserved rest." Gracefully walking along the wooden floors Unohana came to the corner of her office, there lay another door that Naruto didn't notice.

With her free hand Unohana opened the slide door, on the other side was a bedroom that while the same as every other room struck Naruto as different, it held a pure more gentle feeling to it.. It held the same decor of every other room within the Seireitei, wooden floors with a bed,dresser,table,seats,mirror, and a personal bathroom.

Stepping into this room Unohana walked to another corner, this one directly beside the bathroom door. There laid what appeared to be a towel rack, only it held not only several variously colored towels but also a silverish white bathrobe.

Unohana grabbed the bathrobe and took a look back at Naruto, "You'll be safe within here. The material is extrodinarily soft and pleasant, no doubt a perfect place for you to rest; plus I shall know where you are. Is this okay with you?"

Naruto smiled a wide grin, "Okay? It's great, hell perfect! It's heaven!" The arrancar shined with the joyous innocence of a child which appeared rather amusing given his hollow features.

"Enjoy then." Unohana whispered to him as she slipped Naruto into the left pocket of the bathrobe. Bending over she looked inside to see Naruto already cuddling up to the silky material. "If you need anything, anything at all, please fluctuate your spiritual pressure. As a Captain my senses are sharp enough to detect it even at your size."

Still smiling like a child Naruto flashed Unohana a thumbs up. Chuckling under her breath Unohana left the room so she could return to her work.

Moaning in happiness Naruto threw himself against the cloth of the bathrobe, all he had to cuddle with in the last few days was more or less feet with a few exceptions here and there, the bathrobe was damn near heavenly. Naturally given this it wasn't soon before the exhaustion set it, before he even realized it Naruto fell asleep.

It could've been hours, days, hell even weeks but something woke the arrancar, a sort of rhythmic booming noise. After spending a few days shrunken Naruto recognized the sound instantly, the sound of footsteps and they were approaching.

Whoever this person was the arrived right at the bathrobe Naruto was in, and proceeded to pick it up. Half asleep Naruto couldn't focus enough to determine who it was via their energy, but he felt assured it Unohana. Regardless, this mystery person began sliding on the robe. Sliding their hands through the sleeves, inserting their body into it and tieing it around their waist. Naruto still had no idea who it was but he found out they had a rather nice sized butt, it brushed against him as this person was putting on the robe.

Once the robe was fully on Naruto managed to awaken fully, realizing instantly who was wearing the robe.

In an instant Naruto was released from between her fingers and fell over right where a finger used to be and in the next second the finger came back there and started to crush him beneath it. This too only lasted a second, a rather painful second but a second nonetheless.

In the process of raising her finger again Unohana freed Naruto and unknowlingly flicked him against the edge of her pocket, bouncing him against the cloth and into another finger like a sort of ragdoll. It was almost like a bounce house, Naruto flew around everywhere and slammed into everything, in less than ten minutes he was sore all over.

Unohana spoke, probably thinking out loud. "I wonder if I should go check on Isane? She might have had another unusual nightmare. Perhaps Momo, she's still weary and weak from Aizen. The Patient ward? Hmm......"

"Your pocket!" Naruto yelled from within his prison, obviously not getting heard. A sudden memory flooded into his mind, what Unohana told him if he needed her. "Fluctuate your spiritual pressure" He repeated the words he recalled, knowing what he had to do.

It was a challenge to do within his bounce house of horror but Naruto managed to concentrate his energy enough to fluctuate it to it's highs and lows. All he could do what pray it would work.....

1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.content:
Naruto yawned loudly. "Well now that I've had my hundredth near death experience for the day I think I could use a nap."

Unohana checked a clock in her room before answering, "You've been asleep for well over four hours and you want to sleep some more after only being concious for twenty minutes?"

The arrancar flashed a toothy grin, "Patients need rest!"

All Unohana did was shake her head with a smile, "True, Yoruichi should be in the Human World for a few days anyway so this is an ideal opportunity to rest."

"You make it sound like she's gonna torture me or something when she gets back." Naruto joked.

The gigantic captain nodded once, " She just may, Yoruichi is.....rough I suppose you could say. She means well but get on her bad side........" Unohana let her voice wander, furthering her point. The miniature arrancar saw what she meant but also knew that it could be applied to his latest caretaker too, get on Unohana's bad side and he would likely be tortured beyond belief. Just thinking about it gave Naruto goosebumps.

"So.....where can I sleep?" Naruto quickly asked, changing the topic.

"Hmm..." After thinking for a moment Unohana gestured to her bathrobe pocket, "You slept well in there before, I think it would suffice."

"What if you forget me again?"

Unohana smiled softly, "That would apply no matter where I kept you, my bathrobe pocket is much safer than other places I could keep you, like say....my cleavage."

Naruto turned blood red at the comparison but it made Unohana's point crystal clear, he nodded once. "Gotcha, but now I don't feel tired anymore."

"Perverted thoughts keeping you awake?"

Shaking his head wildly and in an overexaggerated manner Naruto shouted, "No way!"

"So I'm not pretty enough for them?"

"No uh.....you're gorgeous it's just...."

Giggling Unohana stroke a finger along Naruto's head, almost like she was petting him. "Relax, I am only playing around with you.

Calming down Naruto returned to his normal skin tone and demeanor, only sweating slightly now. "Not funny!"

"Perhaps a different sort of game then?"

Naruto stared into Unohana's large welcoming eyes....
1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.title: Playing around

1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.content:
Hearing his declaration, Unohana smiled. It was obvious that this Arrancar in particular thrived under pressure. So turning down a challenge was something he couldn't do. Naruto and Yoruichi were strikingly similar.

"Alright, lets make the rules and stakes first though." Unohana said, wanting this to be fair.

"Tell me."

"Just a 60-minute game of keep-away against me and my feet. No weapons, no energy attacks and no movement abilities. If you win you rest in my bathrobe pocket, if I win, I'll keep you in the loops that make up my hair braid until Yoruichi gets back."

Naruto noticed Unohana was wearing a pair of tabi, traditional ankle-high Japanese socks with a separation between the big toe and the other toes. He gulped and shut his eyes, Yoruichi hadn't had time to fully remove the foot pet thing from him before she'd had to go to the Living World. Last thing he wanted was a relapse.

Unohanna closed her eyes and smiled pleasantly as she set him down and raised her foot.

"Ready?"

choices: But first I think the winner deserves something....
1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.content:
Naruto looked nervously around, Unohana's room was large to be sure but it was at best 20x20 which while large for a bedroom wasn't exactly much to work with in a game such as this.

"Ready?" Unohana repeated again, this time sounding impatient. Somewhat nervously Naruto nodded and braced himself.

Foot still in the air Unohana quickly slammed it into the wooden floor, not holding back in the least. Expecting nothing less Naruto managed to leap away in time, barely in time though. Unohana's stomp rivaled the greatest Sonido Naruto had ever seen, he could see it, predict it's course, but acting fast enough was an issue. To worsen matters Unohana restricted all forms of his powers, it didn't hit the arrancar til then but she rigged the game due to this.

Landing a couple floorboards away from Unohana Naruto took off running full speed, his target Unohana's bed. His reasoning was that if he could make it Unohana's feet couldn't reach him, simple but effective. The Captain was quick though, in a few seconds she was already chasing the arrancar with stomps, each one coming inches away from nearly killing him.

Looking over his shoulder Naruto saw each stomp come close to grazing him, to ending the game. On some level he was happy he was untouched but a quick look at Unohana removed all joy. She was smiling softly with her eyes closed, walking slowly as if there was nothing to fear, she was toying with the arrancar. At anytime she wished she could catch him under foot, but the game was just getting too fun.

"You've lasted about two minutes, only fifty-eight to go!" The giantess teased as another stomp came dangerously close to Naruto.

Looking away from Unohana Naruto glanced at his target again, he was roughly halfway there. In one Sonido he could make it but sadly he was restricted from using such things. Every few seconds a sudden waft of air accompanied by a boom told Naruto that his latest caretaker took another step towards him. Each stomp easily held enough force to crush him, least if it wasn't for the arrancar's Hierro, at the moment he was thanking god for giving Arrancars this blessing.

It may not have been apparent to Unohana who was merely toying with him but Naruto saw a problem with his situation. He was already running full speed and Unohana was at best going 1/100, this wasn't the problem, What was the problem was that she seemed to be slowly speeding up, what was once coming inches away from him now came centimeters from touching Naruto. If nothing would be done soon it would be over.

Fate finally gave the arrancar a blessing though, as this realization hit him Naruto was just before Unohana's bed. He had become so lost in thought he failed to notice he had reached his target. It was the final stretch and Naruto instinctively knew Unohana would speed up to catch him.

In a last act of desperation the arrancar leapt forward, everything suddenly slowing down as if time itself had slowed to a crawl. As Naruto predicted Unohana sped up for this last bit, well over triple what she had been doing before. Her socked foot was coming in like an unstoppable force of nature but in Naruto's heightened sense of time it was amazingly slow.

He could see it all, every fiber, every dirt clumb, every bead of sweat present on Unohana's socked sole. Beyond it she wore a victorious smile and her eyes were open, her lips were parting to say something...."I win."

In his enlightened moment Naruto felt no fear, no nervousness. A part of him knew how this would play out and it played just as he had envisioned.

It came mere milimeters from making contact but Naruto was not touched by Unohana's foot and successfully ended up beneath her bed. Behind him nothing could be heard past the loud boom of the stomp and the creaking sound coming from the floorboard.

Naruto laughed, he had seemed to have won. Beneath Unohana's bed her feet couldn't reach him, he was safe and victorious. He felt safe again, somehow this playful game turned into a fight for survival, at least to Naruto at the moment. If he had been hit he was just going to get healed, that much was certain but it still felt as if his neck was on the line.

Naruto felt secure, safe, until he saw it. The slender pillar-like digits that were the Captain's fingers wrapped around the edge of the bed. The next moment the hiding place Naruto chose was slowly being lifted in the air.

In moments Unohana was holding the bed above her, using both hands to hold it with ease as her foot raised ever so slowly.

Naruto didn't move, his jaw was agap and he was stunned, either on the development or the sight of Unohana's strength. "You cheated...."

Unohana shook her head as she wore her victorious smile. " I did no such thing. I said I would catch you with my feet, I never said I wouldn't use my hands at some point." She took a quick look at the clock on her wall. "You lasted ten minutes and thirty-seven seconds. Congratulations but....." Unohana lowered her foot, too fast for Naruto to react so it came upon him. Unohana's foot was now on top of him and the sock cloth between her toes wrapped around him. "I win."

As fast as it came upon him Unohana's foot removed itself too, revealing Naruto who was still stunned. Surprisinly the arrancar leapt up and started laughing. "Ya got me!"

Smiling gently Unohana began lowering her bed back down, nudging Naruto back into the open via her foot. "I did win, it was fun while it lasted."

"What now?"

Unohana smiled at him again, "Well I said if I won I would keep you in the loop of my hair braid for the night.....
1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.title: What Started as a Game....

1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.content:
Hearing that Unohana wanted something from him. Naruto gulped in spite of himself. " Well..what do you want?" he asked.

The woman studied him for a long moment "I'm wondering why you, an Arrancar,chose to ally yourself with the soul society against Aizen. I'd like an answer to why."

Naruto shrugged, seeing no harm in that. "There's innocent lives at stake, I had to do what I can to help protect those who can't protect themselves. Might seem strange coming from a former Hollow, but I took what I believed in with me to my grave, Hollowfication isn't enough to change that. I choose to live my afterlife in the same manner I did when I was alive and human. It's as simple and complex as that."

Unohana stared at him, then shook her head. Hueco Mundo was the home of vicious and horrendous fallen souls who became Hollows. Then HE became one of them. Naruto was proof that even as a Hollow, life was determined by one's own beliefs. To stay true to one's path like that without the slightest deviation, even in death...his soul may have fallen, but the boy's spirit was strong as always. And it was strength like that would shake the foundation of the spiritual world as a result.

It made her chuckle thinking about it. If Aizen was evil and he was a Soul Reaper, then Naruto, an arrancar who fought to protect others, was his antitheses. "Ah." Unohana smiled"I must commend you for being so brave and standing up against Aizen, Naruto."

The arrancar blushed, as he met her gaze, his eyes found something that surprised him: There was a scar at the top of her sternum in between her collarbone.

"So that's where you were hurt back when you faced Zaraki when you were a criminal?...huh." he muttered.

Unohana stared at the shrunken, ascended Hollow of the young man.

"H-how do you know about...?!" Unohana said, panic filling her voice.

"Aizen. He had a file on it. Didn't really think it was anything but fiction." Naruto said, then he looked as Unohana gripped the hilt of Minazuki so tight her knuckles were white and her hand was shaking as she built up her Reiryoku.

"BAN..."

"Realx Unohana, Why would I care about a trail of footprints in the desert?" Naruto said calmly.

Unohana stopped building up her spirit energy as she stared dumbstruck at the arrancar. What? What had he just said?

"Wha...what did you just...?" Unohana said, feeling weak-kneed and hoping she hadn't heard him wrong.

"I said I don't care about it. I don't care about people's pasts? Do I think their important to make a person who they are, yes. But do I care about them beyond that, no. Look you're a founding member of the Gotei Thirteen, so as such, you know what life was like before the choice to become Shinigami was like. When there's no other choice to make, you make the choice you must. There wasn't any other way for you to live back in those days. You were that way because it was the only way to survive before the Gotei Thirteen existed. We shouldn't blame ourselves for bad things that happened to us. Sometimes, no matter what we do, we're victims of the circumstances." Naruto said with a small shrug.

Uhohana gawked at the whiskered blond as he looked her in the eye, face serious.

"Unohana. Look at me, look at me and really listen, not just hear...You're a healer, NOT a hitokiri. So you have things in your past your not proud of, who doesn't? Nobody's perfect Unohana. I know that for a fact, since I'm the perfect example of it. Everyone makes mistakes. There's no such thing as a perfect person, or else the world wouldn't be able to improve, evolve for the generations to come." Naruto told her.

"In terms of total existence, I know that I may be a bit young to be talking about these sorts of things, but there is no reason whatsoever that you can let the past haunt you like that. You aren't Kenpachi Yachiru anymore, you're Retsu Unohana. and you'll never have to become that way again as long as I have any say about it, even if I have to take that step for you, you can let the past go and move forward."

Unohana bit her lip as she started to tremble all over and her eyesight blurred and wavered due to the moisture of unshed tears building up in them.

He knew...he knew, yet it didn't matter to him? Hardly anyone within the Seireitei knew her past, most had moved on to the Royal Guard or passed away in the line of duty. Still...her past haunted her. She wasn't naive, she knew all about how all the other Shinigami, even her fellow Captains, feared her...and worst of all, WHY they did. Yet, here he was, letting her know it was alright...that she could move on and utterly forget and bury the fact that she had ever been, was and always would be the most diabolical criminal to ever exist in Soul Society. To discard the mantle of Kenpachi Yachiru at long last.

She sniffed loudly as the tears began to overflow and spill out on their own since she wouldn't weep. She rubbed her eyes to wipe them away.

The next thing Naruto knew, Unohana had slammed him into her lips. As she pulled away, however, Unohana grabbed as her head as if in sudden pain. When she spoke, her voice was much colder and more ominous as she looked at him.

"No...won't...disappear...need to...exist!"

Naruto paled. That was just like how Gaara was originally back when Naruto was alive. Seemed that while Unohana herself sought to change for the better, she was so haunted by her past that she'd developed a split personality with who she CURRENTLY was and who she USED to be!

Unohana was a soft-spoken, polite, and caring woman with a gentle and warm personality.

On the other hand, Kenpachi Yachiru had a violent and bloodthirsty nature, and firmly believed in taking any actions necessary — even sleight of hands such as hidden daggers — to get ahead in battle.

So what would happen to him in this situation?! Shrunken, weaponless, and alone with her, if the wrong side emerged? It was clear "Kenpachi Yachiru" saw him as a threat...which didn't bode well with his odds being what they were if Unohana's bad side got out.

The Fourth Squad Captain clutched her head and swooned as her two personalities seemed to war with one another. After a few seconds, Unohana calmed down and looked at Naruto and the arrancar couldn't help but wonder which side of her personality he would be dealing with.

"NO WAY ARE YOU GETTING INVOLVED AGAINST THAT THING IN A FIGHT!" Yoruichi said, feeling loke a mother almost.

1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.content:
Isane Kotetsu sighed as she pulled on her bathrobe. She had to worry about that tiny arrancar, as a bit of a rule about Soi Fon, she wasn't the nice type...unless it was to Yoruichi. Besides, she had a crush on Naruto worse Momo did, having met the blond in the world of the living when he was alive. He'd saved her from being raped and had taken care of her for half a whiole year until she had returned to the Soul Society. Having found him as an arrancar, she had been too surprised to properly recall him, but not that she had a few moments to recall things, of course she had remembered him fully. She smiled...having found out about him and how he was as an arrancar, she was delighted not even Hollowfication had changed his nature, it had just given Aizen someone on the inside that was against him and aiding the Soul Society.

She smiled. His soul may have fallen when he became a Hollow, but his spirit was still high. She slipped her hand into the pocket of her bathrobe and the 6'1½-tall Lieutenant was surprised that she found something in her pocket and pulled whatever it was out. Her eyes widened as she took out the very object of her thoughts with him in the middle of the palm of her hand.

Rubbing sleep from his eyes, Naruto looked up into the face of a tall, young-looking woman with gray eyes and short messy silver hair with strands on the right side of her face that were shoulder-length and styled into two thin braids. She was wearing a thin dangling red earring on each ear and the silverish-white bathrobe he had been in, and a pair of white tabi socks.

"Hello Whiskers..." Isane whispered to him and his eyes widened. Isane looked at the blond with sheer affection and puckered her lips and brought them to the eveolved class of Hollow and planted a kiss on him, almost pulling him into her mouth. She loved him with all her soul...and coming from someone that called the Soul Society home, that was saying quite a bit. Even if he didn't recall his time alive, like most souls didn't after too long among the decesed, she was sure that given enough time, he would.

Naruto himself was feeling quite freaked out by this. He recognised this woman from the Woman's Shinigami Assocation meeting, but what was she DOING?! He didn't know her! Naruto sighed as he was able to breath again as her lips pulled away and she studied him with one massive, grey eye. The eye in question beetled a she smiled at him.

"Uh...hello." Naruto said akwardly.

"Hello Darling." Isane cooed. "Remember me?"

Naruto looked at her for a long moment, and his eyes seemed to unfocus and his head started to pound. What the heck was wrong with him? "You...You seem fimilar. But why?" Naruto asked.

Isane giggled "Never mind that right now...all that matters is that from now on, we'll be togeather." she cooed.

"Um...what about Mo..." Naruto started to say, but stopped as he saw Isane scowl deeply at the start of him saying Momo's name.

Isane slid Naruto back into her bathrobe pocket and then walked to her bedroom as she thought about what to do with her seemingly long-lost beloved.

In the end, she made up her mind and pulled Naruto out.

"Naruto..." she said, "I know how we're going to be togeather."
1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.title: Isane Kotetsu & Naruto Uzumaki

choices: playing with Nemu first since she's going to tell him anyway
1233211122212111111211212211111112121121.content:
Naruto awoke with a yawn and froze. What the? He was looking out of a cage of fingers and they weren't Yoruichi's! What was more, he was inside a a sleeping bag-style bed with a silver metallic collar around his neck and upper shoulders at where his head was, effectivly making exiting the sleeping bag impossable without outside help.

The cage closed and he was lifted up to a face he'd seen at the the Shinigami Women's Association's meeting.

Petite and youthful, she had green eyes and dark purple hair with slightly parted bangs and is pulled back into a long braid. Her uniform, which she had on (if she'd slept in it, he didn't know) consisted of a short black kimono with a white nagajuban under it. The sleeves of her kimono weren't as wide as those worn by most Shinigami and the upper parts of the sleeves are puffed. She wore a traditional wide white obi with a red cord fastening it. In addition she wore white gloves that covered only the back of her hands and wrists; as well as a dark red choker. She was neither pale or tanned in color of skin, just fair.

Naruto wouldn't deny she was absolutely gorgeous. If his heart wasn't spoken for already, he'd have to say he'd try giving her a shot at her and him trying to make something work.

Seeing him awake, she smiled at him and nuzzled him against her cheek before setting him down by her feet.

"Hello Darling, I'm Nemu, Nemu Kurotsuchi. How was your rest?" she said.

"It was welcomed...thank you kindly for your concern." he said, making this giantess of a Shinigami smile softly at him.

Nemu knew what Mayuri saw whenever he looked at her. A tool, a creation, something to be used whenever necessary, a product with no life, no spirit, no substance. Just as she knew what others saw whenever she passed by them: A thing, his puppet, something that exists to do his bidding. A humiliated, beaten pawn.

That wasn't the case with how she saw herself, no, she was Nemu Kurotsuchi , lieutenant of the twelfth division, a shinigami.

Mayuri created her, it was true, but she'd never seen herself as anything other than a soul who wants nothing more than to be free of his tyranny. Mayuri was someone she loved and loathed in equal parts, for she was inbebted to him for the life, her life, which he held in the palm of his hand. He was a cruel master, who expected her to feel no pain, no sorrow, no joy. In his eyes she was just an experiment and didn't have the right to live. Nemu supposed because Mayuri was so used to having people obey him unquestioningly is he that he didn't know that she was more alive than he will ever be. In his quest for immortality, her "father" left his heart in a place darker than Hueco Mundo. She knew this; She was…closer… to him than most people would think. Yet despite this, she couldn't help but wonder if she was so flawed that he couldn't be proud of her, she knew he didn't love or care about her.All she wanted to do was become stronger, strong enough that he would acknowledge her, that when he looked at her, the only thing reflected in his eyes would be pride.

This wasn't meant to be.

He would never acknowledge her for hin his eyes, she was just an experiment to be taken apart as punishment, or to be the test subject for many other experiments that Mayuri cared nothing for. If she dared to defy him, retribution will be swift- and painful.

Nemu had a dream, one she kept to herself and relived in her darkest moments.

In it, she was standing in a field of daisies, in the sunshine. There wasn't a cloud in the sky, the wind blowing through her hair and she was free to laugh, to spin around in circles and get dizzy, to make daisy chains and pick as many flowers as she wanted. In that dream, a picnic had been laid out for her, with all her favourite foods and drinks, the chocolates from the living world that she liked so much, and there are presents, just for her. It is my birthday, and for one day I am special, I am loved more than anything or anyone, more than a mod-soul had any right to be. She wanted to live. To be happy. To feel the wind in her hair, the sun on her skin...to laugh so hard her stomach hurt...to cry when she's sad, be comforted, and be hugged when she got hurt. She wanted to be loved, be acknowledged, be someone worthwhile. Didn't she deserve the chance to prove that she can be more than what they see her as? Didn't she deserve the chance to show them that she was a good person, someone who is just as real as they were? Nemu wished she wasn't lonely, but she supposed that was the only thing she deserved. Even death was too good for the worthless creature that looks out of her mirror. If she couldn't make her own father love her, how could she ever expect to be seen as a person? If her father loathed her so much, why shouldn't she loathe herself and expect others to do the same? She saw herself as a pawn. A plaything of her father's division. a father's puppet unworthy of the life Mayuri chose to bestow upon her.

As these thoughts all went through her mind, she drew her Zanpakutō, the form of it appeared to be a thin katana with a green hilt and a seemingly warped guard.

"Tear through the Jungle:Shishi Kisaki (Lion Queen)" Nemu shouted, activating her Shikai.

Naruto looked up and there stood Nemu. Only she was different. Unlike the short skirt and robe she wore before, Nemu was decked out in a suit of golden cloth-like armor. Her hair was no longer up in a bun but was now free falling past her shoulders. Encompassing her head was lion shaped samurai helmet with a purple mane on it. On her feet were a pair of dark purple high heel boots going up to her thigh and the toe section of the shoes were clawed.
