"So... now you don't want to be eaten?" She asked, confused by his apparent inability to make up his mind. Ichigo's heart was racing a mile a minute and he sat on her hand panting, "You're cute Ichibug," Moema smiled, "But you've got to learn to be more clear about what you want. Some people might get the wrong impression. It's a big world and I'm sorry to say that the change is permanent." she winked at you.

She walked over to the bed and laid down, her hand cupped around you pressing you against the soft pale skin of her exposed stomach, just below the navel. Ichigo's head was free, so he tried to take a closer look around and see where he was.

Where was he gentlemen?
123332221.title: Moema the Arrancar Appears

124.content:
"Ugh, Where am I?" was all Uryu Ishida said when he found himself waking up. Shaking his head a little bit he found he coudnt remember anything about going to sleep so he assumed he was knocked out. It was then that Uryu gasped, he was on a gigantic wooden floor surrounded by other gigantic objects. For a brainy one like the young Uryu he knew immediately he was shrunken, question was how?

Just as he thought this Uryu recognized exactly where he was,
124.title: Uryu awoke shrunken

1241.content:
"Im in orihimes house" uryu said to himself. He looked around to see if Orihimes was around. Suddenly there was a loud roaring like sound Uryu turned to see Orihimes giant bed with a giant Orihimes asleep in it. Uryu Let out a big sigh. "why did she have to be asleep?" he said. Uryu had no choice but to climb up her bed and wake her up for her to help him.

uryu managed to get a grip on the sheet that covered to Orihimes bed and began to climb. This climb took hours and from time time to Orihimes often moved causing uryu to lose his grip a little and fall losing the progress that he made trying to reach her. When he finally makes it to the top he is at Orihimes feet. "ok i have two choices i could climb up her feet so i can walk across her body to reduce the risk of being crushed however it would take longer or i could go around her which would be shorter but i could get crushed"uryu thinks. Which does he choose?
1241.title: Orihimes house

choices: Orihimes rolls over in her sleep
12412.content:
Uryu decides to climb up and walk to her since it was safer. Uryu First had to climb up her feet. Uryu approached her feet slowly and was immediately hit with a terrible odor. Uryu backed away and covered his nose at first but then approached it again. Uryu Started to climb orihime's foot and trying to stand the horrible odor.

After what felt like hours Uryu had finally reached the top of her foot and slid down and rested right where the leg and foot meet. Once he reached their he saw exactly how long his journey would be. " I better get moving because if she moves ill have to start over." Uryu said to him self. Uryu began walking up Orihimes giant leg slowly. From time to time he often lost his grip and nearly fell but regained it and continued his journey.

Uryu had finished his trek across Orihimes giant leg and reached her waist when.......
12412.title: Walk up on her body

choices: missed and is stuck bewteen her breast
124122.content:
Suddenly there was a large grumbling noise. Uryu stopped in his tracks and listened. There was mumbling sound that followed. Uryu who was curious looked around but saw nothing. Suddenly there was movement all around and Uryu was wondering what was going on. Then orihime started to turn.

"oh no" uryu said. "She starting to move. Uryu began running as fast as he could to get to her pillow before she turned . Orihime was turning slowly from his point of view. Within seconds orihime was nearly turned over and Uryu was nearly there. URyu had no choice but to jump and thats exactly what he did. Uryu jumped and....
124122.title: Orihimes rolls over in her sleep

1242.content: Uryu recognized this place, it was a captains quarters! These rooms were there for captains in their spare time and were all built the same way.The rooms layout was basic, Uryu was on a queen sized bed with a red cover on it. Matching curtains donned a window to Uryus left and next to that was a large dresser presumably full of clothes. To Uryus right there was a desk where the captain probably did their work. That left the door to be behind Uryu and turning around Uryu saw it opening. A figure stepped forward and Uryu was shocked to be looking at....
1242.title: In a captains room

12422.content:
It was captain Soi fon. Uryu was glad it was someone he could probably depend. Now uryu wondered how he could get her attention. While he was thinking he was suddenly snatched up and brought up to eye level with Captain Soi. It didn't take long for uryu to realize that Soi had something to do with this. The two stared each other for a while in silence until uryu finally asked "why have you done this to me?"

Soi replied" i dont have to give you a reason i did what i wanted to do. What you should be asking his what am i going to do to you now." Uryu's became nervous and unsure of what she was planning. Then Soi said " ya know my feet have been hurting today Ive been walking around all day i could use a massage". Soi kicked off her sandals and placed Uryu right in front of her feet and said "get to work." uryu stood their frozen then finally......
12422.title: Soi Fon

124222.content:
Uryu realized it would be stupid to not follow her orders so he slowly walked toward her feet and began massaging them. At first he began gently squeezing them which consumed most of his energy because of his size. Within barely 10 minutes of this uryu was a already tired and stopped. "hey whats going why did you stop" Soi fon shouted.
Uryu not wanting to make her angry in any way started punching her feet as hard as he could.

Considering his size this only felt like a regular massage to soi. Soi fon who was enjoying this let out a big sigh and leaned her head on her pillow and closed her eyes. Within a half hour she fell asleep.At the first snore uryu stopped massaging a looked to see if she was asleep. Uryu had two choices now he could try to escape or he could continue massaging as to not anger her when or if she wakes up in time.
124222.title: Got to work immediately

12423.content:
It was lieutenant himamori. Uryu was surprised a bit but had to act immediately. Before he could even act he was grabbed and cradled by himamori. "oh uryu your ok i was so worried" she said. Uryu was confused. "Whats going on" Uryu asked. "i dont know" Hinamori replied. "Do you remember anything out of the ordinary happening before you shrunk" she asked?

Uryu replied "no not a thing". "Well thats just great" hinamori said in a baby like manner. Uryu and hinamori thought of what to do for moment then hinamori said " well we could ask a captain for help but i think i have some remedies that might work."
Which does he choose.
12423.title: Hinamori?!

124232.content:
"I know your good with kido, but I'll go with having a captain help figure this out." Uryu said.

Hearing his choice, Momo looked thoughtful. "I know you hate Mayuri Kurotsuchi, so maybe Captain Unohana is the best possible choice since she IS the leader of the medical unit for the Soul Society...then again, seeing how Quincies have more in common with Bounts than they do with Soul Reapers, so maybe RanTao would be the best choice to go see first?"

Uryu raised an eyebrow, if he'd still hated Soul Reapers, he'd be stunned at how sensible lieutenant Momo Himamori was. Just went to show there's always an exception to the norm, he supposed.

Momo placed Uryu in the pocket of her shihakusho and used a kido spell to make it so that the only way for Uryu to get out was if she took him out, after all, she didn't want anything to happen to him.

Uryu felt Momo begin to walk to go see the ones who could probably cure him.

Did Momo go to see RanTao or Unohana first to try and find a cure and turn Uryu back to normal?
124232.title: Requesting the mo cappy'tan variety help

choices: get out of there, it's too dangerous
get the help of a fellow female shinigami
12532.content:
Momo was the first to arrive at the emergency meeting and walked into the room. Wondering what was to be discussed, she spotted a strange object on the table. She picked it up and a purple mist shot out in her face. Momo stumbled and passed out, dropping the object onto the table again. When she awoke what was minutes later, she noticed everything seemed much bigger!

"Uh Oh! That thing must've been what is gonna be discussed and now I know why!" She squeeked.

Hinamori looked around, fear and nervousness present in her eyes. Everything...was big, her own sandals she slid off upon entering...she couldn't even fill it up with a dozen of her. She was small...and things couldn't get worse.

Boom

It just got worse, instantly almost every female shinigami vice captain and captain strode in, either clad in their dirty sandals or socks, but none of them noticed Hinamori at all. A gigantic sandal made it's way to Hinamori, looking up she saw the voluptous Matsumoto, and via her shunpo she managed to dodge just in time. But as she reappeared a barefoot stomped mere inches away from Hinamori, the owner of it was none other than Soi Fon, Captain of Squad 2. Before Hinamori could react Soi Fon's other foot kicked her into the path of the other incoming feet. Momo had no time to dust herself off as the massive socked foot of Isane slammed dowm almost on top of her but luckily she rolled out of the way in time.

Just as Momo thought it was over and done with A huge socked foot slammed in front of her. Only one person wears those short socks momo thinks. Its Retsu Unohana! Momo does not have to dodge that foot luckily, as the building sized foot flew by over head. Finally nano Ise walked in and unavoidably kicked the tiny Momo farther into the room.

Momo is a bit shaken by this whole incident, but otherwise unharmed and now in a relatively safe are, now she only has 2 options.....
12532.title: Momo Himormori

choices: Risk it and head to Isane
Nemu is definitely the right choice
125322.content:
There was no real argument over what Hinamori needed to do, she was shrunken and obviously needed help. And there was almost no better opportunity than this, Momo knew each woman in here and well...if she ran she could end up in the hands of some weirdo, got knows what Captain Kurosutchi or maybe even a random Shinigami would do to her. With her fellow Vice Captains and Captains Hinamori at least knew what to expect. Plus at these Female Shinigami meetings either if not both Isane and Captain Unohana would be present, if anyone could fix her it would be them.

She scanned the crowded room for either Isane or Unohana, almost everyone was there, Soi Fon, Matsumoto, Yachiru, Nanao, Nemu, Kiyone, and Isane, but Unohana was nowhere in sight, either too busy or running late for the meeting. But Isane was present and that was a good sign, but there still came the issue of how to get her attention?

As luck would have it Isane was on the opposite end of the room, with a large open area of socked,sandaled, and even barefoot female Shinigami. Even with the skills of a Vice Captain it was practically suicide to try to cross, Hinamori would likely end up stuck to someones dirty foot if not crushed.

"If only I didn't touch that darn thing..." Hinamori whined, that strange cylinder-like object on the small table nearby...she assumed the meeting was about it but no one was even paying it any mind at all. As if to answer for it Momo caught a conversation between Yachiru and Matsumoto about halfway through the room.

"Why the emergency meeting Chairwoman?"

Yachiru replied in her ever peppy voice, "I wanted to party ASAP!!" Momo tuned out the conversation after that, she rushed there for dear life expected an emergency...but it was a false alarm....again, how did Yachiru end as chairwoman again?

But...that made the shrunken Vice Captain wonder...what was that cylinder again? A nearby conversation with Nemu and Nanao explained that too.

"Nemu...do you know what this object is?" Nanao reached out to touch the black cylinder but Nemu gripped her hand tightly.

"I wouldn't, Master Mayuri created that in order to contain hollow specimens, if a Hollow were to come in contact it would be shrunken and teleported into the container. But if a Shinigami touched it, it would only result in shrinking. So unless you want to end up very small, I'd advise not touching." Nanao pulled back her hand sharply and walked away, her face an almost unhealthy pale.

But it made Hinamori perk right up, if Kurosutchi created the device, surely he could reverse its effects! But then again, knowing that madman he might just experiment on poor little her, or Nemu might just torture her, she was never very predictable. It came down to the simply choice, would Hinamori go to Isane for help? Despite her being across the room, the trip would be a marathon against Death but...while Nemu was considerably closer there was no guarantee she would actually be safe with that route....

"What do I do?!"

Hinamori began to sob but someone's passing socked foot nearly crushed her and instinctively she hid against a wall, carefully eyeing the entire crowd for any coming threats. Kiyone was so close to crushing her just then...she needed to be careful! While safe there, Hinamori thought long and hard, even though she was still shaken by Aizen's betray she still managed to think everything out logically, and came up with the proper course of action...
125322.title: False Alarm

1253221.content:
"I have no choice but to get to Isane. She's the kindest and most friendly female shinigami. She wouldn't take advantage of mu current situation". Hinomori said. How can i avoid all these feet? she thought. if I'm not careful even my shunpo would get me crushed.

She began to sprint as fast as she could right for Isane on the far side of the room, in an attempt to avoid most of the foot traffic, but didn't get far as she crashed into the heel of someones socked foot. She couldn't even see who it was and had no time to look as the foot lifted again. The dirty socked sole came zooming towards her but just in time, Momo used Shunpo and evaded the huge foot.

After 45 minutes of dodges feet and even some hands, Hinomori just about made it to Isane when all of a sudden a huge shadow overcame her. Looking up, she saw a dirty sole and...."thump" she was stepped on, but survived. Who's foot is she stuck to?
1253221.title: A dangerous journey

choices: She won't....just in time for the dancing to begin.
12532211.content:
Irony worked in funny ways, here Hinamori had just been fighting for her life against the unaware harbingers of death that were these womens feet as she worked her way to Isane, only to get stepped on by none other than the unusually tall woman. Momo tried to react with a proper Shunpo and escape but she had no time, Isane's dirty sole had found itself on the shrunken girl. If it were someone a tad more...small maybe she would have just gotten away with getting stepped on, but nope; Isane with her tall amazon stature was just heavy enough for poor Momo to get stuck into the depths of the dirt along her sole whilst she walked, and she was too squished into the fleshy prison to do much of anything to get away. Hinamori prayed the ever sensitive amazoness would notice her, or she would be in for a long, long day.

Normally Isane would have noticed too, but if she were alone. But being the shy girl she was this public event made her nervous, shaky, and sweaty, she tried to blend in as best she could, but when you're sisters with a loudmouth like Kiyone it wasn't going to happen. The tall woman blushed as she walked to get a drink to settle her nerves, the first step she took she felt like something important happened, but again being nervous she didn't notice the fact a poor girl was suffering beneath her feet. When she finally got her drink Isane felt like she could just die...Kiyone started getting into a friendly argument with Yachiru and Isane being the big sister was looked at to stop her sister, as always she felt like an abnormality.

" Everything about me is too big... She mentally huffed, eyeing her body with a sort of horrified expressions. Isane hated being so big, her breasts were compatable to Rangiku Matsumoto's but she hid them well with her Shihaksho, her feet were the biggest in the Soul Society (something she despised greatly) her butt was abnormal, and of course there was the fact she was nearly seven feet tall. Sometimes Isane wished she was as small as a speck of dirt, at least then people wouldn't stare at her like some kind of a freak. Of course if Isane had any idea what Momo Hinamori was going through she would likely change her mind about that. Isane's nervousness was making things worse for the poor girl, constantly her body temperature seemed on the rise making Hinamori feel like she was burning a fever. Her feet were always shuffling nervously, and being the nervous wreck she was Isane sweated...only most people sweat through their armpits or neck...Isane's feet were the first to start in a cruel twist of irony. All of this on top of the fact Isane's bare soles were pretty dirty, didn't smell though; Isane was obsessive about cleanliness, anything to make her not stand out, the dirt on her feet was only from arriving at the party barefoot, and with each step more and more dirt piled on to it, and on to Momo.

Hinamori felt like she was ready to cry, for some reason it was always her who ended up suffering among her fellow Vice Captains. Aizen's betrayal, her getting impaled by him, her pyschological issues since then, and now this, life really was unfair. But Momo did not cry, she used up all her tears on the Aizen incident and that was a thousand times worse than this! She would get out of this but it was a lot harder than it sounded. She kept trying to push herself out of Isane's meaty sole but damn she was squished in there good, and any time Momo actually made any headway Isane would take a step and push Hinamori even further in. More than once some of the foot dirt and grime got on to Hinamori, staining her appearance to a more ragged form, she just gritted her teeth and kept trying though.

The party was going great, but Isane still had her paranoid delusions of being a freak among the much smaller women, Kiyone and Captain Unohana would be her only comforts in this situation but Kiyone was having too much fun and Unohana was too busy with battle wounds....Squad Eleven got a little rough again. Isane wanted to stay but Unohana politely asked her to go, but she spoke it with that powerful tone that made it more like a command than anything. And so...Isane was here, very uncomfortable and blushing a bright red. Plus there was this nagging feeling like something was very important and she was missing it, aside from her left foot feeling oddly comfortable Isane saw nothing wrong and just shrugged it off, but the feeling stayed.

It was then she noticed something wrong and grabbed the nearest person she could Nanao Ise. "Nanao, do you know where Hinamori is?"

The nerdy looking Shinigami tensed at the mention of Hinamori but showed deep concern in her eyes, "She was invited...but she may still be stuck in her room due to the Aizen incident....such a shame too a party like this would really have helped her."

BEG to differ!!! Momo mentally screamed, she was going to vocally scream but the last thing she wanted was the taste of Isane's dirt ridden foot in her mouth.

Isane looked at Nanao sadly, "I see...thank you..." She allowed Nanao to walk away but instinct was telling her Momo was the key in all this, like somehow she was involved in ways Isane wouldn't normally guess. She knew for a fact she saw Hinamori hurrying before the party, right after it was announced as an emergency meeting...but she wasn't here; something was definitely off. She would definitely look into it after the party, but not at that moment. It would ruin everyone's good time and she would likely come off as paranoid, she'll wait until after the party and bring it up with her Captain.

Hinamori's hopes were raised and crushed when Isane asked about her then stopped, that was probably the closest she was going to get to a rescue unless she did something. But being underneath Isane's foot options were very limited, her arms were restricted so no Zanpaktou, Isane's foot steps ruled out concentrating for Kido. In fact, the only options Momo seemed to have that would help at all were two, bite, or lick Isane's foot. Licking would tickle her as she was overly sensitive to it, biting well...an ant could do it and get attention why couldn't she? Initially Hinamori was inclined towards biting but....a part of her deep down inside was against it; it would mean intentionally harming Isane, even though it would be minor....Momo had had enough of that already...and maybe all the constant steps Isane was taking messed with her thinking process a bit. So she crossed off biting and that left only licking, but...would Momo really go that far, to lick the dirt ridden sole of the most sensitive Female Shinigami in existence?

It was a question of personal honor more than anything else....Would Momo do it?
12532211.title: Fate Works in Funny Ways

choices: inspect her foot out in the open
go to the bathroom and inspect it there
125322111.content:
Momo gringed at the obvoius choice, she opened her mouth slowly as if some of her pride had not been swallowed. She finally sucked all of it in and licked the amazons dirt covered sole, a tear emerged from her right eye at the taste. She hopped her fellow shinigami would notice this and inspect her foot carefully.

----------------------------

Isane chuckled as she felt a ticklish sensation on her right sole. She felt it again after a ew seconds. these chuckles evolved into giggles, then those giggles evolved into short bursts of laughter. "Isane is something wrong?" Unohana asked her luietenant wondering what was so funny. "Oh nothing Unohana-sama." She said shaking her head and pintching herself to combat the sensation with pain. She grinded her foot into the ground to get rid of the feeling but instead she was harming her friend. 'Please Isane, look at your foot!' Momo mentaly screamed in pain. Isane was getting annoyed and decided too....
125322111.title: Yes! Survival takes priority.

1253221111.content:
"I'm sorry captain Unohana. It feels like there is something on the bottom of my foot and is tickling me. Would it be alright if I check to see what it is?" asked Isane. "Sure." Unohana said to her lieutenant. "Just have a seat over there and I will come and help check out what it is." Isane walks over to an empty chair and waits for Unohana to come to her. "I hope it isn't a bug." thought the lieutenant. "It would be so gross to discover I stepped on a bug with my bare feet."After a while, the captain finally comes over to Isane. "Okay Isane, bring your foot up so that we can see just what is bothering you." said Unohana. Isane brings her foot up so they can see just what is causing the tickling sensation she was experiencing. "Hmm. I don't see anything on your foot Isane. Maybe it is just in your head?" "But captain, I'm sure there is something on there. There just has to be." Isane replied to her captain. "Okay. I'll take a closer look."

Momo's perspective was different. Still licking Isane's foot, she was starting to lose hope of being found. She has been doing this for awhile and she still couldn't get the lieutenant's attention. Just as she was about to give up, she finally heard something that showed that what she did was working. She heard Isane ask for her captain to help her check to see what was causing her foot to feel like it was being tickled. As Isane walked over to the chair, Momo couldn't help but smile,because she knew that she now had a chance to finally get found. As Isane sat down, Momo thought about how she was going to get her attention. "How will I get them to see me?" thought Momo. "I am too small to be sensed. They probably don't know where I am, either. I guess Ill just have to hope that they will see me." As she waited for the chance to get found, Isane started to tap her foot while waiting for the captain. This had the effect of making Momo feel like she was on a roller coaster and disorient her.

Finally, the captain had arrived and had Isane raise her foot. Momo couldn't help the tears of joy that sprang from her face at thechance to finally be saved. As soon as the foot she was on stopped, she was face to face with the titanic faces of Isane and Unohana. "HMM. I DON'T SEE ANYTHING ON YOUR FOOT ISANE. MAYBE IT IS JUST IN YOUR HEAD?" boomed Unohana. "BUT CAPTAIN, I'M SURE THERE IS SOMETHING ON THERE. THERE JUST HAS TO BE." came Isane's equally loud reply. "OKAY. I'LL TAKE A CLOSER LOOK." And soon Momo was confronted with the captain's titanic eye. Momo unpeeled herself from Isane's foot and tried to get Unohana's attention. "CAPTAIN! I'M RIGHT HERE! FOR SOME REASON, I ENDED UP BEING SHRUNK DOWN! PLEASE, HELP ME GET BACK TO NORMAL!" shouted out Momo, who tried her best to be heard. "HMM? WHAT IS THIS LITTLE SPECK?. I THINK I FOUND YOUR PROBLEM ISANE. IT LOOKS LIKE THERE IS A TINY BUG ON YOUR FOOT." "WHAT!? CAN YOU SHOW ME THE BUG, CAPTAIN?"asked Isane. When Momo heard the word bug, she tried to yell to them that she wasn't a bug. While she was doing this, she didn't see Unohana's giant fingers coming to grab her until it was too late to run away.

Unohana quickly grabbed the bug in her fingers and showed it to her lieutenant. "So, this was the thing that was tickling my feet?" asked Isane. "It appears so." replied Unohana. "What I can't tell is what kind of bug it is. Would you like to see?" "Yes." came Isane's reply. Unohana carefully handed the bug to Isane so she could see it better. "I'm not sure what kind of bug this thing is either, captain. Should we squash it?" With that, Isane started to push her fingers together to squash the bug for good. To Momo, it felt like she was in the middle of a trash compacter. "NO, ISANE PLEASE! I BEG OF YOU, PLEASE DON'T SQUASH ME!" shouted Momo. Just as suddenly as it began, it stopped. "No no. I don't think that would be a good idea. We don't know what that poor thing could be. For all we know, it could be a new species that could only be found in the soul society. I think we should bring it with us to be checked out." said Unohana. "Okay, captain. But what are we going to carry it in so it doesn't get away?" "I have an idea. Bring me one of your socks. Since it survived under your feet, it should survive in your sock." And with that, Isane went to retrieve her socks. When she returned, Unohana took the bug and dropped it into the sock and tied it into a know to close it. "Come on Isane. Let's get back to our division."

To Momo, it was horrible. First she was stepped on by the giant woman to everyone else. Next she gets called a bug. And now she is in a sock being carried to who knows where. "Oh great. Now I'm stuck in a sock being carried to fourth division to be checked on to see if I'm a new bug. This couldn't possibly get worse." Sadly, it did. The sock she was in already had a slight smell on it from being worn all day. Now that it was closed, the stench had no where else to go but stay inside and quickly got worse. Combined withe the sway of the sock as she was being carried, it was a miracle she didn't throw up yet. It eventually can to an end as the swaying stopped. "Now what?" thought Momo. The sock finally opened and she was dropped onto a table. She then saw Isane and Unohana standing there with magnifying glasses in their hands. "OKAY ISANE, ARE YOU READY TO SEE WHAT THIS THING IS?" asked Unohana. "YES MA'AM." They brought the magnifying glasses up to Momo to finally see what it was that was causing Isane trouble.

What do Isane and Unohana see?
1253221111.title: inspect her foot out in the open

choices: No, she just crushes her like a bug
12532212.content:
Momo gazed at the monolithic shadow casted by Unohana's foot. The foot was as big as a building and, judging by the dirty lint balls and yellowish sweat stains covering the sock, it was safe to assume that Retsu had worn these socks for a while without washing them.

*Thump*

Almost instantly, Momo felt a immense amount of pressure on top of her body. She felt the moist, sweaty fibers of Unohana's sock. Momo also noticed the cheesy smell that the sock was emitting as it crushed her. It was far too heavy to resist against. As much as she tried, the sock had completely conquered her. To Unohana, it wasn't even like stepping on a bug. At least stepping on bug, one feels the bug being crushed. Momo was much smaller than that. Stepping on her was like just walking on dirt.

As Retsu lifted her foot again, Momo noticed that she was leaving the ground with it. She was stuck to Unohana's socked sole, like a piece of dirt. As Unohana was walking around, greeting the other Shinigami, she was unaware that she was stepping all over a poor, speck-sized Momo. Finally, after being stepping on for what felt like an eternity, Momo finally saw a light: Unohana was taking her seat. "Finally, now I need to get off of this sock." The putrid fumes of the sock were starting to get to Momo so she wanted off as so as she could. She heard the captain discussing issues, including what the object that shrunk her was.

Immediately, Momo realized that this was her chance. She tried as hard as she could to get unstuck to the smelly sock but to no avail. "Looks like I'm gonna have to use the big guns now.", she said. She pulls out her blade to cut the tree trunk-sized sweaty socked fiber she was currently stuck to. As she pulled her sword out. She saw Retsu's other foot getting closer to her.

"Noooooooooooooooooooo", she yelled at the top of her lungs, as the colossal foot came in contact. Retsu, who was oblivious to the tiny shriek and was just casually itching her feet, was sandwiching Momo in between them. Momo was completely surrounded by smelly sock fibers. The thick, cheesy smell of Retsu's socks were extremely powerful, and they were rubbing the smell all over her miniscule body. The rubbing caused Momo to drop her sword. The sword fell on a fiber. However, because the sword was the size of dust, Unohana did not feel a thing. She stopped rubbing her feet together, but, seeing how comfortable she was now, she keep them together. Despite losing her sword, Momo did not give up hope. She once again tried to wiggle free as hard as she could.

This time, she became free. She began rolling down the socked sole until she stopped at the toes. "All of this and Retsu still didn't notice me.", Momo commented as she shook her head. As she glanced up, she understood why. Saying that Unohana was the size of a skyscraper would have been a major understatement. She was monolithic. A colossal goddess like her would've never noticed Momo on her sock. To her, Momo was just a tiny piece of lint. Momo scrambled to her feet and noticed that the smell was worse. Unohana's socked toes were emitting the most stink out of all the places on her foot. Momo began to climb Retsu's big toe, which was as big as a skyscraper in and of itself. Luckily, as disgusting as they smelled, the socked fibers were a good way to climb.

Momo finally reached the cushion Retsu was sitting on. She saw that the other Shinigami were getting up. "Crud, just as I get unstuck, everyone is leaving. Now how am I supposed to get back to normal?" She began to feel the cushion ground move as Retsu was also standing up. Momo rolled off of the cushion, onto the ground. She looked up to see Retsu at her full height. Like it was said before, she was simply monolithic.

"Now we'll continue this meeting in a few minutes. Everyone just stretch and get some water." said Unohana, in her booming voice. As she turned to leave, she noticed a tiny speck on the floor. She didn't care until she noticed that it began to move.

As Momo was getting back up, she heard a booming, god-like voice cry," Ewww! A tiny bug was on my seat."

Shivering in fear, she turned slowly to see Unohana glaring down at her, lifting her giant foot.

"No! RETSU, IT'S ME! MOMO! DON'T SEE ON ME."

Momo screamed as loud as she could. The last thing she wanted was to experience that hell again. Does Retsu hear her?
12532212.title: Unohana's socked foot

choices: I think I'll keep you as my own personal foot bug"
Yachiru would love to play with you, little bug"
125322122.content:
Momo gazed at the monolithic shadow casted by Unohana's foot. The foot was as big as a building and, judging by the dirty lint balls and yellowish sweat stains covering the sock, it was safe to assume that Retsu had worn these socks for a while without washing them.

It neared her as if to tell her that she'd never escape Uhohana's socked foot, her tormentor.

*Thump*

Almost instantly, Momo felt a immense amount of pressure on top of her body. She felt the moist, sweaty fibers of Unohana's sock. Momo also noticed the cheesy smell that the sock was emitting as it crushed her. It was far too heavy to resist against. As much as she tried, the sock had completely conquered her.

"Gotta grind it, or it may still be there." Retsu said and started twisting her foot on the bug.

Momo screamed for mercy as her entire body was now squished from ALL SIDES by Retsu's disgusting, sweaty, raunchy socks as she felt she was going to be torn apart. She couldn't move a single muscle, as she helplessly sank deeper and deeper into the tree trunk-sized sweaty socked fibers covering Unohana's sole. An embarrassing fate indeed, smothered and swallowed by Retsu's feet. In her mind, Momo felt as though she'd truly become one with her foot. Her smell completely overtook the little lieutenant. The very air she breathed was now 100% tainted by Retsu's horrible foot. Foot stench fills Momo's nostrils and lungs, and slowly goes through her blood stream like some type of drug, making Momo loose her mind. Though it was pure black on the underside of the monolithic foot, Momo could swear she could see Retsu's socked foot, playfully squeezing and squishing her over and over again, as if it were chewing, trying to make her a part of it.

After a while of Retsu Unohana grinding her under her sole, Momo was raised along with the foot she was now throughly stuck to and she saw Retsu's other foot getting closer to her.

"Noooooooooooooooooooo", she yelled at the top of her lungs, as the colossal foot came in contact. Retsu sandwiching Momo in between them. Momo was completely surrounded by smelly sock fibers. The thick, cheesy smell of Retsu's socks were extremely powerful, and they were rubbing the smell all over her miniscule body. She stopped rubbing her feet together, but, seeing how comfortable she was now, she kept them together in an attempt to suffocate the bug.

After a good hour, the socked was removed and replaced with Unohana's face.

"So you're still around, tiny bug?" Uhohana asked, eyeing the speck. "Well you certainly do like my socks and feet don't you?" she smiled.

Momo screamed at the goddess in very unlady-like language. It was most likely a good thing she was too small to hear. She felt a bit better after using words too vulger for a sailor to vent how wrong Unohana was about Momo's opinion of her socked feet.

Unohana, oblivious to the tiny Shingami's plight, looked at the incect.

"You know little one, since you're so durable...
125322122.title: Momo vs. Retsu's socked feet--round 2

1253221221.content:
As soon as Momo heard that sentence, the hope she had seemed to drain from her face. The thought of spending any more time with the feet that have been crushing her sounded like a death sentence to her. "Oh no! She wouldn't do this to me, could she?" Momo thought to herself. "I have to escape, but how?" As she was pondering this, she never saw Unohana begin to reach down for her. Momo finally noticed the growing shadow around her, but couldn't do anything to escape as she was grabbed by Unohana. "That's odd. Usually bugs run away when people try to grab them." said Unohana. "Maybe you do want to be my little foot pet. First, let's try to see what kind of bug you are. Don't want you to bite me when you're doing your job, do we?"

Momo was slowly brought up to the captain's eye. The first thing she saw was just how big the eye was compared to her. It was like looking at a four story building. She now understood just how insignificant she was compared to Unohana. "Dear kami. She's freaking huge compared to me. I doubt she will be able to see any kind of detail about me. Maybe she'll hear me, though. Hopefully I'm close enough to her face to be heard." thought Momo. "CAPTAIN UNOHANA! IT'S ME, MOMO! FOR SOME REASON, I'VE BEEN SHRUNK DOWN TO NEAR MICROSCOPIC SIZE! I TRIED GETTING YOUR ATTENTION EARLIER, BUT YOU WERE TOO BIG TO HEAR ME! PLEASE, HELP ME!" shouted Momo. Sadly, she still went unheard as Unohana muttered to herself. "Hmm... you seem like you can't bite me. Kinda hard to tell though. Oh well, you appear small enough that you can't break skin. And even if you do, I can just squash you flat. Other than that, you're perfect. Get ready for your new home."

Still keeping a grip on Momo so she couldn't get away, Unohana sat down and began to reach to take of her right sock. When she took it off, she saw the state it was in. "Oh dear. Looks like I might have to clean these soon. They look almost yellow. And the smell is pretty bad, too. Too bad I don't have much time to change them more often. I am always on my feet doing my duties, as well as taking care of the injured in fourth division. I almost feel sorry for you, my pet. You get to experience these first hand. All alone, with nothing but my feet and socks to keep you company. Hey! Maybe you can help me, my little pet. Maybe you can absorb some of the stink my socks have. After awhile, the stink will hopefully be cut down to a more bearable level. I knew it was a good idea to keep you." Momo, having already experienced the titanic captain's feet first hand, feared for the worst when she heard what Unohana said. The stink from when she was under them still lingered on her, and to hear that she would be spending a lot more time inside the socks instead of the outside of them made her struggle harder to escape Unohana's grip. "I have to get out of her hand now! If I don't, I'm going to be spending the rest of my life near those things." thought Momo. Meanwhile, Unohana continued talking. "Heck, maybe after awhile, I'll share you with some of the other females. I'm sure Rukia and Orihime could use you. They say they need something to help their feet, and it's my duty as a doctor to help them. Then there are some of the other female shinigami. I always thought my lieutenant could use something to help her relax after a hard day, and you would be perfect for her. Be careful, though. She has stinkier feet than I do. Not to mention bigger. Oh well, time for your new home."

Unohana opened her sock and moved the hand holding Momo over it. "Hope you enjoy it. You'll be staying here a long time." And with that, Unohana dropped Momo into her sock. To Momo, the fall felt like eternity to her, while in reality, it was only a couple of seconds. She soon landed into the toe section of the sock and the first thing she noticed was the smell. It was literally the worst thing she had ever smelled. It was like the smell on the outside of the sock magnified by ten. It alone nearly made her pass out. Next was the heat. It was as if she was in a furnace. The final thing she noticed was the sweat. It felt like a Shana in there from the feel of it, and was obvious that the sock absorbed most of it. "Well, looks like you're having fun. I hope you enjoy your home for the foreseeable future. You do look lonely, though. Don't worry. Your roommate is coming to meet you in a second." Momo heard above her. She barely had time to look up before the sock started turning and shaking her around. When it finally stopped, she looked back to the opening to see if she could escape, but was too late as Unohana's massive foot came barreling back in. Momo knew the only way to survive this was to get into a place where there was less pressure on her. "I can't believe I have to do this." she thought to herself. Carefully, she positioned herself so that she would get caught between the captain's big and second toe. It happened quickly. The foot crashed into her body and met the end of the sock. Meanwhile, Momo was between the toes as she had planned. The bad part was she had landed in a patch of toe jam that most would barely notice. "Eww! This is so gross." Momo said, but it quickly got worse. The toes started to clench and unclench as if to adjust the sock. This had the effect of shoving Momo into the patch and making her get stuck in it. Finally Unohana was ready to leave.

"I hope your ready for the rest of the day, my little bug. Don't forget to do your job and absorb the smell. Oh, and if you get hungry, there is some toe jam and lint you can eat and sweat in case you get thirsty." And with that, Unohana started to walk. To Momo, it was like riding a rollercoaster at high speed. She quickly resisted the urge to throw up, and tried to escape the toe jam she was in. As she tried, she noticed that the longer the captain walked, the worse it got for her. The toes she was between started to sweat more. The stench started getting more and more unbearable. The heat started rising exponentially. All of this due to Unohana just going about her day. Momo was truelly suffering at this moment.

What happens next?
1253221221.title: I think I'll keep you as my own personal fo...

12532212212.content:
The first thing Unohana decided to do was to take a walk around her division to check up on her patients and subordinates. Sometimes she would have to help the newer subordinates with some rather difficult injuries, but most of the time she just stood there and watched, proud of how well the members of forth division were able to heal others injuries. All of these movements and moments of some stillness had the effect of making Momo, who was still trapped in the toejam between the gigantic captain's toes, very disoriented. "Kami, this sucks." thought Momo who looked close to throwing up. Suddenly the foot she was stuck with started to move even quicker than what it has been moving. "What the hell is going on?!" Unohana was just standing around when one of her seated members ran up to her. "Taichou, we have a problem! A member of eleventh division got incredibly cocky and used hollow bait to train. The fool was quickly over run with them. Thankfully, there were some others with him, but he is in terrible shape. We need you immediately!" the unnamed shinigami said. "I'm on my way." said Unohana. "Hopefully my little foot pet can handle a bit of running. I would hate to have it die this soon." she thought to herself.

Unohana quickly entered the room where the injured shinigami was. "Oh dear, this does seem bad. Thankfully I'll be able to heal him, but he will have to rest for a month after this." said Unohana to the others in the room. Working quickly, she slowly healed the injured shinigami. "There. He will be okay, but make sure he stays in bed for a month and to not use hollow bait unless he has more people with him. I hope I don't see him like this again." told Unohana to the people that brought him in. Seeing this was over, she decided to go outside and relax in the sun for awhile. "Hmm, I think I'll keep my socks on for this. Too bad it's so hot today. Oh well, atleast my pet will get plenty of my sweat to drink." With that, she took a short nap. To Momo, the running she did had the unfortunate side effect of forcing into the toejam even further. "Please let this end soon." Momo said to herself. Suddenly some toejam that came loose during the running fell off and landed into her mouth. "Oh kami! This is disgusting!" she thought. It filled her mouth to the point she had to swallow it or rick suffocating. Deciding to get it over with, she quickly tried to swallow it. The stuff, however, don't want to go so quickly, and slid down her throat slowly. "Please go down." thought Momo with a grimace.

The foot finally started moving again, but quickly stopped moving. "Now what?" Momo thought. Seeing nothing wrong, Momo decided to take a short nap with nothing else to do. The sock she was in was quickly getting hotter and the foot started sweating worse stink even more. All of this quickly led to Momo waking up sweating. The sweat was slowly staring to make her breathing harder and harder. Seeing no other option to to stay alive, Mom quickly started to lick all the sweat away. The sweat kept coming, however. Slowly soaking her from head to toe in the captain's sweat and oils, Momo had to continue licking just to survive. Unohana woke up feeling great and refreshed after her nap. The first thing the captain felt was what she thought was a bug liking between her toes. "I guess you really like my sweat down there, little guy." said Unohana. "I'll make sure you have a steady supply." With that, she got up and went to her office to do some paperwork. After some time of this, she quickly got bored. "This is so boring." she thought. "Wonder what I can do to make this more fun? Ooh, that's a wonderful idea." She slowly reached down and pulled off her socks.

To Momo, she felt shaking, and suddenly she saw a bright light. After her eyes adjusted, she saw she was finally out of the sock. "Oh thank kami." she said. Looking up, she saw Unohana's face looking down at her. "WHERE ARE YOU MY LITTLE PET? I KNOW YOUR DOWN THERE." Unohana finally noticed where Momo was. "OH. IT LOOKS LIKE YOU HAD A FUN TIME. HOW DID YOU ENJOY BEING STUCK BETWEEN MY BEAUTIFUL TOES? WELL, I FIGURED IT WAS TIME FOR US TO BOND AS A MASTER AND PET. AND THE BEST WAY TO TO THAT IS WITH PLAYING WITH EACH OTHER. GET READY." Unohana used her finger and picked Momo out from between her toes and sat her down between her massive feet. "I think I see where this is going." thought Momo with a sigh. Unohana's feet came together, trapping Momo in some kind of demented form of a hug. Struggling to escape, Momo was able to slide past the balls of the feet due to the sweat, but was quickly stopped by the captains toes. Feeling the bug struggle made Unohana laugh. "This is so much fun. I'm glad that I came up with this idea." Taking her toes away from Momo, she let the bug get away from her by an inch and quickly trapped it under her big toe. Suddenly, the toes trapping Momo separated. "This is my chance to escape!" thought Momo. She ran as quick as she could, but didn't make it ten feet before she felt a huge pressure push down on her back. Looking up, she saw it was the captains big toe on her right foot. It then started rubbing up against her, as if trying to cuddle with her, rubbing all over Momo all the stuff that was on it, such as sweat, lint, dead skin, and more.After awhile, the toe stopped and removed itself. Thinking it was over, Momo was unprepared for the next toe that decided to rest on her back. This process continued until Momo knew every detail of every one of Unohana's shiny black painted toes.

Finally the day was at an end and Unohana finished her paperwork. She played with the little bug for many hours and never grew bored of it. Reaching down for it, the captain saw it wasn't moving and decided to just carry it back to her quarters to go to sleep for the night. Having no time to make a place for the bug, Unohana decided to just drop the bug into one of the socks she wore that day and wear it to bed. Feeling the bug between her toes, the captain decided that today was over and quickly fell asleep.

What happens next?
12532212212.title: Momo's day in Unohana's sock

125322122121.content:
A few hours after Unohana fell asleep, Momo finally woke up after falling unconscious while Unohana's feet played with her. At first, she didn't know what was happening. Then the memories of shrinking and spending the day under the captain's feet came rushing in. "Oh kami. Why couldn't this just be a horrible dream." said Momo. "Why did I shrink in the first place? Was it some kind of experimental kido? Maybe Mayuri built something and decided to try it on some unexpecting victim. I wouldn't put it passed him to do something like that. Oh well, the fist thing I need to do is try to figure out what happened before I passed out and where I am now." Thinking back to the last moment she had before everything went black, she remembered that Unohana had put her face in between her big and first toe and kept it there. She remembered being forced to eat everything that was between them or Unohana would start to scrunch her toes and basically force feed her the lint, sweat, and dead skin that had accumulated during the day. Finally, she remembered being pushed into the crevice for so long that she had trouble breathing and fell unconscious.

"Well, that answers what happened, but what about where I am?" asked Momo to herself. Deciding to check her surroundings, she found she couldn't see much. "Well, wherever I am, it's dark." Moving her hands in front of her, she felt something solid, yet slightly wet. Pushing onto it, whatever it was slightly gave. Checking behind her, she found the same thing as what was behind her. Checking to see if she was in a small box, Momo stuck her arms out to both sides and felt nothing. "Okay, so it's dark and wet. I'm also in between two things are also wet. That doesn't really narrow it down. Wait, why didn't I try this first." She calmed down and cast a small kido that summons a small ball of light. Checking her surroundings again, she finally realized where she was. "NOOOO!!!" she yelled. She finally realised where she was at. She was inside Unohana's sock and between her toes. Backing away, she nearly fell off as she reached the edge.

"Woah!" she exclaimed. "Wait a second. Why isn't Unohana doing something to me right now? What time is it?" Deciding to try and listen to what was happening, she tried to see what she could hear. All she heard was the sound of someone snoring lightly in the distance. "Okay, so it must be night time and Unohana is asleep. This is perfect! With her asleep, I can probably get away from her and find someone to help me." Momo said happily. Deciding to escape, she slowly started the slow climb down the sleeping captain's foot. Slowly but surely, she made it down passed the ball of Unohana's foot and made it to her sole. "Wow," thought Momo. "This is kinda easy. I figured Unohana would have done something to me by now." While she was thinking this, her staying on one place of Unohana's foot caused an subconscious movement from Unohana. Bringing her foot over to the other, the unconscious captain brought her big toe to the spot where it was itching and vigorously scratched there. To Momo, this happened unexpectedly. She was staring to climb down when suddenly, she felt a giant weight smash into her back and push her into the captain's unwashed foot. Then the weight started to push her up and down quickly and repeatedly, all while pushing her deeper and deeper into the foot. Up and down. Up and down it went for a good minute before the weight finally left her. This didn't leave her unaffected though. She was so disoriented from the event she quickly lost her grip and fell down to Unohana's heel.

Momo closed her eyes and waited to hit the ground, but what she didn't expect was bouncing up slightly after hitting the bottom. "Huh? Why didn't I die?" asked Momo after opening her eyes. "Oh wait. I can't believe I forgot I was on a mattress. Guess I wasn't in much danger." Finally at the bottom, Momo couldn't help but look up to the foot that she had just survived falling/climbing down. This cemented just how small she was compared to Unohana. It was like standing next to a small skyscraper for Momo. "Wow. I can't believe I finally made it down. Time to escape." Walking out of the sock was a blessing for Momo. She finally got a breath of fresh air after spending a day of torture under Unohana's feet. She saw she was close to the edge of the bed and started to climb down to freedom. Half way down Momo heard Unohana mutter something in her sleep. "Oh yes, right there Isane. That is just where all my stress is." "Huh... guess Unohana is dreaming of getting a massage from Isane." thought Momo. "Excellent work Momo, you give incredible massages as well." "Wow, she is also dreaming of me? That is kinda flattering." thought Momo. "Oh, I'm so happy we agreed to this relationship. The woman I taught and love massaging my shoulders and the other I watched from afar massaging my feet. This is perfect. And the best part is that you are both small enough to fit in my hand and protect. Just perfect." murmured Unohana for the last time. "Wait what was that last part!?" said Momo. "Holy cow! I had no idea Unohana felt that way about me. Kinda odd about her wanting me and Isane, but still kinda nice. After I get back to normal size, I might have to try and get to know her better." thought Momo with a blush.

Finally reaching the bottom of the floor, Momo noticed light was drifting in from the window. "Wow. How long did it take me to escape from her sock?" While she was wondering this, the light from the the window hit Unohana in the eyes and nudged her to wake up. "Hmm… that was a pleasant sleep. And what a wonderful dream as well. If only that could really happen." said Unohana outloud. "Oh well. Time to start my day. Better check on my little foot bug." Hearing Unohana say that snapped Momo into action to try and hide. Looking around, Momo saw the only place close enough to hide was under Unohana's bed. Rushing over, Momo prayed to whatever kami that would listen that she wouldn't get caught. "Huh?" she heard the titanic Unohana say. "Where is my little pet? I know it was there last night." Deciding to look around for it, the first place the captain checked was under her bed. Looking around, Unohana almost missed the little speck near the lower corner. "There you are. Nice try, but you won't get away from me." Grabbing Momo, Unohana brought her to her face. "NAUGHTY LITTLE BUG. YOU NEARLY LEFT YOUR POOR OWNER. OH WELL. NOW TO PUNISH YOU FOR LEAVING. MAYBE I SHOULD CHECK WHAT YOU ARE FIRST. DON'T WANT TO HURT YOU BY ACCIDENT." Deciding to check first, Unohana left with Momo in hand to find a magnifying glass. Finally finding one, Unohana checked to see what it was.

What does she see?
125322122121.title: Something happens during the night

1253222.content:
Momo came to the conclusion that Nemu may be dangerous but she's the closest and only option. Without further hesitation, Momo used shunpo (flash step) to bolt across the floor to Nemu's socked foot. The small journey was rough though. Along the way there was some obstacles. Momo barely dodged becoming paste under Rangikus' sandal right as she left the safety from under the table. Also as she finally reached her destination, Nemu decided to move......

Momo looked up at the descening sole of Nemu's sock in awe as it came down right for her. "Boom!" Nemu's sock connected but luckily the bug sized Momo was unharmed due to the fact that she was under the arch of the sock...

As Nemu takes another step, Momo stands up unharmed but has little time to do anything else because coming for her was...........

1311221.content:

"AAAHH!!!" Ash screamed, flying upright. He was covered in sweat and shook nervously, he had a ghostly paleness to him like he had seen a ghost. Ash took a quick double-take and sighed happily, he was back in his own room.

"It was all a dream......" Ash whispered. "When did I get home anyway?" He asked aloud, with no response to be heard.

Groaning Ash sat up and dangled his legs over the edge of his bed, waking himself up before he started walking around. He was wearing his normal outfit as he always had been for the last few years of his journey. Soon he jumped off his bed and began wandering his own house.

" Mom......Mr.Mime........." He called, expecting a response, silence was all he heard. "Must be out shopping or something, he reasoned as he stepped into his living room. The room was near pitch black, groping the wall Ash found the light switch and flipped it, nothing. The lights seemed to be broken.

Feeling his way through the dark Ash reached the window and opened the curtains before letting out a scream. Obscuring the windows view was a gigantic eyeball that was as big as he was.

" About time you're up twerp." A familiar voice said.

"Jesse!!"

The gigantic Jesse stepped back, removing her eye from its place at Ash's window and giggled.

"Gotta hide, gotta hide!" Ash panicked, running around in circles in his own home. He was knocked off his feet by a strong tremor that seemed strong enough to affect the whole world. Loud cracking sounds told Ash his house was coming apart, he had no choice but to run out of it.

"AHHH!!" He screamed, running to his front door and stepping onto his porch, his head turned behind him so he didn't notice until it was too late, Ash's foot didnt touch his porch but only air. The young trainer lost his balance and began tumbling down where he fell into some sort of a rubbery surface that smelled of fresh latex.

Crawling up Ash looked forward to see a near neverending arm that led to the face of Jesse, he had landed on her glove!

"Good now I can destroy your house." The giantess smirked as she clenched her hand tightly together, destroying Ash's home.

"You'll never get away with this!!" Ash screamed bravely, pointing a finger at the giantess with his whole body shaking. Jesse looked blankly at the teenager before bursting out into a fit of laughter.

" The twerp is so funny at this size." Jesse's voice said from behind Ash.

"Wait how can her voice be behin-" Ash cut himself off as he turned around and saw yet another Giantess Jesse!

"T-theres two?!!" He blurted.

Both Jesse's laughed their evil laughs. "Nope," The new one said. Looking around Ash saw many Jesse's around him, clad in different outfits, some barefoot,socked, wearing shoes. Some wearing Jesse's various disguises, but all held one thing in common, they were looking at Ash with this gleam of pure mischief.

"I'll be nice tiny twerp." The original Jesse cooed, kneeling over and placing Ash by her boot clad feet. "We'll give you a ten second head start before we go after you."

Not wanting to find out if the giantess was serious Ash took off running.

13533221.content:
It was a pretty good day in Littleroot town. People were smiling, Pokemon were playing, and the sun was shining brightly over them all. The town was in the middle of a famed festival so naturally crowds littered the streets of the small town, filled with tourists and people shopping; one of these shoppers was a young girl named May. May was a cute enough girl, nice body, great attitude, a deep love for Pokemon and her friends would vouch for her in any event because of these. Her friends she journeyed with were also quite kind, Ash a young trainer who sought to become a Pokemon Master, Brock a young adult who wanted to be a breeder, and lastly May's own younger brother Max who wanted to be a trainer too. May loved each of them dearly and together the group had more than their fair share of adventures, but the one that May would undergo now would make all of them seem like nothing.

As mentioned May was shopping, currently alone due to her and her friends agreeing to split up and enjoy the town. Being May and Max's home town just walking around brought a feeling of nostalgia. Littleroot was a small town so almost every one of the residents May recognized and they recognized May. Many asked about her adventures, her friends and her group of Pokemon; a few also asked about her and Ash...in a rather implicative way that made the girl blush and get flustered. It was fun to say the least but time was running out and the day would soon end; May had no choice but to head to the Pokemon center she agreed to meet her friends at. She began walking with the bustle of tourists dying town and the town regaining its tranquil atmosphere. There really was no place like home after all, not that May really minded but the tourists made it too noisy.

Just calmly walking in the slowly darkening town May passed a single thing that caught her attention; a small sales booth. May didn't recognize it so it naturally peaked her interest. "Probably here for the tourists...ah well no harm in paying a visit. " Absent mindedly May browsed the things for sale along the counter, no one was there and May was broke so browsing was all she really could do. The booth seemed to be selling Pokeballs, a bunch of rare ones too by the looks of it; May didn't recognize half of them.

"Ah a customer.." A voice called out. A quick look to the side told May that someone had arrived. It was apparently a young woman in a cloak, wearing a Pikachu mask too. It was pretty normal for people to dress up so mysteriously at the Littleroot festival so May didn't particularly care. "Why hello there. I'm sorry to say I'm just browsing miss."

The saleswoman clasped her hands and her eyes softened, "Oh no worries dear. For a young cutie like you I think a freebie is in order. Money is no issue with me."

May blinked in surprise, "Really? Are you sure?" Her eyes narrowed in slight suspicion, this person....seemed very familiar. Someone older than her...than much was certain but, she couldn't quite place it. And would probably come off rude to just ask for her to remove the mask. "Um have we met?"

The saleswoman shook her head fast, in fact probably too fast. "No not at all. But I have heard of you; you are the coordinator May correct? I think a free Pokeball is the least I can do to help your cause."

May's suspicious expression turned into a big smile, "Oh a fan. That explains why you're familiar, I probably saw you in the crowd or something. I guess my reputation proceeds me. Hahaha." May wasn't quite used to having fans yet.

The saleswoman smiled, or at least...seemed to, the mask made it kind of hard. "Why yes, you and your friends have quite a reputation. Young Ash is still famous for his Pokemon League runs in Kanto and Johto. Word of Brock has spread along the various Nurse Joy's and Jenny's. And you of course have a great record as a Pokemon Coordinator." The saleswoman seemed to be prattling on but May didn't interrupt her, finally she just laughed. "Oh but listen to me go on. Pardon me I just really like you guys, heck Ash is pretty cute!" That last bit made May cringe a little bit, she knew she had a crush on the trainer and hearing people talk like that bothered her. But oddly enough it made her seem even more familiar.

"Anyway here is my gift to you May." The woman held out a solid black Pokeball, "A rarity all the way from the Orange Islands. The S-Ball!"

"Wow...." May's expression was one of solid awe and amazement. "An S-Ball...I haven't even heard of that before. What does the S stand for?"

The woman laughed mysteriously, "Oh I think you'll find out soon enough. But it really is amazing; it can pinpoint you to the nearest wild Pokemon as well as almost guarantee to catch it. Go ahead and give it a try."

May had already pushed the button, "Catches and finds Pokemon? I love it. Thank you mi-" A loud spraying noise disrupted the young coordinator as a white cloud of smoke came from the ball and surrounded May. Having dealt with numerous smoke screens before May already had a hand at her mouth and expected a fit of coughing to come, but this smoke wasn't upsetting her lungs at all. In fact...it just made her body feel weird.

"Wh-What did you do?" Blindly May ran a hand through the smoke, not touching anything of course. But she didn notice something that really caught her attention, her glove she had worn since departing for her journey was gone! Did this person smoke screen May just for a glove? May checked her other hand and sure enough, that glove was gone too. And now that she thought about it her feet kind of tickled...She looked down and gasped, May's shoes were gone too! Hell, May looked all over herself and all clothes were gone! May questioned why she didn't feel it, and then she realized what this odd feeling the smoke gave her was...numbness. She couldn't feel a thing, heck it was a miracle she noticed her feet feeling ticklish. The smoke began to clear as a bright blush formed on the girl's face, "I need to find that woman and fast or else I'm gonna be naked in front of the town!"

An unusually loud voice from above responded, "I don't think you will have to worry too much about that little May."

The smoke cleared a little bit more and May caught a glimpse of something...and gasped yet again. Before her was a very familiar item, her shoe....only it had to be ten times taller than her! Heck, with more and more smoke clearing all of May's clothes were noticable in the ground, all huge as can be.

" So that is what the S in S-Ball is for...shrinking!" May realized with a gasp, if her shoe was ten times her height there was no telling how small she was. A centimeter? A milimeter? Less? Finally the smoke dissipated completely and the masked woman stood towering before May, eyes showing much more than joy. "Heh, it worked...." The woman began to remove her mask at long last and May gasped as she recognized who it was at long last....

It was a cloudy day in Hearthome City, and Dawn was making preparations for an upcoming contest. Weirdly though, the place was surprisingly empty, something that Hearthome wasn't exactly known for, being the region's second city after Eterna.

But the blue-haired teen looked around, and she could swear there wasn't another person on the streets. Paper bags were even blowing past her for the sake of gratifying an old cliché.

"...where is everyone?" she muttered, arms piled high with contest supplies, "This place is normally packed with-"

"Hello there!"

Dawn flinched at the sudden, loud voice piercing her eardrums, and spun around to see another person!

Where this person came from, she couldn't be sure, and the fact that this mask-wearing stranger appeared only after Dawn noted just how empty the place was made her feel more nervous still; however, she hid that behind a brave façade and managed a nervous smile, "Uhh, hi there!"

Dawn rubbed the back of her neck anxiously.

"Preparing for a contest, are we?" The masked person asked of her, finally revealing to have a young woman's voice, "Have everything you need?"

"I... think so?" Dawn squinted in confusion at this weirdly enthusiastic stranger. Shaking her shopping bag as some makeshift means of reassuring herself, she mentally assessed everything, and said, "...yup! Got everything I need! So I'll just be going now, and-"

"Are you sure, kid?" The stranger asked, concealing a grin behind her mask, "I don't see any PokePerfume there?"

"Poke... Perfume?" Dawk asked, never having heard of this before, "W-what's that?"

"Ohh, only the finest in contest supplements! Any self-respecting contest connoisseur knows, lives and breathes PokePerfume!"

"Well umm... I can't say so much," Dawn hesitated, not having the confidence to call herself a 'contest connoisseur', but still yielding to the mystery woman's plan, "B-but I'm interested! Where can I find this?"

"Oh, I have some right here!" She responded almost too readily, pulling out your typical perfume bottle with a squeezy spray thing on it, "Here, would you care for a free sample?"

And Dawn was forced to hack and cough as a violently pink cloud of perfume engulfed her, smelling of some horrifying combination of sea-salt and... cheese?

"H-hang on a sec!" She spluttered, trying to wave the fumes away, "Shouldn't you be using it on my pokemon?"

Dawn fished in her purse for her Buneary's poke ball, but was forestalled by the mystery woman, "Ohh, that won't be necessary! Everything's already been set up!"

"Oh, so this stuff was for humans?" Dawn raised an eyebrow, "...ehh, whatever. You've gotta work on the smell, okay lady?"

"Thank you for the feedback!" She 'smiled' behind her mask, "We'll be sure to take that into account!"

Her confidence heightened, Dawn made a mental note of everything she needed to prepare for the upcoming contest in less than an hour. However...
