Each footfall created quakes that rocked nearly Lelouch off his feet,and shook the layer dust motes the size of boulders that covered the ground.Being not the most athletic person around,Lelouch was soon out of breath from trying to run away from the gigantic girl.

His fears soon came to life.A shadow was soon casted over him,a foot-shaped shadow.Looking up,a monolith blocked out the light,hovering over Lelouch.Kallen's sole was thousands of feet long and wide,about to come down on an unnoticed speck.Lelouch could see other specks of dirt,all as big as him,and various other objects that stick to somebody's foot.

It all happened in a flash,too quick for Lelouch to think.Who knew something so big could move so fast?Lelouch felt enormous pressure and pain,but he was still alive.From the force of the impact,it was like he was glued inside to a wrinkle on Kallen's sole."I don't believe it...I'm actually so small I can fit into a wrinkle on a foot?!"He shouted,uttering every angry cuss word he could muster.
1411.title: The Pink Giantess

14112.content:
"What...?"Kallen actually knew Lelouch the speck was underfoot?

"I asked you a question,Lelouch!"Kallen laughed once more,he voice sky-cracking thunder so high above."What the hell?!Did you do this to me?!"Lelouch yelled up,knowing that his pitifully small voice couldn't possibly be heard by such a large being as Kallen now.But,somehow,she did."Lelouch,you can't answer my question with another question.If you answer mine first,then I'll answer yours"She giggled."And,it had better be a good one.My feet are wonderful,aren't they?"

Reduced in size and ego,Lelouch felt humilation as he answered Kallen.He didn't have much choice in the matter,considering the fact that he was trapped in a wrinkle on her sole."Yes....your feet are....big.And er.....lovely."He yelled up in reply,trying not to breathe in too much foot odor."How lovely are they?"Kallen asked mockingly.

They're so lovely....that the skin feels like silk."He was lying.The skin really felt like a suffocating blanket."They're so lovely....that the smell is heavenly."Once again,a lie.For an added effect to get out of this mess,Lelouch took in a big whiff and nearly passed out.

"Oh Lelouch,you flatter!!"Kallen giggled,seemingly satisfied with her captive speck now."Now,for your question:Duh.Of course I shrank you!"

"FOR WHAT F***ing REASON?!!"Lelouch screamed up,struggling to release himself from the wrinkle.Already many possibilities came to mind on how to get out of this situation.He did have a genius-level IQ of course.If he could just get Kallen to bring him up to her eye,his Geass would make it all so simpler....

"Tsk,tsk.No need for language.And since that's another question,I'll have to have a few more compliments....."

Lelouch sighed,defeated at the moment.He'll have to play along with this game for any hope of returning to normal size."On what?"He asked.
14112.title: Kallen laughs."How is it down there,Lelouch?"

141121.content:
Lelouch's eyes widened once Kallen spoke.A chance to get out of this gargantuan mess.He felt the world shift around him,and soon a bright light filled his vision.That light ws blocked out as Kallen's face seemed to act like an eclipse.She ocnentrated on her foot,using her nail to pluck the tiny speck from her foot wrinkle.

"Wow Lelouch,I can't believe I actually shrunk you this small.It's pathetic!"She laughed.

"Yes,yes.Keep on laughing...."He whispered to himself.

"I mean,I must seem colossal to you!"She continued on,gloating over having such power over something so small.Indeed,she was colossal,Lelouch concluded.He was standing on just her fingertip,and it could be an entire town for all he knew.Kallen brought the speck to her face."So,start complimenting my facial features.Unless you don't want your question unaswered,and yourself stuck in a wrinkle again."er voice this close up was magnified by a thousand.Lelouch actually thought he was deaf for a second or two.

Now was his chance.All he had to do was stare right at her eye,and activate the Geass.The giantess would then be under his control,and he would be normal again.

But...something made him hesitate.Kallen was stunning.Lelouch knew she was pretty before,but it just seemed magnified now at his new speck size.He seemed torn...
141121.title: Plan Furthered

1411211.content:
Lelouch new he would hate himself later on,but he wanted to do this for some reason."Well Kallen...your face shines like the sun.Your eyes...are glittering oceans."

Kallen actually blushed from the compliments."Tha sounded sincere Lelouch...unlike the last ones.I guess...thanks."

There was a moment of silence until Kallen remembered what to do."Oh yeah,your question.Umm....I can't exactly remember why now...I came across this device in one of the rooms here....nothing much beyond that."She actually spoke quietly as not to hurt Lelouch this time.The superiority and smugness was gone now.

"So.....what now?"Lelouch yelled quizzically."Well,I could return you to normal size if you wanted,or....."

"Or....?"Lelouch questioned.

"We could spend some time together....with you....at your speck size...."

Lelouch thought of his options,going over a dozen cons and pros of his options in seconds.He shouted:
1411211.title: Compliment Kallen.

14112112.content:
Kallen nearly squealed in joy,but she knew a noise as high-pitched as that would probably kill Lelouch."Good choice!"Kallen brought her finger up,pressing her finger to her cheek,smothering Lelouch against the skin.

Kallen walked towards her room,the tiny Genius safely in the palm of her hand now.Lelouch was truly amazed,it was a desert of skin he could get lost on.The towers in the distance that were fingers blocked his view of what as ahead.Behind him though....

It was hard not to notice.He was held at chest level.....the jiggling.With each step,Kallen's massive bosom shook up and don,the sound of a million strings twanging,her bra trying to hold the mountains in place.Kallen soon reached her room,closing and locking the door behind her.She wanted privacy with her tiny date.

Laying down on her bed,she brought Lelouch to eye level."I'm so looking forward to this!So,how have you been?"She tried to start the conversation.Leouch couldn't resist being snide."You mean apart from beng shrunken down to the size of a speck?"He shouted up sarcastically.But...to save himself from ending back up in a foot wrinkle,he added some more comments."But....it's all fine now.With such a lovely giantess to be in my company."

This worked.Kallen blushed slightly."Lelouch...would you....."
14112112.title: "We could spend some time together..."

141121121.content:
"Well....of course...y-yes please."Lelouch tried to hide his embarressment,but failed at it.Kallen smiled and brought the speck on her fingers to her lips,her mouth puckered.The notion was ridiculous,but she was actually looking forward to kissing this little speck.

Lelouch gulped as he looked on.Kallen's lips were....well,they were hard to describe.Two giant walls of glossy pink was a good enough description.Soon,his entire body was in contact with them."Mmmmm...."was all he heard muffled from Kallen.Small beads of saliva and wet lipstick fell onto his body,staining him pink.Lelouch did all he could with his size.He tried hugging the lip flesh and kissing back.He actually liked it....despite the fear of being stuck in one of the wribkles on her lip,or worse,falling into her mouth.

A minute or so later,their make-out session was over.Kallen pulled her finger away,smiling."Hmm....you taste nice Lelouch."She laughed at the speck that was completely pink now from her lipstick."Yeah....pretty nice...."Lelouch replied happily.For some reason,his ego hadn't been damaged at all.Being shrunken down to this size wasn't so bad after all...

"Now...what would you like now?"Kallen asked,her voice alluring.
141121121.title: "Like a kiss?"

choices: Screw with her and make her his perminat slave....
1411212.content:
A new thought hit Lelouch. Yes Kallen was stunning but she was also the one who put him in this mess. With one glance into her eyes, he could have his answers and a brand new servent. It was just punishment for her since she did this to him. So, Lelouch looked right into Kallen's massive eye and activated his Geass.

The effect was instent. Kallen's body froze in place and her face took on a blank stare as the familar red simble appeared in her eye. Lelouch smiled wickedly as he thought of how best to program his new servent. He could comand her to tell him what she did and how to reverse it. Or he could take his time and draw out Kallen's services. Her body was now ripe for the takeing...
1411212.title: Giantess Slave.

choices: She didn't notice a thing, guess Lelouch will have to climb to get her attention
1412.content:
The miniature prince couldn't believe his eyes, one moment he was at a computer, analyzing Knightmares, then his head suddenly felt like it was about to split open, next thing he knew Lelouch was the size of an ant! His head still throbbed slightly, like a severe migraine suddenly appeared.

"What happened?" The young former prince asked himself, there were infinite possibilities, Brittanian Weaponry, Experiment gone awry, Geass reaction, anything could have shrunken Lelouch and he had next to nothing to truely go on. All Lelouch could do was use logic to try and figure out what could have happened. Brittanian interference was a possibility in other circumstances but the Black Knight headquarters were hidden, Brittania would have no idea where they are, let alone get the kind of technology to shrink things without Lelouch picking up on it. A messed up experiment seemed unlikely too, as Zero Lelouch knew all of the runnings of the Black Knights; there were no experiments that could have logically resulted in this, assuming Rakshata didn't do some private experimenting that is. That left the other obvious choice, some sort of reaction involving Geass, and knowing the power Lelouch couldn't be sure of anything.

Suddenly light filled the overall dark room and in strode a woman who appeared as big as the biggest buildings in the world. Lelouch recognized the beautiful woman, the luscious green hair, the white boots, it was his partner and advisor in affairs C.C.

She wore an apathetic look as she eyed around the room, "I thought I sensed something going wrong with Lelouch....." The giantess walked around the edges of the room, seemingly staring at nothing in particular.

Each step C.C. took made a small booming sound, nothing else, just that sound. Lelouch stared at his gigantic comrade with a mixture of awe,desperation, and even...fear. It didn't take a genius to realize that against C.C.'s boots alone Lelouch would end up as a small blemish against the white leather. The prince never felt more powerless, like a bug. But the sudden torrent of negative emotions didn't affect Lelouch's mind or thoughts. C.C. was here, and was pretty much Lelouch's one source of hope of getting out of this unscathed. But Lelouch knew better than anyone that C.C. was a cruel witch, she wouldn't kill Lelouch but it was pretty easy to see her acting pretty much evil towards the shrunken teen. It was a gamble, a risk but Lelouch knew it was worth it. He took off running full speed for the white pillars that were C.C.'s boots, comically running out of breath after ten seconds and walking towards them with a huff.

C.C. just casually kept walking around the room, staring off into space as she thought about Lelouch. Her senses said something was wrong with him, and they were never wrong. Black Knights said Zero never left his room so Lelouch must have still been there, or have gotten kidnapped and if that was the case then there would surely be a clue, and C.C. was searching for that clue. She was too busy examining the walls and furniture to notice the small black speck rushing towards her.

Lelouch kept running towards his mountainous companion, huffing so badly he quickly fell over, tripped on his own cape. "Damn this outfit....why did Zero have to have a cape?" He cursed to himself, rising back to his feet and chasing after C.C. as fast as he could. Lelouch was the worst person suited for this, at best he covered ten meters a minute and C.C....she covered twenty meters per step....the math was pretty clear.

After a few moments of chasing Lelouch collapsed again, "Dammit! Forget this! Zero shouldn't have to chase some womans feet! I'll get her attention another way!" He jumped up, reached a gloved hand into a pocket of his cape and pulled out a pistol, aimed directly at C.C's boot clad feet. "At my size this couldn't possibly hurt her...but it will get her attention." He grinned, his finger pulling the trigger.

A loud bang echoed out as the bullet flew from the gun towards C.C., it easily struck the leather of her boot and made what seemed to Lelouch as a loud ripping noise. Now all he could hope was C.C. herself heard it.
1412.title: Trying to Contact C.C.

choices: "Let's see what we can do to restore your height, shall we?"
"I think it would be refreshing for you to live at this height for a bit..."
14122.content:
Lelouch screamed for C.C.

"C.C. can you hear me?!? Did you feel that?!?"

"Hmm...Lelouch? What are you doing there? You're so...small..." C.C. said as she looked down at the shrunken Lelouch. C.C. knew that a shrunken Lelouch couldn't be good for the Black Knights, nor could it be good for Lelouch's ego.

C.C. picked up Lelouch with a single finger. She stared curiously at the small Lelouch. Although this amused her, Lelouch's small stature was also slightly a turn-on. She could do whatever she wanted with him...

Ignoring her selfish (and somewhat cruel) thoughts, C.C. decided she needed to help Lelouch. She wasn't sure how, though. Perhaps they could find a scientist to find out what was wrong? The only problem with that, is that what if they didn't agree to help? Maybe Lelouch could geass them...but if he's too small, would it really work? How could he make eye contact? Too many questions...

C.C. felt like a giantess and decided to play with Lelouch...just a bit. Twirling him around and around on her finger, Lelouch felt like he would vomit. He silently prayed she wouldn't drop him as she tossed him up and down for a bit. C.C. yawned as she quickly grew bored, however, her passions shifting towards something else.

"Please, put me down!" Lelouch screamed.

C.C. placed Lelouch down on the ground, and mockingly pretended she would step on him. Moving her foot back safely, Lelouch yelled, "Not funny!"

C.C. then said:
14122.title: She noticed it and Lelouch (Good)

1413.content:
Being killed sucked, as Lelouch could attest to. There is a shooting pain and then a feeling of dizziness, after that feels like your falling. It’s a very disorientating and it makes you want to throw up. Luckily, it ends quickly and there is only darkness after that. Now for most people that would be the end, but for Lelouch, it was the beginning of something much bigger and much smaller.

“It’s time to wake up and welcome a new day.”

Lelouch groaned and reached for the spot where he had been stabbed as soon as he awoke. It felt strange not to feel any kind of wound over his heart because he could clearly remember the blade sinking it. But there was no wound, no death for him and if what C.C. had said was true, there would be no death for him anytime soon. The day he was to die, she told him, as calm and cold as ever; that there was a way he could die, but live on. The details she had given him had been scarce, but the general gist of it was simple; C.C. had the ability to make him live a second life, but there would be a price. When Lelouch had heard what the price was going to be he had barely believed it. He should have known better then to disbelieve the Gray Witch.

“Aren’t you going to say thank you?”

Staring up, Lelouch had to crane his neck back to see C.C.’s face. She stared down at him in her palm, as naked as the day he was born and only an inch tall. Lelouch stared up with a small smile at the giantess, amazed that she had been telling the truth. She had told him that she could resurrect him with a special Geass after his public death, but he would only be an inch tall. She told him his size could be readjusted over time and that there was one specific side effect that she had no control over; once he is resurrected, he could never die. When C.C. told him he could make everyone think he was dead and live on forever, he jumped on the opportunity. Spending a little time shrunk seemed like a small price to continue living.

“Thanks C.C.,” Lelouch halfheartedly said up to his giant savor as he tried to get to his feet on C.C.’s giant palm. Being shrunken was so strange, everything looked so insanely huge that it felt like he was in a whole other world. The ground looked like it was hundreds of feet away and the room around him seemed big enough to fit two stadiums inside. It was hard to recognize the giant surroundings, but it looked like a hotel room. “Where are we?”

“I’m staying at a small inn in Japan. You were out for two weeks. I had to carry you around in my pocket the whole time. You’re lucky you don’t have to eat and drink or you probably would have died. By the way, in case you’re interested, everyone thinks your dead including your sister and Kallen,” C.C. explained evenly and Lelouch nodded. Everything would fall apart if anyone found out he wasn’t dead. Luckily, his new size would help him hide. He could stay like this for a few decades, maybe travel around with C.C. as her tiny companion and years later when his face was just a memory, he could come back and walk the streets openly. No one would second-guess him for being a deadman decades after his death. It was the perfect plan for the world’s greatest chess player.

“So C.C. lets look at a map and see what we got. If we are going to be traveling together from now on I think it’s time I start making the decisions. But first, you know where I can get some pants?” Lelouch asked, covering himself meekly as he waited for C.C. to do what he told her. She raised her brow at the tiny boy giving her orders before smirking softly at him and reaching out. “C.C.! What are you…” Lelouch began to say but the air was forced out of him as C.C. pinched her thumb and forefinger around his waist and lifted him up. He was carried high into the air as C.C. stood up, staring at the tiny boy that would be king with a growing smile.
He looked so cute believing he still had power, it almost hurt C.C. to break that delusion.

“Silly boy. You were once my knight but now your nothing. Did you really think I was going to take care of you for the rest of your life. Your just a bug now, not a king and you no longer give orders. I do.”

“How can you do this to me?” Lelouch sputtered, all his grand dreams coming crashing down as he stared into the cruel golden eyes of the woman that had given him a second chance at life. It seemed like some kind of cruel joke that she’s turn her devotion around and degrade him to nothing but an insect. Did his size really make her think he was nothing or did she always think that way of him?

“Because you agreed to it. You accepted a second chance at life without thinking of what role you’d be taking. You owe me your life and I own you,” C.C. told him plainly, surprised to find he hadn’t thought about what she might do to him until now. She told him his new role in life. Knowing he would fight back, they always did. However, in the end, they all ended up thanking her for the honour of letting them kiss her feet. She told him in four words what he was now.
1413.title: The Chess Master Gets Outplayed

choices: She makes him clean her feet
She makes him rub her feet
14132.content:
“I refuse to be your slave!” Lelouch screamed in horror and disgust once he heard what C.C. had determined to be his new role in life. This whole thing was a nightmare and he was desperately trying to figure a way out. He needed to get it straitened out with C.C. that he was no ones slave and she needed to start treating him like a man again. He thought he could reason with her, but her mind had already been made up about it and nothing could change what she had planed. It was him that would need some convincing.

“Poor bug, you think what you think matters?” She said with mock sympathy. She felt nothing towards Lelouch other then amusement over his plight. She no longer could see him as the king he had once been, but a toy for her amusement. He only had himself to blame for it. He thought he could achieve his grand dream of bringing the world together and be rewarded for his hard work. If the world was just he would be rewarded, but it wasn’t. C.C. knew how unfair life could be and if she couldn’t have the sweet relief of death, she’d get her amusement out of Lelouch. Enslaving the former king would keep her happy for a few decades at least.

“Of course what I think matters. I’ve overtaken nations, thought up the most brilliant battle plans and done the impossible. If you think that you can turn me into a slave then think again.” Lelouch would have gone on, but C.C. had heard enough. Annoyed by his high-pitched squeaky voice she dropped him. She relaxed her fingers from around his waist and let him fall, watching him decent to the floor without concern.

“Damn!” Lelouch screamed as he fell seemingly hundreds of feet to the ground. He whizzed by C.C. as he dropped, looking at her broad hips, then her long legs and then her naked feet before hitting the ground with a bone-shattering thud. He landed on his back, the back of his head colliding with the ground and sending pain shooting through his skull. Pain raced through him unlike anything he had ever felt before. The fall should have killed him, but as he lied there, the pain slowly went away and he was left with only a dull throbbing pain was left. He stared up, hundreds of feet above him C.C. stared back, a tiny smile on her lips.

“Thought that was the end, didn’t you? But your forgot, can’t die remember. Not even if you’re dropped a hundred feet up,” C.C. told him, not revealing everything to him. He could survive anything, but the amount of pain that was inflicted on him determined how long it took him to heal. If he were stepped on for several hours, it would take a few minutes for him to heal. If he spent a day under her foot, it would take an hour for him to stop feeling pain. If she got really creative and kept torturing him for weeks, well, Lelouch would spend several days in agony afterwards. Immortality could really hurt, especially if you spend your time with someone that enjoys watching you suffer.

“By the way, what I think is the only thing that matters,” she informed him sharply, never showing an inch of sympathy as he lay at her feet shaking from the new pain he felt. It was bad now, but he’d get used to it, along with the other things that came from being her slave like the smells, tastes and heat. She had some cruel plans for Lelouch that would shatter his prideful mind. She could hardly wait for the fun to begin.

“You…you…you tricked me,” Lelouch panted as he struggled to sit up. The reality of his situation was unimaginable, but Lelouch was trying to rationalize it. Always the thinker, he tried to figure out C.C.’s game. She wanted him as a slave, but what use were a man smaller then her thumb. She said she could control his size, so did that mean that once he had been humbled she would grow him back and he’d wait on her on his hands and knees? It seemed so convoluted of C.C. to shrink him just to have him become her slave. Plenty of men would do that just because of the awesome powers she had. Hell, he could have used his Geass to turn some unlucky fool into a mindless slave to her. But she wanted him and she wanted him immortal, why?

“No, you tricked yourself,” C.C. explained like she was talking to an annoying child. She leaned down, until all Lelouch could see was her giant face looming over him. Fear raced through him, even though he knew he was immortal, he still feared what this giant girl could do. His questions were pushed aside as he focused more on listening to what his new master had to say. “I gave you a choice between going with your original plan and dying or living on forever with me. You choose this, not thinking once about what your life would be like. That’s your greatest weakness Lelouch; you never think twice about a decision. All you heard was that you could live and you jumped on it. Now you belong to me for as long as I want.”

“This isn’t fair,” Lelouch whispered. His voice was tiny, but C.C. heard him. It was one of the many new abilities she had over him. No matter how small he became or how quiet he was, she could hear his voice whenever she wanted to.

C.C. sneered at the pathetic whining she heard. “Life is seldom fair, slave.” she relished calling Lelouch her slave. Maybe later she could try some other names like toe jam or foot sweat to describe him after his first job. She had been on her feet often and hadn’t been able to wash her feet in a week. They were sore and dirty in need of the services of a good slave. Having Lelouch start at her feet would prepare him for the future he was going to spend under her soles.
14132.title: Get Used to it Slave

choices: There's a knock at the door...A visitor?
Now Lelouch can experience what C.C.'s foot plus her boot is like!
141321.content:
The giantess eyed Lelouch with what seemed to be glee, "Perhaps to get the message across about your role in life I should start you off with a task that will help show some humility..." She shuffled her barefeet around, making sure Lelouch could see the dirt and sock lint that plagued them. "Why don't we begin your rebirth with you cleaning my feet?"

How Lelouch replied to that would likely determine the first few months of his life, being a genius he realized this easily but....pride got in the way. "No! That's absolutely ridiculous C.C.! I'm royalty, once emperor of the most powerful country in the world, leader of a rebellion, he who creates and breaks worlds and you want me to clean your disgusting feet!? I'd rather die!"

C.C. seem to chuckle at the statement, "Very well then slave, if death is preferable I will be happy to oblige." Slowly C.C. raised a foot into the air, some of the slight dirt and grime on it falling off with gravity. She hovered it a good three feet into the air, but to Lelouch's eyes it rose a couple hundred feet high. Instinctively the prince felt fear grasp his heart, the sight of C.C.'s sweaty sole, the fact he would die beneath it. Nowhere near the honorable death he had set up before, no he would die beneath a witch's foot like some sort of a bug. It was nausiating just to think about.

"Goodbye little Lulu." Was all C.C. said before she let her foot fall to the ground. It came fast, strong, and Lelouch had no time to react. He knew running would be pointless, a wasted effort especially for his weak frame but instinct made him do it regardless. Less than a second passed before he looked up, C.C.'s foot was literally inches away from him. The sight of his death caused Lelouch to stumble, and he fell; rolling on to his back he attempted to push away the sweaty sole of the giantess, but his hands merely sank a couple inches into its soft flesh as it came. Pushing was useless, anyone knew this but still, instinct drove Lelouch the desperation and he tried to no avail, soon the foot overcame his meager strength and crushed him. The loud slamming noise of C.C.'s foot stomping blocked out any and all screams Lelouch released.

With Lelouch smushed beneath her foot C.C. just let out an evil chuckle, as she slowly lifted her foot up and saw the prince, practically flattened but otherwise alive with a horrified expression. "Fear does such amazing things to the mind doesn't it Lelouch? I showed you less than a minute ago how you were unable to die, but in the face of apparent death you forgot all about that and nearly gave yourself a heart attack. Do you see now, how you are nothing but a bug to me?"

Lelouch seemed to unflatten slightly and sit upright, eyeing C.C. with what bordered on hatred. "You manipulative witch...was all that garbage about me someday returning to normal a lie too?!"

For a moment C.C. looked surprised but then she shook her head with a slight smile, "No, I had no reason to lie and I still don't. You will one day grow to normal size...however it is to be a day of my choosing."

A gasp escaped Lelouch's mouth as he realized how the situation was set up. His role, was to be C.C.'s slave, simply because she wanted it. If he refused she could crush him and torture him in ways unimaginable and he wouldn't die, it would only serve to break him of his free will. Yet if he did submit someone prideful like himself would likely go insane of self-hating from the submission and end up unworthy in C.C.'s eyes of becoming normal again. Help was virtually impossible too, everyone in the world believed Lelouch to be dead, and even if he managed to contact someone like Kallen, what would she do? He lied, tricked, and manipulated her to the end, somehow Lelouch preferred C.C. over an angry Kallen. And there was always the chance Lelouch would be too good of a slave and C.C. would just decide to live her immortal life with Lelouch as her slave for all eternity. The situation was set up so no matter what Lelouch would lose and C.C. would gain a slave, it was almost...beautiful how well it was set up. Lelouch's expression was a mixture of horror and awe.

Towering above him C.C.'s eyes gleamed with victory, "Now you see Lelouch, what you want is completely irrelevant. No matter what I get what I want, and you end up as a slave. You just have one real option, do you want to retain yourself, or do I have to break you like I have broken others?"

Lelouch didn't respond at first, he was just...sitting there, thinking over the meaning behind C.C.'s words. He absolutely didn't want to lose his will in this situation, that would bring C.C. far too much pleasure; and yet the alternative meant Lelouch would be going against almost everything he stood for...could he really do that? His mind listed the possible outcomes of such with ease, the odds of him actually getting a Happy Ending out of this were slim to none, C.C.'s odds on the other hand...were unfairly high.

The shrunken prince made his choice, although he despised it with all his torn heart. "I'll...play along for now C.C." He nearly bit his tongue off for saying that.

C.C. smirked and softly sat on the ground, pointing her soles at Lelouch and wiggling her toes eagerly. "Actions speak louder than words slave."

She waited for it, the first step to Lelouch's submission. His soft footsteps were even audible to her, she wanted to fully grasp the situation and enjoy every possible second of it. Lelouch's emotions were practically radiating off of him, self loating, anger, hatred, sadness, humiliation, it was all coming out in waves that seemed to intoxicate the beautiful giantess. Finally, he stood before C.C.'s towering feet, each over twenty times his height, and he did it...he licked her sole. That one action made C.C.'s entire body shiver with pleasure, it was of course Lelouch's only option for cleaning her feet, but still...one stomp and some words and he was doing it, to break him that quickly...that was what really made C.C. happy.

Whether or not it was noticed wasn't important but Lelouch wasn't as broken as C.C. thought he was. Years of being an outcast of Brittania taught him much, including how to bow your head and suck things up until the proper opportunity came. One day she would mess up, get too overconfident, and Lelouch would use that to his absolute advantage. Until then if he had to lick some dirt or clean her fingers so be it, the prince was far from defeated.

Without showing any physical signs of apprehension he continued licking, even climbing up C.C.'s foot an inch or two to get more of it all. it was a sort of lucky break that her feet had all the wrinkles of a typical foot, they made excellent footholds and even someone as unathetic as Lelouch would have no trouble climbing to the tip of her soles. He was doing his best to block out the taste of C.C's feet and all the filth on them with each lick, not that it helped much. The taste was nigh undescribable. But, he kept going, he would play the role of the obedient slave for now.

Time passed, an hour, maybe two but soon Lelouch reached the top of C.C's second foot, and finishing licking her big toenail clean and finally finishing his job. He licked everything, toejam, sock lint, dirt, food crumbs, it was all disgusting just to recall. The entire time C.C. was wordless, just smirking at him. Lelouch couldn't help but wonder, was this all C.C. was going to do to him? Make him lick her feet? Sure it was disgusting but after a while it wouldn't even bother Lelouch anymore, it sure seemed like an ineffective torture. But if C.C. had other plans...it was possible Lelouch would never properly adapt; he simply wouldn't have the time to. But his musings were ceased when C.C. finally spoke to him again.

"Good job Little Lulu, for your first time that was an exquisite job. You will definitely be spending much if not most of your time down there. I'm sure it was disgusting to you, but one day you'll learn, learn what a blessing of a goddess I am to you. And when that day comes, your fate will be determined." She fell silent as did Lelouch, both were thinking of what that sentence meant. If C.C. had her way Lelouch would likely be her slave for eternity, if Lelouch suceeded he would be free and normal again for all eternity. It all depended on who would win, Lelouch, or C.C...

"Okay slave, I think I have an idea what you can do next...."
141321.title: Who Will Win, Lelouch or C.C.?

choices: "Anytime! Now where's little Lulu? I'm ready for some worship!" Kallen laughed
"No, thank you for inviting me Miss C.C." Cecile politely greeted back
1413211.content:
C.C. was interrupted by the booms of someone knocking on the door. Lelouch stared at the door in surprise, who would pay a visit to C.C.? The giantess however, appeared unsurprised. Her golden eyes casually glanced at the door with a bored look, "She's come early."

Lelouch turned his gaze to C.C., "She?"

The green-haired witch turned back to her slave with a smirk, "I decided to celebrate the day I get a new pet by inviting a friend."

The young prince gulped, "Does she....know...?"

The smirk C.C. wore grew into a devious smile, "Oh yes, and she seemed quite eager when I mentioned worship."

The dim situation was growing dimmer, Lelouch began to question whether or not he could win against such a deviant goddess. "Who did you invite here?"

C.C. stood up, "You'll see..." Another knock came from the door, followed by an impatient "Anyone here?" The voice was familiar to Lelouch but at his size it was magnified to an extent it was hard to pinpoint. C.C. opened the door eagerly greeting her guest, "Thank you for coming."
1413211.title: Knock Knock, Who's There?

choices: C.C. doesn't wait, she makes Lelouch smaller anyway.
14132111.content:
(Note, this is a two part chapter)

In strode the familiar red-head, hair spiky as usual and a great big grin on her face, right behind her was C.C. with a softer smile on hers. She wore a loose yellow tank top that exposed much of her chest along with a pair of navy blue short-shorts and a pair of boots, slung over her shoulder was a decent-sized backpack that seemed completely packed. Lelouch had mixed feelings upon seeing Kallen approach him. On one hand it was a reunion with a dear friend, on another it was him coming face to face with a woman who he lied and manipulated to the very end. Judging from C.C.’s words it seemed Kallen definitely wasn’t going to play nice, She loomed overhead, a titaness whose toes alone were double Lelouch’s height. As she got closer her face couldn’t even be seen past the two large appendages coming from her chest, to Lelouch’s dismay it didn’t matter anyway, anything past the hip was blurry. That was the sheer size difference between the two. Kallen walked into the room, closer and closer to Lelouch…And closer…very close…

BOOM!

…until her foot landed right overtop of the shrunken man. Every bone in his body shattered instantaneously with a hideous cracking sound that was too small to be heard by the looming goddesses.

Kallen casually glanced at the room she was in, “Not bad at all. A little under-furnished, but not bad at all.” The home C.C. was residing in was a small cottage, far off in the more rural part of Japan, a simple set up ideal for a couple of people. They stood in the living room, furnished with a pair of simple couches adjacent to one another, a couple of small counters with a decoration or two, a small television, wooden floors, and a decent-sized table by the couch. Kallen tossed her backpack onto the couch, “So where’s the little guy?”

C.C. chuckled, “Under your right foot.”

Immediately Kallen looked down and lifted her foot, sure enough there was a splotch of blood, Lelouch’s remains. “Oh man, is he-?”

“Just watch.”

They both were silent, watching the remains of the shrunken prince begin to transform, flowing back together until it formed Lelouch once again. It was like watching a rewind of him getting crushed, with everything flowing back into place. Wheezing, Lelouch stood back up. All he could remember was the intense split second of pain from getting crushed, a level of pain that nearly made his mind break instantly. Yet here he was, alive and well. In front of him was the enormous tower known as Kallen’s boot. Lelouch craned his neck to trail it up to its source, a grinning Kallen. “Hiya Lulu!”

Lelouch offered a small wave, “H-Hello Kalle-“

BOOM!

Her boot stomped on Lelouch again, coming back off so he could reform. “My foot wanted to say Hi too.” Kallen giggled to the newly reformed prince. “I can’t believe you were telling the truth C.C., I thought you were crazy honestly.”

C.C. took a seat on the couch, planting one foot beside Lelouch while the other crossed over her knee. “That’s why I had to show you. Like I said, my own personal little slave.”

There was a scary gleam in Kallen’s eyes the moment C.C. uttered the word slave, “I’m glad you did. And you meant what you told me?”

C.C. nodded, “Yes, while you’re here he’s as much your slave as he is mine.”

“Sweet!” Kallen looked down at Lelouch, “Hear that Lulu? While I’m here you answer to me! You got that?”

There was a mental list of any number of retorts Lelouch could’ve used, most of which would have offended Kallen deeply. But for the sake of avoiding another stomp, he bit his tongue. “Yes Kallen…”

“It’s Goddess Kallen to you bug.”

Lelouch sighed, “Sorry, Goddess Kallen.”

Kallen never looked so smug, “I’ll forgive you this once, but only if you give a little kiss to my boot.” The Brittanian prince didn’t waste any time in planting a solid kiss on Kallen’s boot sole, compared to licking C.C.’s feet clean this task was trivial.

“No need to try and ease him in Kallen. Why, little Lulu here just finished licking my feet clean. See?” She flexed her foot towards Kallen, showing how flawless it looked now that it had been cleaned. Even with a casual glance Kallen saw that they looked nice. “Oh? Then I guess it’s my turn then!” In a single motion Kallen fell to the couch and landed with a cushioned boom, kicking off her boots and sliding them beneath the couch, planting her now bare feet before Lelouch. “I expect a perfect job or I’ll crush you between my toes for an hour!”

Lelouch sighed again, but one more pair of feet wouldn’t be as humiliating as before. He tried to rationalize that but it just wasn’t going to work. C.C. was one thing, but Kallen once answered to him. Now the leader was a servant…Actually less than that! At his size Lelouch was the grime on the servants shoe, and he had to answer to his former subordinate. Embarrassing, humiliating, and the loss of power to top it off. Lelouch felt worse with what he was about to do! Before him the monolithic toes wiggled in anticipation, each painted a subtle red that matched Kallen’s hair. They had more a tan coloring to them like Kallen’s skin, unlike C.C.’s pale complexion. There were drips of sweat clinging to her feet, especially between the toes; she clearly walked for a while in those boots. There was a faint stench of feet in the air, but it wasn’t really that bad, Kallen’s feet thankfully lacked a powerful odor. Trying to avert his gaze so he wouldn’t bear witness, Lelouch leaned forward to Kallen’s big toe, tongue outstretched.

“Let’s say we make this interesting.” C.C. smirked. Kallen and Lelouch turned to the witch, noting the Geass emblem on her forehead glowing. C.C. stared at Lelouch with a sinister smirk, and Lelouch realized why. He was shrinking again! The looming toes before him grew, grew until they resembled 100-ft tall buildings! The Goddesses around him grew to an even greater height, blurring past their knees. Even one such as Lelouch had only a single reaction, he screamed. The insignificant squeak Kallen miraculously heard made her look back to Lelouch, who was now naught but a speck before her feet. “Oh my God…Did you just make him smaller?”

“So he can get all the details right.” C.C. smiled, the symbol on her forehead fading again. Kallen’s face gave away she wanted to know how so she immediately explained, “When Lelouch agreed to his second life it was another contract, sort of…a revised one if you will. Obviously it made him his size, but it also gives me the authority to control his size at will. So I could change him to normal-size one day, or in this case, make him smaller.

The shocked look on Kallen’s face turned into a smirk, “Well then thank you.” She looked back to Lelouch, “No slacking Lulu, get to work, or I’ll get C.C. to make you small enough you’ll live between my toes!”
14132111.title: Kallen's Arrival

choices: All that excitement has C.C. and Kallen hungry!
C.C. plays around with Lelouch's size for a bit
141321111.content:
(Hurray 1000 chapters!)

Lelouch didn’t hesitate, lest he’d be shrunken again. He ran to the monolithic structures and began to appease them with his tongue, licking into toe-prints he could crawl in. Each toe would take hours to worship, let alone the entire foot, but Kallen still watched eagerly like it would only take a second. To the side C.C. watched as well, clearly amused at seeing her slave worship another woman. The taste was salty, with a layer of sweat over all of Kallen’s feet. It quickly dried out Lelouch’s mouth but he continued out of fear Kallen would do well on her threat. Each second dragged painfully on as Lelouch licked a piece of foot, then licked another. It took ten minutes before he finished one area, and even then he had to crawl into Kallen’s toe-print to make sure he did a proper job, and to escape the watchful eyes of his Goddesses. All around Lelouch was toe, not foot, but a single toe. Even for a big toe it was simply ridiculous. It stretched close to a hundred feet wide, and definitely over a hundred feet tall. And that wasn’t counting the bottom of her toe that rested on the ground! Regardless, Lelouch continued to lick, even though there was no end in sight.

It was hard to tell how much time had passed; in fact, Lelouch was beginning to question his own mind right now. Everywhere it looked the same, a huge terrain of toe he had to lick. Even if he got to the edge he had to go up to the next line in the print and repeat. He started off humiliated and embarrassed, but now all Lelouch thought of was the next lick, where to go. In the back of his mind he imagined Kallen’s reaction, thanking him for his good job. Or maybe a simple nod. Anything to show that this eternity of painfully slow foot worship was worth something. Earlier he was confident he could outlast C.C. and gain his freedom one day, but if she could adjust his size and make each hell constantly worse, it seemed like a futile effort.

Goddess Kallen and C.C. above eventually stopped watching and took to talking, largely catching up but they also spent a lengthy bit of time developing new ideas for Lelouch. There were too many to keep up with, each sounding worse than the last. But at this point anything would be better than continuing to worship Kallen’s big toe. Just to change things up if anything.

“C.C….How long has Lulu been worshipping my feet?”

C.C. checked a small clock in the corner, “About two hours.”

“And he’s still not past my big toe?”

“Not even close.”

Kallen shook her head, “Should I give him more time? Or should he be punished for a bad job?”

“I say punished. He licked all of my feet in two hours. Smaller or not, taking this long is no excuse.” It was unfair statement, and the smirk C.C. had said she knew it. But Kallen had the same smirk; they just wanted to make Lelouch suffer.

Kallen lifted her foot into the air, letting gravity work the puny Lelouch from one of her toe prints. Lelouch landed with a painful thud that broke his neck, but as before, he revived. He was greeted with Kallen, standing over him with her hands on her hips. Lelouch stopped paying heed to what the two talked about so he hoped for that compliment he desired, that hope was shattered instantly. “I am disappointed in you Lelouch.” Each of Kallen’s toes drummed along the wooden floor, almost like an ominous, booming drum roll. “My first order for you, and not even a hard one. But you waste two hours and not even finish a single toe? That’s just inexcusable. What do you have to say for yourself?”

Lelouch weakly stood, speaking with a voice raspy from all the salty foot sweat. “I’m too small Goddess Kallen! Please just give me more time!”

“Sounds like an excuse to me.” C.C. stood up too, standing opposite of Kallen with her feet behind Lelouch. “If you don’t have a good reason then you’d be better off just apologizing.”

Lelouch began an apology, which Kallen’s much louder voice interrupted. “Unfortunately for you, I don’t accept apologies for pure laziness. You need to be punished.”

Weak and tired, Lelouch fell to his knees, “But Goddess, I tried my best!”

“You’re immortal Lelouch. You could’ve worked til your heart gave out and could’ve kept going, but you didn’t. That is what I call lazy.”

“But how to punish him?” C.C. queried.

“I have an idea.” Kallen frowned down to Lelouch, “Lelouch, beg.”

Even tired and near-broken, Lelouch jumped at the order, “Huh?”

“Beg for me to crush you under my foot.”

Memories of the pain of death resurfaced, Lelouch did not want to relive that. Dying was a hell worse that what he was just doing. But he knew if he did nothing he’d just get crushed anyway, or worse. The shrunken man knelt down, “Please crush me! I deserve it Goddess Kallen!”

Kallen smirked, “I’m not buying it, I said BEG!” She stomped to emphasize her point.

Lelouch reacted without even thinking about it, running on pure fear. “Please Goddess! Step on me and wipe me out like a bug! I deserve it for failing you! Please, I’ll do anything just to have you crush me!” The words were utter insanity; Lelouch realized it. But he was too tired to fight the fear that had enveloped him, grueling hours of tending to Kallen’s feet with no progress at all wore him out to the point he was too tired to fight anything. But remarkably, despite his severe exhaustion he still felt the humiliation of his actions. He was begging at the feet of a teenage girl to be crushed, he was begging for this as if it were a gift. Lelouch couldn’t even imagine what he looked like right now.

“Hmm…I suppose if it’ll make my slave happy…” Kallen raised a foot and stomped as hard as she could. Lelouch died instantly, but it was a level of pain that put his previous deaths to shame. He saw the sweaty sole of his friend loom overhead, then it was nothing but darkness. The darkness faded away, Lelouch opened his eyes to another foot above him…this one paler…C.C.!

BOOM!

She stomped too, showing more leg strength than Kallen. Lelouch practically felt his mind break with the instant of horrendous pain. He awoke again, this time to Kallen’s foot. He was stomped again and soon it became a cycle. Each brief second Lelouch was alive he processed what was going on, the two Goddesses made a game out of crushing him, even laughing as they did so and getting creative with their stomps. Each stomp was an instantaneous hell, worsened with the new methods of crushing Lelouch. And on top of it all…He was just stunned. C.C. was this cruel? Kallen disliked him this much because of what happened? Or maybe they just didn’t see him as a person anymore. At this point Lelouch wondered himself. His mind felt like it was on the brink. Lelouch wanted to give anything for it to stop.

Of course it did, a full ten minutes later once Kallen and C.C.’s legs got tired. Lelouch reformed just in time for a bead of sweat from Kallen’s brow to land on him, threatening to drown him.

“That was a nice workout C.C. We gotta do that again some time!”

“I agree, it was quite fun.”

“What about you Lulu?” Kallen knelt down to the speck-sized Lelouch. “Did you have fun?”

What Lelouch just endured didn’t come close to fun. In fact, words didn’t approach it at all. But he knew anything negative could result in another stomp, one he was sure would just break his mind completely. “Yes Goddess…Thank you for crushing me like I asked.”

“Anytime!” Kallen grinned, petting Lelouch with her finger.

Lelouch stared at the backpack on the couch above him, full with enough stuff to say Kallen was going to be around for a while.
141321111.title: Kallen's Torture

choices: Lulu is trapped under her toes
Lulu escapes her toes.... for now
1413212.content:
Lelouch stared up in horror, his eyes wide and his heart racing at what C.C. was holding in each hand. Her feet had been bad; he could still taste the dirt and sweat on his tongue. However, the sight of the two white monstrosities hanging from her fingers made those sweaty soles look much more appealing. Back when C.C. had been living with him and he hadn’t been her slave, there were two things that bothered Lelouch more then anything, her left over pizza boxes littered all over the floor and her discarded boots. Her boots were slightly worse because at least the pizza boxes didn’t give off a horrible smell. Lelouch had often threatened to burn her filthy boots, but never went through with it. Right now, he wished he had.

“Do you know what these are?” C.C. asked as she dangled her giant boots over Lelouch who stared at the treads with fear. He could see bits of dirty stuck in the bottom of her boots, tiny specks rained down on him as C.C. shook them. He wondered how much it would hurt to be crushed under her foot when she wore those monsters. He could only imagine how painful it would be compared to the soft underside of her foot.

“Your favourite boots,” he answered straightly, hoping to not show his fear. C.C. shook her head in amusement and corrected him.

“No, there one of the places you’re going to live. I have some other places, but these will be where you go when you displease your goddess,” C.C. told him coldly. She added quickly with a sadistic smile a moment later. “Or when I’m bored. It is so much fun having you underfoot.”

“I can only imagine,” Lelouch softly whispered. Rebelling against the goddess was looking less and less appealing to the shrunken slave. He had no desire to remain in this position, but he wasn’t going to start fighting against C.C. now. If he had learned anything from cleaning C.C.’s feet it was that he could swallow his pride and a stomach full of underfoot filth. There would be no whining and bellyaching from him. He’d win this slowly and not be broken by C.C.

At that moment, C.C. let go of her boots and they fell to the ground beside Lelouch. It was like two small buses were falling towards him and Lelouch ducked and covered his head on instinct. They crashed to either side of him, falling to their sides, as they lay empty on the floor. Lelouch lifted his head back, just in time to hear his new Goddess issue down an order. “I’m bored. Crawl into my boots like a good insect, Lulu.”

Lelouch didn’t do anything but stare into the dark abyss of the boot. The foul stench reached his nose and he wasn’t even close. He wanted to remain were he was, fight C.C. but he knew that it would be pointless. He was a smart person and if he resisted it would only be like when he refused to clean her foot; pain and then acceptance. Reluctantly, he walked towards the opening to the boot under the gleeful eye of C.C. Her only thought was how easy it was to break the smart ones as she watched Lelouch walk towards his fate.
Crawling into the boot, Lelouch was forced to breath in the thick aroma of unwashed feet.

He could see the insole of the boot in front of him, filthy and stained with sweat and grim. He would have liked to stay as far away from the insole as possible, but once he was inside, C.C. turned her boot upright and Lelouch dropped onto her insole face first. He sank several inches into the spongy inside of her boot, feeling the sweat rub against his naked body. He slowly sat up, his face covered in foot filth. He wiped it away furiously, but couldn’t get it off. He could taste it and smell it, making him gag and his eyes water. As he brushed his tears away, he stared up out of the opening of the shoe and saw C.C. smiling down at him.

“Good Lulu, you’ll get a treat later for being so well behaved,” she cooed patronizingly and Lelouch sneered at her. Lint the size of his fist was sticking to him and the front of his body was covered in foot filth, but at least C.C. was getting her jollies. C.C. chuckled at her tiny bug trapped in her boot. He looked lonely so she decided to give him some company. “Now lets see how well my foot fits inside my boot with you in it. By the way, if I was you, I’d start running.”

Panic seized Lelouch and he looked around desperately. C.C. was going to put her foot in, with him under foot. He couldn’t climb out and he’d be crushed under her sole if he didn’t move. With revulsion, he realized he would have to crawl in deeper to escape her foot. With a despondent scream he started running towards the toe section, not wishing to be crushed under C.C.’s foot again. As he got deeper, light got dimmer and the smell got stronger. The ground was sticky from absorbing years of sweat and made it hard to move. Several times Lelouch fell forward, taking a fateful of the sole of C.C.’s boot. He could feel the slimy residue from the bottom of C.C.’s foot on his lips and he disgustingly tasted it as it ran into his mouth.

More lint, dirt and crumbs surrounded him as he went deeper and as he neared the toe section he started to see big globs of toe jam stuck to the inside of the boot. C.C.’s disgusting habit to wear her boats without socks had turned the inside of her boot into a hellish place of smells and textures. As Lelouch neared the very end of her boot when all the light disappeared and he heard something big coming towards him. C.C. was putting in her foot and he was about to discover if he’d be trapped under her toes or not.
1413212.title: Seeing New Places

choices: C.C. decides to go visit some old friends...
C.C. wanders around aimlessly all day...
14132121.content:
While he was far from being even remotely atheletic Lelouch managed to run his way to the very end of C.C.'s boot; which, given the unstable and constantly moving terrain, was quite a feat. If C.C.'s boots were loose in anyway possible he would have at least some space between him and the toes of the goddess. Nothing left to do but watch and wait; above C.C.'s foot was coming in quick, making the cavern of her boot grow darker with each inch. All that remained of light was the faint edges of C.C.'s boot's opening, whether or not that would last Lelouch would soon find out. It was just light enough to see C.C.'s foot in detail, a sight that would render everyone to at least be stunned. And yet...Lelouch found himself experiencing more than that. He was stunned and even slightly scared to be sure; but two things made him feel different than expected. First off was the fact he was incapable of dying, and as such the colossal mountain that was C.C. was no real threat. And second, Lelouch seemed to notice how well kept C.C.'s feet were.

It truly is odd how in the face of what would normally be considered imminent demise what crosses people's minds, what they think of, what they notice, their memories, all sorts of unusual things come to mind. In this case, Lelouch noticed just how much work C.C. put into her feet. He never really put thought into it but when Lelouch honestly tried; he could not remember one time he saw C.C. tending to her feet. And yet, before him he saw that they were clean, well kept, and soft as can be. The only flaws were some dirt specks with C.C. got from toying with him mere moments ago and the odd abundance of sweat (Which given C.C.'s love for these boots barefoot, wasn't odd at all.) The toes didn't have too much between them, the nails were nice and evenly trimmed, if he were normal sized Lelouch might have actually found the luscious soles appealing to some minor extent, even if only because it showed a sliver of self respect. With each closing inch Lelouch thought about it, until it finally came before him; the harbinger of death that was C.C.'s foot.

With it mere inches away Lelouch realized something in dismay, there wasn't any spare room in C.C.'s boot, he had only guaranteed he would be beneath the toes of the giantess. He wasn't a man who took being beat lightly, but Lelouch accepted that C.C. had won this round, even if only due to her immense advantage. He crouched down against the moist insole and awaited his fate, laying face up towards it. C.C.'s toes seemed eager to toy with Lelouch as if he were a bug, and at that moment they got their wish. C.C.'s foot finally slid all the way in, and her big toe was rubbing Lelouch deeper into the vastness of her sweaty insole.

Miles and miles above C.C. was clearly letting out a victorious chuckle as her toe rubbed against her shrunken slave. "Nice try Lelouch but I've been alive for the better half of the Millennia; I've found a pair of boots that fit perfectly. Not so much as one little loose spot to be found. All you did was ensure you would get to know my toes." She scrunched her toes, feeling Lelouch get squeezed further by it. "I doubt I can imagine what you must be feeling but allow me to offer you a sort of sanctuary. I will stand still long enough for you to climb your way under my toenail. However you have to earn your right to enjoy luxury away from my soles. I will settle for a few kisses for now, if you don't then I'll go ahead and do what I desire while you suffer the full force of my feet. Either way is fine with me of course. Now...choose." C.C.'s voice was an interesting mixture of her usual monotone emotionless speech and clear sadistic pleasure being drawn from Lelouch at her mercy. A potent combination to be sure.

Beneath the arch of C.C.'s toe Lelouch cursed; "She's a shrewd one..." Obviously hiding beneath C.C's toenail would save Lelouch a lot of trouble albeit at the cost of extreme humiliation. But the cost for doing so was the real trick, C.C. knew full well Lelouch never gave up without a fight, if he had done as she had asked it would have tipped her off to his plan. And no doubt she would definitely try to break him then and there through tortures too extreme to comprehend. But fortune was on Lelouch's side (To an extent) in that he figured this out, he stubbornly sat still in his place at C.C.'s toe arch without budging an inch. Doing nothing would doom him to what could be a day under her sweaty foot, but doing something could ruin Lelouch for life. It was a simple choice.

Lelouch (Accurately) imagined C.C. smiling mere moments after he froze up, "Very well. If you want to suffer far be it for me to take that away from you. Just know I offered you solace." The giantess rose her foot and took the first of many steps. Literally shaking Lelouch's world to the core the young Prince felt gravity no longer in effect as his miniscule body was uplifted against C.C.'s toe whilst C.C. rose her foot. And equally effective was the downward motion, which threw Lelouch against the insole and instantly get crushed beneath the toe as she pushed her foot up yet again. Lelouch gritted his teeth as grunts of pain forcefully escaped; he could feel his bones shattering and organs crushing into dust and yet; Lelouch didn't feel anything remotely like death coming.

"D-Damn W-Witch! The former Emperor couldn't even properly think those two words without stuttering; let alone do what he had hoped and drift his mind away from the harsh reality of events. Now that he was actually experiencing them...it was clear that was NOT happening. He would have to suffer what would feel like an eternity enduring the highest levels of pain, and then the next minute will start. Meanwhile C.C. was getting off on the suffering Lelouch endured.

An idea crossed the little genius' mind at that moment; exactly where was C.C. going to go? Simply wandering would suit her but it was possible that during his time unconcious C.C. had gotten a job for money (Pizza) or food (Pizza) was running low and she needed to buy some. The latter sounded like work, which didn't sound like C.C. And there always was the possibility C.C. would visit some friends. Lelouch may have been considered dead but she wasn't. Lelouch shuddered as he recalled every woman he knew; by the end of his campaign as Emperor the names ranged from people like Kallen to soldiers like Villetta and Cecile to world renowned like Cornelia and Anya...And C.C. would have no problem whatsoever in manipulating any of them against Lelouch if she wanted. God he hoped she wouldn't visit anyone. All the while he panicked she playfully started to hum and develop a rhythm in her step.

Today would be the start of an...interesting life for the two...

151111112.content:
"Vivi? She brought all sorts of herbs and stuff for Alabasta didn't she?" It was an answer you could expect from Luffy; don't see the doctor of the ship no no no, go visit a friend who might have a cure that might work. It was simply how Luffy worked and Nami as well as the rest of the Strawhat Crew had long learned to deal with that. Thankfully Vivi had boarded their ship the Thousand Sunny when the Strawhats ran into her on an island; something about going out on a mission for medicine for her country. Naturally when they saw eachother everyone reacted happily (Except Brook and Franky who had to be filled in.) It was soon decided Vivi would journey for a couple islands for old times sake, but she had to return to Alabasta soon so it couldn't be no longer than a week. At least with all the medicinal supplies she picked up when they found her she might be able to help.

Nami sighed at her questionable captain, "Are you sure you don't want Chopper? It seems awfully weird that you're insistent on Vivi."

Luffy responded quickly, so quickly in fact it was clear he didn't think a single word out. "I ain't no Sanji! I just think Vivi would be better for the job."

"You just missed her." Nami sneered.

"Well DUH!!!! But more importantly......she said that some of those supplies are stuff like redfish meat and meat veggies and all sorts of cool foods right?"

"Hell-o ulterior motive. " Nami thought sarcastically, and all the confirmation she needed was the foot of drool dangling for Luffy's lips. "So you made up your mind I take it?" Twas a pointless question but no harm in confirmed her random captain's thought process. Luffy stretched his mouth to its limits. The result was actually a sort of megaphone effect. "YES NOW GO!!! TIME FOR FOOD-I MEAN HELP!" Nami sighed and went.

All around the crew was doing their usual thing, Zoro was asleep, Usopp was tinkering with stuff, Chopper and Robin were reading books together, Brook was humming quietly while working on some music, Franky was doing some ship maintenance, and lastly Sanji was unconcious due to the nosebleeds he was getting between time with Robin, Vivi and Nami (Don't worry he got medical attention). Vivi was secure in her room for now, both Robin and Nami suggested it would be best for her health. The princess would likely wear herself out when partying with this odd collection of people. Her room wasn't hard to find at all so Nami arrived in mere minutes. Vivi was doing nothing but sitting on her bed staring out the window with a smile. When Nami walked in she turned to greet her with a smile, "Hi there Nami! What do you need? Money?"

Nami cringed at Vivi bringing that up; an internal conflict ensued, money or Luffy? Luffy won...but barely; the dollar signs were still on her eyes as she spoke. "Actually...we have a small problem." Nami opened her cupped hands to reveal Luffy who waved as if nothing was wrong. "Hey there Vivi! I heard you got some food an-"

"STAY FOCUSED IDIOT!!!" Nami snapped.

Vivi didn't know how to react so she simply walked up and inspected Luffy. "What happened?" Luffy shrugged. "Do you have any idea?" Again a shrug. A sweatdrop appeared on Vivi, "Well do you have any idea what could help?"

"MEAT!"

"TAKE THIS SERIOUSLY!" Nami slammed her fist into him. After a moment Nami calmly looked Vivi in the eyes while her bruised captain was moaning in pain, "Vivi do you have any clue what to do?"

Vivi made a loud "Hmmm" Noise for several moments, "Well...there are a dozen of shrinking diseases out there. But about half of them are probably myths and half of the remaining ones have no cures. And of course we have no idea whats a myth and what isn't. This really seems like a task suited for Chopper."

"NOOO!!! IT HAS TO BE YOU!!!!" Vivi blushed while Nami leaned forward to explain, "He's trying to get some exotic food." That cleared things up quick and Vivi nodded happily, "Why I'd love to help then. I'll take him off your hands Nami."

Nami uncertainly handed him to the Alabastian princess, "You sure.... you know how he is..."

Vivi nodded, "Trust me I think I can handle it." Luffy was cheering on Vivi's hand, "YEAH!!!" Cheering for what exactly, no one knew. Nami stepped back to the door, "Okay; give a holler if you need someone to straighten ol rubber boy out. I think that he'd be good as some gum beneath my shoe for a little while." Luffy paled with a clear "She's Scary!" look on his face as Nami left with a giggle and wave.

"Now how bout that meat?!" Luffy turned back to Vivi.

Vivi looked away for the briefest of seconds. "Actually Luffy....
151111112.title: Why ask a Doctor? Ask Vivi!

1511111122.content:
Nostalgia showed itself in Vivi's face clear enough that even dim Luffy noticed it, "Well...maybe we could play a game or two? Have some fun like the old days...? I've really missed you all so much." Vivi looked at Luffy with a soft smile, out of all the Strawhats he was the one she liked the most, not because of looks or anything, but because no matter what the situation he gave off a radiance of hope. The very thing that saved Vivi's own home land...nothing could repay her debt to the pirate. At times she felt like she should've joined them as a pirate...the fun, the adventures, the goofing off, it was all amazing to think about. But Vivi chose the path of responsibility, and even if it made things rough she'd stick with it. But none of that meant she had to stop being friends with her companions.

Luffy grinned at his giantess of a friend, "Sounds like a blast to me! But what about my food...?" He almost seemed depressed by the question; the pirate had such a one-track mind.

Vivi smiled, "Tell you what, if you win our little game I'll prepare a buffet for you myself."

Luffy could almost see the large 9-Course meal before him...The captain cheered, "Yay!! Alright!"...He stopped jumping after a moment, "Wait...uh...what if you win?" He wouldn't lose...but Luffy decided to be a bit polite...for once...

Images of all the possibilities flashed in her head, just the tip of the iceberg on what Vivi could do to Luffy; and all of it seemed absolutely wonderful, albeit bad for Luffy. Some even seemed...a bit perverted. Vivi blushed a bit, "I'll...have you do something." What it was, Vivi didn't even know.

"Sounds good to me! But what game are we gonna play?”

A good question, Vivi was royalty so she didn’t exactly have a firm knowledge of games for commoners. Any games she did know seemed impossible given the situation, or if they were possible, something Luffy would deem “Boring.” She bit her lip as her mind ran ideas, nothing really coming up…except two but they seemed a bit…odd, even for Luffy. But they would have to do. “Okay, I have two ideas here Luffy! I’ll let you pick what we play.”

Luffy was picking his nose as he nodded, and Vivi knew she’d end up repeating herself a few times.

“Okay, the first game is basically Cat and Mouse. An extremely popular game among my people, given your size we could have a lot of fun with it.”

Luffy scratched his head, “How do you play it?”

Vivi explained, “Well, since you’re so small…you can be the mouse. And to put it simply you just have to stop me from catching you. And I’ll be the Cat, all I have to do is catch you. Any way I decide to catch you is allowed; likewise you can do anything to avoid capture. For example, I could try to pin you under my feet, and you could use your Gomu Gomu powers to simply stop them.”

It was painfully clear Luffy didn’t understand half of it, but he got the basic picture. “Okay…and the other game?”

This one made Vivi blush, she was wearing her white princess dress…a dress that did a very good job of accenting her curves…heck her breasts seemed bigger than Nami and even Robin’s put together with it on. “Well…you could just…climb me. I can be like a mountain you have to climb. And I can do stuff to try to stop you, but only indirect things. For example I couldn’t just pull you off, but if I decided to go for a walk it would be okay.” A moment passed, “But don’t get any ideas about groping me in places!!”

Luffy was picking his nose again, “Okay…whatever…now…how do you play the first one again?” Vivi sighed.

About an hour and five detailed explanations later Luffy finally understood it all well enough, and he finally realized he forgot one thing. Just how small was he exactly? You'd think figuring out such a detail would be his first instinct...you thought wrong. Just another testament to his overall ignorance of anything not involving Pirates or food.

He did what seemed like a perfectly normal thing to him, “Hey Vivi! How small am I!!” Ask a friend cause he couldn’t figure it out.

With a sigh Vivi muttered, "Give me a second..." At first the princess tried to tried to measure via her eyes but that didn’t do too well, so she placed her bare feet near Luffy for comparison. The results were a little shocking. “Well Luffy, it looks like you’re about half the size of my toes…I believe a centimeter or so.”

“A centipede?”

“A centimeter.”

“Cinnabon?”

"A centimeter!"

Several mistakes later…

“Ooohhhh…I’m half the size of your toes. I see now.” He looked at Vivi's gorgeous feet with a blank stare. As expected of royalty they were taken excellently care of, any signs of dirt were from simply visiting the Strawhats. Her light blue nail polish was applied perfectly...heck all of Vivi looked perfect. At her size everything just seemed amazing too. Her body was curved, her face beautiful, her hair long and down...and none of these things so much as hit Luffy in any meaning of the word.

Vivi was exhausted, the game hadn’t even started yet and Luffy was wearing her down…and he still wasn’t getting the details! “Okay…Luffy…I need you to pick now. What game did you want to play?”

Luffy leapt up and down, “I wanna play….

151111122.content:
Luffy couldn't help but stare at Nami in nervousness; mainly because she was eyeing him like she eyed money...not a good sign. And the awkward silence was really getting to him, what to do what to do. Nami called him her pet...he didn't particularly care about that but Luffy had more pressing matters. He had to become the Pirate King! He wanted to do his typical loudmouth thing but...for some reason he was just silent; even he couldn't understand it. So he took to keeping himself entertained with a staredown between him and Nami...which ended in countless defeats for him. Finally after several long minutes of the silence Nami grinned and spoke, "I bet you're wondering why you shrunk huh?"

Luffy managed to find the will to speak again, "Not really, as long as I become Pirate King nothing else matters."

Nami let out a content sigh, " such a one track mind. ""Well you have to be big to be Pirate King don't you?"

Luffy had to think for a minute, "Yeah...I guess you're right. So why did I shrink?"

Nami giggled, "I shrunk you of course."

"Oh...." Luffy seemed oddly calm about it; that is until the realization of Nami's words dawned on him, then his jaw literally fell to the floor. "WHAT!!?!?"

Nami giggled at the delayed response, "Yeah, I snuck in last night and did it to you. Check it out." She gestured towards her wrist where a gold bracelet was. "Like it?"

Luffy scratched his head, "Looks...sorta familiar...."

Nami nodded, "As it should. We picked this up on Sky Island. We just never really tried it. But I did one day and guess what?! It's a shrinking dial! One shot makes you an inch tall!"

"Wow that's cool!" Nami smiled at Luffy's understandable excitement, but give it a second...."Now that you've shown me unshrink me!"

"I would.....but I can't....and I honestly meant what I said about you as a pet ya know."

"But...why..." Luffy was not understanding this a bit.

In response Nami just got her devious smirk, "I just....wanted some fun. And...with you being a rubberman and all....you're the most convenient. If I stepped on you you would be fine."

Luffy shrugged, "Yeah I guess that's true...." His inappropriate behavior knew no bounds.

Nami kept on talking, getting a slight high from not only being so powerful over Luffy, but him not even seeming to mind. Course he was just that way but she didn't have to let that kill her buzz. "Now Luffy....what to do with you?"

"MEAT PLEASE!!!"

Nami flicked him, "NO!" Luffy looked like he was about to cry.

Nami was about to discipline him some more when an idea came to mind, "Wait...if one shot makes you this small...what will another shot do?" Luffy turned white at the idea, and Nami's now scary face told him she was more than willing to experiment to find out.

"Time to find out~" She practically sang as she pushed a switch on her bracelet, a small thin beam escaped and hit Luffy. No matter how he ran it was simply too much for him to outrun without using Gear Second. But he had no time to even charge that up. As a result he was hit, and in the next few moments he would find out just how large the world around him would become. How large Nami would become, and how small he would become....
