151111211111.content:
"Crap, crap, crap, crap, CRAP!" Luffy repeated dozens of times as he ran in circles inside Nico Robin's boot. His friend's foot was coming in fast and unless something was done he'd be underneath his friends smelly foot! Luffy couldn't swim in the ocean, he did not want to find out if the same applied to foot sweat too.

Faintly the Straw hat captain could see the outer edges of Robin's boot, mostly blocked off by her incoming foot. The keyword being 'mostly' there was a tiny amount of space at the very edge, very very thin; even to Luffy as a rubber human being it would likely be a tight squeeze.

"It's worth the risk!" Luffy screamed like a masachist, breathing in more of the nasty foot odor which surrounded him. He either ignored it or hadn't noticed because Luffy gave no signs of disgust, in fact all he really did was stretch his arms out...literally.

Luffy was literally stretching his arms towards his tiny opening, he wasn't sure if his arms would reach high enough but he had to believe. His head felt kind of light, certain areas of Luffy's peripheral vision were starting to grow blurry too, was Robin's boot odor alone great enough to cause this? If so what kind of horrors would Luffy experience if he actually encountered the foot?

He didn't want to find out, time was running thin and his hands were so close to the rim of Robin's boot. Sadly his arms stretching ability had reached their limit, even a rubber band can only be stretched so far and Luffy's rubber arms had reached their limit.

With an almost cartoonish face Luffy screamed "COME ON!" and leapt up into the air. The added height from his unrealistic ten foot high jump did wonders, his hands had successfully grasped the rim of Robin's boot! "YES!" Luffy yelled triumphantly, instantly turning green at swallowing more of the disgusting foot odor.

Luffy allowed his rubber arms to begin retracting, lifting Luffy high into the air and towards freedom. "I'm gonna make it!"

----
Not knowing of the struggle going on in her boot Robin boredly slipped her foot deeper into her footwear, such a simple activity seemed to be taking a lot longer than necessary. Her mind was on other things though, to be precise they were on various ruins and the wonders within, " Such wonderful possibiliti- Ah....AHCHOO!" Damn near screaming Robin had sneezed, unknown to her was that this sneeze had far more consequences than a runny nose.

----

"So close....." Luffy was less than ten meters away from the slight opening of space, in about three seconds he would be out and have slingshoted into the open air that did not smell of feet. At least...this was what was going to happen. Out of the blue Robin muttered something to herself, and more importantly midsentence she let out a loud sneeze.

To Luffy it sounded as if a volcano erupted high above, but sound wasn't all that came from it. A simple sneeze had a very common if not unnoticed effect on Robin, her entire body jolted slightly. Under normal circumstances this would mean next to nothing but when a shrunken Luffy is inches by her foot the effects were quite extreme.

Robin's foot jolted to the side, unknowingly the very bottom of her bare sole ended up on top of Luffy's hands. Any normal person's hand would have been crushed to dust by the impact, but due to the rubber nature of Luffy's entire body his hand mere flattened out like in an old cartoon.

It was flat but Luffy's hands still held on stubbornly, although now the pirate wished they hadn't. Another effect of Robin's minor foot repositioning was that the opening Luffy was heading to...it was blocked off. The other side would have even more space but this side now had none, and Luffy was on a crash course with Nico Robin's sole.

In a couple of seconds the Straw Hat captain slammed against his friend's gigantic bare sole, experiencing odors that made the boot seem like heaven. The sudden pain and shock of the impact finally released Luffy's fingers from the rim he held so desperately on to; he was dazed the impact combined with foot odor and sweat had left Luffy temporarily stunned, which led to a devastating result.


Still unaware of any unusual activity by her foot once Robin had sniffled a couple of times she finally began inserting her foot back into the foot wear, finally getting it on all the way. Stunned and unable to move, Luffy was stuck on the bottom of her sole, a small flattened lifeform between the boots sweat filled insole and Robin's sweat making foot.

With clear uninterest in anything going on around her, Robin took a single step in her now boot clad feet. The weight of Nico Robin fully came onto Luffy's small frame, it was like several hundred tons of flesh on top of him. His body remained okay, but the pain was still there, severely weakened but there.

Luffy could only wonder what Robin would do now....

15112.content:
"Ha!...Ha!...Ha!" In the middle of a dojo-esque room stood one man. In his hands were a single long blade that he swung repititively, roaring with each swing. Sweat littered the man's body from the arduous hours but he didn't care; he swung more and more. The man was Roranoa Zoro, first mate of Straw Hat Luffy, master swordsman, and ex-pirate hunter. He was in the middle of his typical training and had finally decided to take a minor rest.

Almost right away his legs gave way and Zoro fell to a knee, gasping for air. "Ha.....ugh.....hu...." He stared almost furiously at the blade in his hands, Sandai Kitetsu. A powerful and effective blade, but a cursed one; or so Zoro was told by the man he got it from. Everyone who had wielded this blade before died of odd causes. At times it even seemed like the weapon had a mind of its own, a stubborn one; and Zoro was training to bend it to his will. It was one of the main reasons he trained like this; if he couldn't make a stubborn sword listen to him Zoro didn't deserve to beat Mihawk like he desired. Zoro was grateful he was on dry land for this though, he and his crew had docked on this island and shortly afterwards Zoro found an empty dojo; one thing led to another and soon he was training vigorously. Training on a ship was good and all but nothing beat good ol dry land. Thankfully the Straw Hat crew was supposed to be spending a few days here to restock, giving Zoro plenty of time to train in a proper setting.


Still panting Zoro rose back to his feet and stared at the blade further. Images of his past came to mind, images of sparring with Kuina....and losing. His promise to her, battles til now. He had come a long way for some rough and tumble brat, he grinned at how Kuina would probably think of him now. And of course, by thinking of his childhood friend Zoro's mind came to... her. Tashigi of the Marines, a woman who looked almost identical to Kuina apart from age, she was like her in every way; strength, skill....beauty....Zoro shook his head, she was the enemy, this was no time for fantasizing about her!


She's the enemy. And if the time comes. I will have to take her down, I can't hold back because of old friends. It's how everyone would want it, Luffy, the gang, Kuina, and even Tashigi herself.


Energized by his memories Zoro gripped his sword tighter than ever, for a brief instant; because in the next instant his hand suddenly felt a sharp pain which caused him to drop his sword. The tip of Zoro's finger was bleeding for some odd reason, investigation of Sandai Kitetsu revealed why. One long, sharp point was potruding from the hilt, something that was never there before. Zoro laughed when he saw it, "So the cursed sword wants to hurt me eh? Bring it!" The sword naturally did nor said nothing, but...for some reason Zoro had the feeling he was being mocked. He stared at his finger again and gasped.


Vision...growing hazy....body...suddenly weak... Zoro's legs gave way and the man began to fall, his eyes locking on to his blade one last time. Damn sword...what did you do? It held it's mocking silence as Zoro fell into unconciousness. It was a dreamless rest, couldn't have lasted more than a moment before Zoro awoke, to a great surprise.


He may not have been the smartest, but Zoro was no dimwit like his captain. Before him was the cursed blade he dropped, as were his other two blades which somehow fell, his clothes were too; all extremely massive. Zoro had shrunken! Yet he was oddly calm, he just grinned and walked his naked body to the cursed Sandai Kitetsu. "This all you got? A little downsizing? With all the weirdstuff in the sea I'll be back to normal in a flash!" Again nothing remotely like a response came. But a thought did come to Zoro; what if it was just timing? What if there was an enemy who did this? He quickly braced himself at that thought and looked around; no enemies....it looked as if it might really have been the sword that did this.


Logic told Zoro to remain on guard, but his heart said his sword had done it somehow so he turned to face it yet again. "Now....mind telling me when I can look forward to thrusting you into an enemy again?" This time the sword actually did something, it didn't physically move or anything of the sort but; Zoro's blood on the point that stabbed him...it dropped a drop of blood and Zoro paled. He might've been paranoid but...the sword seemed to be saying Zoro's death would end it.


Again Zoro shook off the oncoming shock, "Please, like a sword of all things can take me down. Even if you somehow are alive I have no reason to fear you!" But it wasn't the sword Zoro had to be nervous about, it was the person who knocked on the dojo entrance. A gasp escaped Zoro as he eyed the door, a feminine voice on the other side asked to be let in; then without waiting too long opened the door. Zoro gasped as he recognized the girl....
15112.title: The Curse of Sandai Kitetsu

choices: Tashigi fell, just far enough so that her face ended up right in front of Zoro
Zoro made his move, now he starts his climb.
151122221.content:
Zoro would've recognized that woman anywhere. It was…her…The one person whose mere appearance affected the swordsman to his very core. Tashigi, Smoker's right-hand soldier and a top notch swordswoman, had entered the very dojo Zoro was in. Right away Zoro could not help but note her attractiveness. She reminded him too much of Kuina to not to. Instead of her typical Marine jacket and sword, Tashigi had on a much more casual outfit consisting of a sleeveless, black shirt that accented her chest, and a pair of jeans, all fitted tightly against the admittedly nice figure of the woman. Zoro paled slightly when he noticed that even from the vast distance between himself and her, he could tell he wasn't even close to the size of Tashigi's shoes. That left him about toe-size, if even that.

-----

Tashigi took a look around the empty dojo, "Hello…? Is anyon-" Her sentence got caught short by what she saw in the middle of the dojo. Well…sort-of saw, she didn't have her glasses so it looked a bit like a haze, but it was there all right. "What's that?" Instinctively she took a few steps forward to investigate.

-----

Zoro cursed under his breath when Tashigi began to head his way. For whatever reason he felt like he should cover his nudity, so he hid beneath his normal-sized shirt. Wait, why am I doing this? I can still take her! And even if I can't, I can at least face this woman like a man! Zoro gritted his teeth and ran back out to open space. He turned to face the oncoming Tashigi, and he felt his bold feelings quickly leave him.

Boom

A footstep alone sounded reminiscent of Oar's stomps from Thriller Bark. Even Zoro realized he was outmatched; and not only that, but the overall beauty Tashigi had stunned the swordsman more than he would've thought. For just a single moment, he didn't feel like a man facing a giant woman, he felt like a speck before a beautiful Goddess. The moment that thought came though, Zoro instantly shook it off. Control yourself you dobe! This woman isn't Kuina! She is not, will not, and can never be her. So quit acting like this! Regardless of how Zoro lectured himself though, he couldn't stop his heart from accelerating in Tashigi's mere presence.

Boom

-----
Tashigi came closer and closer, with each step she was becoming increasingly sure of it. On the ground were three swords and some clothes. It was all still blurry, but for whatever reason thoughts of the Straw Hats pirate swordsman Zoro came to mind. Were they his clothes? Were the Straw Hats in town? And…

Is he…naked…? The Marine quickly started to blush. Her eyes shifted from side to side, but there didn't seem to be any movement. Well, not entirely true. There was apparently some small bug near the clothes, or maybe it was some dirt…or maybe something else. Without her glasses Tashigi really couldn't tell. She didn't want to step on it though, just in case, so she made sure to note where her feet were going.

------

Tashigi was now a mere footstep away, and Zoro's jaw was wide open. The woman was the biggest thing he'd ever seen. Even Oars was smaller than her! If he had to estimate, Zoro was about…somewhere between half of an inch, and an inch tall. Small enough that Tashigi's toes alone were formidable foes. Right now her toes weren't his concern though, it was her entire foot. Why? It was big, and in the next step, it was going to land on him. There was no way to escape it, not that Zoro intended to. He'd lived through worse, this would be nothing. He braced himself as all light seemed to be eclipsed by Tashigi's massive frame. The sole of her shoe quickly replaced the light at the top of the dojo. Zoro tensed as he awaited major pain. Heh, it'd be kind of funny if this killed me, crushed to death by the look-alike. He smirked.

BOOM!!!

That footstep created the loudest boom of all, enough to create a decent gust of wind that blew some dust into Zoro's eyes. But that was it. It didn't crush him. In fact, Tashigi's shoe went right over him and was in the space between Zoro and his clothes. A bit bewildered, Zoro didn't really know how to react. He did all that preparation for pain, and it didn't even happen…? He sighed, Man, I gave up way too easy. Why does she have to look like that?

Zoro looked up to Tashigi, just in time to see her bend over to examine his clothes and swords. The swordsman cursed when the first thing he saw was Tashigi's enormous rear pushed in his direction. As if not trying to think of her appearance wasn't hard enough.

-----

Up close it was certain, though Tashigi couldn't believe it. These were indeed Roronoa Zoro's clothes and swords. But the swordsman himself was nowhere to be seen. She gave another look around to see if he was there, he wasn't. Roronoa isn't the type to just leave his swords lying around…He must be near… Tashigi tensed as she awaited an attack. She instinctively reached for the rare sword Zoro carried, Wado Ichimonji. She needed a weapon should he make his move, and why not one of the most beautiful blades in existence? Tashigi still couldn't fathom why a pirate had it in the first place.

But even with a weapon, Tashigi was not attacked. There wasn't even a hint of movement. Was Zoro really not there? She looked to the clothes and thought, Did something happen to him? He may have been a pirate, but Tashigi felt a small desire to rescue Zoro flare up inside. A desire she quickly quelled. He's a pirate; his fellow pirates can handle it. "Even so…leaving all of these out like this is just disrespectful…" Tashigi muttered aloud as she reached for Zoro's attire and weapons. She grabbed one sword and instantly felt her body throb, her hand tightened its grip. She looked to the blade, remembering it from Roguetown. Now…this is the sword I expect of a pirate…A cursed sword…After staring at it for a moment Tashigi rose back up to her feet and continued to walk forward, towards some benches for those who train at this dojo.

The Marine laid out all of the three swords along the bench neatly, and after folding them, Zoro's clothes were placed in a neat square beside them. A faint blush came back as Tashigi remembered Zoro was likely naked. Her eyes wandered to Wado Ichimonji again.

…That pirate doesn't deserve that blade…

Before she even realized it, Tashigi grabbed the blade and turned around to head to the exit.

-----

"The hell woman?!" Zoro screamed up at Tashigi, who seemed miles away. After staring at her rear more than he would like Zoro saw the Marine go take some more steps forward towards some benches. The pirate was about to raise some hell about it but then he noticed Tashigi was merely laying his belongings somewhere more respectful. He felt a bit grateful she even showed a pirate's belongings such respect…Then she took Wado Ichimonji…Kuina's sword, and that was the last straw.

Small or not, Zoro moved himself in Tashigi's path. He was gonna get that sword back one way or another; even if he'd have to climb Tashigi like a mountain to do it. All he'd have to do is hop on her shoe the moment it gets close enough and begin his climb. He'd done worse. It worked in his favor Tashigi seemed to avoid stepping on him. Her foot would stop just before Zoro, where he can grab on to it no problem.

Zoro readied himself, another few steps and he'd make his move…

Boom…Boom…BOOM!

The booms got louder and louder until…

151131.content:
Sanji was busily preparing a meal for the crew,shifting between tasks such as grilling the meat,seasoning the vegetables and keeping Luffy out of the kitchen.After an hours time of preperation,he was nearly done."Just need a bit more spice...."He muttered to himself,taking a long drag on the cigarette that hung loosely in his mouth.Walking to the far end of kitchen,he opened a cabinet in search for that last ingredient for the meal.Puzzlement went aross the blonde-haired chef's face."There's only one jar of spice....what happened to the rest of the bottles?!"Reaching in and pulling out a small vial filled with a light green powder,it was true,almost all of the spices he had just bought tfrom the last island they had visited,had vanished.

Opening the cap of the vial,he put a finger in and out it came with the green powder covering it."Whatever this stuff is,I'll have to improvise."He took a small taste of it,finding that this green-powdery substance was delicious."Hmm....yum."Not currently acting like a professional chef,Sanji dabbed his finger into the powder once more,taking another lick of it.As he walked back over to the other side of the kitchen to finish the meal,his vision suddenly began to blur.His superhuman legs felt wobbly,and he collasped to the hard wooden floor.He spilled the powder all over himself on the way down to unconsciousness.

.....

Sanji awoke to the sound of earthquakes,with honed reflexes he jumped to heet,looking around for any enemies that might have attacked the ship while he was unconscious.Nothing.He wasn't even on the ship anymore.Before him,was a green boulder.Approaching it,Sanji whistled at it's size.He put his hand on the base,just to find that it felt like powder.....powder.....

"Oh God please don't tell me...."A few puzzle pieces clicked in his head."This boulder...is a particle of that green powder?!"

Shrunken,Sanji had been shrunken.Whatever that green powder stuff was,it had strange properties."I really hope this isn't permanent...."He moaned to himself,taking a cigarette out of his pocket and lighting it.Strangely,his clothes and all he had with him had shrunken as well.

Soon,,Sanji had found the source of the earthquakes.What he thought just a part of the landscape in the distance,was a giantess.A very,VERY big giantess....

Her bare feet brought the titanness closer and closer to Sanji,making her size ever more astounding.A toe alone could be an entire island.Gazing skyward,Sanji looked up,craning his neck just to see the entire colossal being.His view was halted by breasts that could crush entire civilizations.He smiled."Y'know what...I hope this is permanent...."

The giantess is...

"Vivi.....you make such a lovely giantess!!"Sanji exclaimed,even though she couldn't hear him at all."Sanji?Where are you?Me and the others are hungry!"She said,looking this way and that.Her voice,even to Sanji so far below,was thunderous,yet beautiful."Ah,my blue-haired Goddess,I cannot hide myself from you any longer...."Sanji grinned.If he was to survive,he would have to climb Vivi,a thought that made him all the more happier.

He dashed towards her feet,even at his diminuitive size his legs retained their superhuman qualities.He approached one of her island-toes,the big toe.He placed his foot onto one of the ridges that could hold the Going Merry on it,and kicked off,propelling himself into the airHe repeatd this process,sort of a hop-skip upwards.He had his hands in his pockets the whole time,and puffed smoke from his mouth every now and then.In a minute,Sanji was on top of Vivi's big toe."What a nice touch..."He smiled,her nail had been painted to match her hair."Alas,I cannot admire your wonderful artistry for long,for I must reach your ear soon...."Being around women made Sanji much like a poet,a perverted one though.

He walked across her toe,the ankle only seeming a mile or so away.A sudden shift in landscape made Sanji nearly fall off balance."I guess Sanji left....odd."He heard Vivi say as she began to walk out of the kitchen."Oh Vivi....I wish you would've let me enjoy the scsenery...guess I'll have to speed up."He began to run across the plain that was her foot,speeding up his process.

151132.title: More Present Luffy?

choices: Boa Hancock, a guest on Luffy's ship at the time
1511321.content:
"Zzzzzzz.....more meat...zzzzz."

Were those words the sound of a hungry person, a starving man? No they were the words of a sleeping pirate; a pirate by the name of Monkey D. Luffy. Clad in a simply blue shirt and shorts with a strawhat Luffy was far from what most would consider to be a pirate; but the fact remained that he was, and one of the most known in the world. Luffy was a simpleton, but a good man, kind, strong, does the right thing, and has a deep addiction to meat. Most important of all though is that Luffy is a Rubber Man, a man who can stretch any part of his body out as if he were made of rubber (which he was.) It was a curse attained through eating a Devils Fruit, at the cost of the ability to swim Luffy had became rubber and used it to become a pirate. Despite the clear contradiction in becoming a pirate who couldn't swim Luffy indeed became quite a great pirate, with a good if not unusual crew.

Zoro, a former Bounty Hunter and Ace swordsman. Nami, a money grubbing and extremely hot woman with a talent for navigating. Usopp, a cowardly man with an alias of Sogeking which allows him to do great things with his sharpshooter ability. Sanji, the perverted cook. Chopper the talking blue nosed reindeer who doubled as a doctor. Nico Robin, another beautiful voluptous woman who worked as an archaeologist. Franky, a panty wearing cyborg with a heart of gold. And last but not least Brook, a skeleton swordsman and musician. Together these people made up the Strawhat Pirates. This crew brought the term "Weird" to a whole new level but together they had gone through much and had become the best of friends. Though different from the stereotypical pirate the Strawhat crew were all good hearted and did the right thing; despite getting on the goverments bad side more than once. Recently their adventures led the crew to a mass separation through a great battle; but through a series of interesting adventures the crew was together again and enjoying time on their ship the Thousand Sunny.

With no particular destination in mind the ship sailed, everyone doing their own thing and Luffy deep in a comatose level of sleep. His dream was what you would expect in the mind of a fat person; meat, mountains and mountains of meat for him to injest. It was more or less Luffy's idea of heaven, and he ate and ate as much as he could. That is exactly all that happened until Luffy happened to eat a certain piece of meat, unlike the other ripe muttons and such this one meat tasted sour and before Luffy could spit it out he had swallowed it whole. With a sudden chill Luffy cringed over, the light playful atmosphere of the haven seemed to disappear all around; replacing itself with darkness. A voice called out to Luffy, loud enough to be mistaken for God; and it spoke to him as if it knew all about him. "Monkey D. Luffy....you have achieved much in the short amount of time you have become a pirate, but you still have not followed the typical road of one. You and your crew fight like Revolutionaries or pure hearted Marines rather than pirates. Tell me, why do you walk the path of a pirate when you clearly are much more suited for other roles?"

Luffy rose to his feet and...grinned? "Because I'm gonna be King of the Pirates!"

The voice seemed to chuckle, "He said the same thing....Strawhat! I am addressing you because of one thing; when you awaken you will find yourself in a situation unlike any you have ever faced. I contacted you to see whether or not I should intervene in this and save you. Can you guess what I chose?"

Luffy didn't even seem to grasp half of what was said, "I don't care! Whatever comes I'll handle it! Because I'm gonna be King of the Pirates!"

"Which is why I chose to do nothing. I have watched your journey from afar for quite some time Strawhat, if you really are intent on staying on the path of Gol D. Roger then you will have to overcome this on your own. Now farewell..."

Luffy stepped forward to try and stop whatever it was from leaving; but it did nothing of course. All that happened was an image surfaced in his mind. An image of a stern looking man with an intricate tattoo on the left side of his face. He looked....familiar. But before Luffy could place it the world around him blurred into nothingness...

"Wah!"

Luffy sat upright panting, was it all a dream? It seemed...so real...the voice. It mentioned a situation Luffy would have to face, was that a mere dream too? "Ugh...I need some water....and meat." Luffy got to his feet and started walking. After a couple moments he managed to get far enough to lazily leapt off his bed...wait...leapt off his bed? While falling it hit Luffy that he had never needed to do that before; and why did the ground seem so far away? There was only one logical explanation.

"OH MY GOD EVERYTHING GREW!!"

In his head something, probably his conscience or maybe just memory of Nami always correcting him; but no matter what it was it corrected Luffy. "No...you've shrunk." Luffy had a blank look of understanding on his face, oddly calm as he landed on the ground. "So I somehow shrank....wait..." An idea came to mind. "I CAN EAT MORE MEAT LIKE THIS!!" Like a little school girl Luffy grinned and started skipping towards his door miles away.

"I'm gonna start with some steak! And some mutton! Maybe even get some bacon! May this is gonna be great!!!" If Luffy's dream was heaven the ideas he was having now were probably heaven's heaven. He marched ever happily towards the door...when it opened.

"Huh?" Luffy muttered when the door opened, who was coming in?
1511321.title: Little Rubber

choices: The Dining Room. Luffy's Meal awaits
Hancock's Guest Room. What Luffy wants is her after all no?
15113211.content:
In stepped perhaps the most beautiful woman on the planet; Boa Hancock. Hancock was amazingly beautiful; clad in a red dress with flower-like designs that exposed much cleavage and much of her legs Hancock was probably the male epitome of beauty right now. On a scale of one to ten...she was probably a twenty, despite her rather snobbish personality to most. The truth however, is that Hancock was quite kind and sensitive; just with a burdened past. This woman who resembled a goddess at normal size walked in, and Luffy barely gave her a glance. In fact, Luffy might not have noticed her at all if Hancock's giant red heels hadn't stopped directly in his path. When he saw the heels Luffy strained his neck to look up, and gaining no sexual arousal at all from Hancock's rather revealed body Luffy simply shouted, "Hiya Hancock!"

The giantess didn't hear him at all, Luffy was probably somewhere between an inch and smaller so a regular voice wouldn't have any hope of gaining her attention. Instead she seemed to be scanning the room for Luffy, "Luffy? Are you in here?"

Actually grinning Luffy jumped up and down; "Are ya blind Hancock I'm right in front of ya!" He screamed, not realizing his size was why he was not noticed.

With a sigh Hancock began to turn around, " Sigh ...and I had Sanji prepare a large meal just for the two of us..." A faint blush arose to her cheeks near the end of the sentence, a blush that Luffy missed entirely. All he heard was "large meal." With a mental fantasy of Sanji's five star food surrounding him at his size Luffy nearly fainted, no matter what he would get Boa to take him to that meal!

"But why isn't she seeing me?" Luffy wondered aloud, after a moment the rather obvious answer dawned on him. "Oh...it's cause I'm little...silly me. Maybe my hunger has gone to my head." Now that he knew the problem Luffy needed a way to gain the giantess' attention, and he came up with an effective if not extreme method. Putting his thumb into his mouth Luffy blew into it with all his might, and like a cartoon his hand swelled up like a giant balloon. "Gear Third!!" Gear Third allowed parts of Luffy's body to expand to Giant-like size temporarily, although he had never used it quite like this. Putting all of the growth-like power of Gear Third into his head Luffy swelled his head up until it was about twenty times normal size, which translated to about two-three inches; and at this size he shouted at the top of his lungs. "HANCOCK!!"

In the process of shutting the door Hancock stopped midstep, Luffy just called her. She turned around hoping to see the Strawhat Captain, but the room was still empty; and yet...the voice was still calling...from below? Hancock bent her head over and couldn't believe it, there Luffy was; his body about half an inch tall and his head the size of a large thumbtack. Hancock knelt down and looked in disbelief, "Luffy? Is that you?"

The large head of the Strawhat Captain swelled down to normal, as the side effect of Gear Third kicked in. Luffy's body resembled a childs now but due to only using the ability for a moment he reverted to normal almost instantly. He grinned and looked up at Hancock giddily, "Yeah! Now did I hear something about a meal?" With Hancock bent over surely she could hear him now.

"Luffy what happened?" She asked in concern

Luffy shrugged, "Dunno, just woke up small. Now...meal?"

Hancock placed a hand against her mouth, "Oh my God...I think this might be my fault."

"Huh?"

Hancock looked almost ready to cry, "In certain rare instances....my Devils Fruit power has shrunken people instead of petrifying them. It...might have shrunken you."

Luffy...grinned? "Nah that can't be it! You used your power on me once, and it did nothing! This is probably from me going Gear Second and Third a lot. We can ask Chopper about it later. Now...MEAT!!"

Hancock had an expression of surprise and guilt; truth be told she had been trying often to use her power on Luffy. As a sort of way of testing the love between them. If it worked it meant Luffy found her at least attractive....it never worked. But to Hancock it just meant Luffy was that strong; he was so strong in his love for her that her power couldn't even come close to it! Hancock may have been a Shichibukai but she was quite capable of delusions. But prolonged usage of it has probably caused this....but embarrassed Hancock decided to keep that to herself. "I suppose...but are you sure my dear? I mean, I sort of like you like this and you probably like me like this too."

Not quite getting the message Luffy kept grinning, "Of course I like ya Hancock! You're one of my best buddies!" Hancock leapt back in shock, taking Luffy's words as a confirmation of love. "Oh Luffy...I'm so happy!"

Luffy hardly registered her words, "MEAT!!!"

Hancock nervously brought her hand to Luffy, gesturing for him to hop on. "Are you sure you don't want to see the doctor...Chopper was it? About your condition?"

"After I EAT!!!!!" He shouted as Luffy leapt up to Hancock's palm.

Hancock sighed with a smile, Luffy was so different from anyone she had ever met.....it's why she loved him. "Okay...I'll take you right to where you want to go." With that Hancock rose back to her full height and left Luffy's room with the Captain in hand. Heading for....
15113211.title: Clueless Captain and Delusional Babe

choices: Husbands usually give their wives a foot massage...and my feet are rather sore..
Would you....like to make love to me?
151132112.content:
In Hancock's open palm Luffy was clearly more than ready for a meal to come, the drool dripping from his rubber lips had begun seeping onto the giantess' silky soft skin; but she showed no signs of minding in the slightest. She walked with a silent grace in the Thousand Sunny's halls with the Strawhat Captain in hand, while Luffy undoubtedly couldn't care Hancock did not want people to see what she intended to do. Thankfully everyone seemed busy doing their own thing in their own rooms so Hancock was virtually alone, making entering her room an easy task. With a gentle shove the amazon empress opened the door and shut it behind her with a foot, walking towards her bed. The room was quite simple in the basest of color and furnishings; as to be expected of a guest room, but Hancock was more than happy with it. Why? Because it was directly beside Luffy's room. Unable to control herself Hancock let her lips slowly curl upward as she kicked her shoes off; oh how she was tempted to mount Luffy then and there...but she respected him too much for such an act.

Comically late in noticing Luffy screamed, "This isn't the dining room!!"

Hancock giggled at the man who would one day be her husband, "I said you had a meal; I never quite said it was in the dining room did I? My apologies it is only one plate...."

Luffy was unable to reply, before him was what was normally considered a large platter; to Luffy, it was probably an island of meat. The Captain did nothing to restrain himself, "BANZAI!!!!" Over ten feet away from the bed the platter resided on Luffy leapt into the air and stretched his arm to the edge of the platter. Hand firmly on it Luffy pulled himself forward and dug in. Watching Luffy eat....it was sickening, the rubber man was eating like a starved pig, only worse. No manners whatsoever in any action he made, and Hancock watched with a lovey expression. Mere minutes later it was a miracle...the platter was cleared and a very bloaded Luffy sat in the middle, quite content. "Thanks Hancock....that was....awesome..."

Hancock looked away with a blush, "Oh Luffy dear, you are too kind. I only asked for the meal so you could...." Hancock looked back at the captain, dismay filling her face. " He's ASLEEP!!? "

Peacefully Luffy slept...for all of three seconds, in an equally sudden move as falling asleep Luffy woke up and yawned loudly. "Ahhhh! That's rocked." He looked to Hancock as if he forgot she was even on the ship, "Oh...hiya Hancock. What are you doing here?"

"I brought you into my room for a meal..."

It took a moment for Strawhat to remember, "Oh yeah....thanks again for that."

Hancock smiled and lifted the platter off her bed, as well as put Luffy in her palm again, "It is my pleasure. I wanted to make you happy......Um...Luffy?" A faint blush arose to her cheeks.

Luffy tilted his head cluelessly, "Yeah?"

The girl's gigantic face was as red as Nami's hair, "Well...truth be told...I had another reason for bringing you into my room. Although I didn't expect you to be...well like this..."

Again the Captain grinned, "It don't matter Hancock! Big or small I'm still gonna be King of the Pirates! What's up?"

The giantess' couldn't look him in the eye, "Well...you see...we're sort of like a married couple at this point. Wouldn't you agree?"

Half listening Luffy picked his nose and brushed Hancock off, "Yeah...yeah..."

Confidence and hope rose up in Hancock's heart, "Well...married couples do a large amount of stuff together... for eachother....Would you be willing to do something for me?"

Luffy gave her a thumbs up, "Sure! Whatcha need?"

Hancock gulped, too direct or not it was now or never..."Well....
151132112.title: In the Lair of the Empress

choices: You meant well. Of course I forgive you!
Nothing personal but once you cause me pain you have to pay for it....
1511321121.content:
A silence ensued after Hancock's embarassing comment. Was she too direct? Did she succeed in disgusting Luffy instead of getting a chance to be with him? She spoke with Sanji about the subject of married couples to great detail, and while he seemed to be getting the wrong impression he gave Hancock valuable knowledge of the field. But as experiences have told her Luffy was an exception to most rules; was it too much? Her nerves almost couldn't handle the wait. "Um...Luffy?" The entire silence Hancock couldn't even look the Captain in the eye, and when she finally did...he was asleep?! "LUFFY!!"

"Wah!" Strawhat fell to his side in surprise and looked up to the giantess, "Hiya Hancock! What were ya saying?" Hancock sighed and began to repeat herself only to be interrupted, "Wait I remember now! You said your feet were sore and asked for a foot rub right?"

Luffy missed the entire husband and wife part, much to Hancock's dismay. "Well...not exactly, you see I said...."

Luffy cut her off again, "Your feet are sore right? Cause I'm more than willing to help a friend!" He flexed his muscles like he was showing off.

Hancock wore a love filled expression, taking the acceptance like a marriage proposal. "Oh my! Luffy, are you sure dear?" The empress almost let out tears of joy; Luffy admitted he liked her (In her head anyway.) Such relief flowed throughout her body that Hancock fell to the floor with a soft thud. Her back against her bed and her bare feet stretched out a good five to six feet before her.

Still in her hand Luffy grasped none of this romantic stuff Hancock was fantasizing about; "Yeah, it's just a foot rub. No big deal." Hancock was too lost in her own mental fantasies to notice his words; leaving Luffy with nothing to do but hop from Hancock’s hand and calmly walk to her bare soles. It took the giantess several minutes before she realized Luffy was even gone, and with a gasp she leapt forward and stood at her full towering height. “Luffy! Where are you?!” Some ticklish sensations came from under Boa’s left foot, she lifted it and sure enough; the rubber man was stuck to her sole like a piece of gum. The ticklish feeling was his mouth moving in an attempt to talk. “Sorry Luffy, I lost track of you for a second and overreacted.” Gently she peeled Luffy from her sole. Funnily he was perfectly unharmed, albeit he was as flat and thin as one of Hancock’s toe nails. He poofed back into shape in an instant though and relief flew throughout Hancock once again. “So you can’t die if I accidently step on you, that’s good to know.”

This time paying keen attention to Luffy Hancock sat back down and brought Luffy to her feet again, stretching her lovely soles to the captain as if she were giving a show. Even the girl’s feet were amazingly beautiful, despite living in a jungle-like tribe of people as well as the life of a pirate Hancock’s bare feet were absolutely flawless. Perfectly applied red toe nail polish, no dirt or grime, hell the only thing on the foot was sweat and that was a turn on with the way Hancock came off to most men. To Luffy however…it was just another foot, nothing special. The captain bent over and placed his knuckles along the ground, looking up at Hancock with a grin, “Ready?” The giantess nodded and as soon as she did Luffy vanished in a puff of smoke.

It wasn’t just any smoke either it only appeared due to one event…Luffy had activated his Gear Second! The smoke cleared in seconds and there stood Luffy, looking no different aside from a more rubbery appearance. Hancock instantly realized why the Strawhat Captain used such a drastic measure so quickly, but it didn’t mean she liked it any. It endangered Luffy that was the big draw back to this technique. It blessed Luffy with speed beyond belief but it hurt him at the same time. Hancock wanted to protest, but it was already done and Luffy would not hear of it anyway. So she just leaned her head back and awaited the foot pleasure.

Luffy stretched his arms back a few feet, “Gomu Gomu….JET RAPID!” With his increased speed Luffy begun a punching spree with Hancock’s two feet, going so fast his arms weren’t even visible. You see, someone like Luffy did not know the meaning of the word gentle. Luffy would find a way to ruin a garden of flowers while physically unable to move, and given something as delicate as a woman’s foot he of course messed that up too. No gentleness, no not at all. That was too slow, the way Luffy figured it he needed some force to get Hancock to feel anything at all; plus it was an interesting way to practice his abilities. So he pummeled the giant feet without sign of hesitation.

Hancock closed her eyes, expecting a massage to top all massages. However what she felt was a most unpleasant feeling. One that increased over time. Without warning the pain receptors on her feet were going crazy as she detected that Luffy isn't massaging her, but rather punching her. Each blow feels like she's stepping on broken glass. Gritting her teeth she holds silent as she tries her best to endure this assault.

Luffy on the other hand can feel his punches affecting Hanock's soles. The once perfect and smooth soles now look irritated with reddish spots all over. Making a fist Luffy takes aim and launches another punch towards the wall of flesh of Hancock's left sole. Feeling his knuckles digging into the flesh of her foot Luffy sees that he's ruptured her skin letting a small trickle of blood to leak out. The powerful piercing sensation doesn't go ignored as its strong enough that Hancock screams in pain:

"LUFFY STOP!!!"

Dumbfounded and confused Luffy stops his actions and what lies before him is the current state of the pirate empress' feet. No longer do they look perfect like the other parts of her body as they are filled with red and purple sore spots all over the heels, instep, ball and the underside of the toes. To add salt to the injury Boa Hancock's left sole has a bit of blood pouring out of it, no doubt the end result of Luffy piercing her with his knuckle.


The Strawhat broke his rhythm and eyed Hancock with confusion, “Whatcha need?”

Hancock was a tad angry, “You dope! You ended up hurting me!!” If anything set Hancock into a rage it was pain, and even Luffy was no exception to that.

The Captain had a blank expression, “Oh…sorry!” His apology was sincere enough….but it didn’t help that Luffy passed out right afterwards, awakening an instant later in a weird fashion. He proceeded to grin foolishly, "So....forgive me?

Hancock sighed, "Well....
1511321121.title: Luffy is Really Bad at Foot Massages

15113211211.content:
It was almost as if a mental conflict was playing out within the confines of Hancock's mind. Ever since her long past days as a slave Hancock and practically killed and/or petrified any living creature that so much as plucked a flawless hair from her head, but this was Luffy...her love, her future husband, the future Pirate King. It was a short battle between a fierce anger and an equally powerful love; love won in no time whatsoever. Her lips curling into a love-filled smile Hancock gently brushed Luffy with one of her toes, one of the few still unharmed by Luffy's pummeling. " Even if the result was a tad....different than expected you meant quite well. Of course I forgive you dear." A faint blush arose at the usage of a pet name at the pet-sized Strawhat, this was nothing but bold steps for her today!

Of course, ever dimly Luffy didn't grasp any hint of romance in Hancock's words and just grinned like he always did. "Thanks a ton Hancock!" The rubberman began to walk a couple of steps to give Hancock a nice hug for being so kind, a hug of friendship and not love mind you; but somehow the Captain found a way to mess that up. As if on cue a sharp jolt struck Luffy from within, a result of Gear Second no doubt; it wasn't a long usage of it so it didn't even really hurt, but it was enough to make Luffy stumble. And as fate would have it, by stumbling Luffy's lips somehow found their way to Hancock's sole. Albeit accidental Luffy had just kissed Hancock's foot. Naturally the two had very different reactions about this.Practically swooning in happiness Hancock's cheeks rose to a pure red as she began to mentally yelp in happiness. " He did it! He kissed my foot! He loves me so much he doesn't care if his lips touch a dirty sweaty foot! I knew he was the one!! " Her lovey-dovey feelings for the captain made all injuries Hancock had seem to just go away...heck even the bruises on her poor feet somehow found a way to heal right away. Of course this was far from the truth but Luffy didn't correct her, or even notice her basically fangirling over him. He was too busy gagging in overexaggerated disgust. Luffy was disgusted and Hancock was love-filled, neither one so much as hinting at noticing the other's very different feelings.

After a couple of minutes the drama did die down though, and once again Luffy found himself in Hancock's slender hand staring the giantess in the eye. She was eyeing him with more love than Sanji showed most women (Which was quite a lot) but it fell on deaf ears or rather, blind eyes in Luffy's case. "What're we gonna do now Hancock? Should I see Chopper about this?"

It was for an instant but Hancock's face showed pure dismay at the idea. Showing Luffy to the crew would essentially mean losing this perfect chance to be with her beloved. And there was no telling what any of them would do to him too, Chopper and maybe Brook were alright and safe but the rest of the crew....there was no telling. Zoro and Sanji tended to lack gentleness when needed, Usopp was a klutz, Nico Robin...there was no telling but she was a dark person, and Nami was all for self pleasure at others expense. Most of the crew was basically a danger to the captain. A selfish and a selfless reason....two very different types of reasons that agreed on one thing; Luffy wasn't going anywhere. But Hancock...could she handle lying right to Luffy's innocent if not dim face? She had no choice, "Well...you see...the crew went out. We....landed! Yeah, we landed on an island and they went for supplies!" Nervous sweat was on Hancock's brow, would Strawhat buy her lie?

He let out a childish laugh, "Hehehehehe! Alright! Adventure time then! Let's head to the island!"

Hancock was dismayed. Not just at how easily her lie was accepted, but how Luffy now wanted to adventure on this fake island. Hancock had gotten herself into quite a corner. "I really don't think that's a good idea Luffy! I mean, you are shrunken you know!"

"I'll be fine! After all I'm gonna be King of the Pirates!"

So fearless, so adventuring, so...dim; but it was precisely why Hancock loved the little captain. She didn't even realize the words as they escaped her mouth, "Okay, but I'm going with you." She gasped as soon as she realized what she just did.

Luffy grinned widely, "Alrighty! It's a date!" He meant it more like a turn of phrase, a joke really; but boy Luffy used the wrong word there. Hancock's face turned redder than her revealing outfit, " He wants to go there on a date! WITH ME!! But the island doesn't exist!! What do I do? I can't just say no...it' a date!! " Panicking Hancock had only one idea, a very bad idea...but with Luffy it just might work....

"I...have a condition..."

Luffy showed hardly any interest, "Whatcha need?"

Hancock blushed further,"Well...to keep you safe...I'll need to put you... somewhere. "

Luffy was....asleep again!? Thankfully in an instant he woke up, not a care in the world. "No prob Hancock! Do what ya need!! Where you gonna put me?" He was thinking hair or ear...not the case.

Hancock blushed, "Well...I can't have you fall out or anything so it needs to be...secure. And I know a place that could work..."

"Where?" Luffy was NOT catching the hints.

"Well....I should just show you." Closing her hand around the captain Hancock placed him in...something...something soft. Once he was released Luffy saw he was in some...large black surface. It was soft...but that was all he could grasp with his rather questionable observational skills. "Where am I?" No concern was in his voice, just a regular ol question.

Hancock sighed. "My...

But...at least you'll be near my heart..." Hancock turned away and blushed. Having Luffy against her breasts...her nipple...right there beside her heart... touching...relaxing ...relishing the location beside her heart. The Strawhat captain was smirking at his newfound place, "I get ya Hancock! It'll be okay. I can trust ya cause we're buds. You won't do anything weird." It was clear from his tone he didn't get any of the romantic hints the Shichibukai was dropping by the mother load, but in her love obsessed head she didn't notice that he didn't notice...somehow it was the kind of bond that seemed to suit a romance between the two.

Without wasting so much as one more second Hancock slid her dress down; exposing her perfect torso to Luffy in all it's glory. She couldn't bear to look at the Captain out of fear of backing down; Hancock had to do it quick and she did it as fast as possible. In a rushed motion Hancock grabbed both ends of her jet black bra and slid the cups onto her breasts in an instant. Equally fast she hooked it together, until soon she was wearing a bra with Luffy trapped in the left cup. Elder Nyon made an exaggerated motion towards Luffy, “Keeping these two apart will be absolutely disastrous for Hebihime-sama! Being apart from her beloved could send her into a love-struck rampage! Bring the Strawhat boy along! “ Sandersonia nodded and lifted the tiny captain from Nyon’s palm, unable to resist poking her snake tongue out a giving a short hiss, much to Luffy’s dislike. It was clear he didn’t quite listen to the situation; he just knew he was heading to the palace, and in the snake-girl’s hands he felt a little nervous. Snakes ate people…do snake-girls eat people? He sure hoped not.

Nyon gestured to Marguerite, “Marguerite! Inform the boy’s crew that he’ll be residing in the palace for a few days!” The blond amazon gave an uncertain look, shifting her gaze from Nyon to Luffy. “But Elder Nyon…are you sure this is a good idea?”

The little woman seemed infuriated by the question, “Of course I’m sure!! Now go!” Still showing signs of uncertainty, Marguerite turned and ran towards the village. When she was out of sight Nyon sighed, “Hah….sometimes it feels like that girl is the one with Love Sickness.” She pointed at Sandersonia and Hancock, “Sandersonia! Carry Hebihime-Sama to the palace! And be careful!” Sandersonia looked nervous at the idea of handling her sister in that state, but she obeyed. With Luffy and Hancock in hand the three women departed for Hancock’s palace.

Normally it would’ve been a huge hassle to do, given how ever Amazonian warrior would have saw Hancock and asked questions, but the Strawhats handled that. All of them were each doing their own things, but everything was distracting the people. Usopp and Franky got into a building contest, which many women watched, Robin and even Chopper were asking about Amazon Lily’s cultures and medicine. Nami was using Sanji as a patsy for all the goods that would sell well outside of the island, with Sanji flirting with every single woman he passed. Brooke had begun playing a violin to everyone’s enjoyment, and asked about seeing their panties…only to realize that the Amazons underwear was in clear sight. Last was poor Zoro, who due to his tough appearance became something of an attraction, he was on the run from a group of women interested in him romantically. With all of the crew acting like that no one even noticed the group enter the palace. Nyon did make note Marguerite was nowhere to be seen though, that girl worried her.

Inside the palace Sandersonia sealed the doors, and under Nyon’s orders escorted Luffy to a guest room specifically designed for him. She entered and…well it made the amazon gag a little. Hancock had adorned the room with many pictures of herself, no doubt to try and win Luffy over. Luffy pointed at what would be his bed if he were normal sized, “Hey look a giant pillow!!” It was clear Hancock’s attempt with the pictures didn’t work. Sandersonia was ordered to remain with Luffy until she was told otherwise. The elder said something about easing Hancock’s suffering until it came time for treatment, what the treatment was she didn’t say.

Nothing left to do but strike conversation, Sandersonia smirked at the rubber man in her hands, “So Luffy, what is it like being that small? I mean…I can’t even imagine how big someones feet are, let alone their body.”

Luffy was picking his nose, “Well…everything’s big.”

Several minutes passed, “…And…?”

“Really big.”

Sandersonia sighed, “But does anything seem different? I mean, for example, does my sister seem more attractive at that size? Do things seem harder to do?” She might as well get some information to share later.

Luffy shrugged, “Eh, I guess…” He replied only half listening, he was sort of hoping for some food soon.

Sandersonia didn’t know if he answered the first or second question with that answer, “Which one did that answer?”

“The question.”

Sandersonia sighed, she’d take that as a “Both.” Not like she could expect much more from the little dimwit. “Anything you like at that size?”

Luffy grinned, “The food and the sea! More ocean for adventures and more meat to eat!”

Sandersonia didn’t even bother pointing out the flaws in logic and just smiled, “Speaking of eat…” She opened her mouth to reveal snake teeth and tongue, licking her teeth with the thin tongue, Luffy turned ghost white. “Just kidding.” She laughed as she closed her mouth.

Luffy fell on his butt panting, “Don’t do that!”

The giantess laughed, tossing him a wink. “Couldn’t help it. Relax, I won’t do anything like that to you.” “My sister would kill me…literally.”

The banter continued for a bit, until Sandersonia decided to throw a question that bothered her personally. “Luffy…who do you like more…my sister or Marguerite?”

The pirate was not getting the picture…”I mean which one do you like….” Luffy itched his head, “Huh? Like…like?”

Sandersonia nodded, Luffy shrugged. “Never really thought about it.”

That was an expected answer, but the amazon pressed on. “Well if you had to pick…”

“Dunno. I kinda love something else.”

The captain grinned as he said this, and Sandersonia took it completely the wrong way. “Wait… you mean…? Oh Luffy! I don’t think that’s such a good idea. I mean…there’s my sister…and I never even thought about you like that. It just seems so…dangerous.”

“I like danger!” The captain grinned.

“It…it just seems so wrong…to my sister and everyone else.”

“What’s wrong with loving the sea?” Sandersonia slapped herself.

Before more humorous words could be uttered a knock came, “Let me in Sandersonia!” Between the thick doors Sandersonia couldn’t tell who said it, but she stepped out, leaving Luffy on the bed. Luffy could hear Sandersonia and someone else talking, but nothing past that. He didn’t know who else was there, nor did he really try to listen. He just kicked back and relaxed. He could hear Sandersonia sounding sort of…worried by what she was being told, but Luffy didn’t care. He could handle anything! Seconds later he was asleep, just in time for someone to enter.

BOOM BOOM BOOM

Luffy rubbed his eyes at the booms that were footsteps, “Huh…? Who’s here?” His hand covered his eyes so he couldn’t really see, but Luffy saw a lot of bare skin…soft looking skin too…he didn’t realize it was a woman too, not until the woman leaned over by Luffy, giving the captain a prime view of her cleavage (Not that Luffy noticed..) The giantess smiled at Luffy as she whispered words to the captain…

15113211211211.content:
It brought a big smile to Luffy’s face to see Marguerite again, not even noting her exposed cleavage or warning. “Hiya Marguerite! I missed you! Heck, I haven’t seen you since…back when Hancock fell…Huh I guess it hasn’t been that long!” He proceeded to giggle like a happy dope.

The blonde amazon, understandably, didn’t reply with the same enthusiasm; she merely smiled softly at her friend. “I missed you too Luffy, but this isn’t the time for that. Like I said, I’m here to save you!”

“Huh? Save me? From what?”

“Hebihime-sama, sad to say.”

Luffy scratched his head, “Hancock? Why do I need to be saved from her? She’s sick!”

Marguerite spoke with a hushed tone, “Exactly! She’s not in sound mind; she’s liable to hurt you with what Elder Nyon has planned. I managed to talk my way in here, but I need to get you out! We have to hurry; before Sandersonia suspects something!”

Luffy was not scared, “So…? If Hancock tries anything, I can take her!”

“You’re shrunken! She’s at least a mile tall to you.”

“Oh yeah…Well it can’t be that bad, can it?”

With Luffy being so stubborn, Marguerite had no choice but to say it, “Luffy, Elder Nyon thinks it’s best Hebihime-sama to come in here and use you for sexual pleasure! You can’t swim remember?! You’d die inside her!”

Finally it seemed like something got through to the idiot, “Oh, So she wants to….”

“Yep.”

“And I’d….”

“Mmhm.”

“And I’d never be Pirate King?”

“Nope.”

“…No more meat…?”

“No more meat.”

A couple minutes passed in silence.

“I’VE GOTTA GET OUT OF HERE!!!!!”

“NO DUH!!” Marguerite shouted, smacking Luffy into the bed, giving him a large bump.

Oversized bump on the head, Luffy finally focused. “Okay, so what’s the plan Marguerite?”

The amazon regained her calm composure, “Well, Sandersonia is right outside the door so I’ll have to hide you. But given my um…outfit, I think I’ll have to hide you in my stocking.” She gestured to the black and white striped stocking on her right foot.

Luffy didn’t exactly look enthusiastic about the idea, “So your foot…? Ew, that sounds like that’d stink.”

“More like thigh actually, and they smell fine! It’s either that or my heels!”

“What about your clothes or hair?” He pointed to the revealing animal skins.

Marguerite blushed slightly, “Hair’s too short and NO WAY am I putting you near where my clothes are! It’d be too awkward.”

“Why?”

Marguerite could not believe he had to ask, answering with another angry smack; giving Luffy a second bump atop his first.

“Okay, so stocking eh?” Luffy nodded, fully cooperative now.

The giantess’ hand was already coming for Luffy, other pulling her stocking from her thigh. “It’s a little bit of a tight fit so you might get squished into my leg a little; but you’ll be okay. I promise.” Her index finger stopped before Luffy, awaiting the pirate to jump on.

He did just that, grinning at his giant friend. “Thanks Marguerite, you’re a true nakama!”

Marguerite blushed slightly, “It’s nothing, plus if Hebihime-sama gets to you I’ll never get it…”

“It?”

The amazon struck a determined pose. “I’ll never get your Kintama!!”

Luffy’s eyes bulged out, “I’m telling you they don’t come off!!”

Marguerite either didn’t hear or didn’t care; she simply put Luffy beside her thigh, releasing her stocking and wincing with the slight smack of the clothing slapping back into place. She pulled her hand out, looking nervous, “You okay Luffy? That was a loud smack.” Luffy, embedded deep into Marguerite’s well-toned thigh, mumbled something inaudible against the woman’s skin. If he could talk he was fine, Marguerite figured.

A knock came from the door, Sandersonia. “Hurry up Marguerite! Every second you’re in there is another second Hebihime-sama might show up! I’m not sticking my neck out for you!” She was answered by the beautiful blonde exiting the room. “Sorry Lady Sandersonia, Luffy is just a lot of fun being around. I sort of lost track of time.”

She nodded nodded, “I know, I was with him a few minutes ago too. Anyway, get to going before my sister finds out you’re here. You know how jealous she is.”

Marguerite didn’t need to be told twice, she was already on her way. She tried to act as casual as possibly around the people who maintained the building; not knowing that Sandersonia, and everyone else in the palace for that matter, didn’t suspect a thing. The only sign anything was amiss was the occasional chuckle that escaped Marguerite’s lips as Luffy’s movements tickled her. But no one noticed, and with ease the duo escaped from the palace right out the front door, stepping out to the village.

They were in the clear now, but the girl couldn’t take Luffy out, not yet, too many people around who might notice and snitch to Hancock. She had to either be alone, or near trusted people before anything could be done. And on that note, what now? Despite her success the amazon honestly didn’t plan that far ahead. She and Luffy were out…so what to do…? From what she had learned Hancock’s powers somehow shrunk Luffy, they’d logically be the unshrinking process too right? Or maybe the ocean since it’s a Devils Fruit; but Luffy was so small he could wash away… Sighing, she walked aimlessly around the village, thinking about her next course of action.

------
All this was nothing to Marguerite, but for Luffy it was an adventure. When he was put into the stocking, Luffy was simply talking to the beauty, getting distracted by his own innocent attitude. Naturally the sudden slam of the elastic pushing him into the muscles of the amazon’s thigh threw him completely off guard. It took a minute before he remembered that was the plan, a minute Luffy couldn’t move due to just how deep the elastic embedded him; Marguerite wasn’t kidding when she said her stocking was a tight fit.

Thankfully, being rubber, Luffy was completely okay. Distantly he heard the echoes of Marguerite’s voice asking if he was okay; forgetting his place, Luffy tried to mumble “I’m fine.”, but all that got him was muffled gibberish. It worked though, as she left.

Walking was what really made it feel like an adventure; the up and down motions of Marguerite’s footsteps felt, to Luffy, reminiscent of the sea. He began enjoying the feeling. Though with time, he noticed things. For instance, the muscle contractions of her the giantess’ thigh, something Chopper would probably find medically fascinating. Luffy? He enjoyed the way it felt physically. Not in a sexual sense, but it was a nice reminder of Skypiea where Luffy got eaten by a snake. It felt similar with all the body functions, just a lot less wet and no fear of digestion. Still completely harmless, that is…until Marguerite reached around minute nine of her aimless walking.

Amazon Lily was an island with a tropical climate, which basically meant, to Luffy, it was hot. Since it was hot, after a few minutes walking, Marguerite began to sweat a little, not really an issue. But the added heat posed a problem, Luffy, pushed against an increasingly hot leg, and inside a stocking, was quickly sweating bullets as his escape route became a sauna. Nothing he could do about it though, Marguerite’s stocking ensured he had very little mobility, despite his efforts; and even if he did, where would he go? To her toes were a pool of foot sweat was forming? Outside where Hancock wants him? Luffy didn’t think that reasonably but it didn’t make it any less true. In a way, being stuck was probably what saved him from doing something stupid.

-----

Ugh, I should’ve thought this out... Marguerite sighed; Thankfully, keeping a low profile was easy with the Strawhats around. Speaking of, she had just passed Robin and Nami, who were chatting. Surely they were trustworthy? Marguerite didn’t know them personally, but with their appearances they seemed safe. Robin donning a revealing navy blue top and a floral-style dress, Nami a pair of low-riding pants and a green and white bikini to go with her new long hair.

Seeing the two matured women made the amazon realize; it had been two years since she actually got to hang out with Luffy. She missed her friend, and they had yet to actually hang out. Perhaps this could be a chance to fix that? Rekindle an old friendship (And maybe have a little fun?)

Marguerite found herself looking at her home, right across from Nami and Robin ironically. Looking back and forth she realized she had quite the dilemma, but her instincts lead her to the right choice…

(Authors note for a few things here.

In case you did not know, Kintama is a japanese slang term literally calling testicles "Balls of Gold" which is a reoccuring joke with Marguerite I decided to use.

This IS after the timeskip. It was never specified til now and what better time to start utilizing these improved girls? ^^ Please note I intend the other option of the chapter right before this to be prior to the timeskip. So until now, whatever you want. But from here on out, this is after the time skip, the other path is before.

I just wanted to clarify those things. Enjoy the chapter and please add if you liked it enough ^^ Doesn't even need to be this storyline!)

15211.content:
Bulma awoke to the sound of something smashing and she instantly know that whatever it was had to be valuable. The heir to Capsule Corp yawned and tried to go back to sleep, but the sound of something else crashing to the floor kept her from drifting off. Grumbling she sat up in her bed and stared angrily at her bedroom door, knowing he was out there causing trouble. She had wanted to kick him out after the first day, but she just couldn’t find the courage to kick out the guy responsible for defeating the Red Ribbon Army. Son Goku, probably the strongest being on the planet to stand less then four feet tall. He was just a naïve, over excited kid, but still he intimidated Bulma slightly. Who knows how strong he’ll be when he grows up?

The sound of another object shattering to the floor made Bulma twitch. A tiny “sorry” came from outside Bulma’s bedroom, which did nothing to decrease her frustration. Goku had come to her house a week ago, asking to stay and have her teach him about being civilized. Bulma’s parents were away and she saw no problem with teaching the destructive kid a few manners. She thought she’d spend a few hours showing him how to not act like an animal and he would be gone, but it didn’t work out that way. Goku was hopeless, he never listened and wrecked everything. Bulma wanted nothing more then to teach that little animal some self-control, but he was ten times stronger then her. She couldn’t even rely on her so-called boyfriend, he had left with his cat the second she mentioned trying to control Goku. It was frustrating her to no end and Bulma had no idea what to do. She needed a way to either get rid of Goku or make him behave.

Nothing could be done from bed so Bulma got up, moving her naked legs over the side of the bed. Bulma was only in a pair of panties and a small undershirt that left her midriff exposed. Wearing revealing clothes around Goku didn’t matter, she could be completely naked and he wouldn’t bat an eyelash, which kinda made Bulma even angrier. Her bare feet touched the ground, her pudgy little toes curling up as the bottom of her feet touched the warm floor. She slipped on a pair of sandals and stood up, ready to deal with the problem. Catching sight of a few of her inventions on her desk, Bulma reaches for the microband. Just invented earlier this year, a watch like device that let her shrink down. Ended up being more trouble then good. Her own mother even stepped her on while she was using that piece of junk. “Maybe I can shrink myself and sneak out of the house. If I’m not around maybe Goku will just wander off and never come back.”

Inspiration hit Bulma. A solution was in her hand that would allow her to punish that destructive brat and minimize any more damage he might cause. She held up the Microband, an evil laugh on its way, but she was brought out of her cruel glee by the sound of something crashing to the floor and multiple things shattering. Rubbing the bridge of her nose, she headed out of her room, grumbling all the way. “If he breaks one more thing, I’m just going to crush him on the spot.”

As soon as Bulma looked outside her room her mouth dropped and her eyes went wide. Her house was destroyed. The couch was tossed over, bookcases were knocked down, windows were broken and chairs tossed around. In the middle of all this stood Son Goku, looking unaffected by the destruction he’d caused. “Look, I caught breakfast!”

“AAAAAHHHHH!!!” Bulma screamed, nearly throwing the microband away in her panic. Goku was holding a mouse in his hand. A furry, disgusting mouse that did not belong in her house, Taking several deep breaths, Bulma calmed down enough to speak strait. “Throw that…thing…away!”

Goku pouted, but did as he was told, throwing the poor creature out of the broken window without a second thought. Holding her hand to her chest the blue haired teenager looked angrily down at her unwanted houseguest, who just looked back innocently. Absolutely having no reservations about what she was going to do, Bulma showed Goku the Microband, knowing he’d never recognize it.

“Goku, I’m going to teach you about something important we do in the city. It’s called wearing watches. Everyone has a watch and they wear it everyday. Here, I got you one.”
“But you’re not wearing a watch,” Goku pointed out, ignoring the gift for him in Bulma’s hand.

“I just got up, I haven’t put it on yet.”

“So, do I take it off at night or at a specific time.”

“Just out the damn thing on,” Bulma grumbled and pushed the Microband into Goku’s hands. The curious boy, examined the device, giving it a sniff before putting it on slowly. Bulma watched with a small smirk, anticipating her impulsive plan coming to fruition. Goku looked at his watch, unconcerned about it lacking anything you’d see on a watch. “There’s a button on your watch, push it,” Bulma said with barely concealed excitement. She had so many plans for Goku to teach him that his behavior was wrong. The facts that she was still immature herself and her reasons had more to do with amusing herself then helping Goku were ignored. Goku pushed the button without a second thought and immediately started shrinking. Bulma actually started laughing as he shrunk below a foot in height. As he kept shrinking, Bulma remembered that she hadn’t set a specific height for the watch; she had no idea how small Goku was going to be.

Bulma's smirk returned and this time stayed, "Easy, since you're nice and strong you get to play the little white blood cell that protects me from disease. A sort of microscopic hero you could say."

Being tutored nonstop by his mother Gohan had already learned the basics regarding white blood cells. Like Bulma said they basically fought disease, and it looks like Bulma intended to have him do the same. It all seemed to fit now, the aquatic mask Gohan wore was meant to allow him to breathe as he traversed within his giant friend, only one problem. "I'm not microscopic! I'm about a centimeter to an inch tall."

As if she expected such a response Bulma's smirk grew all the wider. "Then you outta make a really good white blood cell then. Don't worry, it is MY body you'll get to travel in."

"When would I get out?" Gohan asked with a scared shudder.

Bulma shrugged, "Depends....I could take you out after a couple of minutes or I can just make you live in me. I bet massages are a lot better when you are actually massaging the muscle itself. Plus getting you out would probably be a huge pain in the rear."

Growing increasingly scared Gohan felt tears start welling up in his eyes. "Please don't Bulma! You aren't a bad person, I know you're not!"

She seemed shocked by Gohan's sudden outburst, but it was to be expected. Through his strength,knowledge and maturity Gohan was still a child. "Relax, even if I did keep you in me I promised Chi Chi I'd keep you safe. Can't get much safer than in me, plus when we get back to Earth I'd just give you to Chi Chi."

Calming down slightly Gohan sniffled out, "R-really?"

Nodding once Bulma smiled kindly at Gohan, "Of course." Truth be told, she had no idea if she could get Gohan out, nor would he survive the process of being inside of her. This was basically an experiment that Bulma was possessed to go through.

"Are you ready my little blood cell?"

Nervous,scared and sweating Gohan shook his head. "Let's just stop this Bulma."

The giantess shook her head, "No can do. Sorry but in you go!"

With no room to really move Gohan couldn't exactly fly away and he definitely had nowhere near enough strength to burst the glass at his size so he was stuck. Quickly twirling the syringe so it faced her Bulma lowered it gently towards her left forearm. Positioning the needle just above where she could safely inject Gohan she allowed it to pierce her skin, wincing slightly out of reflex. It was a success, so now all Bulma had to do was gently push the button atop the syringe and force Gohan into her.

She did just that, but as soon as she did both her and Gohan foresaw a problem with it all, well...to Bulma it was a problem to Gohan it was probably a blessing. Gohan barely fit inside the syringe, but the needle was about a hundred times narrower. All it had was a slight opening for liquid to traverse through but Gohan while he may have been little was nowhere near little enough to fit through it.

At this point Bulma had pushed the syringe enough so that it was trying to force Gohan through the thin needle, unsuccessfully thus far. There was a better chance of him being crushed than sliding through that needle but Bulma was stubbornly continuing.

1522122221112.content:
Android 18 in the future timeline where she and her brother killed all the Z-fighters until Trunks was the only one left. Nearly died today, yes not too long ago Trunks blasted an energy blast in her face that would have killed her if she hadn't formed a barrier at the last second. And now after escaping Parsely City she returned to Dr Gero's lab and took a weapon that would make her unstoppable, at least according to the records she found.

18 was standing on a mountain looking over Pepper Town, the town where she and her brother had killed Gohan. The android chuckled at her plans, she was planning on not only defeating Trunks but to make him her slave, all the people of earth will lose hope seeing their hero bowing to her. And now it was time to put her plan into action she took out a ray gun of some sort and aimed it at herself. "Can't wait to see his face when he finds out that I'm back, and bigger than ever." She stated as she pulled the trigger, a blue light surrounded her and she started to grow.

Android 18 starting growing, first she was 20, then 30 and then 50 ft tall. The buildings in the area looked like toes as did the cars and the people. 18 smirked at the city. "Time for my grand entrance." She jumped off the mountain and landed at the outskirts of the city creating a huge spider crack around her, she stood up to her full height and looked down at the cars that crashed and skidded off the road. She smiles as she sees some humans getting out of their car and recognizing who she was and ran.

Android 18 smiles at the toy looking humans running for their lives, before they were toys now their the size of them. The giant took her first step into the city and looked around at the toy size city. Before she would just blow them up, but not this time, she had to lure Trunks to get here but how? She looked down at the humans fleeing for their lives, however plenty of them are looking up at her not believing what thier seeing, 18 smiles knowing she can start her return speech.

Android 18 tucks some hair behind her left ear and puts her hands on her hips. "That's right humans, I'm back, and as you can see bigger than ever." She began her speech knowing that everyone is listening. "Starting now I own you all, before you were toys and now you are the size of them, so I'm going to do with whatever I please with all of you, I am you're goddess." She speaks, her voice sounds like thunder as if she were a god. "Of course I know some people disagree, one man in particular, his name is Trunks, and if he doesn't show up in time, everyone in this city is going to die." She smiles down at the people who are now wearing terrified faces. "Now then you humans better start running." She says as she raised her right boot up and stomped on a running crowd of people trying to get away from her, this causes an earthquake around the area, and 18 barely put any force behind her stomp.

18 chuckles as she kills the humans easier than ever before, at this size she sees the humans for what they really are. Toys for her to play with, but their is one toy she'll keep alive for her personal amusement, Trunks. She can't wait for him to show up so she can humiliate him in front of whoever's left in the city. She looks down at the humans fleeing for their lives and enjoys playing with them before Trunks's arrival.
