The unfortunate man looks up at 18 as she bent down and reach out to him with her giant hand.

"N-no!" The man was scared, too scared to move, he wanted to run but he's too scared of the giant android. He sees the giant open palm her thumb on his left and her other giant fingers on his right. The hand closes, when her giant fingers ensnared him, he felt the cold yet surprisingly soft fingers wrap around him. (She's a cyborg, she isn't all metal.) The man is terrified as he is in her grasp, he is too scared to even struggle in her grip, he is slowly elevated to her eye level. The sight is terryfing to him, he sees the narrowed pale blue eyes of the girl and the cold sadistic smirk she was giving off, it terrified him, even turning his face blue.

18's cold exterior then formed a sweet looking smile that would make any man blush at how beautiful it looked, save for the human in her hand, in fact he's even more terrified of her. "So little human, do you happen to know where I can find Trunks?" She asked enjoying the fear he was giving off, and the shivering he felt in her grip.

The man was not brave, if he knew where the hero lived he'd tell her hoping that someway he'd destroy the giant girl looking android. But he didn't he could only tell what he knew. "I- I don't"

18 frowned making the man stop. "Really?" She asked giving the man a tiny squeeze, slowly breaking his tiny bones, she ignored the screaming he was doing. "Then I guess I'll have to squeeze you until I know for sure you're not lying."

"AAAAHHHH!" He screamed as he felt his arms break from that 'gentle squeeze.

18 stopped and reverted back to her sweet smile. "Care to give a different answer?" She loosened her grip on him to let him talk.

The man thought of something, anything to escape from her. "He- he wears a Capsule Corp jacket, you'd find it in West City." He admitted hoping that it'd be enough to stop hurting him.

18 frowned and looked thoughtful for a moment. 'That jacket he always wears of course.' She can't believe she missed that, well doesn't matter now. She looked at the man she was holding and gave her sweet looking smile. "Thank you, you won't have to suffer anymore."

The man smiled not believing the torture was over. "Thank you!" At last he could get out of town and hope that Trunks can stop her a second time, even at this size.

Android 18 then raised her thumb and crushed her victim's skull without him realizing it. "Never said I wouldn't kill you." She said with a smirk, she rose up back to her height and put a hand to her chin. Now she knew where Trunks lives and can begin her torture session on him, she looked down at the humans scurrying away from her, she normally hates leaving a job unfinished and she already knew where her target was so she decided to finish the city off and go get her new toy, Trunks.

A smile crept on her face thinking of all the things she'll have him do once he's in her possession, perhaps a foot rub, or some other humiliating task. 18 began walking out of the enjoying herself as her steps crushed people beneath her.

18 has now stepped on the outskirts of the city, she turns around and aims her finger pointed towards the city with a sinister smile. "I'm coming for you Trunks." She said as she was about to fire.

Bulma felt a chill down her spine at the smile 18 was giving her, she was going to be 18's plaything until her son comes to rescue her.

18 poked the car window with her finger and tore off the door with her thumb and next finger. The android then tilted the car over her other opened hand, Bulma fell out of the car and landed into 18's large palm.

Bulma looked up at the android terrified that she was literally in her hand.

18 dropped the car and looked down at her captive resting on her palm. "Now, let's begin." She said with a 'sweet' tone. The android used her other hand to pull off her right boot, she carelessly dropped it on a few people fleeing the city, and did the same with the other.

Bulma watched as 18 revealed her two bare feet. "Wh-what are you doing?"

18 only gave an impish grin at her and sat down on top of Capsule Corporation turning it into rubble beneath her bubble butt. "I hope there wasn't anyone else there, I'd hate to have blood on the back of my skirt." She then laid the scientist between her feet.

Bulma looked up at the sitting android and sees the sole of her right foot raise, she tied to flee but was pinned down by the soft but heavy foot. "AHH!" She shrieked, she wasn't in any pain, just pinned down. She felt the baby-soft flesh on her back, the skin of her big toe keeping her face in the dirt.

18 giggled as she had the little woman under her foot, she then rolled the tiny human so her face was looking up and her head was seen between her big and second biggest toes. "I want your opinion, do you think Trunks will like my feet, or do you think I need to use a different lotion?" She asked sounding sincere.

Bulma feels the soft skin on both sides of her face slightly squishing her cheeks, and a sweet strawberry scent enter her nostrils, likely foot lotion. With a hint of natural foot odor. Her eyes widened at 18's question. "W-what?!"

18 tilted her head slightly making sure the human can see her face. "You heard me, I want to make sure Trunks likes my feet, after all he's going to be serving them for the rest of his life."

Bulma then grew angry. "Why you, Trunks'll put you in your place big foot!"

18's beautiful features hardened into a glare. "I was going to go easy on you but you just had to make it harder on yourself!"

Bulma felt 18's toes squeezing her face harder, hurting her face. She felt 18's titanic foot lifting sideways, and she felt her back being touched by more of the soft foot flesh. "What are you?"

18 smirked as she had Bulma sandwiched between her feet. "This'll teach you some respect!" She then rubbed her feet together with Bulma between them.

Bulma felt the flesh on both sides, it hurt, and it was also humiliated. She was nothing but a plaything for the android's gigantic feet.

18 stopped and separated her feet with the Bulma still stuck to her right foot. She then tilted it so that she was lying and the ground and made sure that her face was seen by the downed beauty. "Anything else to say?"

Bulma said nothing, she was in pain, lucky that her bones were'n't broken.

"That's what I thought!" 18 laughed, she was having so much fun with Bulma, she wonders how much fun she'll have with Trunks. She then looked forward seeing a golden light head her way, she smirked. "Speak of the devil."

Trunks was wearing his usual capsule corp jacket, black undershirt, pants, and yellow boots. He also had his long hair Super Saiyan form. He looked ahead with a shock look on his face, he stopped when he was a distance away from 18's giant face. "Wha- what, Android 18, but how and- and why are you so big?!"

18 smirked at seeing the tiny (to her Trunks), she was going to enjoy breaking him as her slave. "You weren't very thorough with destroying me, how? Not important, what is important is what's under my foot."

Trunks still in shock looked down to see that the Android was bare footed and sees his mother trapped under the right one. "Mom!" He yelled as he was about to fly downward.

18 sees the distraction and smashes her fist down on the warrior on the ground next to the foot that held his mother.

Bulma saw from between 18's toes that the android sucker punched her son. "Trunks!"

18 raised her fist and looks at Trunks reverted to his normal state, she notices that her hair got longer. "Like the hair." She said chuckling as Trunks was barely standing.

Trunks looked up glaring at the gigantic Android, just one hit and already he was in his normal state, it's like the old days all over again. He looked down to see his mother's face between the android's gigantic toes. "Mom!" He ran to save her.

Android 18 lifted her right foot and snatched Bulma from underneath her foot before Trunks could get closer, she then nudged her right foot forward hitting his head with her big toe. "Hahaha, it's like old times, with you helpless at my feet, only better and literally." She said holding Bulma in her right hand.

Trunks looked up seeing 18 hold his mother. "Let go of her!"

18 shook her head. "One wrong move and I'll snap her neck." She said raising her thumb so that it's tilting her head.

Bulma felt the thumb pressing against the back of her head. "Trunks, don't listen to her, destroy her now!"

Trunks wanted to but didn't want to cause harm to his mother, and also he already can't maintain his Super Saiyan form from just one hit. Anymore and he may die. Realizing there's nothing he can do he only asked. "What do you want 18?!"

18 smiled. "Good now we can get to the fun part." She said with a smile. "Let's make a deal."

Trunks didn't like the sound of that but asked. "What kind of deal?"

18's smile grew wider at the small saiyan human. "You have two choices." She began. "Either be my slave and I'll rule the world, or refuse and I'll make you my slave and we'll be back to the good old days."

"What?" Trunks asked glaring harder, he didn't want to be a slave especially to her. "What's the difference!? Either way things will be the same as they were before, how are they different?!"

18 laughed. "You see tiny." She began with a wink. "If you refuse to be my slave, I'll kill your mother, torture you to obey me and kill your precious little humans like I did with 17 when he was around." 18 said with a smirk as Trunks flinched at that. "Or if you agree to be my slave then not only will I let you mother live, I won't kill humans like I used to, I'll keep them alive as my little subjects, the ones who don't resist me I mean." She said seeing Trunks glare harder. "It's cute that your trying be intimidating with our size difference but it's not a bad deal, I'll be ruling instead of destroying, and all you have to do is obey me."

Trunks clenched his fist, the pride he inherited from his father wanted to refuse, but he knew he had little options right now. Living that nightmare again, only worse with him being kept as the monster's plaything when she wasn't killing. The second option wasn't much better, she'd enslave the world in exchange for him obeying her every command in exchange for less death. It was the lesser of two evils, but still, his pride didn't want it, and the world would be no better than it was back then. Surviving on an android's whim.

"Oh! Almost forgot before you decide." 18 cut him off from his thoughts. "If you want to be my slave, then I'll want you to bow, bow and beg me to keep as my slave." She said with an evil grin on her face. "After you beg I want you to kiss my toes." She said wiggling her giant peds next to the warrior. "Only then will I 'allow' to be mine."

Bulma wanted to intervene but the thumb on the back of her head was twitching, she didn't want to anger 18 or Trunks may pay the price further, she can only watch Trunks make his decision.

Trunks was disgusted at what he heard, now he really didn't want to be her slave. But he had always put the world before his own. But if he does 18 will likely never out of his sight, never let him train to learn the form Gohan used against Cell. Also his mother was still resting in the hand of his most hated enemy. He looked up at the smiling Android and down at the giant feet that had toes as big as his head, they were wiggling with eagerness. Will he make the sacrifice.

Trunks steps forward and...

________________________________________

Months have past, and Trunks was living a normal life near his mother, helping the citizen of West City to rebuild the town. But there were still no sign of 18, which was strange, mostly as she was a giant. He checked the daily news on tv everyday but nothing. Thought that Bulma didn't know the whole story of what happenned between him and 18, she suspected the android to have changed because of him and that's why she left.

"Mom. Did you find a way for what i've asked ? "

Bulma sighed. " Unfortunately, there's a lot of things even myself will never be able to create again. Some of my inventions needs some rare materials which have been destroyed once and for all last time your gigantic "friend" made sure to be seen by everyone in city. "

" So you can't make a shrinking ray...What about a spaceship to go on Namek and find the dragon ball ? "

" Same problem. I can try, but it will take me years and i won't even be sure it will work "

" I see. " Trunks said and left home. He needed to be alone, walking throught the city. Lost in mind, he wondered what could be 18's next action, or even if she was still alive when he heard a cop talking to some citizen

" Yeah, i'm not certain but a friend of mine said that the android has been seen in the mountains not far from West City..." these words created some panick among people, but for Trunks, it was a good new and decided to go in there to check this information.

Flying above a huge forest, he joined the mountains enought soon, which were familiars to him somehow. When he remembered something : there's Dr Gero's lab around there ! He landed to not be seen easily and continued his search by walking. Once he arrived, he entered a grotto where many computers were working to his surprise. But this time was different, no androids, or no cell were being created in there. On the screen, he could read : " SHRINKING PROCESS STARTING IN 3 MINUTES. TARGET NEED TO BE READY !"

" What's the....?! So she actually spent her time to work on something to shrink herself back ? " Trunks smiled, when he suddenly found himself trapped in a fist. The giant android took him out of the grotto and faced the tiny Saiyans.

" How did you find me ? " She asked coldly.

" Was not an easy task.. But i guess it was not easy either for your to work on Dr Gero's computers." Trunks replied. She remained silent for a moment and Trunks knew he had to do also her part of the conversation.

" So you've finally decided to shrink back ? My mother tried to work on something, but she didn't have some materials to make it work."

" I never asked you anything ! " she yelled at him before turning calm. "...it's the last material on Earth to make a shrinking ray work. I knew that Gero planned something with that long time ago. There will be no reverse, i 'll never grow again. "She explained.

" You did a good choice for a new start, but why ? " Trunks took the risk to ask.

" You made me feel that what i need the most is a normal life. Changing clothes, taking care of my hairs and body...This ray will also remove my powers once and for all."

Trunks was happy to hear that...and maybe, just maybe..he could be with her...if that's what she wanted to of course. But for now, something was worried him as he heard the computer said : "SHRINKING PROCESS STARTING IN 1 MINUTE "....Why 18 wasn't putting him down ?

Trunks thrusted his arms up at Cell. "The nightmare is over Cell!" He yelled unleashing his heat dome attack.

Cell screams as he was being swallowed up by the yellow blast, incinerating him completely.

Trunks sensed that Cell's energy had vanished and reverted to his normal state and smiled. 'It's over, thank you father, Goku, Gohan, and everyone else.' He thought with a smile, it was all over now, the world was now free from the androids and he will defend the earth from any other threat.

However Trunks had made a costly mistake.

Trunks then frowned as he felt strange, he looked around him, the grass beneath him seemed to be growing at a fast rate, he stopped when the grass reached around his knees. "Wh-what just happened?" He asks looking around, the grass seemed to have grown. "Wait no, the grass didn't grow... d-did I just shrink?" The young man looked around in confusion, he then sees a shadow, a large shadow, the warrior looked up to see the sole of an orange boot heading down on him, the warrior tried flying out of the way but only ended up jumping out of the way. The half saiyan looked to see an orange boot, then he looked up and was shocked at what he saw. "W-what?"

Looking up, the orange boot, he sees blue tights, a familiar jean skirt, and shirt with the red ribbion army signal. And he sees the face of the beatiful and deadly Android 18 only she appeared much larger.

With a smile 18 put her her hair behind her ear. "Hello Trunks, miss me?" She asked with an evil chuckle.

Trunks looked at her in confusion. "What's going on, why am I small, and, and I destroyed you!"

18 laughed at his confusion. "Hehehe, sorry little boy, but right before you blasted me, I made a barrier, you only blasted me away although it still hurt, alot." She said as she put a hand threw her hair. "Your lucky, I didn't lose any hair otherwise I'd do worse to you." She said still smiling.

Trunks took an involuntary step back. "How did you do this to me?"

18 kept her sweet looking smile. "We'll after you nearly destroyed me, I found out that you killed my brother." She said glaring and frowning down at Trunks's shrunken form, this look sent a chill down his spine. "I knew that I couldn't fight you, so I went to what was left of Dr Gero's lab took his shrink ray, all I had to do was wait for the perfect moment and then shoot you with it." She said taking out a small ray gun. "Oh and by the way this is the only device that can turn you back to normal." She says as she crushes the device, breaking it into tiny pieces causing Trunks to panic. "Now then come here." She said in a sweet tone as she bended down with her hand down.

Trunks didn't want to risk fighting against a giant (to him) android 18, so he decided to fly home to his mother. She can find a way to restore him back to normal, he jumped up and attempted to go super saiyan, however he only fell on the ground. "What?" He then looked up to see 18's opened palm coming towards him, her slender fingers wrapped all around his body.

18 grabbed Trunks in her fist like a barbie doll, she then stood upholding Trunks close to her face. "Oh I'm sorry, did I forget to mention that the shrink ray also prevents you from using your powers?" She asked in her sarcastic tone, she made a sadistic smile. "All your powers are gone now, your like a normal human, only even punier." She said.

Trunks tried fighting against the android's grip despite what he was told. 'This isn't happening, it's not, he finally defeated them, he finally freed the world from the cruel androids, this has to be a bad dream!' He thought in fear, he was ripped out of his thoughts, when he felt 18's giant finger from her free hand lift his chin up to see the smiling face of his captor.

18 can see the fear on his face, she was reminded of when he fought him when he learned how to turn super saiyan. She chuckled at his small face. "Don't worry, I won't kill you, I have a much better idea in mind." 18 said with a grin that sent even more chills down Trunks's spine. "You see Trunks, I think you've grown up quite a bit, your extremely handsome.

Even though Trunks hated the android with a passion for what she did to his father and friends, he couldn't help but he couldn't deny that she was beautiful and so he blushed at her compliment, he tried very hard in vein to fight it from appearing.

18 sees the blushes and decides to take advantage. "Aww, is little Trunks having his first crush?" She teased, he tried putting his head down, but her finger nail kept his head looking up at her. "So you see Trunks , now that 17's gone, he's not here to kill every cute boy I meet so here's what I'm going to do, I am going to make you mine, starting today I am your goddess, you will do everything I tell you like a pet, or a slave, take your pick."

Trunks kept struggling in vain against her grip. "You killed all of my friends, I'd rather die than take orders from you, you evil bitch!"

18 glared and gave her hand a squeeze.

Trunks felt the pressure in her grip tightened. "AAAAAAAAAHHHHHH!"

18 then stopped and pet Trunks like one would a hamster. "Sorry, I let my anger get the better of me." She said as she kept petting him. "Don't worry my little Trunks, I'm going to make you love me." She stated as she opened her back pocket. "Now then see you when I get ho- our home."

Trunks kept struggling as he was being put in 18's tight back pocket. "Stop this, you won't get away with this!" Trunks yelled as he was put in the pocket, as the pocket closed he felt her bottom and blushed as it's warmth enveloped him. "Let me out!"

18 giggled as Trunks tried punching her back pocket even though, he knew he was powerless. It was like the old days... only better. The android gave her back pocket a light pat. "Don't worry, one day you'll love being my pet, either way your all mine now." She said with an evil smile, the android then flew off in the direction of her home where she intends to train and play with her new pet.

When she gets there what's the first thing she does with Trunks?

18 sees the house in the woods she took for herself and descended to the porch. The cyborg opened the door and walked to her living room. The cyborg reached two fingers into her back pocket and grabbed Trunks by his armor and took him out of her pocket. She then held his body in front of her waist and held him into a fist. She then raised him up to her chin making him look up to her. With an evil smirk she asked. “Welcome to your new home Trunks.”

Trunks only struggled in her grip and growled in response.

18 giggled as Trunks kept fighting her grip. “Alright Trunks since your going to be living here your going to have to start paying rent, and since I don’t need money and you have none I think you should do some chores for me.” She said getting Trunks’s attention.

Trunks hated this woman with all his hate but he had to ask. “What are you talking about I can’t do chores in this size!” He yelled.

18 only giggle more. “Oh Trust me, for what I have planned your a lot more useful in this size.” She said as she held him over a table in front of a couch, he then dropped the half saiyan and watched him fall until he hit the table. “Whoops sorry, hehe” She said sarcastically.

Trunks was in pain, he was surprised that he wasn’t passed out. The time traveler than focused his attention on the android, he looked up at her from the table to see that it wasn’t even passed her knees, she looked down on him with a smile and hands on her hips. She truly looked like a giant. He couldn’t help but take an involuntary step back. ‘What is she planning?’

18 cackled at this, she was going to have fun training her slave and pet, now to finally have her fun. The cyborg sat down on the couch and put her hands on her right boot.

Trunks watched wanting to know what she was doing as she took off her boot and sock, she did the same with the other foot. When she was done she placed her bare feet on the table right in front of Trunks both a head taller than he was and nearly twice as wide.

18 looked down at the warrior on the table in front of her feet. “Alright Trunks, for your first chore you will rub my feet.” She stated wiggling her toes in eagerness.

Trunks gave her a look of disbelief, was she serious. “No way am I rubbing your disgusting feet!” Trunks defied, his pride taking over.

18 did a mock glare expecting that. “That’s the wrong answer.” She said as she pinned the warrior down with her right foot, she then stood up to look down as she kept shifting her foot until she had Trunks’s head between her toes while the rest of his body was pinned under her sole. She smiled looking at Trunks’s face between her toes, it made her feel more powerful than she did normal size when she used to beat him.

Trunks cringed as he looks up 18’s smiling face and couldn’t stand the scent of 18’s feet, they certainly didn’t smell horrible to a normal person however to Trunks who was now the size of an action figure could smell the horrendous odor of 18’s foot. “G-get your foot o-off of me.”

18 grinned at Trunks’s helplessness, and now she get’s to show him how helpless he really was. “Now Trunks, I forgot to tell you the best part of Dr Gero’s shrink ray.” She said applying pressure to her foot.

Trunks screamed as he felt that a truck as pushing him against the table.

“You see the shrink also gave you indestructibility, no matter how rough I handle you you won’t get a scratch but” 18 pressed down her foot even harder making Trunks scream. “It makes you able to go through pain no one should be able to feel alive, so I can do this all day and you wouldn’t explode, so how does it feel under my foot?”

Trunks only glared and screamed as 18 clenched her big and second biggest toe bringing his face to the crevice.

“Now what are you going to do?” 18 asked as she stopped pressing down on Trunks.

“Gah” Trunks felt the pain leave him and realized that he should answer quickly seeing 18’s displeased look. His father would beat him for what he’s about to say next. “I-I’ll massage your feet.”

18 smiled at this. ‘He’s a lot easier to break.’ She thought. “Damn right you will.” She then took her foot off of him.

Trunks took a breath, he sat up in pain, he looked to 18’s feet back on their heels with her sitting on the couch.

18 glared at Trunks. “Start rubbing pipsqueak.” She threatened.

Trunks sighed as he stood up and walked up to her right foot. The warrior couldn’t believe what he was going to do. ‘I’ll find a way out and this time destroy her.’ But before that he will need to be on her good side, with hesitation he placed his hands on her giant foot and rubbed circles on her arch.

18 sighed in content as Trunks started. “Start at the heels then work your way up.”

Trunks said nothing and did so, he hated the smell but did’t have a choice in the matter. Not unless he wanted to be put under her heel again.

18 sighed in content as she closed her eyes satisfied with her slave’s work. “Remember that I have two feet.” She said with a sigh.

Luckily for the Flame Alchemist the heat finally got the best of him and he was unconcious; he would sleep through the worst of his ordeal. Winry didn't know this though and proceeded walking pleasantly with a little skip in her step as she thought Roy suffered.

Time flew, it felt like barely an hour had passed before Winry entered Risembool and her own home came into view along the hills. On the front porch laid her grandmother Pinako and their dog both deep asleep. Her mind momentarily shifting from her tiny slave Winry smiled nostalgically as she came to her door. Turning the handle Winry entered her own home, gently closing the door behind her. For some reason around this time Mustang awoke, his suffering seemed to be over...for now.

The blonde beauty sighed in a mixture of exhaustion and happiness. "Now that I'm home....time for the household chores." Her thoughts shifted to Mustang, he'd spent several hours at her butt surely another hour or two as she does chores wouldn't be too bad? But Winry did have a nice long walk and her feet were sweaty, Mustang would probably feel good under there too...
15321222112221.title: Long Trip to Risembool

choices: Winry grinds him into the floor
Winry makes him kiss and lick her foot
153212221122212.content:
“I was never very patient,” Winry said to herself as she slowly pulled down her pants. It was always the same with her, she needed to get all the automail done now, she needed her parts now, she wanted Edward and Al back now, she needed to torture her parents killer now. There was no better time then the present in Winry’s mind and she refused to give Roy a single break. She bet the pervy alchemist enjoyed being pressed against her smooth rump.

Her fingers trailed over her cheeks, looking for where Roy was. She could barley feel him over the sweat running down her backside, but eventually she found a lump near the top of her right cheek. Roy was almost pressed tightly to her ass, held down by moisture and sweat. She had to peal the bug off her butt like he was a band-aid. Winry held him up to her face to see the damage she had caused and to hear his pathetic wails. It angered the vengeful giant when she saw what she perceived as her victim sleeping in her hand.

“Wake up, insect!” She growled and spit directly at her new toy. A big glob of spit splashed into Roy, covering him head to toe in thick, transparent drool. The sudden wetness woke him up with a jolt. Roy sat up to stare into the face of his nightmare. Winry’s eyes held only malice as she looked down at him, ideas on how to make him suffer ran rampant through her mind. Hawkeye had not given her any limitations to what she could do to Roy, other then not kill him, which was something she would never do anyway. Why kill Roy and end his suffering when she could make the man regret ever being born.

Roy wiped the slimy saliva from his face and looked pleadingly at Winry. “Please Winry, I’m tired and…”

Winry stopped Roy there when she reached for him and pinched his left leg between her thumb and forefinger. Roy cried out as he was painfully lifted out of her palm and dangled thousands of feet upside down. He was brought closer until he was hanging a few feet from Winry’s eye. He could see his reflection in her light blue eyes and he was horrified to see how ragged he had become. He looked twenty years older after suffering under Hawkeye and Winry. He could only imagine how he would look after Winry got through with him.

“Here’s the deal Roy,” Winry spat out, her fingers shaking as she spoke causing Roy to be jerked around. He moaned, but listened, knowing his survival depended on it. “I’m not Winry, I’m your goddess or mistress. Only humans can call me Winry and your scum. You understand?”

“Yes…mistress,” Roy quietly said, feeling disgusted in himself for giving in so soon. A teenage girl had turned the man that planned to one day be Fuhrer into her obedient pet. It was revolting. But when Roy saw that Winry hadn’t heard him, he said it louder anyway. “Yes Mistress!”

“Good, good, now the second part is very simple. You will do everything I say because I am your goddess. If you do a good job, I’ll treat you tolerably or at least as tolerably as you can treat scum. Disobey me and…”

Winry took a deep breath and let it out through gritted teeth. Her eyes blazed with fury that left Roy trembling. Winry had left it to his imagination what she would do to him if he disobeyed and he could think up a lot of horrible things. He felt broken and weak, unable to even muster the energy to think of defying this angry girl. He hung there upside down, limp and no longer able to fight the terrible fate that had befallen him. If Hawkeye could see him now, she’d known the job was done, but Winry neither cared nor wanted to care about Roy’s problem. She only wanted to hurt him.

Without another word to him, Winry lowered him to the ground and let him go when he was still as high as her knee. It was a long fall and Roy landed with a thud on the wooden floor. Winry didn’t bother looking at him as she adjusted her pants and sat down to take off her shoes. Roy lay right in front of her, looking up at her giant form miles above him. He was too weak to run and had not enough will to escape even if he was one hundred percent. He watched Winry take off her shoes and then socks and then watched with growing dread as they came down on either side of him. He gagged as the smell hit him. He wasn’t even that close, but the dense, fetid aroma reached his nose.

They smelled much worse then Hawkeye’s feet, far worse. His former subordinate took better care of her feet, washing them every day. A country girl like Winry saw no reason to keep cleaning between her toes or maintain good foot health. Also, Winry had been walking and sweating all day. The sweat glistened on her feet as they stood beside the weakened alchemist.

“Time to taste my foot scum,” Winry maliciously spoke and lifted one foot off the ground. Roy cowered in its shadow as it hung over him. Drops of sweat landed on his already wet and sore body. He fell to his back as the foot came down. Trapping him under it. He gagged and screamed as the wet smooth bottom of the foot smothered him. Her rank stench burned his lungs and Roy Mustang discovered a Hell much worse then Winry’s backside within seconds of being trapped under foot.
153212221122212.title: From Worse to the Worst

1532122211222122.content:
Winry couldn't help but smile as she increased her foots pressure on Mustang. All those years of crying over her parents deaths left the tomboy heavily repressed, years of bitter anger were kept behind an emotional wall...and with the killer shrunken and at her mercy the wall came down and the torrent of emotions oveflowed. Winry didn't hate Mustang...she actually kind of admired him but throughout most of her life Winry always wanted payback for her parents killer, and that hadn't changed when she found out who it was. "You know..Ms.Hawkeye gave me an idea when I saw you peeled off her foot."

Mustang let out horrified grunts beneath Winry's bare sole, the freshly worked sweat already nearly drowned the alchemist and soaked his already sweat absorbed clothing further. With Winry's comment the fresh memories of being in Hawkeye's boot came back to mind, already that dark,dank, sweat filled prison seemed preferable, at least with Riza Mustang felt like he was somewhat safe. With Winry....Mustang felt sort of safe but...he wasn't certain and the crushing pain in his muscles from Winry's foot didn't help at all.

The tomboyish girl giggled slightly at the ticking sensation her slaves grunts were creating. "It's really simple. You're a bug, I'm a goddess. Worship is all we're missing in this scenario, so go on; worship my feet!"

The pressure intensified as Winry forced Mustang's mouth open in a shout of pain, the freshly made foot sweat slid into his mouth instantly. Mustang's first reaction was to vomit, but knowing Winry he'd pay for it so through the strength of willpower he stopped it. He never felt weaker, a powerful world renowned Alchemist was reduced to this....he really did feel like a bug as Roy weakly began licking Winry's soaked soles. It tasted of sweat, leather, and anything else the foot came into contact with...point being it tasted horrendous. The Flame Alchemist didn't stop, no matter how much he disliked it he knew it was best to give it his all rather then anger the young woman. And truth be told, Mustang felt on a very small level he deserved this, killing Winry's parents tore the man up and this...it was unusual but just punishment in his eyes; whether he realized this or not was unknown.

The sensation of Mustang's tongue along her overworked foot made Winry absolutely ecstatic; Mustang couldn't tell beneath her foot but Winry looked happy like she had just found a rare one of a kind automail piece. It wasn't just retribution anymore, Winry really was getting worshipped as a god and that thought made the woman happiest of all. Mustang was naught but a bug by her feet, she knew, and Mustang knew it.

"By the time Ms.Hawkeye comes back you'll be the perfect bug!" Winry snickered.

Mustang couldn't make out Winry's taunt over the sound of his worshipping. The sweat along the automail mechanic's foot was getting replaced by the Alchemist's saliva, he was powerless beneath the girl's foot. Almost teary eyed Mustang, of his own accord, kissed Winry's sole.

That one kiss was noticed as Winry almost yelped, she knew what Mustang did and...it just made her even happier. He seemed to be accepting his place! "That's right bug! Kiss and lick my foot until God says otherwise!!" Winry goaded, obviously getting a power trip from all of this.

Again Mustang didn't catch this, he just continued worshipping as he mentally disciplined himself for being weak. He licked every crevice of Winry's foot, most more than once, he kissed her rough soles everywhere, and even massaged with his sweat soaked gloves. And after that he moved on to the other foot. He would have used Alchemy long ago if he could have...but the sweat from his encounter with Hawkeye way before had soaked Mustang's special gloves, not only could he not make a spark but the transmutation circle was smeared, and unless Winry's sweat stayed still he couldn't make another one.

Time passed, perhaps an hour, maybe just ten minutes but soon Mustang was finished, Winry nodded in approval as she removed her foot from him. "Good, you're learning. After being my slave for a while you'll learn to love your place. Ms. Hawkeye I'm sure would love it too! Weeks of being under my butt,breasts, mouth and feet...weeks of being dirt to me...yeah I think this is going to be fun..." She laughed.

15321222112221222.content:
(A few weeks after this)

*dingdong*

Pinako answered the door and was surprised to see none other than Riza Hawkeye standing in her doorway. "Yes? What is it?" Pinako said suspiciously. Riza smiled kindly at the short woman, "May I speak with Winry?"

Pinako stood there for a moment, wondering what this woman was up to, she felt a hand on her shoulder from behind. She glanced behind her to see Winry smiling at her. "Grandma um.....I think Den is hungry." Winry said hoping that would get her granny to go away for a bit. Pinako turned around and noticed Den was looking forlornly at his dish, she sighed and went to the cupboard.

Winry turned back to Riza with a smile, "So....Has it been a week already? I've been having so much fun I hardly noticed the days passing."

Riza returned the smile, "Two weeks actually, I've covered up his disappearance well. Nobody suspects a thing."

Both girls giggled quietly as they went out to the yard and sat down on the grass.

"Where is he right now?"

"Well I've taken to wearing sneakers since I got him. They make my feet smell pretty bad. So he's in there right now, licking between my toes." Winry giggled.

Riza smirked, "Wanna have some fun together with him?"

Winry blinked and then nodded.
Riza popped her foot out of her right boot, which came out with a suction cup sound due to all the sweat on her bare foot. Winry untied her shoelaces and pulled her socked foot out of her ratty old sneaker.

Winry peeled off her sock, sending fuzz flying everywhere. Both girls sighed girlishly as they wiggled their extremely potent and now free toes in the air.
15321222112221222.title: Hawkeye's Return

choices: But Riza tries some other activities first....
153212221122212222.content:
"You really should try the whole foot worship thing Miss.Hawkeye, honestly the first time I had my pet do it it was a spur of the moment kind of thing but...it was actually pretty nice. Like a massage but...somehow more soothing." Winry's lips formed into a dopey smile at the memory as she described it.

Hawkeye smiled softly at the mechanic, "Please don't be so formal Winry. Call me Riza." Her soft eyes sharpened as Hawkeye scanned the floor earnestly, "I don't see Roy anywhere....where is he?"

"I think I have an idea..." Winry muttered playfully as she rubbed her index finger along one of her feet, "When the days are rough enough my slave has on occasion gotten stuck...like so..." Having found Mustang through her finger Winry stretched her foot out to Hawkeye for the visual, the once proud man was literally in the girl's toejam between her fourth and third toes.

"Oh my god...." Was all Hawkeye let out upon the sight, but it didn't come out horrified in fact...in almost seemed amazed. Mustang was nigh unrecognizable, his blue army uniform had become little more than sweat soaked tatters that just barely counted as clothing, his boots, most of his pants and shirt and even his oh so proud gloves had mostly if not all been dissolved by him various tasks with Winry. In terms of physical appearance Roy was even worse, his skin was pale...no beyond that he was damn near translucent, almost like he had his skin bleached. His cheeks were hollow, like he had been deprived of food. Whiskers several inches long formed all around her face from weeks of not shaving and his neat and tidy short hair had grown long enough to cover his forehead. All of this was what Hawkeye saw as he was trapped in Winry's toejam and getting soaked in her fluids. Perhaps oddest and most shocking of all were Roy's eyes, even in the midst of war and its horrors he had always had a fierce determination in his eyes but now....he couldn't even look his former subordinate in the eyes, like he viewed her as a higher life form....a god.

"What did you do to him?" Hawkeye muttered, almost regretting letting Winry anywhere near Mustang.

Winry replied as if nothing was wrong at all, "Well I stuck him with my butt sometimes...I did some creative stuff but that became too much of a hassle...really he's been at my feet mostly. I'm always busy, it's simple and holds him still, plus I think it's my favorite activity now. I usually have him lick my feet and kiss them while he's in my shoe....just so I have something to enjoy."

"What do you feed him? He looks belimic."

Mischievously Winry wiggled her toes, knocking Roy out of her toejam and on to the floor where he seemed to land safely. "Toejam and whatever I step on with my barefeet. He's free to eat sock lint from my socks but he usually doesn't touch that. He drinks sweat too, got plenty of sweat soaked insoles he licks the sweat out of."

Hawkeye was literally mouth agap in awe, "Winry....I didn't think you would go so far."

In response the mechanic winked at Riza, "Don't knock it til you try it."

Hawkeye seemed uncertain...she was thinking more of discipline when she originally shrunk Mustang; but what Winry had done bordered on abuse...but...for some reason the way Winry was acting made the kind of activities she could do with Mustang... tempting .

"Okay I'll give it a shot." She muttered weakly as Hawkeye sat with her back to the wall and outstretched her feet to Mustang, it amazed her that he managed to stand straight without reeling from her worsened foot odor.

Winry clapped her hands in joy, "You heard her slave! Licky licky!"

Without any sign of hesitation or free will Mustang lunged at Hawkeye's massive sweat soaked soles and licked, licked like there was no tommorow. At this point the taste of feet was something he was accostomed to and....in an odd way Hawkeye's tasted better that his previous goddess'. With each lick the shrunken alchemist's hands rubbed along Riza's soles in perfect circular patterns as he kissed between licks. Hawkeye was stunned. Seeing Mustang like this was...bizarre but....it felt amazing . Like her brief time with Mustang was a vacation and this...was heaven times three. The slight tickling of Roy's tongue, his hands wiping away all the stress of her weary soles...he even climbed to get to other areas! And he licked and licked...until he reached Riza's toes where he did the unthinkable he began licking up Hawkeye's toejam like a dog!

Seeing this Winry giggled, "I taught him that, people eat, maggots lick."

Hawkeye was in a heavenly euphoria, she was so tempted to just slip on her boot with Mustang between her toes and return to Central then and there....
153212221122212222.title: Back with Riza

choices: After the day...Riza fixes Roy and returns him to normal.
After the day Riza decides to keep Roy as a slave...forever
1532122211222122221.content:
Hawkeye wasn't thinking entirely clearly when she began pulling her foot back; Roy showed no signs of response though, aside from holding tightly to her toes and continuing to lick. Riza wasn't even sure why she was about to do this, to keep Mustang for herself, to get him away from Winry, just to feel him in her boot? There were so many possible reasons and she couldn't seem to place her motive on any one of them, maybe the term "All of the above" Would describe why she was doing this. She clenched her toes around Mustang and began walking back towards the entrance door, towards the spot right beside where her military boots laid.

Quickly Winry threw out the obvious question, "What are you doing Riza?" Her eyes showed a slight fear at how the situation was playing out.

Riza looked back at her softly, "Winry...I think I'll take Roy back with me to Central now, you've done more than enough."

Immediately Winry leapt at the wiser woman, arms wrapped around her ankles and overdramatic tears sliding down her face. "No no no! Please Riza let it stay here! I love having that runt at my beck and call, and it's been doing wonders for me in areas I didn't even expect! I mean, he makes me so happy my automail success rate has doubled! Please don't take away my good luck slave!! I'll even worship your feet just keep him here! "

Hawkeye stared at the begging girl in complete embarrassment, she had only seen Winry act like that over one thing, and that was new technology, she must've really loved Mustang, or at least loved him as a slave. She tried to kick her legs free without accidently losing the man still licking between her toes, "Come on Winry have some dignity! I told you straight out this was only going to be temporary, you've done....more than I expected but this was never meant to be permanent. I mean Roy still is a human being!"

Winry looked up in blatant amazement, "Riza do you see him!? What kind of human is less than an inch tall and licks feet without putting up a fight! He's a bug now! "

Riza kicked her feet free and continued walking, "Not helping your case Winry, maybe you need a new hobby. Keeping someone at your feet isn't exactly healthy." She of course meant mentally speaking because physically speaking...Winry was glowing, even while in overdramatic performance she looked stunningly beautiful even to a straight woman like Hawkeye.

With one foot in a boot Hawkeye exchanged one last glance at Winry then and Roy. Winry appeared ready to burst into tears like a little girl and Roy...he looked at Hawkeye like she was good and began cuddling her face in the freshly licked skin between her toes, whether as a sign of submission or gratitude at leaving Winry it was uncertain. She looked almost sadly into Winry's eyes as she slipped her other barefoot into her boot, "I'm sorry Winry..."

But Winry hadn't given up yet, she lunged at Hawkeye and again grasped her ankles, "Please Riza!! At least shrink someone else!!" Winry was acting exactly like a child who wanted a toy at this point, to a degree it was comical but right now given the circumstances...it was kinda sad.

Riza didn't want to break the poor girl's heart so she pretended to agree, "We'll discuss it another time, until then find someone first." It seemed to give Winry what she wanted as she let go and allowed Riza to finally leave. Right outside the building was a car awaiting Hawkeye to take her back to Central, wordlessly she got in and gestured the driver to start driving. Taking one look back at Winry's home she saw the mechanic looking at her hopefully.

It was a couple minutes on the road that Riza began to wonder some key things. Would Winry really hold her up to that shrinking thing? What should she do with Mustang now, if she stuck to her original plan she would fix him but....him at that size was sort of...ideal. She would leave that decision until after her day at Central, she would have yet another arduous day of Military activities until late at night, she would at least keep Roy as an insole until that point.

A few hours passed and honestly Riza was amazed, not once had Mustang broken his licking pattern..if anything he was going faster! Whatever Winry did to the poor man...it broke him alright...Hawkeye actually felt pretty sorry for him, but there was no time for guilt as the car pulled up to Central Military Base, she stepped out and stood proudly, it was time for a very long day of Military training,drills, and of course dreaded paperwork.
1532122211222122221.title: Return to Central

15321222112221222212.content:
Riza walked up the steps to her apartment, producing some keys from her uniform pocket, she unlocked the door and stepped inside to her neat living room. She heard barking and soon Black Hayate came up to her boot, wagging his tail. She smiled down at the puppy who was obviously very glad to see her for the first time today. She shut the door with her foot as she reached down and picked Hayate up. "Come on, lets get some dinner." She said as she went into the kitchen and turned on the light.

After scooping some doggy food into Hayate's bowl, Riza went into her bedroom and closed the door to prevent Hayate from disturbing this important moment.
Riza sighed as she sat down on the end of her comfortable bed, she would have to be firm with him if he started to protest, though she thought that unlikely after his experiences with Winry.

She reached down and pulled off the boot that held Roy inside, it came off with a sickening suction cup sound. A sour smell began to fill the air as Riza tried not to be distracted by the nice feeling of the cool air on her hot sweaty foot.

Riza rubbed her hand along her sore sole, regardless of how good a fit those boots were or how nice an insole Roy made, her feet were killing her from today.

Her hand came back from her foot covered in a sheen of sweat which she flicked off with a sigh. She pulled off her other boot and set it down next to the other one. She pondered how she was going to tell him. She thought of different ways that would harm him in the least.

Finally she decided she would wing it and reached into the hot damp confines of the boot that held Roy.

She plucked him out of it and saw the ragged man she had previously seen at Winry's.

She realized he felt disgusting, he might not have had a bath all the time he was with Winry. "Well," she thought "I'll try to do better with him."

Not wanting him to soil her uniform or her bedsheets, she gently set him down on the wood floor where her feet were leaving damp footprints.

He looked up at her, a beautiful goddess who he had hoped would one day be his bride, but now he realized he was fit only to serve at the feet of the women he had once envisioned serving him in miniskirts.

Riza gave another sigh and decided to just tell him, "Roy....There is no easy way to tell you this....But......I can't return you to normal."

Roy blinked, his ears not really registering what she was saying.

Riza continued. "It's not that I can't, it's that I really don't want to.....There is something about this that I can't give up. I'm sorry Roy....But I promise I'll treat you better than Winry ever did if you behave yourself." Riza said and to Mustang's surprise, he saw tears welling up in her eyes, as there were in his. They both knew that they could've had something with him at normal size, they both knew it and they both knew that it was now never possible.
15321222112221222212.title: Tears For What Could Have Been

Wiping the tears from his eyes quickly, Roy glared up at Riza. "Just who the hell do you think you are woman!?" He shouted up to the barefooted giantess who was currently wiping her eyes. However all traces of tears quickly vanished as she gave him her coldest "I'm gonna blow you away" stare. "I think I'm the one who hasn't decided to squish you yet!" She grinned, "Can't take my foot after a long hard day of YOUR paperwork and YOUR duties colonel? Well man up!" She said as she wiggled her sweaty toes over his body, engulfing him in a world of foot stench with every wiggle.

Riza just grinned, finally understanding the thrill Winry must have got from torturing another person underneath her foot. It just felt so.....empowering to torment someone with the lowest part of your body, especially when it was sweaty and stunk to high heaven. "I'll have to let Winry borrow you again sometime." 1532122211222122221212.content:
For a moment Roy, in his ragged and worn tatters of clothes, looked as if he would strike Hawkeye in anger; and Hawkeye was prepared to retaliate with a very firm death grip with her toes, not enough to kill him of course but maybe enough for a couple ribs to break. None of it was necessary though as the shrunken man stepped up and began rubbing Hawkeye's toes, much to the giantess' pleasure. The slight hope Roy had before was gone again, dashed out by his Goddess' foot.

Not a single second had passed before Hawkeye's feet overcame his body and her voice rang out, "I do believe you forgot to ask me; your Goddess."

Mustang's weak moan of a reply came, "Please Goddess Hawkeye allow me the grace of your feet." Wordlessly she complied, obviously loving every second. Roy on the other hand looked like a dead man walking.

He was dead inside when Winry had him, he died around day ten or so but when Riza returned Roy felt the first signs of life rise up within. Riza would never harm him to the extent Winry had, and she would certainly reverse the process of shrinking; or so he thought. When he was asked to worship Hawkeye he did so without hesitation, out of elation and being saved; and when Hawkeye hid him in her boot and left he didn't mind at all, he was free! But his heavenly ideals fell to Earth moments after arriving at Riza's home, no return...be her footslave...all that. It was no different from what Winry did! A couple more minutes of rubbing and Roy corrected himself, Hawkeye's feet sweated, smelled and disgusted Roy more. As they should, military activities and all. To have his hopes dangled and crushed before him...Roy was even deader inside. Unless Riza explicitly said something to help him he had to accept that he was dirt on Hawkeye's feet.

With the sad realization he knelt over and began licking the crevices of Riza's mammoth sized toes. Above on her bed Riza wore a proud expression as she saw it. 15321222212.content:
Roy hated to admit it. But he was scared of what Riza would say. Or do. She was at least twenty times his size. He watched slightly helplessly as her eyes widened, the way her pupils diluted and how her mouth fell into a small 'o'. How her hands fell limp where she was sitting, (he still couldn't believe she was heavy enough to make that much of a dip in the bed) how her shoulders slumped and how she simply put looked defeated. Lost. He never had seen her this way. She was simply like a rock, unmovable, stern and demanding. But now--he's never seen her like this. He wanted to reach out and hug her, to comfort her and hold her in his (once) strong arms and hold her to his (once) taller frame. But at his current size and predicament, (he was still recovering from being stomped on for the whole day) he could do nothing but sit and watch. He felt useless--helpless and insignificant.

But then Riza shoots her arm out at him, fingers stretching (God they were big! But somehow they managed to look delicate even so) out to him to pick him up. Instinctively he shivers, those hands were so much bigger than him. They could crush him in an instant if she got angered. It was humiliating. He wanted to reach into his pockets for his ignition gloves, but then he realizes that they were soaked with her sweat. Not to mention he'd never again fire at her again. Not after a whole day of being stomped on--not after seeing her break down in front of him. When in her hands he's feel strangled--she's holding him too tight. He doesn't mention this however, in fear she burst out in tears again.

You didn't need to be told twice, this strange knowledge you held told you that Lust was not to be trifled with so you had to do your best to appease her. It was the transformation he made when he dueled and when he didn't. This younger, more innocent person extended a hand towards Junoichi, "It was a close game man; don't worry. You'll get me next time."

From the side came the duo's two closest friends Anzu and Honda, neither showing much surprise at Yugi's victory. "Really Yugi? Cause by my count Junoichi's lost over 50 times!" Honda laughed.

"55, but who's counting?" Anzu smirked.

Junoichi leapt to his feet, "Oh yeah wise guys!? You guys wanna duel me?" Before a reply came Yugi stepped in, "Slow down guys, let's just calm down before we make Grandpa upset with all the noise."

Junoichi gritted his teeth, "Ah forget it!" He screamed as he angrily stomped out of the Mutoh Game Shop. Behind him he could faintly see his friends obviously dumbfounded by his anger. Without batting an eye he turned and started walking down the street in some random direction. It wasn't their fault he was upset, he knew this. For ages now Junoichi had been...anxious. The Battle City tournament had just ended and while he placed in the top four Junoichi couldn't help but feel...inferior to his friend Yugi, who won the tournament, and Seto Kaiba who placed above him as well. The three were considered the best three duelists of the age, with Junoichi being considered the weakest. It was an honor to be considered among the best, that was for sure; but just once...Junoichi wanted a taste of being on top. Even if it was just by beating Yugi in a single unofficial game where they didn't even use Duel Disks. It had yet to happen though, and to be honest...Junoichi was beginning to lose hope. Even Kaiba, who was considered Second Best, Junoichi had yet to beat even once. It was just...tiring after a while.

"Meh...now I know why Kaiba is so obsessed with beating Yugi..." Junoichi groaned. He had stormed his way right into a large commercial district of Domino City. With a glimmer of regret in his expression he looked back, "Maybe I should apologize..."

A voice came from behind, "You seek power...correct?"

It took a moment for Junoichi to realize he was being addressed, once he did find out though he walked into the alleyway the voice came from. There stood a hooded man, and in Junoichi's experience hooded men were never good. "What do you want? Yugi's Puzzle, my Red-Eyes, The God Cards?"

The hooded figure, a man, laughed, "Certainly not, I have no interest in those trivial things. I simply like to help those I find... interesting. I understand you wish to know what it's like to be the best?"

No matter how hard he tried Junoichi couldn't hide his shock at the man's knowledge, "Maybe...what of it?"

The man's hand revealed itself from his sleeve, wielding a card. "This card will help you in that goal."

Junoichi accepted the card from the man, and looked at it. A pitch black design with a pair of demonic red eyes in the darkness, a spell card. " The Beast of Burden ....huh...never heard of this card before....huh!? There isn't an effect for this thing!" He nearly grabbed the hooded man, "You trying to play me!?"

The man just kept chuckling, "No no no...not at all. That card...is rather unique. For you see, it acts sort of like the God Cards do. In that it chooses its wielder. If you are chosen, the card will reveal itself. If not, The Beast of Burden will be a burden instead of the power you seek."

The man's words were confusing and cryptic but Junoichi caught the gist, "Well...how will I know if it chooses me then?" The man pointed at the Duel Disk Junoichi kept at his wrist whenever possible, "Simply play it as if you were playing a game of Duel Monsters. If you are chosen you will see the effects, if not...well I think you'll know."

Junoichi gave the card another look, "Look man you better not b- huh?" When he looked up, the man was gone. Junoichi sighed, "Probably a prank but worth a shot I guess..." He slid the card into his Duel Disk and waited a moment. Nothing happened, so Junoichi reached for it...but his arms...felt heavy. In fact, his whole body felt heavy...what was going on?! Junoichi collapsed. Within his unconcious mind he saw one and only one thing; the card he attempted to play...like it was mocking him. He tried to reach for it, but as he moved so much as an inch he awoke.

"Ugh...man I really hafta learn not to trust guys in hoods." Junoichi rose to his feet with a slight daze, but something was off... Junoichi looked around, everything seemed...far away...but why? It took a moment but he managed to grasp it, the world was bigger...or in other words...he had shrunken! "Dammit, why does this crap always happen to me?!" The day only got worse though, as a boom came from behind Junoichi; followed by another...and another, footsteps. Junoichi looked behind him and saw...a tower of a person. A person so big he probably was half the size of their toes...a woman...a beautiful woman at that...and surprisingly enough a woman he knew.

It was Mid August, in the middle of a large desert with nothing but sand and a road a large RV drove down. The RV was known as the Rustbucket, the vehicle belonged to Max Tennesen who along with his two grandchildren Gwen and Ben was heading back home.

Bored Ben stared out a side window, almost appearing as if he would cry. On his watch lie an unusual device, vaguely resembling a watch...The Omnitrix. The Omnitrix gave Ben a unique ability, the power to turn into one of ten aliens. At least this was how it began, now Ben's aliens came closer to numbering twenty. Each held their own abilities and form but Ben couldn't use it, he had to save the device for any possible threats that come.

They were on their way back to Ben's hometown, Mid August meant summer had nearly ended and Ben still had summer assignments to do as did Gwen.

Gwen, unlike Ben seemed to be taking the situation much more maturely, reading her spellbook with a satisfied smirk. Appearances aside Gwen was a rather talented magician, she was more of a brainy type whereas Ben was brawn.

"I'm bored!!!!" Ben moaned, kicking the side of the Rustbucket.

The small kick seemed to affect the entire vehicle as it shook slightly.

"Deal with it." Ben's redheaded cousin stated impatiently, not batting an eye from her book.

"I'm hungry too!" In confirmation Ben's stomach growled.

"And the world will end if you dont get a burger."

Max kept talking but Ben was out of earshot, he ran to the fridge ASAP and started nibbling at the burgers without even bothering to chew on them.

Walking back to the front of the Rustbucket all was quiet, Max finished talking. Smirking a bit Gwen raised her head from her book, "What were those burgers made of again Grandpa?"

In what was apparently a tone of approval Max repeated what Ben missed, "Oh they're the best, made of Italian Grubworms, Canadian slug shells, and cooked in Norweigan roach oils. Mhm hm!"

THUD.

She was leaning forward, cupping the bottom of her head in her hands with her elbows on the ground. Ben stared up her massive pillar like arms to look Gwen in the eyes. Gwen’s face filled Ben’s vision; leaving him with his mouth gapping wide and a stunned look on his face. He could see himself reflected in her bright emerald eyes but saw something else in her gaze, a look of amusement.

“I’m not huge dweeb, your small,” Gwen cruelly informed Ben, who could only blink as he was unable to fully understand. His eyes pulled away from his cousin and he looked around him. The hard ground he had been lying on was the table inside the Rustbucket where he usually hanged around during the trip. Everything was so big to him now. He had been small before when he transformed into Graymatter, a bug-eyed alien the size of an action figure, but that size was huge compared to how big he was now. The inside of the Rustbucket seemed like a small town could fit inside it. He could see the ground and it was miles away from him. He had to be less then an inch tall, no bigger then a bug. It was freaking him out and the more he freaked out, the more Gwen smiled. Looking back at Gwen, Ben demanded some answers.

“What’s going on?”

Gwen rolled her eyes, not thrilled that Ben was getting mouthy already. She drew away, leaning back into the soft chair behind her. Ben thought she was ignoring him and was about to ask again, but then she lazily explained, not bothering to look at him. “After you passed out like a wuss, the Rustbucket’s engine overheated and smoke started billowing out. Grandpa stopped the RV at the side of the road and then left on foot to see if he could get something to fix the Rustbucket at the gas station a few miles back. He left me in change of you while he was gone.”

Ben stomped his tiny feet, not caring about what had happened while he was out other then why he was tiny. “That’s not what I meant, stupid! I want to know why I’m small, now!” Ben screamed, finding the tiny bit of patience he had long gone. He was never good at listening or being polite about anything, but he suddenly realized he should start thinking about it when he saw the relaxed look on Gwen’s face turn into a look of disdain.

Before he could react, Gwen’s hand shot out at him, plucking him off the table. Her fingers wrapped around the tiny boy completely. Within her fist, Ben squirmed helplessly; his arms pined to his side leaving him unable to reach the Omitrix. Pressure surrounded Ben, squeezing the air from his lungs and sending pain shooting through his body. He was blind until everything turned to the side and the fingers relaxed, opening up to show the huge angry face of Gwen only a few feet from him. Her hot breath blew on her shrunken cousin, making his hair blow back. Ben gulped, knowing that things were not looking good for him.

“I shrunk you dweeb and if you ever insult me again I’ll make you even smaller. You’re going to suffer now Ben, just wait and see,” Gwen snapped, her hand jumping as she talked, nearly throwing Ben off. He clung desperately to her fingers as he stared up at Gwen with fear for the first time. He knew that they didn’t get along, but this was way beyond just cousin’s bickering. Gwen looked ready to murder him and it left him wondering why.

“What I ever do to deserve this?” Ben asked and knew he should have taken Gwen’s advice and shut up when she scowled at him. Narrowing her eyes at her cousin, Gwen wrapped her fingers around him again, but this time made sure his head was sticking out from atop her fist. She brought him right up to her mouth, close enough that Ben could see the wrinkles in her lips. For a second, he thought she was going to bite of his face, but instead she only explained why she had done this to him in a booming voice that made his ears ring.

“Last Tuesday. We had stopped Dr. Animo and come back to the Rustbucket to rest. I lied down to take a nap, but you stayed awake to pull one of your juvenile pranks on me. You took of your shoes and socks and rubbed your dirty, smelly feet on my face. You thought I was slept through it, but I woke up just as you were rubbing your toes against my lips. I pretended I was still asleep, I didn’t want you to know that I knew what you’d done. What you did was humiliating and disgusting. I can still taste your toes in my mouth. Why’d you do something like that Ben?”

“I…I thought it would be funny,” Ben honestly said and tried to shrug his shoulders around Gwen’s massive fingers. It was just a harmless prank, he thought it would be funny to make his annoying cousin to smell his feet why she was asleep. The prank still seemed funny to him; Gwen was just overreacting. His feet couldn’t have been that bad.

His juvenile reason didn’t further enrage his cousin, but rather put a wicked smile on her face. Ben gulped nervously, not liking that look one bit. Gwen dropped him back to the table, where he landed with a thud. He had been dropped several dozen feet, but nothing seemed broken. Gwen stared darkly down at Ben and licked her lips. “Well Ben, I have some funny ideas of my own that I want to try out.
