1553322222211122.content:
Ben reached towards his wrist where is Omnitrix was ready to be activated. He knew that he was taking a gamble by disobeying his god-sized cousin, but he refused to allow her to win this. If he kissed her smelly, sweaty feet, she’d never let him forget it. He’s forever be reminded that he was the boy that gave in. The severity of his situation hadn’t sunk in for Ben yet. This was to him just another game of dominance between him and his cousin. If he had known how far things were and that the game was over, he would have listened to Gwen. Gwen owned him now and his fate and very life was in her hands or rather feet. All he could do was make it worse, which he did when he slammed his palm down on the Omnitrix.

A bright green light exploded out from under Gwen’s smelly foot. Gwen stared dumbly as the light passed, knowing what it meant and surprised at how stupid her cousin could be. Gritting her teeth, she lifted up her foot slowly, ready to bring it back down on Ben once she saw what he had become. “You’re in big trouble, you little dweeb. I’m going to make wish you had licked my toes,” she hissed, meaning every word of it. She stared at the tiny, sweat covered person under her foot and quickly her snarling face broke into a look of delight.

“This is too good,” Gwen laughed. Ben had transformed all right, but not into any of his strong, powerful aliens. He hadn’t transformed into the tiny Greymatter either. Ben had turned into Ripjaws, a fearsome, razor-sharp toothed, underwater alien. The key word there was underwater.

“Damn,” Ben wheezed as he found his lungs quickly burning, this time not from inhaling the thick stench of Gwen’s feet. He couldn’t survive on dry land in this alien form and he couldn’t return to normal until the timer in the watch ran out. He was literally a fish out of water in the middle of the desert.

He flapped around on the table and Gwen moved her foot away to better look at her suffocating cousin. She watched him clutch his throat, finding something missing in Ben’s suffering. She wanted him humiliated and in pain, but this didn’t please her. It hit her in an instant that it was because she wasn’t responsible for this, Ben’s own stupidity was. She wanted Ben to suffocate, but not on fresh air. She wanted the smooth bottom of her sole to be what smothered the little bug. Seeing that Ben was starting to black out, Gwen quickly got up to ‘help’ him.

“H-help me,” Ben squeaked, hating to beg even in this instant. He could see Gwen getting something and his eyes widened with relief when he saw her get a clear glass. He knew that she would save him. She walked back to the table, walking strait past a sink, and sat right back down. The empty glass was put down right beside Ben’s thrashing body.

“What are you doing?” He gasped out, clutching his scaly chest as he lay their licking his lips trying to find moisture. Gwen paid him no heed, paying more attention to her only covered foot. Quickly she removed the only sock she was wearing, wrinkling her nose in disgust as the horrible smell hit her. Holding the sock between both hands, she lifted it above the glass and started wringing it out. She had been sweating a lot and her wool sock had absorbed all the thick liquid. As soon as started twisting it, her sweet started dripping down into the glass. She wrung her sock out as hard as she could, only getting a few inches of sweat to fill the glass, but it was enough. Grabbing Ben’s semiconscious body by his webbed feet, she lifted him above the glass filled with foot sweat.

“No!” Ben screamed out with all the strength he had left. Gwen let him go and he plunged head first into the cup. He hit the hot pool of sweat with a splash. Ripjaws could survive in saltwater, clear water and, as he discovered to his disgust, pure sweat. The murky, salty water filled his gills and Ben drank it down, retching every time it filtered through his alien body. The taste of feet and sweet filled all his senses. It was like his previous torture in liquid form. He was safe, but Gwen had humiliated him more then ever before in his life. He was swimming in her foot sweat, things couldn’t get any worse.

“Enjoying your swim Ben?” Gwen cruelly asked as she looked down into the glass as Ben swam circles in his glass prison. Another thing he noticed was that the walls were too high for him to jump and too smooth to climb. He was stuck in the glass, swimming in foot sweat until Gwen let him out. He stared angrily back at Gwen, promising his own revenge.

The table shook slightly as Gwen put her now both naked feet up on the table. She slipped back on her sock and then lay back, putting her feet right beside Ben’s glass. The massive feet rested right before Ben and he was forced to look at them. They were Gwen’s prime choice of torture and he could not escape them. He wondered how long it would be before Gwen fixed him and he could begin plotting his own revenge. Ben didn’t know much about the severity of his situation, but of he knew that Gwen hadn’t even considered turning him back since he first shrank, he would be scared. Stone cold scared.
1553322222211122.title: The Omnitrix Hates Ben

choices: ...Charmcaster. He's small just like our deal said."
...Grandpa." Gwen quickly throws Ben down her shirt to hide him.
15533222222111222.content:
Unfortunately for Ben, the Omnitrix’s usual ten-minute timer didn’t seem to be functioning correctly…again. He was still Ripjaws, and that meant he’d still remain in the glass of Gwen’s foot sweat. He turned green at the thought- well, greener. It was horrifyingly disgusting being submerged in a tub of the sweat of his cousin, every breath Ben took in his alien form stung, like trying to drink salt water. But unlike with salt water, it was an absolute necessity for survival; and it seemed Ripjaws couldn’t hold his breath for long anyway, forcing Ben to take even more breaths from the saturated liquid essence of his titanic cousin. To further worsen the matter, Ripjaws seemed to have a heightened sense of taste; because each little breath also slipped some of the sweat into his fish mouth, where he had to either choose to swallow it or open his mouth and just let a lot more in. He smartly chose to swallow, but his taste buds and burning throat hated him for it.

The entire time Gwen sat with her face looming over the glass, her hands cupped around her chin as she eagerly watched her payback unfold. It was as delightful as she had ever dreamed. Her cousin looked like a tad pole swimming in a pool of her foot sweat; it didn’t get much better than that. Every few seconds she could see him writhing in irritable torture at the taste of it. Gwen grinned, “Don’t like it do ya Dweeb? Now you know how I feel!”

Ripjaws Ben raised his fish head out of the water to plead for some salvation. “Please Gwen! I’m sorry; I promise I’ll never pull a prank again!”

Ben didn’t mean it of course, he’d go all out for his revenge, and Gwen knew this, “I know you will Ben, when I’m done with you. But I’m not done, so just deal with it!” She paused for a moment to see Ben swim in her sweat again, “…But I’m feeling a bit nice, and honestly, a little bored just watching you. I’ll give you something other than sweat you can choke down.” Her cousin looked up, hopeful for a water bottle or something; instead he saw Gwen’s open mouth near the opening of the glass.

“Wait Gwen, what’re you-?!”

His eyes answered for him, a huge drop of saliva and spit slid from out of Gwen’s mouth, dangling ever closer to the sweat pool. It wasn’t long before the weight of the drop became too much and it simply broke all contact with Gwen and landed into Ben’s little pool. Sweat and saliva mixed together to form an even more potent liquid the young man despised. He was literally gagging with each breath he took, soon writing on the bottom of the glass in agony.

Gwen just smiled even more, “I think that makes up three of the thousands of spit balls you’ve shot at me.”

“I-I’m sorry Gwen!” Ben choked from underwater. The sound never escaped the pool.

Moments later both Ben and Gwen heard a familiar sound, a beeping that sounded like a computer was powering down. The Omnitrix was finally timing out. Thank God! Ben thought happily; in a flash of blinding red light fish became boy yet again. Holding his breath, Ben swam to the surface of the pool, eager for that breath of fresh air. It wasn’t fresh though, the sweat actually had its own odor it was so bad. But it was still better than breathing with it.

“Okay Gwen! I’m human again. Can you get me out of here?”

The big cousin shook her head, “Not yet.”

“What?! Why?”

Gwen held up three fingers, “Three reasons. One: You still haven’t been punished enough. Two: You tried to transform against me. And Three: I’m having too much fun.”

Ben gestured to the murky mixture of saliva and sweat both covering and surrounding him. “What part of this is fun?!”

“All of it.” His cousin laughed.

“Just you wait til Grandad-“

“Gets back from fishing? Could be a while.” Gwen sneered further.

Ben fell silent.

Gwen was ecstatic to see that, “Good! You’re starting to learn I’m in charge. Maybe I’ll let you out after all-“ Ben looked beyond happy, “-After an inch of that sweat gets swallowed.” The look vanished before she even finished.

The young man grumbled, “Fine, I’ll do it Gwen.”

“Call me Goddess Gwen.”

She was really pushing it. “Fine, Goddess Gwen.”

“Very good, now get to swallowing slave.” Gwen rested her feet back on the table as she watched her cousin carry out her orders.”

Swallowing Gwen’s sweat pool was no worse than having to breathe it, things just got tough after the first few forced gulps. Ben’s throat had begun to burn, his taste buds unable to erase the foul taste, and his gut bloated with Gwen’s foot sweat. He continued to force himself to gulp it down, despite how useless the act was. At best he had removed a tenth of an inch of the liquid in half an hour, and he was at his limit. It was a good thing Gwen got impatient, “God you’re useless.” She reached in and pulled her cousin free, even bringing him to the nearby faucet to wash him off. Compared to the sweat pool it was heavenly, even if it threatened drowning.

When done Gwen held her cousin in her fist again, “And that’s just the start Ben. Wait til you see what else I got planned.”

KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK

Someone was knocking on the Rustbucket’s door, Gwen quickly turned around towards it. “Who is it?”

“Who do you think it is?” A familiar voice responded.

Gwen smiled, “Okay, come on in…
15533222222111222.title: Stuck in Hell

155332222221112222.content:
At hearing it was her own grandfather who has come a knocking on the door of the Rustbucket, Gwen could feel her heartbeat rising drastically. Her chest heaved up and down and she could feel her own body grow faint. In these precious moments Gwen panicked "What do I do!? If Grandpa finds Ben like this and sees I did this, I'm going to be in trouble!...wait a minute...!" Getting an idea Gwen quickly brings up the tiny Ben to her face who heard the loud knocks. He says feeling cocky "Ha! Granpa is going to bust you!" "That's not going to happen dweeb." says Gwen feeling confident. With her free hand she extends it to the collar of her shirt and begins to tug at it creating a gap between the shirt and her own body. Motioning Ben above the gap she quickly lets him drop. Feeling himself fall Ben could only open his mouth and yell at the top of his lungs as the velocity increased:

"Aaaaaahhhh!"

Timing things right, Gwen let go of her shirt. The shirt's material pressed right back against her body and keeping her cousin in place. Particularly around her stomach, the outline of her cousin as visible. To remedy this Gwen covers it with her own hand fully pining as well as concealing Ben. Just as soon as she did this, the door of the Rustbucket opened and the veteran plumber Granpa Max stepped in. "Have you seen Ben by any chance?" shoots Granpa Max. Swallowing some of her own spit Gwen answers with hesitation "Well...n-not really..." "How strange..." comments Max. Curious at the choice of his words Gwen asks "What is?" Max looks at Gwen sounding quite sure of himself as he says "Usually you two are bickering all the time about something. To see so much peace and quiet all at once. It's a bit unsettling."

As the discussion goes on from his confined space, a very much peeved Ben is hearing everything that goes on. "If this keeps up I'll miss my chance to get rescued by Granpa! Here goes nothing!" Not giving in Ben began to wiggle as wildly as he could. His legs and arms collided with the surface of Gwen's stomach. Up above Gwen could feel Ben's wiggling and it felt like a tickle. She could feel a desire to laugh on the tip of her tongue. But quite literally biting it deters the feeling. Through pain she maintains control at least while in the presence of her grandfather. Knowing she needs to end this Gwen thinks "No you don't!" right before slamming her open palm on Ben's tiny form.

"*Huff puff*" is all that escapes Ben's mouth. Obviously his plan didn't work. If he fails to get out from Gwen's grasp he'll be her tool forever. She already has demonstrated how far she's willing to go to inflict pain on him to satisfy her sense of revenge. No, that's not true. For all that Ben knew, things could get much worse than just dealing with Gwen's spit and foot sweat. Thinking that he may as well go out Ben opens his mouth and prepares for the tactic that would make or break him depending on the outcome.

Pressing his open mouth on the flesh of Gwen's stomach, within moments Ben closed his mandible with all the mighty strength a human could muster at his size. But not just that as he bit on the flesh he shook his head from left to right to tear into the flesh even further to cause as much damage as possible. Up above this action has not gone unnoticed by Gwen. She could feel a painful stinging sensation and one that she truly never expected. With some tears forming from her eye lids, Gwen begins to feel a slight moist sensation. Knowing what has happened Gwen quickly determines that Ben has bit her hard enough to start causing her to bleed a bit. This is no good as her shirt will stain and her grandfather being responsible will want to check any injuries on her.

But before Gwen is able to even consider a tactic on how to tackle this new problem she feels Ben bite hard again. With her lips pressed tightly together and her body stuttering a bit, the temptation and desire to scream has become more tempting even more so as Ben digs his teeth into her defenseless mass of flesh.

What happens now?
155332222221112222.title: Gwen's Desperate Move

1553322222211122222.content:
Unable to contain herself Gwen shoots her mouth open and exclaims as loudly as she can "Aaaagh!" "Gwen what's wrong!?" asks her worried grandfather. However, before she could come up with a lie to cover for herself Grandpa Max sees what Gwen only felt. On her stomach the moment she yelled, she moved her hand. The hand that covered Ben's outline. Now the outline of the shrunken boy is not only present, but Gwen's shirt is also stained with a bit of blood. No doubt the end result of Ben's biting all in an attempt to get out. With Gwen's hand no longer hindering him, Ben began to slide downward and soon enough he slipped out of her shirt. But not wanting to fall directly to the floor he holds on to Gwen's pants. From his point of view Ben looks towards his grandfather and screams desperately:

"Grandpa HELP! Gwen shrunk me and has been doing a lot of mean stuff to me! I mean stuff that's way out of line! Like covering me in her foot sweat and her spit! So please get me out of here!"

Placing a hand below his shrunken grandson allows Ben the ability to finally let go. As he does so he feels a sense of relief as he's physically putting distance between himself and Gwen. He feels safer just by no longer being in her grasp and in such close proximity of her. Landing on his relative's hand, it withdraws away from Gwen further enhancing Ben's sense of victory. Not even by holding him near his own nose, Max is able to discern that Ben is indeed telling the truth. He reeks of foot sweat. Despite being rinsed out not too long ago, the smell is still slightly there none the less. The next words made Gwen shiver in fright while Ben could only smile at the developments:

"Is what Ben said true? What do you have to say for yourself?"

Asks Grandpa Max as he sternly looks at Gwen who suddenly looks as if her fear might overcome her before she's able to even form words. Gwen slaps her hands together looking as if she were going to pray and pleads "But Ben started it! He pulled this prank on me and-" "I'm used to seeing you two argue and squabble, but at least you two were always on some form of equal standing. You've gone too far Gwen. What if you hurt him beyond the point of no return? Did you ever think about that!?" yells an angry Max. Taking a breath of air to cool himself leaves Max and Gwen to share a moment of silence. However, this silence is horrifying. Just as soon as she wishes that it was over, Gwen begins to wish it was prolonged when she heard Max say:

"You will return Ben back to normal and you will be punished for this. I'm disappointed in you. Even Ben with the Omnitrix knows better than to use his aliens for tactics and stunts to get back at others in such a way that it could lead to seriously hurting someone."

Beginning to cry, Gwen nods realizing that she's been found out and is now being punished for her actions. Even the little sample of revenge that she managed to attain is not enough to override the feeling of sorrow that she feels now.

Later that day...

Outside the Rustbucket, Grandpa Max and Ben lie on beach beds though nowhere near a beach. As they relax, Ben is able to say with sincerity "Thanks grandpa, you really saved me back there." Grandpa Max not being that gullible says "Don't be so quick to say thanks. While I appreciate the sentiment remember, if it was you who misbehaved to this degree you'd be the one who would be paying for it." Ben knows that Grandpa Max is serious when it comes to teaching him and Gwen to behave. After all he was entrusted with them both by their parents for the duration of the summer trip. But none the less Ben was glad for what his grandfather put a stop to so he reiterates "I know, but still thanks." Grandpa Max nods his head and asks:

"How are you doing Gwen?"

Inside the Rustbucket Gwen finds herself in quite the dilemma. Grandpa Max has confiscated her spell book so she no longer tries anything due to her recent actions. Her hands are completely covered in tape. Unable to use her fingers freely she finds it exceedingly difficult to do the task allotted to her. She has been charged with cleaning the Rustbucket. But in her current state she can't even grab the broom properly. To make matters worse she can't even bite the tape off as Grandpa Max with some input from Ben used a cloth to cover her mouth, much less even chant any spells that she might already have memorized. This is her punishment and she's doing what she can to carry it out. However, something distracts her, it's the sound of footsteps. Inside the Rustbucket enters Ben with an overconfident grin on his face at seeing his cousin being put to suffer.

Extending his hand towards her mouth Ben removes Gwen's cloth. The first thing Ben hears is "Ben when I'm done with this believe me you'll pay!" At hearing her verbal threat, Ben says "Then I guess its a good thing I already planned on doing this..." In a fast motion Ben pulls something from behind him and shoves it into Gwen's mouth. The flavor hits Gwen's taste buds quite strongly. A bitter unpleasant taste that makes her stomach begin to turn. But before she could cough out the object Ben places the cloth right back into Gwen's mouth and ties it tightly to ensure it doesn't fall off. Tears began to form in Gwen's eyes. Ben who looks in glee says "If you're wondering what it is, it's your socks. You know you really stink ha ha!" Muffling Gwen tries to threaten Ben who says not paying attention to her in a rather mocking tone:

"Karma is really something Gwen. Oh and try not to throw up cause if you do, you'll have to clean that up too. See ya, wouldn't want to be ya!"

Taunts Ben as he leaves to join his grandfather outside to rest and unwind. Without much option and now fighting the desire to pour out her insides, Gwen is left to continue work and pay for a revenge plan that went awry. She feels completely defeated. But in addition to that, questions if it was even worth it. Given the sad state of affairs, it's safe to say that it wasn't.

155332222222211.content:
It was a normal day for Tsukune Aono...or at least perhaps the closest things got to normal around him. He was a school student, a very average student who did okay in everything and great at nothing. He had been like this his entire life and the school Tsukune went to definitely did little to help.

Yokai Academy was by no means a bad school, but it was very far from good. Tsukune was human and Yokai...was a school for monsters; through weird chance he had ended up basically living in a horror flick. Werewolves, Vampires, Demons, they all came to Yokai but held human guises and learned how to blend into the human world, as of yet they had no idea Tsukune was human but if he was ever found out it would almost surely mean his death.

There however was a group of monsters who did know the truth about Tsukune, and as his friends they did not care in the slightest whatsoever. These were the people he was with right now, Moka Akashiya, Kurumu Korono, Yukari Sendo, and Ginei Morioka. Each of these people were monsters, and each was Tsukune's friend.

Moka was a very beautiful, very sexy vampire. With attractive pink hair, nice body, and cute face and attitude she was widely considered the cutest girl in school, but the only person she had ever shown interest in was Tsukune who she regularly drank blood from. She is a rather sweet girl but that is only one side of her, she wears a Rosario and once it comes off a different kind of Moka entirely appears. This other Moka has silvery white hair and shares the same body as the normal Moka but her attitude was far closer to the typical vampire; in fact the only people she had ever shown any form of kindness to was the normal Moka and Tsukune.

Kurumu was equally as attractive as Moka in many ways, and better in that she had large breasts which she often exploited. Kurumu was a short blue haired succubus with a personality fit for mischief, ever since an incident involving Tsukune she had been more or less obsessed with him; calling him her "Mate of Fate" who would be worthy to bear her children. Regularly she gets into arguments with Moka, mainly out of eachothers jealously over Tsukune and has a sort of love/hate relationship with Yukari.

Yukari is more or less a child in numerous ways. She looked as if she was no more than nine or ten years old, always wearing a witch hat; mainly due to the fact she was a witch. Like Kurumu her hair was blue, only instead of light blue it was very dark, bordering black in fact. She also has a rather unusual view of love, loving both Moka and Tsukune as much as she could, which leads to minor conflicts with Kurumu. Like a normal child Yukari engages in regular pranks, something that has been cut down dramatically since she met Tsukune.

Last but certainly not least was Ginei, who for all intents and purposes was a pervert. As a monster he is a werewolf, very dangerous due to their speed. Ginei had longish black hair, and held the basic demeanor and appearance of a conman. It was no secret he was infatuated with Moka, and as a result he and Tsukune have their own little personal rivalry.

This little motely group was walking towards Yokai Academy together. Kurumu and Moka were in a sort of jealous argument with one another, Ginei and Tsukune was more or less the same and Yukari went back and forth between the arguments cheering on Tsukune and Moka. It was nothing new, perhaps even a daily ritual but nothing truly bad was going to come out of it.

Tsukune was in the middle of his own argument when he noticed a sign for trouble, Kurumu's succubus tail was sticking out which was absolutely against Yokai rules. In the brief instant of noticing that his guard was lowered and someone made their move, Tsukune felt a slight prick on the back of his neck and slowly the world around him became a blurr.

He woke up later, unsure of anything going on, his vision slowly clearing along with his head. He saw chairs, a bed, shoes, makeup, a bunch of stuff belonging to a girl but it seemed far too large, either Tsukune was dreaming of those brown loafers he saw were bigger than him!

"I must be delirious" He muttered, in perfect contrast to this a loud booming voice replied " Fraid Not!" His vision clearing up some more Tsukune saw he was not alone....

Who was he with?

The figures face began to get closer but Tsukune didn’t need to see the figures face to recognize who it was. “OH! No that chest it can’t be, KURUMU!”Tsukune’s body began to shiver and his skin started to turn pale.

“OH! Tsukune darling you don’t looks so well, but don’t worry, your future wife is here to take care of you” Kurumu said with a smile on her face.”Fu…Fu…Future wife”. “That’s right dear your wife”. Suddenly Kurumu’s skyscraper sized thumb and index finger surrounded the inch tall man. He was then pinched between her finger and thumb. Moka pretended not to hear, and kept walking until she was right in front of Tsukune, where the tip of her shoe was almost touching him.

"Hey Tsukune, looks like your in a bit of a small situation." Moka said, quickly laughing at her own pun. Tsukune crossed his arms and muttered "Not funny Moka.". "Lighten up little guy." Moka said, picking him up.

Moka took another smell of Tsukune, and said "You still smell really good.". "Wait..Moka don't!" Tsukune tried to say, but Moka stuck a smaller fang into Tsukune's neck, and drained a tad of blood. "Moka! At my size, You could suck every inch of blood from me!" Tsukune said, almost passing out. "Don't worry Tsukune! Even if you're shrunken or normal size, I still drain blood, it'll just be a smaller scale." Moka explained.

"I should probably get you hidden." Moka said. She lowered him to her chest area, and dropped him in right behind the Rosary, so he would be concealed. Trying to avoid being crushed by Moka's jiggling tits, Tsukune was able to manage a "Why the hell would you do this to me?!". "Because Silly, I feel you don't spend much enough time with me. I mean, whenever we talk, something comes up, and we have to call out the other Moka." Moka said.

"You know she's right about that." The Other Moka said, through the Rosary. "Yeah, I do realize that." Tsukune replied. "And Kid," The 2nd Moka whispered. "I know you've been falling for me."

"What?? No!" Tsukune stammered. "Ha! You're cute kid." the 2nd Moka said. By the time Tsukune was able to let a shy smile out about that, the 1st Moka (We'll just refer to them as 1st & 2nd Moka's.) was able to make it to her room, and shut the door behind her. She picked the tiny Tsukune from her breasts, and set him down on her desk.

"Now, Tsukune, since there's been no trouble around campus, but, how about we call out the other Moka?" Moka asked her little companion.

1553322222222112221.content:
Tsukune paled at what he saw. His vision was still hazy but the colors, he would've recognized them anywhere. Before him were clearly two massive shoes and coming out of them were two feet completely clothed in a long knee-high striped sock. There was only one person who Tsukune ever knew who wore those... Mizore Shirayuki. Sure enough as Tsukune's vision slowly began to clear Mizore's face was coming into view, far far above. She was smiling, her light pink hair dangling as she leaned her head down and stared at her little love; eyes filled with infatuation.

Mizore raised a hand to a small white stick of a lolipop she had in her mouth, holding it between her fingers as she spoke. "Hey there Tsukune. You're looking awfully cute today."

The shrunken boy fell to his knees; mind blank at what to say. He was shrunken with his debatably worst stalker; Mizore's infatuation even put Kurumu's to shame on some levels! Mind blank Tsukune asked perhaps the only thing he could even comprehend. "You're....giant."

"I think Giantess is the correct term." The ice queen chuckled, her legs bending as her face loomed in closer. "I always did want you to be mine you know."

Tsukune did know, Mizore, Kurumu..hell every girl he knew said things like that...well except Moka. What should he say? His mind was naught but a confused jumble so he remained silent. One wrong word and well....Mizore could end up having a little Tsukune popsicle for a snack.

After waiting for a moment for a reply Mizore chuckled again as it became apparent Tsukune was speechless. " I guess you are kinda surprised huh? Want me to tell you how you got like this? " Still silent from a mixture of awe and fear the shrunkee weakly nodded.

After pausing for a moment to take a breath Mizore began. " Well yesterday I was....nearby when I saw you and the others arguing." Tsukune's eyes narrowed almost humorously, "nearby" meant Mizore was doing her usual stalking routine but he didn't say anything.

" Anyway I kinda got my hands on some shrinking formula someone made in one of my classes and well...temptation got the best of me. I froze it into a thin little needle and shot it into you where it melted as soon as it hit your bloodstream." Now Tsukune's jaw was agap, he thought he fixed this problem of Mizore's, fixed the dangerous part of her stalking!

Clearing her throat the giantess continued, " You passed out right away and worried about you everyone took you to the nurse. Classes started so they had to leave and well...I kinda came and got you. It started out kind of hard but after a couple minutes you started shrinking until you were no more than this. You might be an inch or a centimeter, I didn't really measure. And after a day or so you woke up and...tadah. " Mizore struck a playful pose, smiling wide as if nothing was wrong with what she just did.

It took a moment but Tsukune soon registered everything and responded appropriately. " You have to return me to normal! "

Mizore appeared hurt, " Why? Don't you like being with me?" Without waiting for an answer she cupped her hands around her eyes and made sniffling sounds, which would soon evolve into full blown crying.

"No no it's not that! I just don't wanna worry Moka or Yukari!"

Mizore apparently ignored him, "And the antidote is so hard to make! " A large tear slid from between her fingers, colliding against her shoe.

Seeing this Tsukune paled again, if Mizore kept crying then those tears would likely drown him in a pool of her sorrow...literally. "Okay okay calm down. You don't have to fix me right away! "

Almost magically Mizore removed her hands and not a sign of sadness was around. "Yay! Thank you I knew we were meant to be! And I know just what to do!"

This was going to be a very eventful day to say the least...

Tsukune found himself being carried into the room of the Yuki-onna and set down on her desk. The room's AC was at its coldest setting and Tsukune looked down involuntarily as he rubbed his arms. On the desk was a half-finished letter to someone. From the contents, Tsukune guessed it was for an old friend of Mizore's. The stopped mid-way down the paper so he couldn't tell who it was for.

"TSUKUNE! WHAT'RE YOU DOING READING THAT?!?!"

Tsukune looked up, terrified of Mizore's tone, locking eyes with her.

The beautiful girl with long supple purple hair, she wore a skirt that was the girl's uniform along with a white sweater with long dark sleeves and revealed creamy shoulders and the straps of her black bra. On he feet were purple striped stockings on her legs and white sneakers. Her eyes were pupilless and were a beautiful combination of blue and purple, and a lollipop was in her mouth. And that mouth was currently set in a dangerously deep frown.

Tsukune, at that very moment, was a little scared, the reason you may ask? You do not want to mess with an upset or pissed off yuki-onna, especially if she's a giantess compared to you.

Mizore formed a odachi out of ice and stuck it into the ground next to her, leering at him with pure fury. She suddenly looked down enough to where her hair covered her eyes in shadow and she let out a small, brief, emotionless, dark chuckle before saying anything.

"You wanna know something interesting Tsukune? My father's a samuri and he taught me everything I know about how to fight. I'm the top kendo champion back home...have been since I was old enough to hold on to so much as a butter knife...then again, I suppose its only natural seeing as I learned ACTUAL Bushido...so naturally my weapon of choice when I actually fight seriously is a sword made with my ice powers." Mizore said.

Tsukune gulped, paling rapidly, he didn't know that! And learning it now wasn't a good thing...here HE was shrunk, at the mercy of a sword-welding Yuki-onna and she was ticked off at him for reading her personal letter to a friend...yep...he was screwed.

"W-w-w-wait Mizore! I didn't know that it was a personal letter! Please forgive me! I'll do anything!" Tsukune yelped.

"Anything?" Mizore asked, raising her head and looking at Tsukune thoughtfully. "Alright then Tsukune, I want you to..."

Wearing a completely straight face Mizore said, " Announce via the PA that you love me, all of me, and only me. " The ice girl's cheeks turned a faint yet cute tint of red as her lips curled into a smile; her mind finding nothing wrong with what she said. "Of if you want I can make you experience what it's like to be a popsicle."

He wasn't sure if it was fear or the giantess before him but Tsukune felt his blood turn cold. Him as a popsicle likely meant getting treated like one and getting eaten, granted Mizore would probably not eat him but it was still unnecessarily risky. But to announce his love for her via PA...not only would it be lying on a grand scale and utterly embarassing but his friends....Moka, Kurumu, Yukari...even Ruby all of them would upset...maybe even heartbroken. It was no secret his friends all loved him dearly.

Seeking some sort of way out of it Tsukune improvised, "Uh...I can't...we...can't get my voice on the PA!"

Unphased Mizore took a single step to the side and revealed a microphone next to the letter Tsukune almost read. " Taken care of. I'll push the button and you can talk."

"Where did she get that?!" Tsukune mentally yelled, wildly thinking of a way to get out of it. He was drawing blanks and the solomn expression Mizore wore began to show signs of impatience. Slumping down Tsukune muttered exactly what Mizore wanted to hear and exactly what he didn't want to say. "Let's do this..."

The giantess smirked as she bent over, extending a sleeve covered hand to Tsukune. As if on death row he climbed atop her cloth covered palm and held tightly as she rose her hand up.

Instead of bringing Tsukune to the microphone she brought him instead to her face, wearing an expression that showed she dearly happy. " Don't worry, you're doing the right thing." She leaned forward and planted her lips along Tsukune; damn near covering most of his body. Pure red Tsukune struggled, but by something, perhaps Mizore's power his boiling emotions calmed down as he allowed himself to embrace Mizore's gigantic moist lip. Like her, her room, and her power her lip was cold to the touch, but not necessarily in a bad way. It felt cool like a refreshing breeze rather than the expected blizzard.

After a moment Mizore moved Tsukune away and towards the microphone; using her other hand to push the button the turned on the device. "You can do it." She smiled coyly.

The device came to life as Tsukune nervously muttered his statement to the entire school. " Hello every this is Tsukune Aono. I have an announcement to make." Even in Mizore's room Tsukune heard the school mutter and react as they awaited more.Gulping the young boy tried to knock it all out at once. " I wanted to formally and publically announce my love for Mizore Shirayuki.....my girlfriend."

Wearing a content expression Mizore removed her finger from the button, again bringing Tsukune against her lips and kissing him. All around the school could be heard in its shock, people's disbelief how it wasn't Moka or Kurumu. Tsukune felt bad, maybe even enough to cry but he couldn't do such in front of Mizore. All he could do was find some sort of comfort of the soft and intoxicating grasp of the girl's cool lips.

The kiss lasted a couple minutes before Mizore removed her hand from her lips. " I think I have an idea what we can do now."

The last thing Tsukune wanted to do was continue this facade but he played along. "What dear?"

Mizore blushed. "Well....

"Well..." the blushing Mizore began, placing a thoughtful finger under his chin, "considering that it will take some time until you can be restored to you normal height, let's play a game humans call 'Cat and Mouse'!" Tsukune lost his nerve, feeling something hard drop down through his throat. He knew what the details of her suggested game was, hence the reason why he became easily nervous and scared.

"Mi-Mizore-chan! You can't be serious!" Tsukune cried out, outraged and fearful on the giant yuki-onna wanted to do with her new boyfriend. Mizore looked at him calmly, oblivious to his outrage.

"What's wrong, Tsukune-kun?" Mizore asked, tilting her head to the side as her lollipop shifted around in her mouth. "What's wrong with Cat and Mouse? I've never tried it before and it sounds fun."

"Mizore, do you even know what that's all about?!" Tsukune yelled, trying to dissuade Mizore from her plan, but she still did not see the problem.

"Isn't it where I try to chase you around the room, like that human game 'Tag, You're It!' except I try to grab you or even pin you underfoot?" Mizore brought up, her deep blue eyes gazing upon him with much adoration. It became apparent that their new relationship had completely blinded her from possible dangers as long as she was with her shrunken boyfriend.

Tsukune did not know how to respond to her. He knew that whenever Mizore would set her mind on something, she won't stop until she succeeds. He was extremely worried about she would go about playing. She might get carried away and crush him under her foot or something. Of course, it would be a painless end aside from the possibility that Tsukune might suffer a heart attack from all this fright.

"Uh, Mizore-chan, why don't we play something else?" Tsukune sheepishly suggested. He noticed the way Mizore's eyes narrowed; she's becoming serious now.

"But I want to play 'Cat and Mouse,' Tsukune," Mizore said, retaining a calm, yet demanding tone. Her giant figure loomed over the fearful human. What was Tsukune supposed to do now, keep his new girlfriend happy or face her wrath for not following her demands?

15533222222221122212121.content:
Tsukune sighed, Mizore wasn't going to back down from her Cat and Mouse idea and if he blatantly refused to play...well the Ice Queen would probably overract and Tsukune didn't want to get frozen. Raising his head right back up Tsukune smiled a false smile at his giantess of a girlfriend. " I'd love to play Cat and Mouse Mizore! It'll be fun!" He said this out loud of course but on the inside he was more or less shouting a series of curses and personal insults about his own cowardice.

Mizore smiled, her ominous looming figure easing back to her normal stance. " I thought you'd like the idea. I always chase you anyway, this just takes it to the next level. What should the stakes be?"

"Stakes?" The shrunken human repeated, breaking out into a cold sweat.

The giantess nodded, " Yeah, it'd be kind of boring to just play without any personal gain or anything. So what should the winner get?"

Tsukune saw an opportunity, " How about the winner can get the loser to do one thing for them? Like if I won I could um....ask you for a walk through campus. And if you won...."

"I could have my way with you." Mizore finished, cheeks flushing as she wore her infatuated smile.

Flipping out slightly Tsukune jumped back, " Y-Yeah that's the idea...." This was the one downside to this idea of his, if Mizore won it pretty much guaranteed Tsukune would have to go through some arduous and likely hellish and perverted task.

The Ice Queen thought for a minute, manuevering the lolipop within her mouth as her mind thought it over. All the while Tsukune watched nervously. Finally Mizore brought her hand to her lips and held her lolipop in place. "Sounds good to me. But how exactly would you win? I'm not exactly sure how the Mouse would win the game here."

Jaw open slightly in slight shock Tsukune gave the reasonable answer. "Basically I would just need to survive a certain amount of time without getting caught. A time we decide upon."

"Ten years" Mizore flatly stated.

"TOO LONG!!!"

Letting out a slightly upset sigh Mizore fixed her statement, " Fine...how about an hour?"

Tsukune nodded, this time sounding much more reasonable. "Okay when do we start?"

Mizore sat on her bed, "Right after this." Bending over the girl reached for her shoes, slipping her slender fingers into them and pulling them off. Tsukune stared in relief, at the very least without her shoes the chances of Mizore accidently stepping on and crushing him were reduced. Pulling her shoes fully off Mizore wiggled her striped sock covered toes with a slight sigh.

The shrunken human stared innocently with a relieved smile, but suddenly a loud thunderous boom came and Tsukune felt his body flying back from the shockwave. Confused he looked up at Mizore who had risen and stomped one of her feet directly before Tsukune. " I did say right away." She smiled coyly.

Calmly and with a playful smirk Mizore walked towards Tsukune. " Meow." Lying on the cold floor for a moment Tsukune rose up, the rhythmic booms of Mizore's steps making him look back. His eyes practically popped out of their sockets upon seeing Mizore's feet coming in fast. In record time the human leapt back on his feet and took off running away from his giant girlfriend.

Mizore wore a small smile as she chased her boyfriend around, not even showing any signs of trying. It was fun just to think that by walking casually she was covering as much if not more ground than her desperately fleeing lover. It kind of made Mizore realize just how much of a power difference the two had, not just from being Monster and Human, but from being big and small too. She had to admit, it felt kind of nice.

Tsukune obviously didn't share the sentiment, looking over his shoulder he still saw Mizore's feet coming closer and closer to his frame. He had been running now for a majority of the hour, but the only reason he lasted this long was that Mizore was taking such joy in chasing around her "Mouse" But if he made it five more minutes he would be okay and would have won.

" I can do this, I can win!" He mentally goaded. Ironically in a twist of fate at that very instant Tsukune planted his left foot on the floor but...his foot didn't seem stable. He looked down and saw why, the spot he stepped on...no the whole floor was frozen!

Filled with disbelief he began to fall back, eyes locked on Mizore who wore a bored expression now. Her left hand had a stream of ice shooting from it to the floor. "I was getting bored so I decided to end it." She explained.

"Dammit....." Tsukune muttered as he fell on his back.

155332222222211222121211.content:
The ice made traction impossible, Tsukune began to fall backwards. It all seemed to happen in slow motion, dragging out forever. Tsukune falling, Mizore standing above him with a faint smile, hell he could even see up her skirt; not that this was the time for him to focus on that. Instead his eyes were focused on Mizore's raised foot, the slight dirt, slight signs wear and tear, even a faint wetness that was probably sweat; and it was coming in fast. "I win Tsukune-Kun...." Was all she said with that smile of hers, and it echoed in Tsukune's mind as the foot came in fast.

Instinct made Tsukune raise his arms and attempt to push the gigantic foot away, and when his hands met the cloth of the sock he instantly knew it was impossible. His arms gave way in less than a split second, even with some influence from Tsukune's Ghoul powers, Mizore was just too big...and too powerful. Her soft soft pushed Tsukune into the floor as a cold air seemed to waft from between her toes.

Is this....what my life is gonna be like from now on? Tsukune questioned as darkness overcame. It wasn't the darkness of unconciousness, it was just Mizore's foot blotting out almost all light. Only a faint trickle of light came from between Mizore's socked toes, and it was barely enough to make Tsukune capable of seeing her form. It was blurred....almost like someone believed he was unworthy of the sight...of course it was probably Tsukune being a tad dramatic.

Mizore let out a soft chuckle, "You feel nice under there Tsukune....and...now it's time for what I want you to do....I want...." Tsukune couldn't register the rest, it seemed to fade out; and moments later Tsukune was out too, out cold.

But despite having fainted even then Tsukune found no solace, in his dreams the gigantic Mizore haunted him still. Chasing him, crushing him, freezing him into some sort of toy for her amusement...it was horrifying. And to make it worse it wasn't just Mizore doing it, as the dream progressed Yukari, Ruby, Kurumu, and even Moka and others joined in, each throwing in their own little game. Now Tsukune had to run away from Yukari, clean Moka's vampire teeth, give Kurumu a manicure and pedicure, rub Ruby's feet, run from his teacher Mrs.Nekonome and at the end of all that satisfy his......girlfriend.....it was so terrible that Tsukune wished it would end.

Luckily it did, Tsukune was panting as he sat upright. "Was...it all a dream?"

"Morning Tsukune." A very loud monotone and familiar voice said.

Guess not, He turned to Mizore with a smile, "Morning Mizore! What happened?"

"You fainted." She giggled, "Apparently running for an hour and then getting pinned down really wore you out. But you're fine now, just been out for an hour or so."

"Oh yeah...." It was starting to come back, Tsukune having lost the game, fainting, and....the stakes. His eyes trailed to Mizore nervously as he recalled that little bit.

She smiled at him, "I do believe you owe me one favour Tsukune-Kun. Would you like to her what it is? Remember you have to do it no matter what."

W-What is it?" Tsukune asked with a gulp.

Mizore's eyes lit up, "You'll like it I can guarantee, and because I love you so I've decided to give you something that will really make you happy."

Now that threw Tsukune off, what did Mizore have in mind? Was she going to free him, show him to Moka? What could it be?

"You can.....

But they weren't even outside before they saw Mizore standing across from the door, staring uncaringly at the group.

Each girl calmly stepped outside and poised for attack, Kurumu growing her succubus wings and tail as well as her claws, Yukari holding her small wand and tarot cards, and Ruby who had her own wings and her wand in her left hand, Tsukune being in the other. However no one attacked, it was just the silence before what could be a battle.

"I see you guys found my boyfriend. Can I have him back?" Mizore asked, acting as if Tsukune was all hers.

"Like hell you will!!" Kurumu roared, on the brink of lunging at the ice manipulator.

"We want you to fix Tsukune. There are too many ways he could've been shrunken, we need you to come up with a cure." Yukari added knowledgably

"Cure?" The yuki-onna repeated, sounding confused but interested. Nonchalantly she began walking around, not towards the group or away from them, but just side to side; the group never broke gaze on her. "A cure makes it sound like something is really wrong. Nothing's wrong with Tsukune, his size just makes him more appealing if you ask me."

"Why you little...." Kurumu grunted, clenching her clawed fist to the point of drawing blood. "You're talking about Tsukune like he's your property!"

Mizore smirked devilishly at Kurumu as she took her lolipop from her mouth. "You're one to talk. Let's say it was you who found him small. Would you have done anything different? And that goes for all of you, not just bazooka girl."

All of the group averted their gaze, guiltily realizing Mizore had a point. Tsukune's jaw nearly fell off when he noticed this, "I'm not safe anywhere!?!" He mentally yelled.

Shaken but not defeated Kurumu roared back a retort. "Found? You did this to him! And we wouldn't go so far as to make him announce love for us on the damn PA!"

Still showing signs of apathy Mizore shrugged, pointing a slender finger at the group; Tsukune noticed it was still human but quickly that changed, her human hand turned into an ice claw. "Maybe the two witches wouldn't but you and vampire girl definitely would. Don't act like a saint when you have no right to talk."

Kurumu almost fell to the ground, Mizore's wordplay having the desired effect; still she held her ground. "Maybe so but that won't stop me from kicking your frosty ass!"

"Just come and try." Mizore replied confidently, the air suddenly dropping forty degrees and Mizore's other hand and even her hair turning to ice.

"Be careful." Yukari whispered, "it rained earlier today and that means Mizore has an advantage. Not to mention the lake isn't too far off, this fight could go either way."

Kurumu didn't show any signs of listening. The moment before Yukari finished her sentence the succubus lunged at the yuki-onna, her wings creating momentum for a quick strike. The succubus pulled her claw back and prepared to strike her foe with it. Mizore didn't show any signs of worry, not even moving an inch. When Kurumu came within reach for an attack ice sprouted from the ground and created a wall that blocked her attack, although it crumbled away almost immediately afterward.

It was like a signal that caused the two witches to join in on the fight. "You'll be safe here." Ruby reassure Tsukune, quickly tossing him between her breasts. Together the two witches leapt into the air and attacked via long distance. Mizore reacted to this by leaping out of the way in time to be safe, Kurumu flew after her with her claws poised for another attack.

Tsukune struggled to get some kind of view of the battle, but his position in Ruby's cleavage left his stuck. The two walls of flesh surrounding him were too squishy to use as an actual grip; not to mention with Ruby flying around in every possible direction Tsukune was little more than a ragdoll thrust into various parts of her breasts. His face was pinker than Moka's hair, he couldn't help but feel that in some way he was violating Ruby.

The battle continued, the groups seeming to be equally matched. Under normal circumstances Kurumu and her comrades would have won easily but the rain scattered about the land gave Mizore a huge power boost. She was creating ice attacks and defenses the girl's couldn't even imagine and showing little signs of effort. But the fight seemed to be a tie, for every attack one group threw the other would block it. The fight seemed like it could last forever between the love struck monsters but the fact remained that with each passing second they all grew tired.

Tsukune had to rely on sound alone to figure out anything happening outside. He heard a lot of crashes,explosions and cracking but relatively few grunts of pain. Due to his position he noticed Ruby was sweating, and not just that her heartbeat was amazingly high. While this made Tsukune's position a living sauna he shrugged it off completely, it meant Ruby was getting tired, and if she was getting tired Yukari, Kurumu, and Mizore must have been getting tired too.

Sure enough Tsukune was right, Mizore's ice attacks became less intricate, Kurumu wasn't as fast as when she started, Ruby and Yukari's spells didn't wield the same level of power anymore. They were all tired, but determined to go on until a winner was determined. Tsukune couldn't help but pray all of his friends would remain okay, even Mizore as misguided as she was.

The battle did finally end though.....

Despite being outnumbered, Mizore had faired well due to her surroundings that gave her ice abilities an edge over the other three. She noticed how tired Kurumu, Yukari, and Ruby were from their dives and spells casted at her, but the yuki-onna was just as wiped as they were from evading and defending herself. Her cold, lifeless eyes glared at the three monsters, frustrated that they had her shrunken boyfriend. And the worse part was that in reality, they were just as bad as her in the case of Tsukune as they all, even Moka who was hiding behind the doorway watching due to her inability to call out her inner vampire strength, had strong feelings of love and affection for the caring human boy. Even monsters like them, feared by the rest of the humans as part of folklore and legend, were capable to love... and feel jealous as well.

"I don't like this anymore," Mizore stated coolly, her pale gaze staring at the succubus and the two witches. The air around her true form was sparkling and freezing up; it had spread as strongly as her usually reserved emotions flared up. "I don't like this at all."

"If you don't like it, then leave Tsukune alone, stalker freak!" Kurumu hissed, spreading out her claws and wings as far as she could, but her strength had diminished over time. Her resolve, however, did not.

"What you're doing is not right, desu!" Yukari concurred, gripping her wand alongside Ruby.

"Mizore, please listen," Ruby said cautiously, attempting to placate the yuki-onna that they want the fight to stop as well, but not in the way she wanted to. "We're your friends, so we know what we're saying when we tell you that your plans with Tsukune are 'completely unethical.'"

Mizore tilted her head to the side with a rather clueless and indifferent look on her tranquil face. "I don't understand what's wrong or 'completely unethical' about it. All I want is for Tsukune to be back with me so that I could finally have my way with him. Isn't that what girlfriends and boyfriends do with each other?" Ruby, Yukari, and even Moka from the doorway sported disturbed expressions while Kurumu was all the more pissed off.

"That does it!" Kurumu screamed, kicking off the ground and was about to launch her claws into Mizore's throat. "No one gets to have her with Tsukune-kun but ME!" With a ferocious shout, she dove from the air with claws straight in front of her, all directed at Mizore.

Instead, the yuki-onna used her strength in the area around her in which Kurumu dove into, freezing every living thing in her area, which meant that the succubus was rather comically frozen in a block of ice and rendered completely useless.

"Kurumu!" Yukari and Ruby yelled. Large spikes of ice erupted from under the witches' feet, capturing and immobilizing them as well. The ambush attack had also knocked their wands out of their reach, preventing them from casting their spells. With their arms and legs bound by the ice, both Yukari and Ruby did not have the strength to break free as Mizore casually walked up to the older witch.

"You have someone that belongs to me: my soulmate," Mizore said, reaching into Ruby's chest, much to the witch's embarassment as the yuki-onna groped around until she felt a familiar tiny body in between. Mizore then pulled Tsukune out with ease, staring at the small human with an endless void of love reflected from her deep blue eyes. "You'll be mine forever, Tsukune."

Tsukune whimpered, attempting to struggle out, but Mizore's grip was firm. The obsessed yuki-onna was completely lovestruck as long as she had him in her possession. From behind the doorway, Moka couldn't take it well as Mizore continued to admire the shrunken Tsukune in her hand. She was powerless with the rosario's seal bound on her and would be no match against Mizore, but Tsukune didn't deserve this fate. She believed that a sweet boy like him, even if he was human, deserved better. He should deserve her instead.

She stared at her shrunken boyfriend weakly struggling in her slender grip, trying to push away her silky soft fingers and failing miserably. His struggles seemed cute, like a man trying to battle against God, the kind of comparison that made Mizore most happy. Out of the corner of her gaze, in the shadow of the entrance was Moka, just standing there, looking at Mizore. Mizore knew Moka would try to interfere so she skipped the middle man, showing no signs of actual movement Mizore used her will alone to freeze Moka in a block of ice.

"Moka!!!!" Tsukune screamed, ceasing his struggles and reaching vainfully for the frozen vampire. Even frozen Moka's mouthed move, making no sound through the ice but her lips mouthed, "Tsukune...." as she fell into unconsciousness.

In a way Mizore felt bad, Moka was probably the one person in the whole group aside from Tsukune she really liked, Kurumu was loud, Yukari was flirty and she didn't really know Ruby. Moka made Tsukune happy and that was what mattered, "But now it's my turn to make him happy." She whispered, turning around and starting to walk away.

Lifting her clenched fist up to her face Mizore examined Tsukune who had now entered a state of depression at his situation. "Don't be sad Tsukune....I'm all you'll ever need. Your lover, your friend, and even your goddess. We'll be together forever." Softly she kissed Tsukune, just a quick contact that lasted a second. "To avoid suspicion I have to do something though." Barely aware of anything other than his injured friends Tsukune didn't even grasp where Mizore was bringing him until it was too late. Right at the tip of her shirt Mizore opened it up a small amount of dropped Tsukune into her firm cleavage. Walking back to her own dorm Mizore unfreezed the others to avoid casualties.

Being between Mizore's relatively fair sized breasts snapped Tsukune out of his depressed state, instead now becoming overly nervous at not trying to do anything perverted. Around him were walls of flesh, barely lit through the little sunlight getting through Mizore's shirt, held by a tight black bra, Tsukune was trapped tight within the cleavage, afraid to move and possibly upset Mizore. He heard the sound of the ice melting so Tsukune relaxed much more when he realized his friends would be okay, and maybe even try a second rescue attempt, hopefully after all the residue rain goes away.

"I love you Tsukune..." Mizore muttered with what was probably happiness.

Afraid to upset the yuki-onna Tsukune whimpered his reply, "I love you too..." Mizore just giggled softly at that.

Mizore loved the feeling of Tsukune so tiny, all hers. Between her breasts, under her butt or feet, even against her palm Tsukune was powerless, he was all hers and nothing would change that. At first he would be upset, but eventually he will accept his fate as Mizore's lover, or at least that was Mizore's reasoning for all this. But he did try to escape...maybe some punishment would be in order later on.

Time passed regularly, school students went to wherever they needed to, talking mindless gossip. No one seemed to pay mind to Mizore, or if they did they hid it because of well...how she was. It came in handy for the situation, Mizore made it to her dorm room without trouble.

"Now what to do Tsukune..." She muttered with a faint blush...
155332222222211222121222111211.title: Mizore's Victory

1553322222222112221212221112111.content:
In a soft motion Mizore picked her boyfriend from her breasts, setting him on the foot of her bed ever so gently. The way his face was bright red from being so close to Mizore's heart...it was adorable. The Yuki-Onna got on her knees and laid her arms at the edge of her bed, her chin resting on them. Tsukune was just so…cute…at with her face this close to him he looked all the cuter to Mizore. She smiled a small smile, a smile which Tsukune returned; not out of love but fear however.

The two stared at each other for the longest time, Tsukune scared Mizore would punish him, Mizore just staring with love.“Now Tsukune-Kun…you know I love you…right?”

Tsukune blinked, did he hear Mizore right? “Uh…yeah. I mean…you told me that back when we very first met…and haven’t exactly stopped saying it. It’s one of the reasons I care deeply about you.”

Mizore’s cheeks flushed as one of her hands came to her chest, “Aww….Tsukune-Kun…thank you. It’s good to know my love is returned like that…” Tsukune cursed, should’ve known Mizore would think that. “But…I asked because…well you did run away…and…even though I love you more than life itself. I can’t just let that go unpunished.” Mizore stood back up, at her full…towering height. And it may have been Tsukune’s imagination, or maybe the blurr from sheer distance, but it seemed like an ominous shadow loomed over Mizore’s eyes.

She wordlessly began to kick her shoes off, and start to climb into her bed. The entire time Tsukune wondering, “What is she going to do?” Mizore didn’t give any hints though, she wordlessly situated herself on her pillow and sat with her legs crossed. The suspense was driving Tsukune borderline crazy, and it was then that Mizore spoke. “I know it must be a scary idea…me being what….maybe a thousand feet to you? And that it’s time for me to punish you. But I’m not some cruel monster, even if I have to make you learn a lesson I won’t hurt you or anything…” Her words, despite everything, made Tsukune feel a little better. Or at least…how he normally felt.

The Ice Goddess’ fingers tucked into the opening of her striped socks, “…And with that in mind I thought of the perfect way to punish you, and yet at the same time have us increase our love for each other.” With a soft tug of her fingers Mizore’s socks began to slide away, slowly revealing the amazingly attractive calve and its well toned form to her boyfriend. Not that it stopped there; Mizore’s sock continued to come off, revealing her ankle and eventually…her foot. Never a foot man to begin with, Tsukune couldn’t help but feel a bit in awe at how well kept Mizore’s foot was. No offense to her but she always came off as…too lazy for that kind of thing, but here it was…her foot and to be honest…it was even turning Tsukune on. Despite being in that one pair of socks for god knows how long everyday there wasn’t even the faintest form of foot odor in the air. No dirt…no toe jam or anything like that…only the occasional bit of sock lint and it somehow…added to the beauty of her foot. And there was absolutely NO dead skin along her sole, at his size Tsukune could tell…that alone spoke levels about Mizore’s foot care; but when his eyes rested upon her toes his jaw nearly dropped. Dark purple paint was applied flawlessly on each toe, even at his size not a single crack in the paint was to be found. It was just…beautiful…stunning…there weren’t any other words to describe it. And in the midst of Tsukune’s amazed staring Mizore already had her other foot exposed…and the beauty doubled.

Mizore giggled at Tsukune’s gawking, “Thank you for noticing…I try to take care of myself.”

“They’re…amazing…that’s all I can say.”

“It’s good that you think so Tsukune-Kun…because my feet are a big part of your punishment.”

That sentence tore away any further thoughts of attraction, “W-What? What are you going to do?”

The soft smile Mizore was infamous for formed, “Oh it isn’t what I’m going to do…it’s what you’re going to do.” Mizore wrapped her fingers around her foot, simultaneously stretching them towards Tsukune. The two soles lay at their sides, and even then were over a dozen times Tsukune’s height. “To help further our love, and to help you learn your lesson. You’re to kiss my feet until I say stop Tsukune-Kun…” She giggled a bit, “After how you were acting I know it seems less like a punishment…but I think it will suffice.”

Tsukune’s lips quivered at the mere sight of Mizore’s feet this big and close…and she expected him to kiss them for an unspecified amount of time. He took a few steps forward and rubbed his hand against the sole…it was soft…really soft…Tsukune felt that weird impressed attraction again…it almost made him want to kiss Mizore’s sole…almost. He got on his knees and brought his face before the mountain of flesh. “Do I have to Mizore?” He quickly realized his mistake, “M-Mizore-Chan!?”

Mizore nodded with a soft smile, “Absolutely my dearest Tsukune-Kun.”

Tsukune gulped, worth a shot anyway. Mizore still looked like she wanted to hear something though, “Um…T-Thank you Mizore-Chan.”

That was apparently it, Mizore seemed to ease herself, “You’re welcome Tsukune-Kun…but…while you’re getting punished…please call me Goddess Mizore? Or the Ice Goddess if you prefer. I think it helps send the message.”

“And prove you’re on a power trip…”

“O-Kay Goddess Mizore! I’ll start now!” With all his stalling Tsukune found it easier than he expected, easing towards Mizore’s foot with the intent to kiss…he expected oodles of humiliation and embarrassment but…nothing. Maybe he was finally adjusting to his size? Or…what if he was actually…starting to fall for Mizore? It seemed unlikely but it explained his behavior. He tried not to dwell on it though, right now Mizore wanted kisses…and he’d better make her happy.

Head tilted slightly to the side, lips puckered…Mizore’s sole held as if Tsukune was holding a person…he was doing this right. It seemed to take forever, but eventually Tsukune gave Mizore’s icy sole a good long kiss. The mixture of her silky soft soles coupled with the chill of her body just gave Tsukune goosebumps…it felt…nice. Before he knew it he was giving another kiss…and then another…and it soon no longer was a punishment. But instead Tsukune was kissing Mizore…or at least…her feet. Time seemed to just fly by as a euphoric sense began to form. Miles away Mizore seemed to experience similar feelings, letting out small moans and looking at Tsukune with more love than ever before. Whether or not Tsukune accepted it; at that moment his and Mizore’s hearts were together in romance. It wasn’t just kisses anymore, Tsukune started massaging Mizore’s delicate feet too. And continued kissing with intense passion. He was losing himself in her…literally.

The feeling was absolutely heavenly on Mizore’s end when Tsukune began this…but she began to sense her punishment wasn’t having the desired effect anymore. Tsukune was just making love to her…or at least… a part of her. Between lovers that wasn’t a punishment at all! So Mizore had to up the ante.

“Okay Tsukune, Stop!”
1553322222222112221212221112111.title: Punished...With Love.

choices: Heads home to start planning the Wedding!
155332222222211222121222111211111.content:
“Wrap you around my toe, freeze you, and make you into my toe ring.” Mizore spoke as if there wasn’t the slightest moral issue with what she proposed.

Tsukune, naturally, couldn’t believe what he had just heard. It was one thing to ask for some foot care, a little odd but not uncommon, but this was a bit of a stretch even by Mizore’s standards. There was no way she said what he heard, “I’m sorry Mizore-chan, what did you say?”

The yuki-onna sighed, obviously disliking having to repeat herself. “I said I’ll be using you as a toe ring Tsukune-kun.”

Any delusions the young human boy had were shattered, “Huh?!” He was pretty sure his jaw touched the ground.

Mizore shrugged casually at her boyfriend’s shock, “You shouldn’t be so surprised. After all, this is a punishment for you. Plus I’ve always wanted to try some things like this.” Her usual apathy regarding such outrageousness only served to further shock the little Tsukune.

“I-Isn’t that dangerous?” Tsukune wimpily muttered.

Again, a shrug was all the yuki-onna gave, “Not really, I’ve iced people before. If left unchecked you’d be frozen for about a week normally. But at your size it’d be more like…three days or so. You’ll be fine, and with me the whole time.” She spoke that last part with her usual stalkery, love-filled, tone. Tsukune would’ve argued some more, but somewhere along the line of making out with Mizore’s feet, being her toy basically, and having his friends lose a fight against her just made it clear it wouldn’t be of any use. He hadn’t been shrunken for long but Tsukune had grown to know that look in the beauty’s eyes.

He sighed in defeat, “Alright Mizore-chan, when you’re ready.”

Mizore quickly perked up with a smile. “Thank you Tsukune-kun.” She began to pet him with her toe, “I promise I’ll be gentle.” The long pillars of the yuki-onna’s fingers began to draw closer to the puny teen. He realized it was his wimpy submission that caused it, but Tsukune couldn’t help but grow ever more nervous as the temperature continued to drop around him. The ice seemed to already be forming from Mizore’s fingertips, eager to freeze the lad. When they finally came, all the yuki-onna did was wrap her fingers around her boyfriend. “Not quite yet,” She whispered softly. Ever gently the girl lifted her prize closer to her feet, carefully wrapping his body around the middle toe of her left foot. It was a challenge to do it without breaking her boyfriend, but Mizore managed to do it. Tsukune was just the right size so that he was wrapped around Mizore’s toe with his arms and legs meeting at the underside. His face was smushed against the side of the digit, but given the other possibilities at this size, it wasn’t that bad, although his back did feel a bit stretched out.

The yuki-onna hovered her fingers around Tsukune, “Take a deep breath dear, this will be over quickly.” Tsukune took the advice and took a deep breath, a second later he was frozen from head to toe. “You look beautiful…” Mizore cooed, bringing her foot near a mirror on a door. Just as she said, it was exquisite. A toe ring that shined as if it were diamond, and actually shaped like a diamond was on it. Once you got past the initial dazzle of it all you managed to see the core of the ring, Tsukune himself. Even frozen his eyes moved, but he couldn’t speak. He was impressed by how Mizore’s toe ring looked though.

“Now…in three days you’ll be back to normal Tsukune and your punishment will be over. Until then it’s just me and you, okay?” A bit redundant given the fact Tsukune couldn’t even nod. It didn’t stop the girl from carrying on like he agreed though, “Good…” Mizore stared at her toes, almost infatuated at the sight of her man frozen in an embrace with her body. “It almost feels like a wedding ring, doesn’t it Tsukune-kun?” The yuki-onna wiggled her toes happily at the thought.

“Mizore Aono….Tsukune Shirayuki? I wonder which last name we should keep? Mom might be a little sore if I get rid of mine…” Mizore giggled a little bit before downing to a more serene, content look. “…Maybe we really should consider marriage, eh Tsukune? I have to get married by law soon anyway…why not tie the knot since we’ll be doing it anyway?”

Mizore looked to Tsukune for an answer, obviously not getting much of a response. It was good the ice was there though; it prevented the human from showing just how much he was horrified by the thought of such a sudden marriage.

Unable to get an answer, Mizore…
155332222222211222121222111211111.title: Talk of Marriage

1553322222222112221212221112111111.content:
Things just kept on going from bad to worse for the shrunken human. Mizore's words turned him whiter than the very snow she currently walked upon. She was in her homeland, the frozen tundra where all yuki-onna resided. Her outfit was very typical of her. Her usual shirt and skirt combination with her striped socks and shoes. Inside her shoe however, sat Tsukune in his frozen toe-ring prison, which had barely melted in the last day. And in the frozen homeland of his girlfriend, he'd be frozen for a while longer. The reason they were there was quite simple: Marriage. Not even a full 24-hours ago Mizore said it.

"I'm tired of waiting, let's go get married Tsukune."

Being frozen, Tsukune had no say in the matter. So Mizore packed her things, did a few errands, and here they were. The young woman approached her hometown, greeted by the eager face of her beautiful mother Tsurara. She seemed just as eager as her daughter, Hello there Mizore. Where is my soon-to-be son-in-law?"

Mizore gestured to her shoes, "I kinda forgot to mention some things Mom. But he's in there…"

Tsurara seemed to understand immediately, "Hmm, a bit kinky I must say. But if he can produce good children then I see no problem with it. Be ready Mizore, the wedding is tomorrow."

That soon?! Tsukune mentally gasped.

Mizore nodded, "Yeah yeah. I know Mom. I can't wait. It's good that we can get marriages done so fast. I can't wait to be married to Tsukune. Mr. and Mrs. Shirayuki…"

"Taking your name huh? Alrighty then. Let's go Mizore. We don't have a lot of time to get you your dress."

"Lead the way Mom."

-----

The day proceeded very quickly beyond that. Mizore and Tsurara went to gather Mizore's dress for the coming day, informing her the entire time that she was proud of her and Tsukune finally "Getting it on."

Naturally Tsukune was…less than happy. He didn't want to get married! Especially not shrunken! But it was tomorrow, and he had no chance of preventing it. Heck, his friends couldn't even come if they wanted to. Their only means of travel would be the bus driver, and Mizore took him to get here. He'd spend the day driving back. And that didn't even get into the fact that Mizore recently proved she could best all of them in an advantageous terrain, and this was even more to her advantage than their previous battlefield. Tsukune couldn't escape either. The entire time he was frozen and decorating Mizore's middle toe from the confines of a warn sock and shoe. He'd begun to notice the slight details in the yuki-onna's feet, finding them slightly beautiful in this dark hour. Or maybe he was just grasping at straws to try and make light of a meek situation. Maybe he was developing a love for Mizore? It was hard to tell. Regardless of it all, the next day it had come.

-----

Tsukune was standing before the Snow Oracle, who would be performing the marriage, shrunken and defrosted for the momentous occasion. Well, not completely defrosted; his legs were frozen in place by Tsurara, so he couldn't run away. He stood atop a specially provided pedestal so he would be near-level with his wife when the time for the kiss would come. They were inside the citadel the Snow Oracle usually resided in, in a particular room that was built for marriages. In the room were all of the yuki-onna in the land, much fewer than Tsukune imagined. They truly were a dying breed. There were barely a couple hundred people there. Perhaps if his marriage could truly help them…maybe it was okay…He rationalized that.

The music started playing, everyone, including Tsukune, looked to the entrance of the room, where Mizore entered in the most beautiful of wedding dresses, accompanied by her mother who was in a flowery white kimono. Mizore's dress was snow-white, with a nice accentuation to her cleavage and cut around the hip to show a nice amount of leg. With two white shoes that fit perfectly against the yuki-onna's toes. She looked…

Beautiful…Tsukune gasped.

With each stride of her attractive form, Mizore seemed more and more beautiful to her betrothed, soon approaching an almost goddess-like level of beauty. For just the briefest of moments, Tsukune didn't mind getting married. Even as Mizore stood beside him and he was level with her chest. The young human felt insignificant before her, even in the nice black suit made for him. Without further adieu, the wedding began.

"Dearly beloved, we are gathered here today to welcome the marriage of our own Mizore Shirayuki, and Tsukune Aono, in holy matrimony. Before we begin, does the betrothed's mother have the ring?" The Snow Oracle spoke with the elegance of one who'd done this ceremony a thousand times.

Tsurara stepped beside Mizore, right near where Tsukune was, and slid two rings onto her fingers, Tsukune already had a shrunken one to avoid complications. "Here Mizore. This was my very own wedding ring. I feel it's only right for you to have it."

Mizore blinked in utter shock, "T-Thank you Mom…and this other one…?"

"A gift. Look at it."

Mizore inspected it closer, and from his position, so did Tsukune. They both gasped. The second ring…was Moka! Frozen like Tsukune was not too long ago! Neither could even speak they were so shocked. Even with her rosario seal on, to capture Moka…this was just…unbelievable. "Mom…I love you…" Mizore appeared on the edge of tears she was so happy. In complete contrast, Tsukune felt all hopes of escape die. Moka was the greatest fighter he knew, and she was now powerless to do anything that could help him. And not only that, but she was forced to be there for something she no doubt hated as much as Tsukune did.

"A ring or a pet it's up to you." Tsurara smiled, backing away to the side so the wedding could proceed. At the side she playfully mouthed to her daughter, "Or a slave." With a mischievous look. Mizore looked back with a happy nod.

Apparently as per yuki-onna tradition, the Snow Oracle just cut right to the chase. Tsukune quickly realized that this wedding was going to be very short. "Do you, Mizore Shirayuki, take Tsukune Aono to be your husband?"

"I do."

"Do you, Tsukune Aono, take Mizore Shirayuki to be your bride?"

Tsukune knew he was defeated. "I do."

"Then you may kiss the bride."

Mizore turned to face Tsukune, and the Snow Oracle used her own ice-manipulation to maneuver Tsukune too. Facing eachother, Tsukune saw the streams of happy tears along Mizore's face, decorating her beautiful form even more. This was truly the happiest day of her life.

"I love you Tsukune." Mizore leaned forward and started to kiss the entire body of her husband.

"I love you too Mizore." Tsukune responded, surprised to find he couldn't tell if he was lying or not.

"I now pronounce you Mr. and Mrs. Shirayuki! Congratulations!" The Snow Oracle exclaimed.

The whole room burst into cheers as Mizore and Tsukune never broke their kiss. Tsurara cried tears of joy at her daughter's happiest day. The Snow Oracle was pleased her prophecy was wrong. And Moka, in his frozen ring form, cried.

-----

The two quickly went to Mizore's home, to celebrate their honeymoon. Tsurara gave the two the pleasure of privacy within her home for the momentous occasion. Mizore never let go of her love even as she began to remove her dress. She soon flopped onto her bedroom bed in nothing but a snow-white bra and panties, placing Tsukune just below her breasts.

"I love you Tsukune." She leaned over to plant a kiss on her husband.

"I love you too Mizore." He kissed back, surprised again by his feelings.

The yuki-onna stared at her rings, "They're so beautiful."

Tsukune looked to his wife's slender hand, staring at Moka with a lot of apprehension. "…Yeah…"

"Mizore laid the hand over her husband, cuddling him against her body. "Well Mr. Shirayuki…we're married. And I can only think of one thing to make this day better."

"What is it M-… dear?"

"I want to…"
