1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The day was saved, life fibers were no more, as Ryuko fought Ragyo in space the life fibers were destroyed but something far worse happened to our heroes, during her fight with Ryuko a flash of light emanates from the satellite and soon everyone in Honnouji academy shrunk to the size of dolls, as well as Ryuko who now faced her gigantic mother. Needless to say Ryuko was crushed by her giant mother like a mosquito being swatted.

Once she made it back to earth Ragyo felt a mixture of emotions she could not describe, on one hand her entire army was destroyed and her plan to expand the life fibers was foiled, but on the other she had everyone that dared oppose her all shrunk up and helpless against her.

From satsuki point of view this was the worst possible outcome, normally if the life fibers won, that would be it, the world would be destroyed sure but it would have been a rather quick death. Now here she was a pitiful doll at her mothers feet, thinking of how to defeat this titanic naked monster.

Ragyo thought of what to do when she fell a itch on her ankles, the students of Honnouji were still trying to oppose her, but this time rather than anger she felt amusement, as a smirk creept unto her face she rose her foot and crush them, a puddle of blood appeared beneath her feet and she began to laugh "This kind of power..... Is amazing" her voice boomed throughout the whole academy field, while saying this many of the students tried to attack her, including the 4 devas, but everyone perished against her, all but one person.

This couldn't be, there she was, satsuki kiryuin, completely frozen in fear of her titanic mother, she just stood there and watched as not only her soldiers but also her friends be crushed under the giant (to her) woman's foot. Now with only her remaining she fell onto her knees as her gigantic mother got closer and closer, every step shaking the ground and making a loud boom, "Well, it seems like this is a draw, don't you think?" Ragyo said knowing she hadn't won but didn't exactly lose either, satsuki just kneeling there, her mind couldn't process what had just transpired and her spirit broken from watching everyone she tried to protect die. "Oh come one, nothing to say to mommy? Real mood killer, at least your sister fought to her last breath" ragyo mocked, but satsuki remained silent, "You are boring, oh well, time for you to die" ragyo rose her foot to stomp on her elder daughter, satsuki watched as the foot rose to crush her and thought that maybe soon she would be reunited with her sister and couldn't help but smile at the thought, unfortunately for her ragyo noticed this. "But come to think of it, what will i do after i stomp you? You managed to ruin my life long plan, maybe killing you would be too kind of me for a ungrateful bitch like you" ragyo bellowed "I think keeping you around would be better, it is my duty as a mother to discipline you after all the naughty things you done" with that said ragyo crouched and her mighty hand descended from above casting a shadow over satsuki. Satsuki however finally snapped out of her pitiful state and began to run, but it was useless, she didnt make it that far before ragyo's hand caught her, ragyo brought her shrunken daughter close to her face, her crimson eyes glaring at the helpless captive in the palm of her hand, her warm breath washing over satsuki's body, "Now then lets get home to start your punishment, remember mommy still loves you but you brought this upon yourself" ragyo mocked and then kissed her daughter covering her whole body on saliva and then making way to one of her mansions.

What will she do when they get home?

Option #1:
She decides to punish satsuki right away (how she does it is up to the reader)

Option #2
She decide that it be better if they both take a bath like they always do (and uses this as a chance to humiliate satsuki further)

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
One day, Fuuri was just walking down the street towards the F.A.V studio with bags of new clothes and some groceries by the orders of band leader, Suzu. As she was going near the front door, she saw a bakery shop and her stomach growled like usual as she loves to eat things. "*Gasp* A bakery! And there is a new cake on sale! I hope Suzu doesn't mind me spending on it. I hope she doesn't become angry." said Fuuri. She went inside the bakery and bought a piece of cake called, "Growing Deliciousness a La Mode De Chocolate" and ate it immediately once she got out of the shop and went to take the items to the studio. Suzu came in from practicing with her bass and said, "Did you bring all the things I asked for Sonico, you, and myself?" Fuuri lifted all the bags that are in her hands and smiled cutely as she closed her eyes.

“Ok, good. Hey Fuuri? Can I have my wallet back?” said Suzu, “Sure,Suzu.” responded Fuuri and as she gave her back the wallet, Suzu saw that a few bucks were missing. “Fuuri?! Where the 12 dollars that were supposed to be in the wallet? You didn’t spend it on any sweets, right??” questioned Suzu. Soon, Fuuri did what she hadn’t done before... lie, “Umm..no.” said Fuuri. “You’re lying to me are you?” said Suzu as she starts seethe in fury, and soon Fuuri started to tear up from Suzu’s anger and said in a sad but cute tone, “But...but..I had to! I was *sniff* I was hungry. It was so delicious! I apologize for my mistake” and Fuuri bowed as she got on her knees and then Suzu turned away from her and sighed and said, “Ok, since you apologized, I’m sorry for yelling at you. But you were so CUTE as you cried I can’t help it! Ok, let’s get set up for band practice once Sonico gets here from her “photo session” *laughes* I wanna know what goes on there!” as she walks out of the room, Fuuri wipes off her tears and once she stood up, she suddenly fainted back to the floor.

A few hours later, Suzu came back to the room enraged that Fuuri didn’t go to rehearsal and Sonico soon followed and once she opened she said, “FUURI!! WHY DIDN’T YO-*GASP*” she and then Sonico both gasped as they saw that Fuuri was growing tremendously and suddenly gave an earthquake and once Fuuri opened her eyes, she said, “Ehhh...What’s wrong with me?!” Then she grew up to 67 ft. and bursts through the walls and roof and soon stood and grew more until she became 103 ft. tall! “AHHHH!!!” screamed Fuuri causing windows to crack and shatter by the piercing sound. Both Sonico and Suzu uncovered their ears and Fuuri covered her mouth but was going into tears, “Whoa….how did she become a giant?” asked Sonico, “I’m not sure how she’d beca-I GOT IT! I remember that Fuuri had said that before she came to the studio, she said something about a cake, so that means the cake had made Fuuri grow!” explained Suzu, “I hope that the cake hasn’t affected her in any way…” “I hope you are right Suzu.” spoke Sonico.

So, how did Fuuri react after all that? (P.S. I still can't BELIEVE no one has made an interactive about this series yet.)
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Fuuri. I choose her!

"Calm down Rem I need to discuss with you some things." Said Crusch Karsten explaining her plan and how Subaru had an important role in it, Finally saying.

"So I think in order to defeat the whale I need to hide Subaru in my shoe as you did earlier, that way the whale will attack me and it will be easier to hit with my sword" Crusch Karsten said satisfied with her plan.

What took Subaru off guard since he didn't expected to be in a shoe again even less in the shoe of rival of his beloved one.

Rem din't liked the idea either but accepted reluctantly since was the only option to rescue her sister, Emilia, the Roswaal mansion and the town.

The next day at night everything was prepared, so Rem give Subaru to Crusch Karsten.

"Ok then Subaru I will be completely distracted, when the battle starts, so try to get in the toe area of my boot, anyway I asked Felix to cast on you a protection spell during your last treatment" Crusch Karsten said placing Subaru in her boot and waiting a moment to let him get in place.

"Well its time so let's go" Said Crusch Karsten putting her boot and feeling Subaru underneath her toes, was a weird feeling but a good one she decided not think much about it and started the trip to defeat the whale.

The whole way Subaru was squeezed by the sweaty toes of Crusch Karsten as if by doing so she kept an elegant and calm appearance above, while taking all her stress out on him. Finally Crusch Karsten, Rem, soldiers both from Crusch Karsten, as well as some from Anastasia Hoshin and some veterans seeking revenge for the past, reached the battlefield, after a while they saw the whale sailing the skies and the battle started.

For Subaru, the heat, and pressure, increased, the constant motion of the battle disoriented him, and the increased sweat threatens to drown him, this continued until he passed out.

Hours later he wake up in Rem's embrace she was asleep holding him in her hands, with the movement Subaru made, she finally woke up.

"What happened" Subaru asked.

Rem explained that they won the battle and that everything was ok, also said that Crusch Karsten wanted to thank him. So she took him to her they where camping in a field with an enormous tree, and the whale carcass farther.

"Welcome, Subaru you did a great service for our country I'm very grateful with you so much that I would like to propose you something. I would like to extend an invitation to be part of my entourage. Of course I will fulfill my part of the deal but after rescuing Emilia and her people you can decide whether to stay with her or come with me what do you say" Crusch Karsten said.

She had liked Subaru very much in the last two days, she began to think that Subaru could become a wonderful pet, since he helped her relax during battle, and also helped her focus her thoughts.

"I don't know, this all is so suddenly" weighing his options, at the end he decided to...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Discovered by Crusch Karsten

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Shinji just came home from a hard mission. The angel had shot some kind of beam at him while he was fighting it, but there was no pain.
The NERV scientists couldn't find any anormalities, so they sent him home to rest. He kicked off his shoes at the door and walked over to couch
to lay down and went to sleep. When he woke up, he was shocked. He had shrunk, everything was gigantic, and he was on the floor.
If he had to guess, he'd say he was about an inch tall. Before he could figure out what to do next,
the ground started shaking and heard some booming noises. The door opened and someone walked in. It was...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: yes

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Misato entered the apartment wearing her usual outfit(red jacket over a black dress with black boots). "Man, what a day. I can't wait to drink and relax!"
she said as she tossed off her jacket and walked over to the fridge and grabbed a beer. Shinji couldn't believe how huge Misato was compared to him.
She was as big as Eva-01! "How am I supposed to get her to notice me!" Shinji said. BOOM! BOOM! BOOM! Shinji was knocked down by her booming
footsteps as she walked over to the couch and plopped down. She then proceeded to remove her boots and socks. "ahh.. that's more like it."
She said as she drank her beer. Shinji covered his nose as he was assaulted by a nasty, cheesy odor.
" Yuck! does she ever wash her feet!" "Still, I need to get her attention somehow.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Misato

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Canada it is!

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: How does she shrink? One of England's spells gone wrong (as usual), or by some yet to be discovered means?
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Female!

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Canada had had many things go wrong in her long life. First the invisibility issue (which started in '45 and ended in '99), then her quite severe headache problem in the sixties, and now she was stuck at around, by her estimate, three to four inches tall. Also, judging by her size, England had royally fucked up a spell.
The redhead sighed, tucking her knees under her chin.

A knock came to her door, and the female Canadian gasped slightly as she realized something. If anyone saw her in this state, they would either try to colonize her (which was basically invading her lands and forcing her people to call themselves whatever country that had taken over, like, say, Russia (no offence-author)), or they would...they would eat her alive, and she would perish within their bodies, her form being added to them.

Canada groaned, but found a place to hide quickly-she was a bit embarrassed by hiding in her own panties, but found the reason suitable, since she was hiding after all. The door opened, and she nervously held her breathe. Since she didn't know who it was, she closed her eyes and prayed.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: A spell gone wrong

choices: The voice was from Eastern Europe
The voice was from Eastern Africa
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: When Canada heard the voice at first, she prayed it was a female, and one that hopefully wasn't hungry. But all the shrunken redhead could pick out was...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: It's a Female

choices: Ukraine, who was looking for her (no digestion)
Belarus, who was looking for food (no digestion)
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: From what Canada could tell, it was a voice from Eastern Europe. Despite her best efforts, she shrieked with surprise as someone reached into her hiding spot and plucked her out. She closed her eyes, and began praying silently, but she didn't see that the person who had picked her up was...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The voice was from Eastern Europe

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Canada?" Ukraine asked, and the shrunken female opened her eyes.

"Ukraine? What are you doing here?" Canada asked.

"Looking for you," Ukraine replied.

"Ah, well, I'm presuming that yet another one of England's spells has gone wrong, so I'm left at this height!" The female Canadian said, moving her arms around her bust to cover them. The two chuckled, then Ukraine, who was still holding Canada, really began to think.

Canada was currently stuck at around three to four inches tall, and if England's spell had accidentally shrunk her, then if someone else had come in, had found her...what would've happened? Would they have...eaten her alive to add her beautiful, curvy body to them?

Ukraine glanced at Canada again, and, upon realizing that she couldn't leave the female Canadian alone, came to a decision. Canada could fit nicely into one of her equally sized (when she was at her normal height) breasts, or she could fill her stomach up finely.
Ukraine sighed, but the decision was hers alone.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Ukraine, who was looking for her (no digestion)

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Hesitantly, Ukraine opened her mouth, as if to ask a question, but Canada interrupted. "You want to eat me. Don't you?" She asked.

"Only to hide you! I wouldn't ever dream of d-d-digesting you!" The female Ukrainian replied. Canada sighed.

"Go ahead," the redheaded female said. Ukraine hesitated for a moment, then put Canada onto her tongue gently, moaning at the taste. Canada was delicious! Why hadn't she done this before?

Soothingly, she rolled her friend around on her tongue, and she felt Canada squirm. Ukraine thought to herself about how...tasty Canada was. Maybe she could just swallow her now and let her friend be safer? Or maybe she could play a bit more with Canada, let her get herself truly prepared for the journey through her intestines?
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Into the belly!

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Mentally smiling, Ukraine began to roll her tongue around Canada, causing her...friend...prey(?) to laugh at her antics, and her taste was slightly overwhelming. Feeling her friend begin to climb up her tongue, the Ukrainian tilted her head back slightly, enough to give her a reason to climb quickly. To her surprise, it actually gave the shrunken Canadian no incentive to climb, and Ukraine nearly choked on her as she slipped to the back of her throat, causing her to gag on reflex, and accidentally spit her back out, coated in saliva.
"Ugh!" She complained. "Next time, please don't do that. I nearly choked on you!"

Canada chuckled. "It's...I'm sorry, but I wanted to be in your belly sooner."

Ukraine smirked. "Well, why didn't you say so?" With that, she gently held the Canadian over her maw, dropped her in, and swallowed, tracing Canada's path into her belly. Feeling her friend arrive in her growling gut, Ukraine sighed, and sat down on the busty female Canadian's bed, poking her belly every now and then.
"It's...honestly nice in here," Canada admitted. "Maybe once I'm back to my normal height, we can do this to each other, y'know? Eternally eating each other alive, feel the weight settle in our respective guts."

Ukraine nodded. "That'd be nice." Both of them smiled, then, once Ukraine had flashed (it's a nation teleporting thing, I don't fully understand it-author) back to her home, fell asleep.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Play with her!

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Ukraine blinked herself open, patting her gut instinctively. Canada...hadn't grown back overnight, but she still filled up the Ukrainian's belly nicely. The platinum blonde female sighed, getting herself out of bed, and into the shower. She hummed to herself and Canada as she washed her hair before ending the shower around six.
It came as a shock to her when her prey(?) began to squirm around in her stomach. "Are you alright?" She asked worriedly.

"I'm fine Ukraine. Just reminding you I'm still here," Canada chuckled, leaning into the stomach wall. Ukraine smiled.

"That's good, although I get the feeling more people might have been affected by that spell of England's." Ukraine said.

"So...more prey?" Canada asked.

"Yes." Ukraine replied. "More friends for you."
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Next Day...

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Her plane to the USA took off the next day, and since Canada lived about half a kilometer from the airport, Ukraine decided to read some fanfiction. Some she smiled at, some she growled at, and some she blushed at, all the while occasionally poking her stomach, which had quieted down in terms of movement, to stir her friend. Ukraine sighed as her plane took off the next day.
When she arrived at the airport, since America didn't live too far away (only about a mile), she rented a car and began the long drive. And her gut began to groan and moan again, so she rubbed it.
"In a little bit," she whispered to it as the curvaceous Ukrainian pulled up in America's driveway. When Ukraine opened the door, she gasped at America, who, like she'd thought, was also shrunken down.
"Ukraine! Thank fuck you're here!" America cried out in joy. "I woke up like this and, well, since I'm now so...so short, I can't reach my phone to call England, ask what happened." Ukraine's stomach gurgled (thankfully not in the process of digesting Canada), and she smiled at her girlfriend's(?) sister.
"Sure," she chirped. "I can help." With that said, she gently picked up the shrunken American woman, dropped her in her mouth, and swallowed, tracing her path down into the rumbling organ as Canada finally got some company.
"Sis!" Canada cried out, although Ukraine knew her voice was heavily muffled from the inside. "You're here!"
From what she could feel, the two sisters embraced, hugging each other deeply. "Oh I'm so glad to see you again," America breathed. The two chuckled before the American personification said something Canada heavily blushed at. "Now, I can guess you're wishing Ukraine put you in her womb, aren't you?"
Ukraine herself chuckled. "Alright then," she said to herself, "off to Seychelles it is then."
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Off to America!

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Like America, Seychelles had also shrunken down to about three inches in height. Ukraine smiled, and picked up the panicking nation. "It's okay," she said calmly, "I'm here." After a few minutes, Seychelles calmed down. Then Ukraine's stomach growled again, and she glanced at Seychelles, who was visibly nervous, but calm.
"I think I know what you want to do with me," the African nation said, her face expressionless but her eyes-which Ukraine could barely see-revealed her nervousness. "You w-want to eat me and send me down into your stomach, where I-I'm digested into little more than a nutritional soup. Am I right?"

"No," Ukraine said. "Canada and America are in there, and they aren't being digested. I'm...holding onto them until we figure out what the heck happened." She smiled, and moved the hand holding Seychelles up to her mouth, gently putting the shrunken female in. Seychelles was tasty!
Then Ukraine thought about something, and her aqua blue eyes lit up. She could play with Seychelles using her tongue, or she could swallow Seychelles there and then.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Off to Seychelles!

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Canada blinked as she rose to awareness. What...what happened? She looked up and gasped as her bra became her ceiling.

Did she shrink? "Okay," Madeleine said to herself. "I've just woken up, and, somehow, I have shrunken." The redhead yelped as her door shuddered from a knock. "I've gotta hide!"

Without thinking, she dove into her panties, and prayed that she wouldn't be found. All she had to do was pray she wouldn't be found.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Yet to be discovered

info.brief_description: A shrink interactive featuring various animes. At least 200 GP for good adds
info.description:
Yet another Anime Shrink interactive, The rules are simple

-No excessive cursing, a few phrases is ok but dont have several dozen curses in a single chapter.

-No toilet or anal material. Butt crush is ok.

-Only females are to be big, both men and women can shrink but the interaction must be with a regular sized female.

-Please try to refrain from one or two sentence chapters.

-You can grow a woman if you wish.

-You can shrink characters in anime like cartoons too, like Avatar if you want

Other than this go nuts. If you have any questions please ask me.


UPDATE 1/17/10

Kinda late to mention this but You can also write about certain non anime shows, action stuff like Ben 10 of Star Wars the Clone Wars. To be sure though ask me before hand.

Also again thanks to all who have added, over 500 chapters and 20000 views ^^

UPDATE 1/28/12

Alright! Over 1000 chapters and over 70,000 views!

Thanks to all those who've helped make this possible, Chaos, AX, Albo, KB, Blood, Teniko, Haloichigo, Mr. E: all of you guys! And to those who read, thank you for reading this interactive. Reviews and ratings are welcome
